XXavsata_u:avs_1_2: somo vaḍikaḥ padmāṅkaḥ pañcālo dhūpa eva ca /
XXavsata_u:avs_1_3: rājānaṃ paścimaṃ kṛtvā vargo hy eṣa samudditaḥ //
XXavsata_u:5_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:5_1: tatra bhagavato 'cirābhisaṃbuddhabodher yaśasā ca sarvaloka āpūrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:5_2: atha dakṣiṇāgiriṣu janapade saṃpūrṇo nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:5_3: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalas tyāgaruciḥ pradānaruciḥ pradānābhirato mahati tyāgo vartate /
XXavsata_u:5_4: yāvad asau sarvapāṣaṇḍikaṃ yajñam ārabdho yaṣṭum*,
XXavsata_u:5_6: yadā bhagavatā rājā bimbisāraḥ saparivāro vinītaḥ,
XXavsata_u:5_7: tasya ca vinayād bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi vinayam upagatāni,
XXavsata_u:5_8: tadā rājagṛhāt pūrṇasya jñātayo 'bhyāgatya pūrṇasya purastād buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣayituṃ pravṛttā dharmasya saṃghasya ca /
XXavsata_u:5_9: atha pūrṇo brāhmaṇamahāśālo bhagavato guṇasaṃkīrtanaṃ pratiśrutya mahāntaṃ prasādaṃ pratilabdhavān* /
XXavsata_u:5_10: tataḥ śaraṇam abhiruhya rājagṛhābhimukhaḥ sthitvā ubhau jānumaṇḍale pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya puṣpāṇi kṣipan*,
XXavsata_u:5_11: dhūpam udakaṃ ca bhagavantam āyācituṃ pravṛttaḥ:
XXavsata_u:5_12: āgacchatu bhagavān yajñaṃ me anubhavituṃ yajñavāṭam iti /
XXavsata_u:5_13: atha tāni puṣpāṇi buddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvenopari bhagavataḥ puṣpamaṇḍapaṃ kṣiptvā tasthuḥ dhūpo 'bhrakūṭavad udakaṃ vaiḍūryaśalākavat /
XXavsata_u:5_15: kuta idaṃ bhadanta nimantraṇam āyātam iti /
XXavsata_u:5_16: bhagavān āha: dakṣiṇāgiriṣv ānanda janapade saṃpūrṇo nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati,
XXavsata_u:7_0: tatrāsmābhir gantavyam, sajjībhavantu bhikṣava iti / bhagavān bhikṣusahasraparivṛtto dakṣiṇāgiriṣu janapade cārikāṃ caritvā pūrṇasya brāhmaṇamahāśālasya yajñavāṭasamīpe sthitvā cintām āpede:
XXavsata_u:7_2: atha bhagavāṃs taṃ bhikṣusahasram antardhāpya ekaḥ pātracarakavyagrahastaḥ pūrṇasmīpe sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:7_3: atha pūrṇo brāhmaṇamahāśālo bhagavantaṃ dadarśa dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyaṃjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:7_4: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tvaritatvaritaṃ bhagavataḥ samīpam upasaṃkramya bhagavantam uvāca:
XXavsata_u:7_5: svāgataṃ bhagavan, niṣīdatu bhagavān, kriyatāṃ āsanaparigraho mamānugrahārtham iti /
XXavsata_u:7_6: bhagavān āha: yadi te parityaktaṃ dīyatām asmin pātra iti /
XXavsata_u:7_7: atha pūrṇo brāhmamahāśālaḥ pañcamāṇavakaśataparivṛto bhagavato vividhabhakṣyabhojyakhādyalehyapeyacoṣyādibhir āhārair ārabdhaḥ pātraṃ paripūrayitum* /
XXavsata_u:7_8: bhagavān api svakāt pātrād bhikṣupātreṣv āhāraṃ saṃkramayati /
XXavsata_u:7_9: yadā bhagavato viditaṃ pūrṇāni bhikṣusahasrasya pātrāṇīti,
XXavsata_u:7_14: tataḥ prātihāryadarśanāt pūrṇaḥ prasādajāto mūlanikṛtta iva drumo hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditaḥ udagraprītisaumanasyajāto bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhiṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:7_15: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayitā,
XXavsata_u:7_16: amuktānāṃ mocayitā, anāśvastānām āśvāsayitā, aparinirvṛtānāṃ parinirvāpayiteti /
XXavsata_u:7_17: atha bhagavān pūrṇasya brāhmaṇamahāśālasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt* /
XXavsata_u:7_18: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
XXavsata_u:7_19: kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti / yā adhastād gacchanti tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti,
XXavsata_u:7_22: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
XXavsata_u:7_25: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ,
XXavsata_u:7_26: nāpy anyatropapannāḥ, api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ,
XXavsata_u:7_28: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
XXavsata_u:7_30: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān,
XXavsata_u:9_0: nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
XXavsata_u:avs_1.1_1: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
XXavsata_u:avs_1.2_0: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:10_0: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
XXavsata_u:10_1: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:10_15: ūrṇāyām antardhīyante / anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:10_16: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_1.6_1: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // iti
XXavsata_u:14_0: [Speyer 7] bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat / nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
XXavsata_u:14_2: anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya pūrṇabhadro nāma samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati,
XXavsata_u:14_3: daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca /
XXavsata_u:14_4: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti /
XXavsata_u:14_5: / yadā bhagavatā pūrṇo brāhmaṇamahāśālo 'nuttarāyāṃ smyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:14_6: tadā pūrṇena bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghas traimāsyaṃ yajñavāṭe bhojitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:14_8: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ,
XXavsata_u:14_9: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:14_11: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:17_0: [Speyer 8] buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho vaiśālīm upaniśritya viharati markaṭahradatīre kūṭāgāraśālāyām* /
XXavsata_u:17_1: atha pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghpuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat /
XXavsata_u:17_2: sāvadānīṃ vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā yena siṃhasya senāpater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:17_4: atha siṃhasya senāpateḥ snuṣā yasomatī nama abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā /
XXavsata_u:17_5: sā bhagavato vicitralakṣaṇojjvalakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā atyarthaṃ prasādaṃ labdhavatī /
XXavsata_u:17_6: sā śvaśuraṃ papraccha: asti kaścid upāyo yenāham apy evaṃguṇayuktā syām iti /
XXavsata_u:17_10: kuryād anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānam iti viditvoktavān*:
XXavsata_u:17_12: tvam apy evaṃvidhā bhaviṣyasi yādṛśo bhagavān iti /
XXavsata_u:17_13: [Speyer 9] tataḥ siṃhena senāpatinā yaśomatyāḥ prasādābhivṛddhyarthaṃ prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇaṃ ratnāni ca dattāni /
XXavsata_u:17_14: tato yaśomatyā dārikayā bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:19_1: / atha yaśomatī dārikā suvarṇamayāni puṣpāṇi kārayitvā rūpyamayāṇi ratnamayāni prabhūtagandhamālyavilepanasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā śatarasam āhāraṃ sajjīkṛtya bhagavato dūtena kālam ārocayati:
XXavsata_u:19_2: samayo bhadanta, sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti /
XXavsata_u:19_3: atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena siṃhasya senāpater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:19_4: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:19_5: atha yaśomatī dārikā sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śatarasenāhāreṇa svahastaṃ saṃtarpya puṣpāṇi bhagavati kṣeptum ārabdhā /
XXavsata_u:19_6: atha tāni puṣpāṇi upari bhagavato ratnakūṭāgāro ratnacchatraṃ ratnamaṇḍapa ivāvasthitam*,
XXavsata_u:19_7: yan na na śakyaṃ suśikṣitena karmakāreṇa karmāntevāsinā vā kartum*,
XXavsata_u:19_8: yathāpi tad buddhānāṃ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devānubhāvena /
XXavsata_u:19_9: / atha yaśomatī dārikā tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhā:
XXavsata_u:19_10: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayitā,
XXavsata_u:19_11: amuktānāṃ mocayitā, anāśvastānām āśvāsayitā, aparinirvṛtānāṃ parinirvāpayiteti /
XXavsata_u:19_12: atha bhagavān yaśomatyā dārikāyā hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt /
XXavsata_u:19_13: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
XXavsata_u:19_14: kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti / yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti,
XXavsata_u:19_17: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
XXavsata_u:19_20: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ,
XXavsata_u:19_21: nāpy anyatropapannāḥ, api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ,
XXavsata_u:19_23: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
XXavsata_u:19_25: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān,
XXavsata_u:19_26: yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,

XXavsata_u:avs_2.2_0: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /

XXavsata_u:30_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:30_2: āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:30_4: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:30_5: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā /
XXavsata_u:30_6: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:30_8: na me putro na duhitā / mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:30_10: devatāyācanaṃ kuruṣveti // asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:30_11: tac ca naivam* / yady evam abhaviṣyat, ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:30_12: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:30_13: katameṣāṃ trayāṇām* / mātāpitarāu raktau bhavataḥ saṃnipatitau /
XXavsata_u:30_14: mātā kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī / gandharvaś ca pratyupasthito bhavati /
XXavsata_u:30_15: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:30_16: tathā hy asau śramaṇabrāhmaṇanaimittikasuhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhavavipralabdho 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:30_17: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:30_18: sahajāḥ sahadharmikā nityānubandhā api devatā āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:30_20: anyatamaś ca satvo 'nyatamasmāt satvanikāyāc cyutvā tasyāḥ prajāpatyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:30_22: katame pañca / raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti, viraktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti / kālaṃ jānāti ṛtuṃ jānāti / garbham avakrāntaṃ jānāti / yasya sakāśād garbho 'vakrāmati taṃ jānāti /
XXavsata_u:30_23: dārakaṃ jānāti / dārikāṃ jānāti / saced dārako bhavati dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:30_24: saced dārikā bhavati vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:30_26: diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhase / āpannasatvāsmi saṃvṛttā / yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:32_0: pūrvakāyam atyunnamayya *{abhyunnamayya}* dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udānayati:
XXavsata_u:32_2: jāto me syān nāvajātaḥ / kṛtyāni me kurvīta / bhṛtaḥ pratibibhṛyāt / dāyād yaṃ pratipadyeta / kulavaṃśo me cirasthitikaḥ syāt* /
XXavsata_u:32_3: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā kṛtyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyati:
XXavsata_u:32_4: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:32_6: śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair nātikaṣāyais tiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukakaṣāyavivarjitair āhārair hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharimāṃ bhūmim* /
XXavsata_u:32_7: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
XXavsata_u:32_8: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:32_11: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:32_13: jñātayaḥ ūcuḥ: yasmād asya janmani sarvakulaṃ nanditam,
XXavsata_u:32_14: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya nanda iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:32_16: / nando dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:32_17: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:32_19: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ paṃcavarṣaḥ ṣaḍvarṣo vā,
XXavsata_u:32_23: / atha śreṣṭhina etad abhavat: so 'pi me kadācit karhicid devatārādhanayā putro jātaḥ,
XXavsata_u:32_27: yo nāma svasthaśarīro bhūtvā paśur iva saṃtiṣṭhatīti /
XXavsata_u:32_29: tena ṣaṭ tīrthikāḥ śāstāraḥ svagṛham āhūtāḥ:
XXavsata_u:32_30: api nāma ayaṃ dārakas teṣāṃ darśanād gauravajātaḥ śayanāsanād api tāvad uttiṣṭhet* /
XXavsata_u:32_31: atha kusīdo dārakas tāṃś chāstṝn dṛṣṭvā cakṣuḥsaṃprekṣaṇām api na kṛtavān*,
XXavsata_u:32_32: kaḥ punar vāda utthāsyati vā abhivādayiṣyati vā,
XXavsata_u:32_34: atha sa gṛhapatis tām evāvasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā suṣṭhutaram utkaṇṭhitaḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:32_35: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:32_36: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ
XXavsata_u:34_0: navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya ca buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:34_1: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam* /
XXavsata_u:avs_3.1_1: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
XXavsata_u:35_0: paśyati bhagavān: ayaṃ dārakaḥ kusīdo maddarśanād vīryam ārapsyate yāvad anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ pariṇāmayiṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:35_1: tato bhagavatā tīrthyānāṃ madadarpacchittyarthaṃ dārakasya ca kuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāḥ kanakavarṇamarīcaya utsṛṣṭāḥ,
XXavsata_u:35_5: sa itaś cāmutaś ca prekṣitum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:35_6: kasya prabhāvān mama śarīraṃ prahlāditam iti /
XXavsata_u:35_7: tato bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtas tad gṛhaṃ praviveśa /
XXavsata_u:35_8: dadarśa kusīdo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣulakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛta aśītyā cānuvyaṃjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:35_9: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ paraṃ prasādam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:35_10: sahasā svayam evotthāya bhagavato 'rthe āsanaṃ prajñapayati /
XXavsata_u:35_11: evaṃ cāha: etu bhagavān, svāgataṃ bhagavataḥ, niṣīdatu bhagavān prajñapta evāsana iti /
XXavsata_u:35_12: athāsya mātāpitarāv antarjanaś cādṛṣṭapūrvaprabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaṃ vismayam āpannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:35_13: tataḥ kusīdo dārako harṣavikasitābhyāṃ nayanābhyāṃ bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:35_15: vīryārambhasya cānuśaṃsaḥ / candanamayīṃ cāsya yaṣṭim anuprayacchati:
XXavsata_u:35_17: sa tām ākoṭayitum ārabdhaḥ / athāsau yaṣṭir ākoṭyamānā manojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ karoti,
XXavsata_u:35_19: tasyaitad abhavat: mahān batāyaṃ vīryārambhe viśeṣo yanv ahaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā vīryam ārabheyeti /
XXavsata_u:35_20: sa śrāvastyāṃ ghaṇṭāv avaghoṣaṇaṃ sārthavāham ātmānam udghoṣya ṣaḍvārān mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:35_21: tataḥ siddhayānapātreṇa mahāratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā bhagavān antarniveśane saśrāvakasaṃgho bhojitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:35_23: atha bhagavān kusīdasya dārakasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt /
XXavsata_u:35_24: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
XXavsata_u:37_0: adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti,
XXavsata_u:37_3: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
XXavsata_u:37_6: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ,
XXavsata_u:37_7: nāpy anyatropapannāḥ / api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ,
XXavsata_u:37_9: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti /
XXavsata_u:37_10: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
XXavsata_u:avs_3.2_0: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:38_0: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
XXavsata_u:38_1: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:38_15: ūrṇāyām antardhīyante / anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:38_16: atha ca tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_3.6_3: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // iti
XXavsata_u:43_0: bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat / nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
XXavsata_u:43_1: paśyasy ānanda anena kusīdena dārakeṇa mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:43_2: evaṃ bhadanta / eṣa ānanda kuśido dārako 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ ṣaṭpāramitāḥ paripūrya atibalavīryaparākramo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati,
XXavsata_u:43_3: daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca /
XXavsata_u:43_4: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti /
XXavsata_u:43_5: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:45_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:45_1: śrāvastyām anyatamo mahāsārthavāho mahāsamudrād bhagnayānapātra āgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:45_2: sa dvir api trir api svadevatāyācanaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇo bhagnayānapātra evāgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:45_4: sa imāṃ cintām āpede: ko me upāyaḥ svādyena dhanārjanaṃ kuryām iti /
XXavsata_u:45_5: tasyaitad abhavat: ayaṃ buddho bhagavān sarvadevaprativiśiṣṭataraḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahādharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ,
XXavsata_u:45_6: yanv aham idānīm asya nāmnā punar api mahāsamudram avatareyam* /
XXavsata_u:45_7: siddhayānapātras tv āgaccheyaṃ ced upārdhena dhanenāsya pūjāṃ kuryām iti /
XXavsata_u:47_0: sa evaṃ kṛtavyavasāyaḥ punar api mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:47_1: buddhānubhāvena ca ratnadvīpaṃ saṃprāpya mahāratnasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā kuśalasvastinā svagṛham anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:47_2: sa mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya bhāṇḍaṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:47_3: tasya nānāvicitrāṇi ratnāni dṛṣṭvā mahāṃllābha utpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:47_4: cintayati ca: mayā īdṛśānāṃ ratnānāṃ śramaṇasya gautamasya upārdhaṃ dātavyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:47_5: yanv aham etāni svasyāḥ patnyā āyaḥ /
XXavsata_u:47_6: tena kārṣāpaṇadvayena vikrīya bhagavato gandhaṃ dadyām iti /
XXavsata_u:47_9: atha bahagavāṃs tad rūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yena sa dhūpa upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya sarvāṃ ca śrāvastīṃ sphuritvā mahadabhrakūṭavad avasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:47_10: tasya tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahān prasāda utpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:47_11: sa svacittaṃ paribhāṣitavān: naitan mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ ratnair nābhyarcayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:47_12: / atha tena sārthavāhena bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho 'ntarniveśane bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:47_14: tatas tāni ratnāni upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya mūrdhni bhagavato ratnakūṭāgāro ratnacchatraṃ ratnamaṇḍapaś cāvasthitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:47_15: yan na śakyaṃ suśikṣitena karmakāreṇa karmāntevāsinā vā kartum*,
XXavsata_u:47_16: yathāpi tad buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena /
XXavsata_u:47_17: atha sārthavāho dviguṇajātaprasādas tatpratihāryadarśanān mūlanikṛtta iva drumo bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:47_18: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita,
XXavsata_u:47_19: amuktānāṃ mocayitā, anāśvastānām āśvāsayitā, aparinirvṛtānāṃ parinirvāpayiteti /
XXavsata_u:47_20: atha bhagavāṃs tasya sārthavāhasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāviṣkārṣīt /
XXavsata_u:47_21: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
XXavsata_u:47_22: kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti / yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti,
XXavsata_u:47_25: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
XXavsata_u:47_28: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutā nāpy anyatropapannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:47_31: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
XXavsata_u:47_33: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān,
XXavsata_u:47_34: yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ
XXavsata_u:49_0: parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
XXavsata_u:avs_4.1_1: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
XXavsata_u:avs_4.2_0: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:50_0: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
XXavsata_u:50_1: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:50_15: ūrṇāyām antardhīyante / anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati,

XXavsata_u:60_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:60_1: śrāvastyām anyatamo gṛhapatiḥ śreṣṭhī prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:60_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:60_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ gṛhapateḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:60_7: / tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā vaḍika iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtavān pitā /
XXavsata_u:60_8: vaḍiko dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattaḥ aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:60_9: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:60_11: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ pañcavarṣo ṣaḍvarṣo vā,
XXavsata_u:60_12: tadā gurau bhaktiṃ kṛtvā sarvaśāstrāṇi adhītāni /
XXavsata_u:60_14: tad anantaraṃ tasya vaḍikasya kiṃcit pūrvajanmakṛtakarmavipākena śarīre kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ patitam iti duḥkhī bhūtaś cintāparaḥ sthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:60_15: kiṃ pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā, yad idaṃ kāyikaṃ duḥkhaṃ mama śarīre jātam* /
XXavsata_u:60_16: tasya pitāpi putrasyedaṃ kāyikaṃ duḥkhabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahadudvignaḥ putrātyayaśaṅkhayā dīnamānasaḥ śokāśruvyāptavadanas tvaritaṃ vaidyam āhūya tasya putrasya rogaṃ darśayati:
XXavsata_u:62_0: kena hetunā mama putrasya dehe jāta iti /
XXavsata_u:62_1: tataḥ sa vaidyas tasya rogacihnaṃ dṛṣṭvā cikitsāṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:62_3: punar vṛddhir bhavati / pitā putrasya rogaṃ vṛddhaṃ jātaṃ dṛṣṭvā avaśyaṃ putro mariṣyati,
XXavsata_u:62_4: yad vaidyenāpi cāsya rogasya cikitsituṃ na śakyate,
XXavsata_u:62_6: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūyo 'pi putrasya cintā jātā /
XXavsata_u:62_8: sa dārako rogī bhūto 'śakyo 'pi vadituṃ kathaṃcit pitaraṃ babhāṣe:
XXavsata_u:62_9: mā tāta sāhasam* / dhairyam avalambyottiṣṭha / mamātyayāśaṅkayā mā bhūs tvam api mādṛśaḥ /
XXavsata_u:62_11: dānaṃ dehi / tato mama svasthā *{svāsthaṃ}* bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:62_12: sa gṛhapatir iti putrasya vaca ākarṇya sarvadevebhyaḥ pūjāṃ kṛtavān* /
XXavsata_u:62_16: sarvadeveṣu pūjā kṛtā, dāno 'pi dattaḥ pitrā mama, tathāpi svasthā na bhavati / tatas tathāgataguṇān anusmṛtya buddhaṃ namaskāraṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:62_17: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:62_18: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya [ca] buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:62_19: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam* /
XXavsata_u:avs_6.1_1: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet //
XXavsata_u:63_0: tato bhagavatā vaḍikasya gṛhapateḥ putrasya tām avasthāṃ dṛṣṭvā sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāḥ kanakavarṇā marīcayaḥ sṛṣṭāḥ,
XXavsata_u:63_7: praviśatu bhagavān, svāgataṃ bhagavate, ākāṅkṣāmi bhagavato darśanam iti /
XXavsata_u:63_8: atha bhagavān praviśya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:63_10: kiṃ te vaḍika bādhata iti / vaḍika uvāca: kāyikaṃ ca me duḥkhaṃ cetasikaṃ
XXavsata_u:65_3: aho bata śakro devendro gandhamādanāt parvatāt kṣīrikām oṣadhīm ānayed iti /
XXavsata_u:65_4: sahacittotpādād bhagavataḥ śakro devendro gandhamādanāt parvatāt kṣīrikām oṣadhīm ānīya bhagavate dattavān* /
XXavsata_u:65_5: bhagavatā ca svapāṇinā gṛhītvā vaḍikāya dattā:
XXavsata_u:65_7: sa kāyikaṃ prasrabdhisukhaṃ labdhvā bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādayāmāsa /
XXavsata_u:65_8: prasannacittaś ca rājñaḥ prasenajito nivedya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā śatasahasreṇa vastreṇācchadya sarvapuṣpamālyair abhyarcitavān* /
XXavsata_u:65_9: tataś cetanāṃ puṣṇāti sma, praṇidhiṃ ca cakāra: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena yathaivāhaṃ bhagavatā anuttareṇa vaidyarājena cikitsitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:65_10: evam aham apy anāgate 'dhvani andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita,
XXavsata_u:65_11: amuktānāṃ mocayitā, anāśvastānām āśvāsayitā, aparinirvṛtānāṃ parinirvāpayiteti /
XXavsata_u:65_12: atha bhagavān vaḍikasya dhātuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt /
XXavsata_u:65_13: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
XXavsata_u:65_14: kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti / yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti,
XXavsata_u:65_17: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
XXavsata_u:65_20: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ,
XXavsata_u:65_21: nāpy anyatropapannāḥ / api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ,
XXavsata_u:65_23: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti yatra satyānāṃ bhājanabhūtā bhavanti /
XXavsata_u:65_24: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
XXavsata_u:avs_6.2_1: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
XXavsata_u:avs_6.3_0: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /

XXavsata_u:79_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:79_2: tadā rājā prasenajit tīrthikadevatārcanaṃ kṛtavān puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:79_4: rājā ca prasenajid daharasūtrodāharaṇena vinīto bhagavacchāsane śraddhāṃ pratilabdhavān,
XXavsata_u:79_5: tadā prītisaumanasyajātas trir bhagavantam upasaṃkramya dīpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanair abhyarcayati /
XXavsata_u:79_6: athānyatama ārāmiko navaṃ padmam ādāya rājñaḥ prasenajito 'rthaṃ śrāvastīṃ praviśati /
XXavsata_u:79_8: kim idaṃ padmaṃ vikrīṇiṣye? sa kathayati:
XXavsata_u:79_9: āmeti / sa kretukāmo yāvad anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatis taṃ pradeśam anuprataḥ /
XXavsata_u:79_11: tataḥ parasparaṃ vardhamānau yāvac chatasahasraṃ vardhitavantau /
XXavsata_u:79_12: athārāmikasyaitad abhavat*: ayam anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir acañcalaḥ sthirasatvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:79_14: tena saṃśayajātena sa tīrthikābhiprasannaḥ puruṣaḥ pṛsṭaḥ:
XXavsata_u:79_16: sa āha: ahaṃ bhagavato nārāyaṇasyārthe iti /
XXavsata_u:79_17: / anāthapiṇḍada āha: ahaṃ bhagavato buddhasyārthe iti /
XXavsata_u:79_18: ārāmika āha: ka eṣa buddho nāmeti? tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena vistareṇāsya buddhaguṇā ākhyātāḥ /
XXavsata_u:79_20: gṛhapate ahaṃ svayam eva taṃ bhagavantam abhyarcayiṣya iti /
XXavsata_u:79_21: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir ārāmikam ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:79_22: dadarśārāmiko buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyaṃjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:79_23: sahadarśanāc ca ārāmikeṇa tat padmaṃ bhagavati kṣiptam* /
XXavsata_u:79_24: tataḥ kṣiptamātraṃ śakaṭacakramāṇaṃ bhūtvā upari bhagavataḥ sthitam* /
XXavsata_u:79_25: atha sa ārāmikas tat pratihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūlanikṛtta iva drumo bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭaś cetanāṃ puṣṇāti,
XXavsata_u:79_27: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita,
XXavsata_u:79_28: amuktānāṃ mocayitā, anāśvastānām āśvāsayitā, aparinirvṛtānāṃ parinirvāpayiteti /
XXavsata_u:79_29: atha bhagavāṃs tasyārāmikasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt /

XXavsata_u:87_2: evaṃ bhadanta / eṣa ārāmiko 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya padmottamo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati,
XXavsata_u:87_3: daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca /
XXavsata_u:87_4: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti /
XXavsata_u:87_5: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:90_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:90_1: / tena khalu samayenottarapañcālarājo dakṣiṇapañcālarājena saha prativiruddho babhuva /
XXavsata_u:90_2: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalyo yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:90_3: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:90_4: ekānte niṣaṇṇo rājā prasenajit kauśalyo bhagavantam idam avocat* :
XXavsata_u:90_5: bhagavān nāma bhadanta anuttaro dharmarājo vyasanagatānāṃ satvānāṃ paritrātā,
XXavsata_u:90_7: ayaṃ cottarapañcālo rājā dakṣiṇapañcālarājena saha prativiruddhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:92_0: kuryād anukampām upādāyeti / adhivāsayati bhagavān rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalyasya tūṣṇībhāvena /
XXavsata_u:92_1: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalyo bhagavatas tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:92_2: atha bhagavāṃs tasyā eva rātrer atyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya yena vārāṇasī kāśīnāṃ nagaraṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:92_3: anupūrveṇa cārikāṃ caran vārāṇasīm anuprāpto vārāṇasyāṃ viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:92_4: yāvat tayor viditaṃ bhagavān asmadvijitam anuprāpta iti /
XXavsata_u:92_5: yāvad bhagavatā ṛddhibalena caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ nirmāyottarapañcālarājas trāsitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:92_6: sa bhīta ekaratham abhiruhya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:92_8: sa taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā bhagavatsakāśe pravrajite /
XXavsata_u:92_9: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:92_12: praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita,
XXavsata_u:92_13: amuktānāṃ mocayitā, anāśvastānām āśvāsayitā, aparinirvṛtānāṃ parinirvāpayiteti /
XXavsata_u:92_14: atha bhagavāṃs dakṣiṇapañcālarājasya hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt /
XXavsata_u:92_15: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
XXavsata_u:92_16: kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti / yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti,
XXavsata_u:92_19: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
XXavsata_u:92_21: teṣāṃ nirmitaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca evaṃ bhavati:
XXavsata_u:92_22: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutā nāpy anyatropapannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:92_25: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
XXavsata_u:92_27: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān,
XXavsata_u:92_28: yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
XXavsata_u:avs_8.1_1: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
XXavsata_u:avs_8.2_0: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:94_0: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /

XXavsata_u:103_4: dvitīyo buddhe bhagavati / tatas tayoḥ parasparaṃ kathāsāṃkathyaviniścaye vartamāne pūraṇopāsaka āha:
XXavsata_u:103_6: buddhopāsaka āha: bhagavān samyaksaṃbuddho viśiṣṭatara iti /
XXavsata_u:103_9: tenāmātyānām ājñā dattā: tayor mīmāṃsā kartavyeti / tatas tair amātyaiḥ sarvavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam*:
XXavsata_u:103_11: ye cādbhutāni draṣṭukāmās te āgacchantv iti /
XXavsata_u:103_12: tataḥ saptame divase vistīrṇāvakāśe pṛthivīpradeśe 'nekeṣu prāṇiśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu gaganatale cānekeṣu devatāsahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu gomayamaṇḍalake kḷpte sarvagandhamālyeṣūpahṛteṣu pūrvataraṃ tīrthikopāsakena satyopayācanaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:103_13: yena satyena pūraṇaprabhṛtayaḥ ṣaṭ śāstāro loke śreṣṭhāḥ,
XXavsata_u:103_14: anena satyenemāni puṣpāṇi ayaṃ ca dhūpaḥ idaṃ ca pānīyaṃ tān upagacchantv iti /
XXavsata_u:103_17: agnir nirvṛtaḥ, pānīyaṃ pṛthivyām astaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gatam* /
XXavsata_u:103_21: pradhyānaparamaḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:103_22: tato bhagavacchrāvakeṇa harṣotkaṇṭhajātena prasādavikasitābhyāṃ nayanābhyām ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya satyopayācanaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:103_24: anena satyenemāni puṣpāṇi dhūpa udakaṃ bhagavantam upagacchantv iti /
XXavsata_u:103_25: evaṃ pravyāhṛtamātro tāni puṣpāṇi haṃsapaṃktir ivākāśe jetavanābhimukhaṃ saṃprasthitāni,
XXavsata_u:103_26: dhupo 'bhrakūṭavat*, udakaṃ vaiḍūryaśalākavat* / atha sa mahājanakāyas tat prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā kilakilāpravekṣveḍoccaiḥśabdhaṃ kurvaṃs teṣāṃ saṃprasthitānāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:105_0: tatas tāni puṣpāṇi bhagavata upari sthitāni,
XXavsata_u:105_1: dhūpa udakaṃ cāgrataḥ / tataḥ sa mahājanakāyo labdhaprasādo bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśrāvaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:105_2: teṣāṃ bhagavān idaṃ sūtraṃ bhāṣate sma:
XXavsata_u:105_5: dharme, saṃghe agraprajñaptiḥ / buddhe agraprajñaptiḥ katamā? ye kecid brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ satvā apadā vā dvipadā vā bahupadā vā,
XXavsata_u:105_6: rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo vā, saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā, naivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñinaḥ, tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas teṣām agra ākhyātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:105_8: agre te 'bhiprasannāḥ / teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyo deveṣu vā devabhūtānāṃ manuṣyeṣu vā manuṣyabhūtānām* /

XXavsata_u:105_22: kaiścit pravrajya idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā,
