XXavsata_u:116_1: tena khalu samayena rājā prasenajit kauśalo rājā ca ajātaśatruḥ ubhāv apy etau parasparaṃ viruddhau babhūvatauḥ /
XXavsata_u:116_2: athā rājā ajātaśatruś caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnahya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalam abhiniryāto yuddhāya /
XXavsata_u:116_4: rājā ajātaśatruś caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnahya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ ca abhiniryāto yuddhāyeti /
XXavsata_u:116_5: śrutvā ca caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnahya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ rājānam ajātaśatruṃ pratyabhiniryāto yuddhāya /
XXavsata_u:116_6: atha rājñā ajātaśatruṇā rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya sarvo hastikāyaḥ paryastaḥ,
XXavsata_u:116_8: rājā prasenajit kauśalo jito bhīto bhagnaḥ parājitaḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛta ekarathena śrāvastīṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:118_0: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ śokāgaraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:118_1: tatra ca śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:118_2: tena śrutaṃ yathā rājā prasenajit kauśalo jito bhagnaḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:118_3: ekaratheneha praviṣṭa iti / śrutvā ca punar yena rājā prasenajit kauśalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:118_4: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā ca (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:118_5: uvāca): kimarthaṃ deva śokaḥ kriyate? ahaṃ devasya tāvat suvarṇam anuprayacchāmi,
XXavsata_u:118_6: yena devaḥ punar api yatheṣṭapracāraṇaṃ kariṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:118_8: yatropaviṣṭaḥ puruṣa utthitaṃ puruṣaṃ na paśyati,
XXavsata_u:118_9: atha rājñā prasenajitkauśalyena svaviṣaye carapuruṣāḥ samantata utsṛṣṭāḥ:
XXavsata_u:118_10: śṛṇuta janapravādān iti / yāvaj jetavane dvau mallāv anyonyaṃ saṃjalpaṃ kurutaḥ:
XXavsata_u:118_11: asti kesarī nāma saṃgrāmaḥ / tatra ye kātarāḥ puruṣās te saṃgrāmaśirasi sthāpyante,
XXavsata_u:118_12: ye madhyās te madhye, ye utkṛṣṭāḥ śūrapuruṣās te pṛṣṭhata iti /
XXavsata_u:118_14: śrutvā ca rājā prasenajit kauśalas tathā caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ ca rājānam ajātaśatrum abhiniryāto yuddhāya /
XXavsata_u:118_15: tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena rājño 'jātaśatror vaidehīputrasya sarvo hastikāyaḥ paryastaḥ,
XXavsata_u:118_17: rājānam apy ajātaśatruṃ vaidehīputraṃ jitaṃ bhītabhagnaparājitaṃ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtaṃ jīvagrāhaṃ gṛhītvā ekarathe 'bhiropya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:118_18: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣīdati /
XXavsata_u:118_19: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo rājā prasenajitkauśalo bhagavantam ity avocat:
XXavsata_u:118_20: ayaṃ hi bhadanta rājā ajātaśatrur dīrgharātram avairasya me vairī,
XXavsata_u:118_21: asapatnasya sapatnaḥ / na cecchāmy enaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayitum*,
XXavsata_u:118_23: muñcāmy enam iti / muñca mahārājety uktvā bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:avs_10.1_1: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
XXavsata_u:119_3: yanv aham enaṃ vareṇa pravārayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:119_4: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalas taṃ śreṣṭhinaṃ vareṇa prāvarayati /
XXavsata_u:119_5: sa kathayati: ākāṃkṣāmi varam*, saptāhaṃ me yathābhirucitaṃ rājyam anuprayacchateti /
XXavsata_u:119_7: dattaṃ me śreṣṭhine saptāham ekaṃ rājyam iti /
XXavsata_u:119_8: yāvat tena śreṣṭhinā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ saptāhaṃ bkahtenopanimantritaḥ,
XXavsata_u:119_12: saptāhaṃ yūyaṃ sakalā yatheṣṭacāriṇaḥ sukhasparśaṃ viharata /
XXavsata_u:121_0: bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca / māmakaṃ ca bhojanaṃ muñjānās tathāgataṃ paryupāsadhvam iti /
XXavsata_u:121_1: tena saptāhaṃ bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho mahatā satkāreṇa satkṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:121_3: saptāhasyātyayena bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya cetanāṃ puṣṇāti,
XXavsata_u:121_4: praṇidhiṃ ca cakāra: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita,
XXavsata_u:121_5: amuktānāṃ mocayitā, anāśvastānām āśvāsayitā, aparinirvṛtānāṃ parinirvāpayiteti /
XXavsata_u:121_6: atha bhagavāṃs tasya śreṣṭhino hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt /
XXavsata_u:121_7: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
XXavsata_u:121_8: kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti / yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti,
XXavsata_u:121_11: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
XXavsata_u:121_14: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutā nāpy anyatropapannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:121_17: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
XXavsata_u:121_19: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān,
XXavsata_u:121_20: yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
XXavsata_u:avs_10.2_0: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:122_0: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
XXavsata_u:122_1: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:124_2: ūrṇāyām antardhīyante / anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:124_3: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_10.6_3: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // iti
XXavsata_u:129_0: bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat / nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
XXavsata_u:129_1: paśyasi tvam ānanda anena śreṣṭhinā tathāgatasya saśrāvakasaṃghasyaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:129_3: evaṃ bhadanta / eṣa ānanda śreṣṭhī 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya abhayaprado nāma samyaksaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati,
XXavsata_u:129_4: daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca /
XXavsata_u:129_5: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti /
XXavsata_u:129_6: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:132_0: nāvā stambhaṃ ca snātraṃ ca tathetiḥ pratisārakam* (pratihāryakam*) /
XXavsata_u:135_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati nadyā ajiravatyā adhastān nāvikagrāme /
XXavsata_u:135_1: atha te nāvikā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:135_2: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte nyaṣīdan* /
XXavsata_u:135_3: ekāntaniṣaṇṇāṃs tān nāvikān bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
XXavsata_u:135_4: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
XXavsata_u:135_5: atha te nāvikā utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam ūcuḥ:
XXavsata_u:135_6: adhivāsayatu bhagavān asmākaṃ nadyā ajiravatyās tīre śvo bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
XXavsata_u:135_9: atha nāvikā nadyā ajiravatyās tīram apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpayāmāsur ucchritacchatradhvajapatākaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ gandhaghaṭikāvadhūpitam* /
XXavsata_u:135_10: praṇītam āhāraṃ kṛtavantaḥ / prabhūtaṃ ca puṣpasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā nausaṃkramaṃ puṣpamaṇḍapair alaṃkārayāmāsuḥ /
XXavsata_u:135_14: atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena nāvikagrāmakas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:135_15: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat* /
XXavsata_u:135_16: atha te nāvikāḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati /
XXavsata_u:135_17: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcatarāṇy āsanāni gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:135_18: atha bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ nāvikānām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:135_19: yāṃ śrutvā anekair nāvikaiḥ srotaāpattiphalāni prāptāni,
XXavsata_u:135_24: sarvā ca sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā /
XXavsata_u:135_25: tatas tair nāvikair bhagavān mahatā satkāreṇa nausaṃkrameṇottāritaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
XXavsata_u:137_0: bhikṣavo buddhapūjādarśanād āvarjitamanaso buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:137_2: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni,
XXavsata_u:137_5: tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:137_6: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani bhāgīratho nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:137_7: sa dvāṣaṣṭyarhatsahasraparivṛto janapadacārikāṃ caran gaṅgātīram anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:137_8: tasmin samaye 'nyataraḥ sārthavāho 'nekaśataparivāro nadyāṃ gaṅgāyāṃ sārtham uttārayati /
XXavsata_u:137_10: atha dadarśa sārthavāho bhāgīrathaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvāṣaṣṭyarhatsahasraparivṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:137_15: tatas tena sārthavāhena bhāgīrathaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dvāṣaṣṭyarhatsahasraparivṛto mahatyā vibhūtyā nausaṃkrameṇottāritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:137_16: praṇītena cāhāreṇa saṃtarpyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:137_17: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena sārthavāho babhūva,
XXavsata_u:137_18: ahaṃ saḥ / mayā sa bhāgīrathaḥ, samyaksaṃbuddho dvāṣaṣṭyarhatsahasraparivṛto nausaṃkrameṇottāritaḥ,
XXavsata_u:137_19: praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ, praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtam* / tasya me karmaṇo vipākenānantasaṃsāre mahatsukham anubhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:137_20: idānīm apy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyaivavidhā pūjā /
XXavsata_u:137_22: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:137_23: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:137_25: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:140_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kauravyeṣu janapadacārikāṃ caran kauravyaṃ nagaram anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:140_1: sa ca kauravyo janakāyo buddhavaineya udāracitaḥ pradānaruciś ca /
XXavsata_u:140_3: yanv ahaṃ śakraṃ devendraṃ marudgaṇaparivṛtam āhveyeyam,
XXavsata_u:142_0: syād iti / tato bhagavāṃl laukikaṃ cittam utpādayati:
XXavsata_u:142_1: aho bata śakro devendro marudgaṇasahāyo gośīrṣacandanamayaṃ stambham ādāya gacched iti /
XXavsata_u:142_2: / sahacittotpādāc chakro devendro marudgaṇaparivṛto āgato yatra viśvakarmā catvāraś ca mahārājā anekadevanāgayakṣakumbhāṇḍaparivṛto gośīrṣacandanastambham ādāya /
XXavsata_u:142_3: hāhākārakilakilāprakṣveḍoccair nādaṃ kurvāṇā bhagavato 'rthe gośīrṣacandanamayaṃ prāsādam abhisaṃskṛtavantaḥ /
XXavsata_u:142_4: tatas tasmin prāsāde śakreṇa devendreṇa bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho divyenāhāreṇa divyena śayanāsanena divyair gandhamālyapuṣpaiḥ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:142_5: atha kauravyo janakāyas tāṃ divyāṃ vibhūṣikāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpanna imāṃ cintām āpede:
XXavsata_u:142_7: yat tu nāma sendrair devaiḥ pūjyata iti āvarjitamanā bhagavantam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:142_9: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ kauravyo janakāyas tasmin prāsāde 'tyarthaṃ prasādam utpādayati /
XXavsata_u:142_10: tena bhagavāṃs tat prāsādam antardhāpya anityatāpratisaṃyuktāṃ tādṛśīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān*,
XXavsata_u:142_11: yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ kauravyanivāsibhir manuṣyaiḥ srotaāpattiphalāny anuprāptāni,
XXavsata_u:142_15: kaiścit pratyekāyāṃ bodhau, kaiścid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
XXavsata_u:142_16: sarvā ca sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā /
XXavsata_u:142_17: tatas te bhikṣavo bhagavato divyapūjādarśanād āvarjitamanaso buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:142_19: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni,
XXavsata_u:142_22: tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:142_23: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani brahmā nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:142_24: atha brahmā samyaksaṃbuddho dvāṣaṣṭyarhatsahasraparivṛto janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:142_26: brahmā samyaksaṃbuddho dvāṣaṣṭyarhatsahasraparivṛto janapadacārikāṃ carann asmākaṃ vijitam anuprāpta iti /
XXavsata_u:142_27: śrutvā ca punar mahatyā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena yena bhagavān brahmā samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:142_28: upasaṃkramya brahmaṇaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte nyaṣīdat* /
XXavsata_u:142_29: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ bhagavān bodhikarakair dharmaiḥ samādāpayati /
XXavsata_u:142_30: atha sa labdhaprasāda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:143_4: atha sa rājā mūrdhābhiṣikto bhagavato 'rthe gośīrṣacandanamayaṃ prāsādaṃ kārayāmāsa /
XXavsata_u:143_5: sa taṃ vicitrair vastrālaṃkārair alaṃkṛtaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ gandhaghaṭikādhūpitaṃ bhagavataḥ saśrāvakasaṃghasya niryātya traimāsyaṃ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya vividhair vastraviśeṣair ācchādyānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhiṃ cakāra /
XXavsata_u:143_6: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto babhūva,
XXavsata_u:143_7: ahaṃ saḥ / yan mayā brahmaṇaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaivaṃvidhā pūjā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:143_8: tasya me karmaṇo vipākenānantasaṃsāre mahatsukham anubhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:143_9: idānīm apy anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasyaivavidhā pūjā /
XXavsata_u:143_11: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:143_12: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:143_14: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:146_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:146_1: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni kāntāramārgapratipannāni /
XXavsata_u:146_3: te dharmaśramaparipīḍitāḥ kṣīṇapathyādanāś ca madhyāhnasamaye tīkṣṇakararaśmisaṃtāpitā jaloddhṛtā iva matsyāḥ pṛthivyām āvartante duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānāḥ /
XXavsata_u:146_8: sa tān vaṇija āha: bhavanto buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchantv iti /
XXavsata_u:146_9: tata ekaraveṇa sarva eva buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:146_10: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:146_11: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ
XXavsata_u:148_0: navānupūrva{vihāra}samāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya [ca] buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:148_1: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ /
XXavsata_u:148_2: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:avs_13.1_0: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
XXavsata_u:avs_13.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:149_0: yāvat paśyati bhagavān saṃbahulān vaṇijo vyasanasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptān* /
XXavsata_u:149_1: tataś cakṣuḥsaṃpreṣaṇamātreṇa jetavane 'ntarhito bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:149_5: aho bata śakro devendro māhendraṃ varṣam utsṛjatu,
XXavsata_u:149_7: sahacittotpādād bhagavataḥ śakreṇa māhendraṃ varṣam utsṛṣṭam*,
XXavsata_u:149_8: śītalāś ca vāyavaḥ preṣitāḥ, yatas teṣāṃ vaṇijāṃ tṛṣā vigatā,
XXavsata_u:149_9: dāhaś ca praśāntaḥ / tatas tair vaṇigbhiḥ saṃjñā pratilabdhā /
XXavsata_u:149_10: bhagavatā caiṣāṃ mārga ākhyāto yena śrāvastīm anuprāptāḥ /
XXavsata_u:149_11: te mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya tato bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:149_12: teṣāṃ bhagavatā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:149_14: kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalam*, kaiścid anāgāmiphalam*, kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:149_16: kaiścit pratyekāyāṃ bodhau, kaiścid anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
XXavsata_u:149_17: yadbhūyasā ca sā parṣad buddhanimnā dharmapravaṇā saṃghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā /
XXavsata_u:149_18: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:149_19: āścaryaṃ bhagavān*, yāvad ime vaṇijo bhagavatā kāntāramārgāt paritrātāḥ /
XXavsata_u:149_22: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:149_24: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:149_25: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
XXavsata_u:150_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani candano nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā
XXavsata_u:152_1: atha candanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:152_2: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto yena candanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:152_3: upasaṃkramya candanasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte nyaṣīdat* /
XXavsata_u:152_4: ekānte niṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ candanaṃ samyaksaṃbuddo bodhikarakair dharmaiḥ samādāpayati /
XXavsata_u:152_5: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena candanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya candanaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:152_6: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān asyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ traimāsyavāsāya sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃgheneti /
XXavsata_u:152_8: tatra ca samayena mahatī anāvṛṣṭiḥ prādurbhūtā,
XXavsata_u:152_11: / tato rājā candanaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham adhyeṣituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:152_12: bhagavann asmin nagaramadhye puṣkariṇīṃ gandhodakaparipūrṇāṃ karayiṣyāmi,
XXavsata_u:152_14: apy eva nāma bhagavataḥ snānād asmin me vijite devo varṣed iti /
XXavsata_u:152_15: adhivāsayati bhagavāṃś candanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho rajñas tuṣṇībhāvena /
XXavsata_u:152_16: tato rajñā kṣatriyeṇa mūrdhābhiṣiktenāmātyebhya ājñā dattā:
XXavsata_u:152_18: ratnamayāṃś ca kumbhān*, yena vayaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ snāpayiṣyāma iti /
XXavsata_u:152_19: tato rājñā āmātyagaṇaparivṛtena tan nagaram apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpitum ucchritadhvajapatākaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ gandhodakapariṣiktaṃ vicitradhūpadhūpitam* /
XXavsata_u:152_20: puṣkariṇī cāsya kāritā / tato bhagavāṃś candanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddaḥ sarvānugrahārtham ekacīvarakaḥ puṣkariṇyāṃ sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:152_21: tato rājñāmātyagaṇaparivṛtena candanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saśrāvakasaṃgho nānāgandhaparibhāvitenodakena snāpitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:152_22: sahasnānād eva candanasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya śakreṇa devendreṇa tathāvidhaṃ māhendraṃ varṣam utsṛṣṭaṃ yena sarvasasyāni niṣpannāni /
XXavsata_u:152_23: taddhaitukaṃ ca mahājanakāyena buddhe bhagavati śraddhā pratilabdhā /
XXavsata_u:152_25: ye ca tatra candanaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ,
XXavsata_u:152_26: sarve te parinirvṛtāḥ / aham ekas teṣām avaśiṣṭaḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam:
XXavsata_u:152_27: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:152_28: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:152_30: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:155_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:157_1: tato janakāyo rogaiḥ pīḍitaḥ tāni tāni devatāsahasrāṇy āyācate śivavaruṇakuberavāsavādīni /
XXavsata_u:157_2: na cāsya sā ītir upaśamaṃ gacchati /
XXavsata_u:157_7: apy eva bhagavatā svalpakṛcchreṇāsyā īter vyupaśamaḥ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:157_8: atha nāḍakantheyā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo bhagavantam āyācituṃ pravṛttāḥ:
XXavsata_u:157_10: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:157_11: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrva{vihāra}samāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya [ca] buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:157_12: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ /
XXavsata_u:157_13: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:avs_14.1_0: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api / *{sonst: karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /}*
XXavsata_u:avs_14.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:158_0: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto nāḍakanthām anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:158_1: tato bhagavatā tan nagaraṃ sarvaṃ hṛdimaitryā sphuṭam*,
XXavsata_u:158_2: yato marakāḥ prakrāntāḥ, ītiś ca vyupaśāntā / tatas teṣāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ buddhadarśanān mahāprasāda utpannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:158_4: tatas tebhyo bhagavatā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:158_5: yāṃ śrutvā anekair brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ srotaāpattiphalam anuprāptam*,
XXavsata_u:158_6: aparaiḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalam, aparaiḥ anāgāmiphalam*, aparaiḥ pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:158_7: sarvaṃ ca tan nagaraṃ buddhanimnaṃ dharmapravaṇaṃ saṃghaprāgbhāraṃ saṃvṛttam* /
XXavsata_u:158_8: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:158_9: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yāvad ime satvā bhagavataḥ prasādād vyasanagatāḥ santo vyasanāt parimuktā iti /
XXavsata_u:158_10: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:159_0: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:159_1: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
XXavsata_u:160_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani candro nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:160_1: atha candraḥ samyaksaṃbuddho janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:160_4: śrutvā ca punar mahatyā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena samanvāgato yena candraḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:160_5: upasaṃkramya candrasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte nyaṣīdat* /
XXavsata_u:160_6: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ candraḥ samyaksaṃbuddho bodhikarakair dharmaiḥ samādāpayati /
XXavsata_u:160_7: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣikto labdhaprasāda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena candraḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya candraṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:160_8: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān iha vāsaṃ traimāsyaṃ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
XXavsata_u:160_11: tasya ca rājño nagare tena samayena mahājanamarako babhūva,
XXavsata_u:160_12: ītiś ca, yena sa mahājanakāyo 'tīva saṃtarpyate /
XXavsata_u:160_14: sādhu bhagavan kriyatām asyā īter upaśamopāya iti /
XXavsata_u:160_15: tato bhagavāṃś candraḥ samyaksaṃbuddho rājānam uvāca:
XXavsata_u:160_16: gaccha mahārāja imāṃ saṃghāṭīṃ dhvajāgre baddhā mahatā satkāreṇa sve vijite paryāṭaya,
XXavsata_u:160_19: te svastir bhaviṣyatīti / tato rājñā yathānuśiṣṭaṃ sarvaṃ tathaiva ca kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:160_21: tataḥ sa janakāyo labdhaprasādo rājāmātyapaurāś ca buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ,
XXavsata_u:160_23: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva,
XXavsata_u:160_24: ahaṃ saḥ / mayāsau candrasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya mahatī pūjā kṛtā /
XXavsata_u:160_25: tasya me karmaṇo vipākena devamanuṣyasaṃprāpakaṃ saṃsāre mahatsukham anubhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:160_27: yena yac cintayāmi yat prārthaye tat tathaiva sarvaṃ samṛdhyati /
XXavsata_u:160_29: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:160_30: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:160_32: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:164_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:164_1: yadā rājñā ajātaśatruṇā devadattavigrāhitena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:164_3: tadā ye aśrāddhās te balavanto jātāḥ,
XXavsata_u:164_8: taiḥ kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ: na kenacic chramaṇagautamaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitavyam* /
XXavsata_u:164_9: atha te brāhmaṇāḥ kṛtāvayaḥ samagrāḥ saṃmodamānā vīthīmadhye vedoktena vidhinā śakram āyācituṃ pravṛttāḥ:
XXavsata_u:164_10: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:164_11: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrva{vihāra}samāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya [ca] buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:164_12: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ /
XXavsata_u:164_13: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:avs_15.1_0: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api / *{auch: karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /}*
XXavsata_u:avs_15.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:165_0: paśyati bhagavān: ime brāhmaṇāḥ pūrvāvaropitakuśalamūlā gṛhītamokṣamārgāḥ svahitaiṣiṇo 'bhimukhā nirvāṇe bahirmukhāḥ saṃsārād akalyāṇamitrasaṃsārgād idānīṃ macchāsanaṃ vidviṣanti,
XXavsata_u:165_1: yanv aham eṣāṃ vinayahetor autsukyam āpadyeyeti /
XXavsata_u:165_2: atha bhagavāñ chakraveṣam abhinirmāya taṃ yajñavāṭaṃ divyenāvabhāsenāvabhāsya avataritum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:167_0: ekasamūhenoktavantaḥ: ehy ehi bhagavan, svāgataṃ bhagavata iti / tato bhagavān śakraveṣadhārī prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:167_4: tato bhagavān āvarjitā brāhmaṇā iti viditvā śakraveṣam antardhāpya buddhaveṣeṇaiva sthitvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:167_5: yāṃ śrutvā ṣaṣṭyā brāhmaṇasahasrair viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:167_6: anekaiś ca prāṇiśatasahasrair bhagavati śraddhā pratilabdhā /
XXavsata_u:167_7: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:167_8: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yāvad ebhir brāhmaṇair bhagavantam āgatya satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:167_9: anekaiś ca prāṇiśatasahasrair mahān prasādo 'dhigata iti /
XXavsata_u:167_10: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:167_12: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:167_13: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
XXavsata_u:168_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani indradamano nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:168_1: sa janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:168_5: śrutvā ca punar mahatyā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena samanvāgato yenendradamanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:168_6: upasaṃkramya bhagavata indradamanasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:168_7: ekānte niṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktam indradamanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho bodhikarakair (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:168_9: atha sa rājā labdhaprasāda utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yenendradamanaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya indradamanaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:168_12: bhagavān āha: asti te mahārāja vijite kaścid vihāro yatrāgantukā gamikāś ca bhikṣavo vāsaṃ kalpayiṣyantīti? rājovāca:
XXavsata_u:168_13: nāsti bhagavan, kiṃ tarhi tiṣṭhatu bhagavān, ahaṃ vihāraṃ kārayiṣyāmi, yatrāgantukā gamikāś ca bhikṣavo vāsaṃ kalpayiṣyantīti /
XXavsata_u:168_14: tato rājñā tathāgatasyārthe vihāraḥ kāritaḥ aviddhaprākāratoraṇo gāvākṣaniryūhajālārdhacandravedikāpratimaṇḍita
XXavsata_u:170_3: tato bhagavatā indradamanena samyaksaṃbuddhena rājño 'dhyeṣayā mahāprātihāryaṃ vidarśitaṃ buddhāvataṃsakavikrīḍitam*,
XXavsata_u:170_4: yaddarśanād rājā sāmātyanaigamajānapadaḥ sarve ca nāgarāḥ suprasannāḥ śāsane saṃraktatarāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ /
XXavsata_u:170_5: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva,
XXavsata_u:170_6: ahaṃ saḥ / mayā sā indradamanasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyaivaṃvidhā pūjā kṛtā /
XXavsata_u:170_7: tasya me karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre 'nantaṃ sukham anubhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:170_8: idānīṃ me tathāgatasya sata iyaṃ śāsanaśobhā /
XXavsata_u:170_10: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:170_11: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:170_13: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:173_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:173_2: na ca śakitaṃ bhagavato romeñjanam api kartum*,
XXavsata_u:173_4: kriyatāṃ rājagṛhe kriyākāro na kenacic chramaṇasya gautamasyopasaṃkramitavyam*,
XXavsata_u:173_6: evam ayam alabdhalābho 'labdhasaṃmāno niyatam anyadeśaṃ saṃkrāntiṃ kariṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:173_7: rajñā tathā kāritam* / tatra ye upāsakā dṛṣṭasatyās te rodituṃ pravṛttāḥ:
XXavsata_u:173_8: hā kaṣṭam anāthībhūtaṃ rājagṛhanagaraṃ yatra hi nābhodumbarapuṣpadurlabhaprādurbhāvaṃ (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:173_9: nāmodumbarapuṣpadurlabhaprādurbhāvaṃ) buddhaṃ bhagavantam āsādya tasya na śakyate saṃgrahaḥ kartum iti /
XXavsata_u:173_12: bhagavān āha: alpotsukas tvam ānanda bhava,
XXavsata_u:173_13: tathāgatā evātra kālajñāḥ / api tu yāvac chāsanaṃ me tāvac chrāvakāṇām upakaraṇavaikalyaṃ na bhaviṣyati prāg evedānīm iti /
XXavsata_u:173_14: atrāntare śakrasya devānām indrasyādhastāj jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate /
XXavsata_u:173_16: sahadarśanād eva dāyakadānapatīnāṃ utsāhasaṃjananārthaṃ buddhotpādasya māhātmyasaṃjananārtham ajātaśatror devadattasya ca madadarpacchittyartham ātmanaś ca prasādasaṃjananārthaṃ sakalaṃ rājagṛham udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsyoccaiḥśabdham udāritavān:
XXavsata_u:173_17: eṣo 'ham adyāgreṇa bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ divyaiś cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair upasthāsyāmi /
XXavsata_u:175_0: bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ / upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:175_1: atha śakro devendro bhagavantam idam avocat:
XXavsata_u:175_2: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān asminn eva rājagṛhe nagare /
XXavsata_u:175_4: bhagavān āha: alaṃ kauśika kṛtam etad yāvad eva cittam abhiprasannam* /
XXavsata_u:175_6: śakraḥ prāha: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān pañca varṣāṇi /
XXavsata_u:175_8: bhagavān āha: alaṃ kauśika kṛtam etad yāvac cittam abhiprasannam* /
XXavsata_u:175_10: śakraḥ prāha: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān pañca divasān iti /
XXavsata_u:175_11: tato bhagavān svapuṇyabalapratyakṣīkaraṇārthaṃ śakrasya ca devendrasyānugrahārtham anāgatapañcavārṣikaprabandhahetoś cādhivāsitavāṃs tūṣṇībhāvena /
XXavsata_u:175_12: atha śakro devendro bhagavas tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā tad veṇuvanaṃ vaijayantaṃ prāsādaṃ pradarśitavān*,
XXavsata_u:175_13: divyāni cāsanāni, divyāḥ puṣkaraṇīr divyaṃ ca bhojanam* /
XXavsata_u:175_14: atha bhagavān prajñapta eva āsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:175_15: tataḥ śakro devendraḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā anekadevatāsahasraparivṛtaḥ svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati /
XXavsata_u:175_16: anekaparyāyeṇa svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcataram āsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:175_17: tato bhagavān śakraṃ devendraṃ saparivāraṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
XXavsata_u:175_18: paśyati ca rājā ajātaśatrur upariprāsādatalagataḥ san bhagavato veṇuvane evaṃvidhāṃ pūjāṃ* /
XXavsata_u:175_19: dṛṣṭvā ca punar vipratisārajāto mahāntaṃ prasādaṃ praveditavān* /
XXavsata_u:175_20: rājagṛhanivāsinaś ca paurā dharmavegapṛaptā rājānam upasaṃkramyaivam ūcuḥ:
XXavsata_u:175_22: yatra nāma devāḥ pramattāḥ santaḥ pramādavihāriṇo divyān viṣayān apahāya bhagavantaṃ pūjayanti /
XXavsata_u:175_24: tato rājñā ajātaśatruṇā kriyākāram udghāṭya rājagṛhe nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam*:
XXavsata_u:175_26: tato rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurāḥ saparivārā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditā udagraprītisaumanasyajātāḥ puṣpagandhamālyāny ādāya bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:175_27: tato devair manuṣyaiś ca bhagavato mahān satkāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:175_28: bhagavatā ca tad adhiṣṭhānaṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:175_29: yāṃ śrutvā anekair devamanuṣyaiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:175_30: bhikṣavo bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśayajātā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:175_31: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavataḥ śāsane evaṃvidha utsava iti /
XXavsata_u:175_32: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:175_34: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:177_0: na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
XXavsata_u:avs_16.1_0: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api / *{auch: karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /}*
XXavsata_u:avs_16.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:178_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ratnaśailo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:178_1: sa janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:178_2: tasyāṃ ca rājadhānyāṃ dharmabuddhir nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati tasyāṃ ca rājadhānyāṃ mahatī ītiḥ /
XXavsata_u:178_3: tatas tena rājñā ītipraśamanahetor bhagavān śrāvakasaṃghatraimāsye bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:178_4: trāyāṇāṃ māsānām atyayena sā ītiḥ praśāntā /
XXavsata_u:178_5: tato rājño nāgaraiś cāvarjitamānasais tathāgatasya saśrāvakasaṃghasya pañcavārṣikaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:179_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva,
XXavsata_u:179_1: ahaṃ saḥ / yan mayā ratnaśailasya tathāgatasya pañcavārṣikaṃ kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:179_4: parinirvṛtasya ca me śāsane anekāni pañcavārṣikaśatāni bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:179_6: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:179_7: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:179_9: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te ca bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:182_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:182_1: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ pañcamātrāṇi gāndharvikaśatāni goṣṭhikānāṃ prativasanti /
XXavsata_u:182_2: tatra ca kāle supriyo nāma gāndharvikarājo 'bhyāgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:182_3: tasyaivaṃvidhā śaktiḥ: ekasyāṃ tantryāṃ sāpta svarān ādarśayati,
XXavsata_u:182_4: ekaviṃśatiṃ mūrcchināḥ / sa ṣaṇmahānagarāṇy apaṭukāny udghoṣayamāṇaḥ śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:184_1: evam anuśrūyate rājā prasenajid gāndharve 'tīva kuśalaḥ /
XXavsata_u:184_2: yanv aham anena saha vādam ārocayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:184_3: tataḥ supriyo gāndharvikarājo yena rājā prasenajit kauśalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:184_4: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ kauśalam idam āvocat*:
XXavsata_u:184_5: śrutaṃ me rājan yathā tvaṃ gāndharvakuśala iti /
XXavsata_u:184_6: yadi te aguru, mīmāṃsasveti / tato rājñā prasenajitā tasya vikṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:184_7: uktaś ca: sādho asti me gurur jetavane sthito 'nuttaro gāndharvikarājaḥ /
XXavsata_u:184_9: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ pañcamātrair gāndharvikaśataiḥ parivṛtaḥ supriyeṇa gāndharvikarājenānekaiś ca prāṇiśatasahasrair jetavanaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:184_10: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:184_11: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya [ca] buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:184_12: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ /
XXavsata_u:184_13: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:avs_17.1_0: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api / *{auch: karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /}*
XXavsata_u:avs_17.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:185_0: tato bhagavān vaineyajanānugrahārthaṃ laukikaṃ cittam utpāditavān* /
XXavsata_u:185_1: aho bata pañcaśikho gandharvaputraḥ saptagandharvasahasraparivṛto vaiḍūryadaṇḍāṃ vīṇām ādāya matsakāśam upasaṃkrāmed iti /
XXavsata_u:185_2: sahacittotpādāt pañcaśikho gandharvaputraḥ saptagandharvasahasraparivṛto bhagavantaṃ yathāvad abhyarcya bhagavato vaiḍūryadaṇḍāṃ vīṇām upanayati sma /
XXavsata_u:185_3: tataḥ supriyo gandharvarājo bhagavataḥ purastād vīṇām anuśrāvitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:185_4: yata ekasyāṃ tantryāṃ sapta svarāṇi ekaviṃśatiṃ mūrcchanāś ca darśayitum ārabdhaḥ,
XXavsata_u:185_5: yac chravaṇād rājā prasenajid anyatamaś ca mahājanakāyaḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:185_6: tato bhagavān api vaiḍūryadaṇḍāṃ vīṇām āśrāvitavān*:
XXavsata_u:185_7: yata ekaikasyāṃ tantryām aneke svaraviśeṣā mūrcchanāś ca bahuprakārā darśitāḥ,
XXavsata_u:185_8: te ca śūnyākāreṇaiva / idaṃ ca śarīraṃ vīṇāvad ādarśitavān*,
XXavsata_u:185_9: svarān indriyavat, mūrcchanāś cittadhātuvat* / yac chravaṇād āvarjitaḥ supriyo gandharvarājo vīṇāṃ gandhakuṭyāṃ niryātya bhagavatsakāśe pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:185_10: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā
XXavsata_u:187_1: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:187_2: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:187_3: tata āvarjitā devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā bhhagavacchāsane rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ /
XXavsata_u:187_4: pañcānām api gāndharvikaśatānāṃ prītisaumanasyajātānām etad abhavat*:
XXavsata_u:187_5: vayaṃ nīce karmaṇi vartāmahe kṛcchravṛttayaś ca /
XXavsata_u:187_6: yan nu vayaṃ rājānaṃ vijñāpya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ nagarapraveśenopanimantrayemahīti /
XXavsata_u:187_7: yāvat tair gāndharvikair labdhānujñair bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho nagarapraveśenopanimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:187_8: adhivāsitaṃ ca bhagavatā teṣāṃ gāndharvikāṇāṃ tūṣṇībhāvena /
XXavsata_u:187_9: tatas tair gāndharvikair rājāmātyapaurajānapadasahāyaiḥ sarvā śrāvastī nagarī apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallā gandhodakapariṣiktā nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇā vicitradhūpadhūpitā puṣpavitānamaṇḍitā /
XXavsata_u:187_10: te ca gāndharvikāḥ svayam eva vīṇām ādāya mṛdaṅgaveṇupaṇavādiviśeṣair upasthānaṃ cakruḥ,
XXavsata_u:187_13: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
XXavsata_u:187_14: tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
XXavsata_u:187_15: kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti / yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti,
XXavsata_u:187_18: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ,
XXavsata_u:187_19: āhosvid anyatropapannā iti / teṣāṃ prasādasaṃjananārthaṃ bhagavān nirmitaṃ visarjayati /
XXavsata_u:187_21: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ,
XXavsata_u:187_22: nāpy anyatropapannāḥ / api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ,
XXavsata_u:187_24: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
XXavsata_u:187_26: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān,
XXavsata_u:187_27: yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
XXavsata_u:avs_17.2_1: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
XXavsata_u:avs_17.3_0: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:189_0: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
XXavsata_u:189_1: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:189_15: ūrṇāyām antardhīyante / anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:189_16: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_17.7_3: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // iti
XXavsata_u:193_0: bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat / nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
XXavsata_u:193_1: paśyasy ānanda ebhir gāndharvikair mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:193_2: evaṃ bhadanta / ete ānanda gāndharvikāḥ anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yathākālānugatāṃ pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya anāgate 'dhvani varṇasvarā nāma pratyekabuddhā bhaviṣyanti hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
XXavsata_u:193_3: ayam eṣāṃ deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti /
XXavsata_u:195_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayānāṃ chettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:195_1: kāni bhadanta bhagavatā kuśalamūlāni kṛtāni yeṣām ayam anubhāva iti /
XXavsata_u:195_2: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:195_4: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:195_5: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
XXavsata_u:196_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani prabodhano nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:196_1: sa janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:196_3: atha sa bhagavāṃs tad udyānaṃ praviśya rājānugrahārtham anyatamaṃ vṛkṣam upaniśritya niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:196_5: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ strīmayena tūryeṇa vādyamānenodyānaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:196_6: atha sa rājā tad udyānam anuvicaran dadarśa bhagavantaṃ prabodhanaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ prāsādikaṃ prasādanīyaṃ śāntamānasaṃ parameṇa cittadamavyupaśamena samanvāgataṃ suvarṇayūpam iva śriyā jvalantam* /
XXavsata_u:196_7: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prasādajātaḥ sa rājā sāntaḥpuro vividhena vādyena vādyamānena bhagavantaṃ tataḥ samādheḥ prabodhayāmāsa,
XXavsata_u:196_10: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva,
XXavsata_u:196_11: ahaṃ saḥ / yan mayā prabodhanasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūjā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:196_12: tenaiva hetunā idānīṃ mama gāndharvikair evaṃvidhaṃ satkāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:196_14: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:196_15: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:196_17: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:199_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:199_1: atha śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ pāradāriko maline karmaṇi vartate /
XXavsata_u:201_0: tato rājñā aparādhika iti kṛtvā vadhya utsṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:201_1: sa rājapuruṣair nīlāmbaravasanair udyataśastraiḥ karavīramālābaddhakaṇṭheguṇo rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣv anuśrāvyamāṇo dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa apanīyate /
XXavsata_u:201_2: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:201_3: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrva{vihāra}samāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya [ca] buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:201_4: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ /
XXavsata_u:201_5: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:avs_18.1_0: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api / *{auch: karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /}*
XXavsata_u:avs_18.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:202_0: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:202_1: dadarśa sa puruṣo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam śītyānuvañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:202_2: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:202_3: varāho 'smi bhagavan*, iṣṭaṃ me jīvitaṃ prayaccheti /
XXavsata_u:202_7: pravrājayāmīti / athāyuṣmān ānando yena rājā prasenajit kauśalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:202_12: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣākṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:202_13: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:202_14: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:202_15: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayānāṃ chettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:202_16: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavatā sarvaṃ cintitamātraṃ samṛdhyatīti /
XXavsata_u:202_17: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu
XXavsata_u:204_0: jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:204_2: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:204_3: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
XXavsata_u:205_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani indradhvajo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:205_1: sa janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:205_3: athendradhvajaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya tāṃ rājadhānīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:205_4: adrākṣīt sa brāhmaṇa indradhvajaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyaṃjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:205_5: dṛṣṭvā ca punar mūlanikṛtta iva drumo bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatyovāca:
XXavsata_u:205_6: vāraho 'smi sugata, niṣīdatu bhagavān agrāsana iti /
XXavsata_u:205_7: atha bhagavān indradhvajaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tasyānugrahārtham agrāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:205_8: agrāsane niṣaṇṇaś cendradhvajaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tena brāhmaṇena padaśatena stutaḥ,
XXavsata_u:205_12: tat kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena brāhmaṇo babhūva,
XXavsata_u:205_13: ahaṃ saḥ / yan me indradhvajasya tathāgatasya pūjā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:205_14: taddhaitukaṃ ca me saṃsāre anantaṃ sukham anubhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:205_15: api yac cintayāmi, yat prārthaye, tat sarvaṃ samṛdhyati / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam:
XXavsata_u:205_16: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:205_17: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:205_19: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:208_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:208_2: tadā tena kṛtapratyupakārasaṃdarśanārthaṃ buddhapūjāsaṃvartanārthaṃ gṛhavistarasaṃdarśanārthaṃ buddhotpādabahumānasaṃjananārthaṃ ca bhagavān
XXavsata_u:210_3: sarvaṃ ca rājagṛhaṃ nagaram apagatapāṣāṇasarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpayitavyam*,
XXavsata_u:210_4: nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇam ucchritadhvajapatākaṃ yāvac ca veṇuvanaṃ yāvac ca rājagṛham*,
XXavsata_u:210_5: atrāntarā sarvo mārgo vicitrair vastrāir ācchādayitavya iti /
XXavsata_u:210_7: tato rājā bimbisāraḥ svayam eva bhagavato mūrdhni śataśalākaṃ chatraṃ dhārayati,
XXavsata_u:210_9: atha bhagavān dānto dāntaparivāraḥ śāntaḥ śāntaparivāro mukto muktaparivāra āśvasta āśvastaparivāro vinīto vinītaparivāro 'rhann arhatparivāro vītarāgo vītarāgaparivāraḥ prāsādikaḥ prāsādikaparivāro vṛṣabha iva gogaṇaparivṛto gaja iva kalabhagaṇaparivṛtaḥ siṃha iva daṃṣṭrigaṇaparivṛto haṃsa iva haṃsagaṇaparivṛto suparṇīva pakṣigaṇaparivṛto vipra iva śiṣyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ svaśva iva turagagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śūra iva yodhagaṇaparivṛto deśika ivādhvagagaṇaparivṛtaḥ sārthavāha iva vaṇiggaṇaparivṛtaḥ śreṣṭhīva paurajanaparivṛtaḥ koṭṭarāja iva mantrigaṇaparivṛtaś cakravartīva putrasahasraparivṛtaś candra iva nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ sūrya iva raśmisahasraparivṛto dhṛtarāṣṭra iva gandharvagaṇaparivṛto virūḍha iva kumbhāṇḍagaṇaparivṛto virūpākṣa iva nāgagaṇaparivṛto dhanada iva yakṣagaṇaparivṛto vemacitrīvāsuragaṇaparivṛtaḥ śakra iva tridaśagaṇaparivṛto brahmā iva brahmakāyikaparivṛtaḥ stimita iva jalanidhiḥ sajala iva jaladharo vimada iva gajapatiḥ sudāntair indriyair asaṃkṣobhiteryāpathapracāro 'nekair āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ parivṛto bhagavāṃs tat puraṃ praviśati /
XXavsata_u:210_10: yadā ca bhagavatā indrakīle pādo nyastaḥ,
XXavsata_u:210_12: bhagavataḥ purapraveśe evaṃrūpāṇy adbhutāni bhavanty anyāni ca /
XXavsata_u:210_13: tadyathā: saṃkṣiptāni viśālībhavanti, hastinaḥ krośanti aśvāś ca heṣante ṛṣabhā nardante gṛhagatāni vividhavādyabhāṇḍāni svayaṃ nadanti,
XXavsata_u:210_21: āntarikṣāś ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā divyaṃ puṣpam utsṛjanti /
XXavsata_u:210_22: atha bhagavān evaṃvidhayā vibhūtyā rājakulaṃ praveṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:210_23: rājā ca bimbisāraḥ svayam eva bahirdvāraśālastho gośirṣacandanodakena pādyaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ pādau bhikṣusaṃghasya ca prākṣalayati /
XXavsata_u:210_24: sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śatarasenāhāreṇa pratipādayāmāsa /
XXavsata_u:210_27: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:210_29: yato bhagavata evaṃvidhā pūjā bhikṣusaṃghasya ceti /
XXavsata_u:212_0: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:212_2: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:212_3: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca /
XXavsata_u:avs_19.1_0: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api / *{auch: karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /}*
XXavsata_u:avs_19.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:213_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani kṣemaṃkaro nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:213_1: sa janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:213_3: kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksaṃbuddho janapadacārikāṃ carann asmākaṃ rājadhānīm anuprāpta iti /
XXavsata_u:213_4: śrutvā ca mahatyā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena samanvāgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:213_6: upasaṃkramya kṣemaṃkarasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:213_7: ekānte niṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktam kṣemaṃkaraḥ samyaksaṃbuddho bodhikarakair dharmaiḥ samādāpayati /
XXavsata_u:213_8: atha sa rājā labdhaprasādaḥ kṣemaṃkaraṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ rājakule nimantrya śatarasenāhāreṇa pratipādayāmāsa /
XXavsata_u:213_10: parinirvṛtasya ca samantayojanaṃ stūpaṃ kāritavān krośam uccatvena /
XXavsata_u:213_11: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva,
XXavsata_u:213_12: ahaṃ saḥ / yan mayā kṣemaṃkarasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyaivaṃvidhāṃ pūjā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:213_14: idānīṃ tenaiva hetunā rājā bimbisāreṇāpi tathāgatasya me evaṃvidhā pūjā kṛtā /
XXavsata_u:213_16: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:213_17: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:213_19: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:216_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:216_1: tatra anyataraḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
XXavsata_u:218_1: sa āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanenāvarjitaḥ śāsane ca avatārito bhagavaty atyartham abhiprasannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:218_4: sahāyo me bhava, icchāmi bhagavataḥ pūjāṃ kartum iti /
XXavsata_u:218_5: adhivāsayaty āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tasya gṛhapates tūṣṇībhāvena,
XXavsata_u:218_6: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas taṃ gṛhapatim ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
XXavsata_u:218_7: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:218_8: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavantam idam avocat:
XXavsata_u:218_9: ayaṃ bhadanta gṛhapatir ākāṅkṣati bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojayitum* /
XXavsata_u:218_10: tad asya bhagavān adhivāsayed anukampām upādāyeti /
XXavsata_u:218_12: atha sa gṛhapatir bhagavatas tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā śatarasam āhāraṃ samudānayati,
XXavsata_u:218_16: tataḥ śakreṇa devendreṇa veṇuvanaṃ nandavanam abhinirmitam*,
XXavsata_u:218_19: ŚtumburuŚ) cānekāni gandharvasahasrāṇy upanītāni ye vicitrair vādyaviśeṣair vādyaṃ kurvanti,
XXavsata_u:218_20: divyaṃ ca sudhābhojanam* / tataḥ sa gṛhapatir divyamānuṣair upakaraṇair bhagavantam upasthāya sarvāṅgeṇa bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇīdhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:218_21: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita,
XXavsata_u:218_22: amuktānāṃ mocayitā, anāśvastānām āśvāsayitā, aparinirvṛtānāṃ parinirvāpayiteti /
XXavsata_u:218_23: atha bhagavāṃs tasya gṛhapater hetuparaṃparāṃ karmaparaṃparāṃ ca jñātvā smitaṃ prāvirakārṣīt /
XXavsata_u:218_24: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
XXavsata_u:218_25: kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti / yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti,
XXavsata_u:218_28: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
XXavsata_u:218_31: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutā nāpy anyatropapannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:218_34: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
XXavsata_u:218_36: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān,
XXavsata_u:220_0: brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
XXavsata_u:avs_20.1_0: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api / *{auch: karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /}*
XXavsata_u:avs_20.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:avs_20.2_0: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:221_0: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
XXavsata_u:221_1: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:221_15: ūrṇāyām antardhīyante / anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:221_16: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūṣṇīṣe 'ntarhitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_20.6_3: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // iti
XXavsata_u:227_0: bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat / nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
XXavsata_u:227_1: paśyasy ānanda anena gṛhapatinā mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:227_2: evaṃ bhadanta / eṣa ānanda gṛhapatir anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trikalpāsaṃkhyeyasamudānītāṃ bodhiṃ samudānīya mahākaruṇāparibhāvitāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ paripūrya divyānnado nāma samyaksaṃbuddhā bhaviṣyanti daśabhir balaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyais tribhir āveṇikaiḥ smṛtyupasthānair mahākaruṇayā ca /
XXavsata_u:227_3: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasādaḥ /
XXavsata_u:227_4: etac ca prakaraṇaṃ rājā bimbisāro māgadhakāś ca paricārakāḥ śrutvā paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:227_5: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:227_6: paśya bhagavan yāvad anena gṛhapatinā bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho divyamānuṣībhir ṛddhibhir abhyarcita iti /
XXavsata_u:227_7: / bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:227_9: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:227_10: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
XXavsata_u:228_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani pūrṇo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:228_1: atha pūrṇaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho janapadacārikāṃ carann anyatamāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:228_3: pūrṇaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho janapadacārikāṃ carann asmākaṃ rājadhānīm anuprāpta iti /
XXavsata_u:228_4: śrutvā ca punar mahatyā rājarddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena samanvāgato yena bhagavān pūrṇaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:228_5: upasaṃkramya pūrṇasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:228_6: ekānte niṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ pūrṇaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho bodhikarakair dharmaiḥ samādāpayati /
XXavsata_u:228_7: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ pūrṇaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ traimāsyaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair upanimantritavān* /
XXavsata_u:228_8: adhivāsitaṃ ca pūrṇena samyaksaṃbuddhena rājñas tūṣṇībhāvena /
XXavsata_u:228_9: atha rājā kṣatriyo mūrdhābhiṣiktaḥ pūrṇasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā traimāsyaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārair upasthāpya bhagavato ratnamayapratimāṃ kārayitvā buddhaharṣaṃ kāritavān*,
XXavsata_u:230_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva,
XXavsata_u:230_1: ahaṃ saḥ / yan mayā pūrṇasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tādṛśī pūjā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:230_3: tenaiva ca hetunā tathāgatasya ca me śreṣṭhinā śakreṇa ca īdṛśī pūjā kṛtā /
XXavsata_u:230_5: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:230_6: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:230_8: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:233_1: candano hy atha padmaś ca cakraṃ daśaśirās tathā /
XXavsata_u:233_3: nirmalo valgusvaraś ca vargo bhavati sattamaḥ //
XXavsata_u:236_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran gaṅgātīram anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:236_1: tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaṅgātīrasya nātidūre stūpam avarugṇaṃ vātātapābhyāṃ pariśīrṇam* /
XXavsata_u:236_2: bhikṣubhir dṛṣṭvā bhagavān pṛṣṭaḥ kasya bhagavann ayaṃ stūpa iti /
XXavsata_u:236_3: bhagavān āha: candano nāma pratyekabuddho babhūva,
XXavsata_u:236_4: tasyeti / bhikṣava ūcuḥ: kuto bhagavaṃś candanasya pratyekabuddhasyotpattir nāmābhinirvṛttiś ceti /
XXavsata_u:236_5: bhagavān āha: icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śrotuṃ yathā candanasya pratyekabuddhasyotpattir nāmābhinirvṛttiś ca? evaṃ bhadanta /
XXavsata_u:236_6: tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:236_7: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* /
XXavsata_u:236_9: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate tadyathā:
XXavsata_u:236_10: ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:236_11: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate /
XXavsata_u:236_12: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:236_13: tac ca naivam* / yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:236_14: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:236_15: katameṣāṃ trayāṇām* / mātāpitarāu raktau bhavataḥ saṃnipatitau,
XXavsata_u:236_18: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:236_20: tasya codyāne mahāpadmini / tatra padmam atipramāṇaṃ jātam* /
XXavsata_u:236_21: tad divase divase vardhate na tu phullati /
XXavsata_u:236_23: rajñā uktaḥ parīkṣyatām etat padmam iti /
XXavsata_u:236_24: yāvad apareṇa samayena sūryodaye tat padmaṃ vikasitam* /
XXavsata_u:236_25: tasya ca padmasya karṇikāyāṃ dārakaḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvāvasthitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:238_0: prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtagātro 'śītyānuvyañjanair virājitagātraḥ /
XXavsata_u:238_1: tasya mukhāt padmagandho vāti śarīrāc ca candanagandhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:238_3: tato rājā sāmātyaḥ sāntaḥpuraś ca tad udyānaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:238_5: ehi tāta, ahaṃ te 'putrasya putra iti /
XXavsata_u:238_8: tato rājā padminīm avagāhya taṃ dārakaṃ padmakarṇikāyāṃ gṛhītvā pāṇitale sthāpitavān* /
XXavsata_u:238_9: yatra yatra sa dārakaḥ pādau sthāpayati,
XXavsata_u:238_11: tatas tasya candana iti nāma kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:238_13: tadā nāgarai rājā vijñaptaḥ: ihāsmākaṃ deva nagaraparva pratyupasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:238_14: tad arhati devaś candanaṃ kumāram utsraṣṭam* (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:238_17: rājāha: evam astv iti / tataś candanaḥ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣito 'mātyaputraparivṛto vividhair vādyair vādyamānai rājakulād bahir upayāti nagaraparva pratyanubhavitum* /
XXavsata_u:238_18: tatra tasya gacchataḥ padavinyāse padavinyāse padmāni prādurbhavanti darśanīyāni manoramāṇi ca /
XXavsata_u:238_20: atha tasya śuddhasatvasya kalyāṇāśayasya pūrvabuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlasya taddarśanād yoniśo manasikāra utpannaḥ:
XXavsata_u:238_23: evam etad api śarīram iti / tasyaivaṃ cintayatas tulayata uparīkṣamāṇasya saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyadharmā abhimukhībhūtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:238_24: te tasyaiva janakāyasya madhye sthitena pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā /
XXavsata_u:238_25: yāvac chuddhāvāsakāyikair devais tasmai kāṣāyāṇy upanāmitāni /
XXavsata_u:238_28: yaddarśanād rājñāmātyanaigamasahāyena mahān prasādaḥ pratilabdho vicitrāṇi ca kuśalamūlāny avaropitāni /
XXavsata_u:238_29: bhagavān āha: ataś candanasya pratyekabuddhasyotpattir nāmābhinirvṛttiś ceti /
XXavsata_u:238_31: kāni bhadanta candanena pratyekabuddhena karmāṇi kṛtāni yenāsya śarīraṃ sugandhi tīkṣṇendriyaś ceti /
XXavsata_u:238_32: bhagavān āha: kāśyape bhagavati pravrajito babhūva,
XXavsata_u:238_34: puṣpāṇi cāvaropitāni, pratyekabodhau cānena mārgo bhāvitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:238_36: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:238_37: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:238_39: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:242_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:242_1: ācaritam etan madhyadeśe yadārāmikāḥ padmāny ādāya vīthīṃ gatvā vikrīṇate /
XXavsata_u:242_2: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:242_3: anyatamā ca strī dārakaṃ svabhujābhyām ādāya vīthīm avatīrṇā /
XXavsata_u:242_4: dadarśa ca sa dārako buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:242_5: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prasādajātaḥ sahasā bāhum abhiprasārya ārāmikasakāśāt padmaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavato mūrdhni prakṣiptavān* /
XXavsata_u:242_9: tiṣṭhantaṃ tiṣṭhati / tato bhagavatā padmarāgasadṛśā prabhā utsṛṣṭā sakalā śrāvastī avabhāsitā,
XXavsata_u:242_12: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
XXavsata_u:242_13: kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti / yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti,
XXavsata_u:242_16: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannā iti /
XXavsata_u:242_19: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ,
XXavsata_u:242_20: nāpy anyatropapannāḥ / api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ,
XXavsata_u:242_22: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
XXavsata_u:242_24: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān,
XXavsata_u:242_25: yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
XXavsata_u:avs_22.1_1: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
XXavsata_u:avs_22.2_0: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:244_0: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
XXavsata_u:244_1: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:244_15: ūrṇāyām antardhīyante / anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:244_16: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:248_0: bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat / nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
XXavsata_u:248_1: paśyasy ānanda anena dārakeṇa prasādajātena tathāgatasya padmaṃ kṣiptam* /
XXavsata_u:248_2: evaṃ bhadanta / eṣa ānanda dārako 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca pañcadaśa kalpān vinipātaṃ na gamiṣyati /
XXavsata_u:248_3: divyamānuṣasukham anubhūya padmottaro nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:248_4: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasādaḥ /
XXavsata_u:248_8: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:251_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:251_2: tasya bhāryā yauvanavatī / sā svāmino 'rthe utkaṇṭhati paritapyati,
XXavsata_u:251_3: na cāsyā bhartā āgacchati / tayā nārāyaṇasya praṇipatya pratijñātam*:
XXavsata_u:251_4: yadi me śīghram āgacchati, ahaṃ te sauvarṇacakraṃ pradāsyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:251_5: tatas tasyāḥ svāmī svastikṣemābhyāṃ mahāsamudrād aśu pratyāgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:251_7: sā dāsīgaṇaparivṛtā cakram ādāya gandhadhūpapuṣpaṃ ca,
XXavsata_u:251_8: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:251_9: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya [ca] buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:251_10: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ /
XXavsata_u:251_11: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:avs_23.1_1: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet //
XXavsata_u:252_0: paśyati bhagavān: iyaṃ dārikā maddarśanāt pratyekabodheḥ kuśalamūlāny avaropayiṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:252_1: tataḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:252_2: athāsau dārikā dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
