XXavsata_u:260_1: paśyasy ānanda anayā dārikayā tathāgatasya sauvarṇacakraṃ kṣiptam* /
XXavsata_u:260_2: evaṃ bhadanta / eṣā ānanda dārikā anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca pañcadaśa kalpān vinipātaṃ na gamiṣyati,
XXavsata_u:260_3: divyaṃ mānuṣaṃ sukham anubhūya ca cakrāntaro nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:260_4: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasādaḥ iti /
XXavsata_u:260_8: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:263_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran gaṅgātīram anuprāptaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
XXavsata_u:263_1: adrākṣus te bhikṣavo dūrata eva purāṇastūpaṃ vātātapavarṣair avarugṇaṃ prarugṇam* /
XXavsata_u:263_5: bhikṣavaḥ ūcuḥ: kuto bhadanta daśaśirasaḥ pratyekabuddhasyotpattir nāmābhinirvṛttiś ceti /
XXavsata_u:263_6: bhagavān āha: icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śrotum iti? ta ūcuḥ:
XXavsata_u:263_7: evaṃ bhadanteti / tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:263_8: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ
XXavsata_u:265_2: sa ca rājā aputraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate /
XXavsata_u:265_3: tadyathā: ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:265_4: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate /
XXavsata_u:265_6: tasya codyāne nahatī padminī utpalapadmakumudapadmapuṇḍarīkasaṃchannā haṃsacakravākakāraṇḍavādiśakunopaśobhitā nalinī /
XXavsata_u:265_8: tad divase divase vardhate na tu phullati /
XXavsata_u:265_10: rajñā uktaḥ: parirakṣyatām etat padmam iti /
XXavsata_u:265_11: yāvad apareṇa samayena sūryodaye tat padmaṃ vikasitam* /
XXavsata_u:265_12: tasya padmasya karṇikāyāṃ dārakaḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvāvasthitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:265_13: abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛto 'śītyānuvyañjanair virājitagātraḥ /
XXavsata_u:265_15: śrutvā rājā sāmātyaḥ sāntaḥpuraś ca tad udyānaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:265_17: dṛṣṭvā ca punar hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajātaḥ padminīm avagāhya taṃ gṛhītvā mahatā satkāreṇa svagṛham ānīya śramaṇabrāhmaṇanaimittikānāṃ nivedya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatiṃ divasān jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā daśaśirā iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtavān* /
XXavsata_u:265_18: daśaśirā dārakaḥ aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:265_19: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cott{aptott}aptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:265_21: sa ca kumāraḥ śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ /
XXavsata_u:265_22: sa paśyati pitaraṃ rājadharme sthitaṃ sāvadyam avadyāni karmāṇi kurvāṇam* /
XXavsata_u:265_23: dṛṣṭvā ca kumāraḥ saṃvignaḥ pitaraṃ vijñāpayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:265_24: anujānīhi māṃ tāta, pravrajiṣyāmi svākhyāte dharmavinaye iti /
XXavsata_u:265_25: yāvat pitrānujñātaḥ keśaśmaśru avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:265_26: tena vinopadeśena saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣān dharmān āmukhīkṛtya pratyekā bodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā /
XXavsata_u:265_27: sa gaganatalam utpatya pituḥ sakāśe vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi cakāra /
XXavsata_u:265_29: sa śarīrabhārodvahanaparikhinno vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi darśayitvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirvṛtim upajagāma /
XXavsata_u:265_30: atha bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:265_33: padma upapanna iti // bhagavān āha: daśaśirasaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:265_34: daśaśirasā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:265_35: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca /
XXavsata_u:avs_24.1_0: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api / *{auch: karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /}*
XXavsata_u:avs_24.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:267_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:267_2: atha vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:267_3: anyataraś ca sārthavāhaḥ padmam ādāya vīthīṃ pratipannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:267_4: athāsau paśyati vipaśyinaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:267_5: sahadarśanād bhagavata upari tat padmaṃ cikṣepa /
XXavsata_u:267_6: tat kṣiptamātraṃ bhagavata upari śakaṭacakramātraṃ bhūtvā bhagavantaṃ gacchantam upagacchati,
XXavsata_u:267_7: tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhati / yāvad vipaśyinā samyaksaṃbuddhena sa sārthavāhaḥ pratyekabodhau vyākṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:267_9: prajāpatī cāsya tena kālena prajāyamānā sasvaraṃ kranditavatī /
XXavsata_u:267_10: tena paricārikā pṛṣṭā: kim idam iti / tayā samākhyātam* / tataḥ sārthavāhaḥ saṃvignaḥ praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:267_11: mā kadācit saṃsāre mātuḥ kukṣāv upapadyeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:267_12: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena sārthavāho babhūva,
XXavsata_u:267_14: tena kuśalamūlenaikaviṃśatiṃ kalpān na kadācin mātuḥ kukṣāv upapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:267_19: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:269_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:269_1: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ prabhūtavittopakaraṇaḥ parbhūtasatvasvāpateyaḥ prabhūtamitrāmātyajñātisālohitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:269_2: sa ca gṛhapatiḥ śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:269_3: tasyaitad abhavat: ime bhogāḥ jalacandrasvabhāvāḥ marīcisadṛśā anityā adhruvā anāśvāsikā vipariṇāmadharmāṇaḥ pañcabhir ugradaṇḍaiḥ sādhāraṇāḥ /
XXavsata_u:269_4: yanv aham asārebhyo bhogebhyaḥ sāram ādadyām iti /
XXavsata_u:271_1: puṣpāsanāni prajñaptāni / tataḥ susvādaśītarasapānāni bhakṣyabhojyāni ca sajjīkṛtya bhagavato dūtena kālam ārocayati:
XXavsata_u:271_2: samayo bhadanta, sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti /
XXavsata_u:271_3: tato bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena tasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:271_4: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:271_5: atha sa gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaviṣṭaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītenāhāreṇa svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati /
XXavsata_u:271_6: svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcatarāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:271_7: atha bhagavān gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati /
XXavsata_u:271_8: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya tūṣṇīṃbhūtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:271_9: atha sa gṛhapatir labdhaprasādaḥ pādayor nipatya cetanāṃ puṣṇāti /
XXavsata_u:271_11: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
XXavsata_u:271_12: tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
XXavsata_u:271_13: kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti / yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti,
XXavsata_u:271_16: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ,
XXavsata_u:271_17: āhosvid anyatropapannā iti / teṣāṃ satvānāṃ prasādasaṃjananārthaṃ bhagavān nirmitaṃ visarjayati /
XXavsata_u:271_19: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ,
XXavsata_u:271_20: nāpy anyatropapannāḥ / api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ,
XXavsata_u:271_22: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
XXavsata_u:271_24: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān,
XXavsata_u:271_25: yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
XXavsata_u:avs_25.1_1: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
XXavsata_u:avs_25.2_0: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:272_0: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
XXavsata_u:272_1: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:274_12: ūrṇāyām antardhīyante / anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:274_13: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_25.6_3: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // iti
XXavsata_u:278_0: bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat / nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
XXavsata_u:278_1: paśyasy ānanda anena śreṣṭhinā mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:278_2: evaṃ bhadanta / eṣa ānanda śreṣṭhī anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca sūkṣmatvag iti nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:278_3: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasādaḥ iti /
XXavsata_u:278_7: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:282_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:282_1: śrāvastyāṃ anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:282_2: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:282_3: tasyaitad abhavat: ime bhogā jalacandrasvabhāvā gajakarṇasadṛśā anityā adhruvā anāśvāsikā vipariṇāmadharmāṇaḥ pañcabhir ugradaṇḍaiḥ sādhāraṇāḥ /
XXavsata_u:282_4: yanv aham asārebhyo bhogebhyaḥ sāram ādadyām iti /
XXavsata_u:282_5: tena grīṣmakāle vartamāne bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:282_6: gṛhaṃ cāpagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ candanavāripariṣiktaṃ vicitragandhaghaṭikāsurabhidhūpadhūpitaṃ nānāpuṣpābhikīrṇam* /
XXavsata_u:282_7: puṣpāsanāni prajñaptāni / tataḥ śītarasāni pānakāni bhakṣyabhojyāni ca sajjīkṛtya bhagavato dūtena kālam ārocayati:
XXavsata_u:282_8: samayo bhadanta, sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyata iti /
XXavsata_u:282_9: tato bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena tasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:282_10: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:282_11: atha sa gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati /
XXavsata_u:282_12: anekaparyāyena śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya bhagavantaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ nīcatarāsanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:282_13: atha bhagavāṃs taṃ gṛhapatiṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
XXavsata_u:282_14: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya
XXavsata_u:282_15: tūṣṇīṃbhūtaḥ / atha sa gṛhapatir labdhaprasādaḥ pādayor nipatya cetanāṃ puṣṇāti /

XXavsata_u:321_12: yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,
XXavsata_u:avs_29.1_1: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
XXavsata_u:avs_29.2_0: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:322_0: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /
XXavsata_u:322_1: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:322_15: ūrṇāyām antardhīyante / anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:322_16: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_29.6_3: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // iti
XXavsata_u:327_0: bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat / nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
XXavsata_u:327_1: paśyasy ānanda anenārāmikeṇa mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:327_2: evaṃ bhadanta / eṣa ānanda ārāmiko 'nena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca trayodaśa kalpān vinipātaṃ na gamiṣyati,
XXavsata_u:327_3: paścime bhave paścime nikete paścime samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe nirmalo nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:327_4: ayam asya deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti /
XXavsata_u:327_6: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:327_7: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:327_9: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:329_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:329_1: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:329_2: saṃbahulāś ca goṣṭhikā madyamadākṣiptā vīṇāmṛdaṅgapaṇavair vividhair vādyair vādyamānair nṛtyanto gāyanta utpalapadmapuṇḍarīkavārṣikādibhir udārapuṣpair āsaktakaṇṭheguṇā viśiṣṭāmbaravasanā bahiḥ śrāvastyā nirgacchanti /
XXavsata_u:329_4: dadṛśus te goṣṭhikā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ
XXavsata_u:331_1: sahadarśanāc ca teṣāṃ yo 'sau madyamadaḥ sa prativigataḥ /
XXavsata_u:331_2: tato vigatamadyamadāḥ prasādāvarjitamanaso nṛtyagītavādyair bhagavataḥ upasthānaṃ cakruḥ,
XXavsata_u:331_4: nikṣiptāni copari bhagavato nīlakūṭāgāro nīlacchatraṃ nīlamaṇḍapa ivāvasthitāni /
XXavsata_u:331_6: tiṣṭhantam anutiṣṭhanti / bhagavatā ca nīlaprabhā utsṛṣṭā,
XXavsata_u:331_8: atha the goṣṭhikā labdhaprasādāḥ cetanāṃ puṣṇānti:
XXavsata_u:331_9: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ sākṣātkūryāmeti /
XXavsata_u:331_11: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti,
XXavsata_u:331_12: tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātā arciṣo mukhān niścārya kāścid adhastād gacchanti,
XXavsata_u:331_13: kāścid upariṣṭād gacchanti / yā adhastād gacchanti, tāḥ saṃjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṃghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tapanaṃ pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudaṃ aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ narakān gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtā nipatanti,
XXavsata_u:331_16: teṣām evaṃ bhavati: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ,
XXavsata_u:331_17: āhosvid anyatropapannā iti / teṣāṃ prasādasaṃjananārthaṃ bhagavān nirmitaṃ visarjayati /
XXavsata_u:331_19: na hy eva vayaṃ bhavanta itaś cyutāḥ,
XXavsata_u:331_20: nāpy anyatropapannāḥ / api tv ayam apūrvadarśanaḥ satvaḥ,
XXavsata_u:331_22: te nirmite cittam abhiprasādya tan narakavedanīyaṃ karma kṣapayitvā devamanuṣyeṣu pratisandhiṃ gṛhṇanti,
XXavsata_u:331_24: yā upariṣṭād gacchanti, tāś cāturmahārājikāṃs trayastriṃśān,
XXavsata_u:331_25: yāmāṃs tuṣitān nirmāṇaratīn paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikān brahmapurohitān mahābrahmaṇaḥ parīttābhān apramāṇābhān ābhāsvarān parīttaśubhān apramāṇaśubhāñ śubhakṛtsnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmety udghoṣayanti,

XXavsata_u:avs_30.2_0: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:332_0: atha tā arciṣas trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti /

XXavsata_u:334_6: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ /

XXavsata_u:338_0: bhagavān āha: evam etad ānanda, evam etat / nāhetvapratyayam ānanda tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti /
XXavsata_u:338_1: paśyasy ānanda ebhir goṣṭhikair mamaivaṃvidhaṃ satkāraṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:338_2: evaṃ bhadanta / ete ānanda goṣṭhikā anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca viṃśatyantarakalpān vinipātaṃ na gamiṣyanti,
XXavsata_u:338_3: paścime bhave paścime nikete paścime samucchraye paścime ātmabhāvapratilambhe valgusvarā nāma pratyekabuddhā bhaviṣyanti /
XXavsata_u:338_4: ayam eṣāṃ deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasāda iti /
XXavsata_u:338_8: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:342_0: padmakaḥ kavaḍaś caiva dharmapālaḥ śibis tathā /
XXavsata_u:342_2: anāthapiṇḍaḥ subhadraś ca vargo bhavati samudditaḥ //
XXavsata_u:345_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:345_1: śaratkālasamaye bhikṣavo rogeṇa bādhyante pītapāṇḍukāḥ kṛśaśarīrā durbalāṅgāḥ /
XXavsata_u:345_4: paśya bhadanta ete bhikṣavaḥ śāradikena rogeṇa bādhyante,
XXavsata_u:345_8: bhagavān āha: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:345_10: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:345_11: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
XXavsata_u:avs_31.1_0: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api / *{auch: karmāṇi kalpakoṭiśatair api/}*
XXavsata_u:avs_31.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:346_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ padmako nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:346_2: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahatī tyāge vartate /
XXavsata_u:346_3: tasmiṃś ca samaye vārāṇasyāṃ kālavaiṣamyād dhātuvaiṣamyād vā vyādhir utapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:346_5: tato rājñā tān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇikam utpāditam:
XXavsata_u:346_6: mayā hy eṣāṃ paritrāṇaṃ karaṇīyaṃ cikitsā ceti /
XXavsata_u:346_7: tataḥ sa rājā sarvaviṣayanivāsino vaidyān saṃnipātya teṣāṃ satvānāṃ nidānam āśayānuśayaṃ copalakṣya
XXavsata_u:348_0: svayam ārabdhaś cikitsāṃ sarvauṣadhasamudānayaṃ ca kartum* /
XXavsata_u:348_1: tataś cikitsyamānānāṃ teṣāṃ satvānāṃ bahavaḥ kālā atikrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:348_2: na ca śakyante vaidyadravyauṣadhaparicārakasaṃpannā api cikitsitum* /
XXavsata_u:348_3: tato rājñā sarvavaidyān āhūya ādarajātena punaḥ pṛṣṭāḥ:
XXavsata_u:348_4: ko 'tra hetur na me duścikitsyā iti /
XXavsata_u:348_7: api tu deva asty ekabhaiṣajyaṃ rohito nāma matsyaḥ /
XXavsata_u:348_8: yadi tasya prāptiḥ syāt, śakyante cikitsitum iti / tato rājā rohitaṃ matsyaṃ samanveṣitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:348_9: sa bahubhir api cārapuruṣair mṛgyamāṇo na labhyate /
XXavsata_u:348_11: atha rājā apareṇa samayena bahiryāṇāya nirgacchati /
XXavsata_u:348_12: te ca vyādhina ekasamūhena sthitvā rājānam ūcuḥ:
XXavsata_u:348_14: prayaccha jīvitam iti / tato rājā karuṇadīnavilambitair akṣarair ucyamānas tadāturavacanaṃ śrutvā kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ sāśrudurdinavadanaṃ cintayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:348_15: kiṃ mamānenaivaṃvidhena jīvitena rājyaiśvaryādhipatyena vā īdṛśena,
XXavsata_u:348_16: yo 'haṃ pareṣāṃ duḥkhārtānāṃ na śakto 'smi śāntiṃ kartum iti /
XXavsata_u:348_17: evaṃ vicintya rājā mahāntam arthotsargaṃ kṛtvā jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājyaiṣvaryādhipatyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya bandhujanaṃ kṣamayitvā paurāmātyāṃś ca kṣamayitvā dīnān samāśvāsya aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgataṃ vrataṃ samādāya upariprāsādatalam abhiruhya dhūpapuṣpagandhamālyavilepanaṃ ca kṣiptvā prāṅmukhaṃ praṇidhiṃ kartuṃ prārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:348_18: yena satyena satyavacanena mahāvyasanagatān satvān vyādhiparipīḍitān dṛṣṭvā svajīvitam iṣṭaṃ parityajāmi /
XXavsata_u:348_19: anena satyena satyavākyena asyāṃ vālukāyāṃ nadyāṃ mahān rohitamatsyaḥ prādurbhaveyam* /
XXavsata_u:348_21: sa patitamātraḥ kālagato nadyāṃ vālukāyāṃ mahān rohitamatsyaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:348_23: eṣa dīrghakālamahāvyādhyutpīḍitānām amṛtakalpo nadyāṃ vālukāyāṃ mahān rohitamatsya prādurbhūtaḥ iti /
XXavsata_u:348_24: yataḥ sahaśravaṇān mahājanakāyaḥ śastravyagrakaraḥ piṭakān ādāya nirgatya vividhais tīkṣṇaiḥ śastrair jīvita eva māṃsāny utkartitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:348_25: sa ca bodhisatvo vikartyamānaśarīras tān sarvān maitryā sphuran sabāṣpāśruvadanaś cintayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:348_26: lābhā me sulabdhāḥ yan nāma ime satvā madīyena māṃsarudhireṇa sukhino bhaviṣyantīti /
XXavsata_u:348_27: tad anenopakrameṇa satvān dvādaśavarṣāṇi svakena māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpayāmāsa,
XXavsata_u:348_29: yadā teṣāṃ satvānāṃ sa vyādhir upaśāntas tadā tena rohitamatsyena śabda udīritaḥ:
XXavsata_u:348_30: śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ satvāḥ / ahaṃ sa rājā padmakaḥ / mayā yuṣmākam arthe svajīvitaparityāgenāyam evaṃvidha ātmabhāva upāttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:350_0: abhisaṃbhotsye, ahaṃ tadā yuṣmān atyantavyādheḥ parimocya atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:350_1: tacchravaṇāt sa janakāyo labdhaprasādo rājāmātyapaurāś ca puṣpadhūpamālyavilepanair abhyarcya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ:
XXavsata_u:350_2: atiduṣkarakāraka, yadā tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyethāḥ,
XXavsata_u:350_4: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena padmako nāma rājā babhūva,
XXavsata_u:350_5: ahaṃ sa / yad evaṃvidhāḥ parityāgāḥ kṛtāḥ,
XXavsata_u:350_9: yena me aśitapītakhāditāsvāditaṃ samyak sukhena pariṇamati /
XXavsata_u:350_14: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:353_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:353_2: saced bhikṣavaḥ satvā jānīyur dānasya dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākaṃ yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipakām*,
XXavsata_u:353_3: apīdānīṃ yo 'sāv apaścimakaḥ kavaḍaś carama ālopaḥ,
XXavsata_u:353_4: tato 'pi nādatvā asaṃvibhajya paribhuñjīta sacel labheta dakṣiṇīyaṃ pratigrāhakam* /
XXavsata_u:353_5: na caiṣām utpannaṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhet* /
XXavsata_u:353_6: yasmāt tarhi satvā na jānanti dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam*,
XXavsata_u:353_7: yathāhaṃ jānāmi dānasya phalaṃ dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam*,
XXavsata_u:353_8: tasmāt te adatvā asaṃvibhajya paribhuñjate āgṛhītena cetasā,
XXavsata_u:353_9: utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:353_10: idam avocad bhagavān* / idam uktvā sugato hy athāparam etad uvāca śāstā:
XXavsata_u:avs_32.1_0: evaṃ hi satvā jānīyur yathā proktaṃ maharṣiṇā /
XXavsata_u:avs_32.2_0: nādatvā paribhuñjīran na syur matsariṇas tathā /
XXavsata_u:avs_32.2_1: na caiṣām āgrahe cittam utpadyeta kadācana //
XXavsata_u:355_0: yasmāt tu na prajānanti bālā mohatamovṛtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_32.3_0: yasmāt tu na prajānanti bālā mohatamovṛtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_32.3_1: tasmāt tu bhuñjate satvā āgṛhītena cetasā /
XXavsata_u:avs_32.3_2: utpannaṃ caiṣāṃ mātsaryaṃ cittaṃ paryādāya tiṣṭhati //
XXavsata_u:356_0: yadā bhagavatā etat sūtraṃ bhāṣitaṃ tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:356_1: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavān dānasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate dānasaṃvibhāgasya ca phalavipākam iti /
XXavsata_u:356_2: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yat tathāgato dānasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
XXavsata_u:356_4: yan mayātīte 'dhvani yācanakahetor mukhadvāragataḥ svakavaḍaḥ parityaktaḥ /
XXavsata_u:356_5: tac chruṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:356_6: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:356_8: sa rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca /
XXavsata_u:356_9: mahatī tyāge vartate / yāvad apareṇa samayena mahaddurbhikṣaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ durbhikṣāntarakalpasadṛśam* /
XXavsata_u:356_10: tatas te janakāyā durbhikṣākālabhayabhītāḥ kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭhakapolāḥ pretāśrayasadṛśāḥ saṃgamya samāgamyaikasamūhena rājānam upasṛtya jayenāyuṣā vardhayitvocuḥ:
XXavsata_u:356_12: prayaccha jīvitam iti / tato rājā koṣṭḥāgārikaṃ puruṣam āmantritavān*:
XXavsata_u:356_13: asti bho puruṣa koṣṭhāgāre annapānaṃ yad asmākaṃ syād eṣāṃ ca janakāyānām*? iti śrutvā koṣṭhāgārika āha:
XXavsata_u:356_15: tato gaṇitakuśalair gaṇanāṃ kṛtvā sarveṣāṃ viṣayanivāsināṃ divase divase ekakavaḍo rājño dvau kavaḍāv iyantaṃ kālaṃ bhaviṣyatīti samākhyātam* /
XXavsata_u:356_17: tena hi bhavanto divasānudivasam āgatya rājakule kavaḍam abhyavahṛtya gacchateti /
XXavsata_u:356_18: tatas te pratidivasam āgatya pratyekam ekaikaṃ kavaḍam abhyavahṛtya yatheṣṭaṃ gacchanti /
XXavsata_u:356_22: dīyatāṃ mamāpi kavaḍa iti / tato rājā svakāt kavaḍadvayād ekaṃ brāhmaṇāya dattavān* /
XXavsata_u:356_25: tasyaitad abhavat*: atiduṣkaraṃ bata vārāṇaseyo rājā karoti,
XXavsata_u:356_26: yanv aham enaṃ mīmāṃseyeti / atha śakro devendro brāhmaṇaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya bhojanakāle rājānam upasṛptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:356_29: tato rājā svajīvitaparityāgaṃ vyavasāyakāruṇyāt svakavaḍaṃ brāhmaṇāya datvānāhāratāṃ pratipannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:356_31: taṃ ca mahājanakāyaṃ bhuñjānaṃ dṛṣṭvā parāṃ prītim āpede /
XXavsata_u:356_32: atha śakro devendras taṃ rājño 'tiduṣkaraṃ vyavasāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā brāhmaṇaveṣam antardhāpya svena rūpeṇa sthitvā rājānaṃ saṃvardhayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:358_3: vāpy antām* / ahaṃ saptame divase tathāvidhaṃ māhendraṃ varṣam utsrakṣyāmi,
XXavsata_u:358_5: rājñā tathā kāritam* / śakreṇāpi tathāvidhaṃ mahendraṃ varṣam utsṛṣṭam*,
XXavsata_u:358_7: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena brahmadatto nāma rājā babhūva,
XXavsata_u:358_8: ahaṃ sa / mayā tāny evaṃvidhe durbhikṣe vartamāne svajīvitaparityāgād evaṃvidhāni dānāni dattāni /
XXavsata_u:358_12: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:361_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:361_1: yadā devadattena mohapuruṣeṇa bhagavato vadhārthena dhanapālako hastināga utsṛṣṭaḥ,
XXavsata_u:361_3: vadhakapuruṣāś cotsṛṣṭāḥ / sa bhagavato dīrgharātraṃ vadhakaḥ pratyarthikaḥ pratyamitraḥ,
XXavsata_u:361_4: bhagavāṃś cāsya maitracitto hitacitto 'nukampācittena na pratyupasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:361_6: paśya bhagavan yāvad ayaṃ devadatto bhagavato vadhāyodyataḥ,
XXavsata_u:361_7: bhagavāṃś cāsya maitracitto hitacitto 'nukampacittenā pratyupasthita iti /
XXavsata_u:361_8: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ tathāgato vigatarāgo vigatadveṣo vigatamohaḥ parimukto jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvākārajñaḥ sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:361_9: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohena daharakavayasyavasthitena vadhāya parākrāntasyāsyāntike naivaṃ cittaṃ dūṣitam* /
XXavsata_u:361_10: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:361_11: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* /
XXavsata_u:361_13: sa rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahatī tyāge vartate /
XXavsata_u:361_14: tasya ca rājño durmatir nāma devī caṇḍā roṣaṇī sāhasikā /
XXavsata_u:361_15: ekaputraś ca dharmapālo nāmnā tasyā eva durmatyāḥ sakāśāj jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:361_16: sa ca dharmapālo dayāvān śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya
XXavsata_u:363_1: sarveṣāṃ ca vārāṇaseyānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām iṣṭaḥ kāntaḥ priyo manāpo darśanena /
XXavsata_u:363_2: sa copādhyāyasakāśaṃ gatvā dārakaiḥ saha lipiṃ paṭhati /
XXavsata_u:363_3: yāvad rājā apareṇa samayena vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukaśārikākokilajīvañjīvakanirghoṣite vanaṣaṇḍe devyā sahāntaḥpuraparivṛta udyānabhūmiṃ nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:363_4: tatra ca rājña udyāne 'ntaḥpurajanena saha krīḍata īrṣyāroṣaparītā durmatir devī kupitā /
XXavsata_u:363_8: yady ahaṃ tavārdhaṃ pītakaṃ pibeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:363_9: kāmān khalu pratisevamānasya nāsti kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karmākaraṇīyam iti /
XXavsata_u:363_10: tato rājā brahmadatto dhārmiko 'pi san kāmarāgaparyavasānavigamād antaḥpurajanena sāntvyamāno 'pi krodhāgninā prajvalitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:363_12: gacchata, dharmapālasya galaṃ chitvā rudhiraṃ pāyayatainām iti /
XXavsata_u:363_13: tato dārakaśālāvasthito dharmapālaḥ kumāraḥ śrutvā rodituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:363_15: yatra nāma krodhavaśād aṅganiḥsṛtam api sutaṃ parityajantīti /
XXavsata_u:363_16: tato dharmapālaḥ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaḥ pituḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
XXavsata_u:363_17: sādhu tāta prasīda / niraparādhaṃ mā māṃ parityākṣīḥ /
XXavsata_u:363_18: iṣṭāś ca sarveṣāṃ pitṝṇāṃ putrā iti /
XXavsata_u:363_19: rājā kathayati: putraka yadi te mātā kṣamate,
XXavsata_u:363_20: aham api kṣame iti / tato dharmapālaḥ prarudan mātuḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭa uvāca:
XXavsata_u:363_21: amba kṣamasva, mā māṃ jīvitād vyaparopayeti /
XXavsata_u:363_22: sā evaṃ karuṇadīnavilambitair akṣarair ucyamānā na kṣamate /
XXavsata_u:363_23: tato vadhyaghātais tīkṣṇena śastreṇa dharmapālasya kumārasya galaṃ chitvā durmatir devī rudhiraṃ pāyitā /
XXavsata_u:363_25: dharmapālo 'pi kumāro mātāpitṛvadhyaghāteṣu cittaṃ prasādya kālagataḥ /
XXavsata_u:363_26: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena dharmapālo nāma kumāro babhūva,
XXavsata_u:363_27: ahaṃ saḥ / sā durmatir devī, eṣa devadattaḥ / tadāpi me vadhakahastagatenāsya maitraṃ cittam utpāditam* /
XXavsata_u:363_28: idānīm apy aham asya vadhāyodyatasya maitracitto hitacittaḥ anukampācittaḥ /
XXavsata_u:363_32: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:366_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:368_1: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dvau saṃnipātau bhavataḥ /
XXavsata_u:368_2: eka āṣāḍhyāṃ varṣopanāyikāyāṃ dvitīyaḥ kārtikyāṃ pūrṇamāsyām* /
XXavsata_u:368_4: cīvarāṇi dhāvayanti, pāṃsukūlāni ca sīvyanti / yāvad anyatamo bhikṣuś cīvaraṃ syotukāmaḥ sūcīchidraṃ sūtrakaṃ na śaknoti pratipādayitum* /
XXavsata_u:368_6: ko loke puṇyakāma iti / bhagavāṃś cāsya nātidūre caṃkrame caṃkramyate /
XXavsata_u:368_9: tato 'sau bhikṣur bhagavataḥ pañcāṅgopetaṃ svaram upaśrutya saṃbhrāntas tvaritatvaritaṃ bhagavataḥ pāṇiṃ gṛhītvā svaśirasi sthāpayitvāha:
XXavsata_u:368_10: bhagavan*, anena te pāṇinā trīṇi kalpāsaṃkhyeyāni dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñā upacitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:368_11: atha ca punar bhagavān enam āha:
XXavsata_u:368_12: atṛpto 'haṃ bhikṣo puṇyaiḥ, labdharaso 'haṃ bhikṣo puṇyaiḥ,
XXavsata_u:368_13: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:368_15: saṃskārair atṛpta iti / bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ tathāgato vigatarāgo vigatadveṣo vigatamohaḥ parimukto jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvākārajñaḥ sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:368_16: yat tv aham atīte 'dhvani sarāgaḥ sadveṣaḥ samohK‍h̲ 'parimukto jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyo tṛptaḥ puṇyamayaiḥ saṃskāraiḥ /
XXavsata_u:368_17: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:368_18: bhūtapurvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani śibighoṣāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ śibir nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* /
XXavsata_u:368_20: sa ca śibī rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca /
XXavsata_u:368_21: mahatī tyāge vartate / sa kalyam (Speyer: kālyam ) evotthāya yajñavāṭaṃ praviśya annam annārthibhyaḥ prayacchati,
XXavsata_u:368_24: na cāsau puṇyamayaiḥ saṃskārais tṛptiṃ gacchati /
XXavsata_u:368_29: kṣudrajanto 'vaśiṣṭāḥ, kena saṃtarpayitavyā iti / sa parityaktavibhavasarvasva ekaśāṭakanivasitaḥ svaśarīrāvaśeṣaś cintām āpede /
XXavsata_u:368_31: sa śastreṇa svaśarīraṃ takṣayitvā yatra daṃśamaśakās tatrotsṛṣṭakāyaḥ pratiṣṭhate /
XXavsata_u:368_34: tasyaitad bahavat*: kim ayaṃ śibī rājā satvānām artham evaṃ karoti,
XXavsata_u:368_35: uta karuṇayā? yanv aham enaṃ vijñāseyeti /
XXavsata_u:370_0: gṛdhraveśam ātmānam abhinirmāya rājñe śibeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkramya mukhatuṇḍakenākṣyutpāṭayituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:370_2: kiṃ tu maitrīviśālābhyāṃ nayanābhyāṃ taṃ gṛdhram ālokya kathayati:
XXavsata_u:370_4: tena praṇayaḥ kriyatām iti / tataḥ āvarjitaḥ śakro devendro brāhmaṇaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya rājñaḥ śibeḥ purastāt sthitvā:
XXavsata_u:370_5: sādhu pārthiva, dīyatām etan nayanadvayam iti /
XXavsata_u:370_8: tataḥ śakro devendro bhūyasyā mātrayābhiprasanno brāhmaṇaveṣam antardhāpya svarūpeṇa sthitvā rājānam abhyutsāhayann uvāca:
XXavsata_u:370_9: sādhu sādhu bhoḥ pārthiva, suniścitā te buddhiḥ, akampyas te praṇidhiḥ; anugatā te satveṣu mahākaruṇā,
XXavsata_u:370_10: yatra nāma tvaṃ saṃtrāsakareṣu dharmeṣu viśāradoḥ /
XXavsata_u:370_11: na cirāt tvam anena vyavasāyenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase /
XXavsata_u:370_12: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena śibir nāma rājā babhūva,
XXavsata_u:370_13: ahaṃ sa / tadānīm api puṇyamayaiḥ saṃskārais tṛptir nāsti,
XXavsata_u:370_14: prāg evedānīm* / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam:
XXavsata_u:370_15: yad dānāni dāsyāmaḥ, puṇyāni kariṣyāmaḥ / ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam* /
XXavsata_u:370_16: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:372_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:372_1: yadā bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadā madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
XXavsata_u:372_2: kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam*, anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty āneñjamānair (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:372_3: aniñjamānair )indriyaiḥ, tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:372_4: paśya bhadanta yāvad dharmaratnasyāmī bhājanabhūtāḥ satvā ādareṇa śrotavyaṃ manyanta iti /
XXavsata_u:372_5: bhagavān āha: yathā tathāgatena bhikṣava ādarajātena dharmaḥ śrutaś codgṛhītaś ca,
XXavsata_u:372_6: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:372_7: bhūtapurvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ surūpo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* /
XXavsata_u:372_9: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca /
XXavsata_u:372_10: mahatī tyāge vartate / tasya ca rājñaḥ sundarikā nāma devī abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā
XXavsata_u:374_0: sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā, sundarakaś ca nāmnā ekaputraḥ iṣṭaḥ kāntaḥ priyo manāpaḥ kṣānto 'pratikūlaḥ /
XXavsata_u:374_1: athāpareṇa samayena rājñaḥ surūpasya dharme abhilāṣa utpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:374_4: dharmo me rocata iti / tatas te amātyāḥ kṛtakarapuṭā rājānaṃ vijñāpayanti:
XXavsata_u:374_5: durlabho mahārāja dharmaḥ / śrūyate mahārāja buddhānāṃ loke utpādād dharmasyotpādo bhavatīti /
XXavsata_u:374_6: tato rājñā suvarṇapiṭakaṃ dhvajāgre baddhvā sarvavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam*:
XXavsata_u:374_7: yo me dharmaṃ vakṣyati, tasyemaṃ suvarṇapiṭakaṃ dāsyāmi,
XXavsata_u:374_11: tataḥ sa rājā dharmahetor utkaṇṭhati paritapyati /
XXavsata_u:374_12: śakrasya ca devānām indrasyādhastāj jñanadarśanaṃ pravartate /
XXavsata_u:374_14: tasyaitad abhavat*: yanv ahaṃ surūpāṃ rājānam mīmāṃseyeti /
XXavsata_u:374_15: tato yakṣarūpam ātmānam abhinirmāya vikṛtakaracaraṇanayano 'nekapariṣanmadhyagataṃ rājānam etad avocat*:
XXavsata_u:374_16: nanu dharmābhilāṣī bhavān*, aham te dharmaṃ vakṣyāmīti / tato dharmaśravaṇāt prītiprāmodyajāto rājā yakṣam etad uvāca:
XXavsata_u:374_18: guhyaka uvāca: sukhitasya bata mahārāja dharmā abhilasanti /
XXavsata_u:374_26: so 'py anargheṇa mūlyeneti / tataḥ sundaraḥ kumāras tad upaśrutya pituḥ pādayor nipatya rājānam vijñāpayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:374_27: marṣaya deva / pūryatāṃ devasyābhiprāyam*, prayaccha māṃ guhyakāyāhārārtham iti /
XXavsata_u:374_28: tato rājā tam ekaputrakam iṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ manāpaṃ kṣāntam apratikūlaṃ dharmasyārthe yakṣāya dattavān* /
XXavsata_u:374_29: tato yakṣeṇa ṛddhibalādhānād rajñaḥ parṣadaś ca tathā darśito yathāṅgapratyaṅgāni pṛthagvikṛtya bhakṣitāni,
XXavsata_u:374_30: rudhiraṃ ca pīyamānam* / # # # dṛṣṭvā rājā dharmābhilāṣī na niṣādam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:374_31: sa guhyako rājānam uvāca: atṛpto 'smi bhoḥ pārthiva, bhūyo me prayaccheti / tato rājā tasmai dayitāṃ bhāryāṃ dattavān* /
XXavsata_u:374_32: sāpi tenaivākāreṇa darśitā / tato bhūyo rājānam uvācā: bho pārthiva, adyāpi tṛptir na labhyata iti /
XXavsata_u:374_33: tato rājā yakṣam uvāca: vatsa datto me ekaputrako bhāryā ca dayitā,
XXavsata_u:374_34: kiṃ bhūyaḥ prārthayase iti / guhyaka uvāca: svaśarīraṃ me prayaccha / anena tṛptim upayāsyāmīti / rājovāca: yadi svaśarīraṃ te pradāsyāmi,
XXavsata_u:374_35: kathaṃ punar dharmaṃ śroṣyāmi? kiṃ nu pūrvaṃ me dharmaṃ vada,
XXavsata_u:374_37: tato guhyakena rājānaṃ pratijñāyāṃ pratiṣṭḥāpyānekaśatāyāḥ pariṣadaḥ purastād dharmo deśitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_35.1_0: priyebhyo jāyate śokaḥ priyebhyo jāyate bhayam* /
XXavsata_u:avs_35.1_1: priyebhyo vipramuktānāṃ nāsti śokaḥ kuto bhayam iti //
XXavsata_u:376_0: tato rājā asyā gāthāyāḥ sahaśravaṇāt prahlāditamanāḥ prītisaumanasyendriyajāto yakṣam uvāca:
XXavsata_u:376_1: tataḥ śakro devendro rājānaṃ meruvadakampyam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau viditvā yakṣarūpam antardhāpya svarūpeṇa sthitvā prasādavikasitābhyāṃ nayanābhyām ekena pāṇinā putraṃ gṛhītvā dvitīyena ca bhāryāṃ rājānam abhyutsāhayann uvāca:
XXavsata_u:376_2: sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa / dṛḍhasaṃnāhas tvam* / nacirād anena vyavasāyena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase /
XXavsata_u:376_4: tato rājā śakraṃ devendram idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:376_5: sādhu sādhu kauśika, kṛto 'smākaṃ dharmābhiprāyaḥ pūritaś ceti /
XXavsata_u:376_6: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena surūpo nāma rājā babhūva,
XXavsata_u:376_7: ahaṃ sa / sundaraḥ kumāra ānandaḥ / sundarikā eṣā eva yaśodharā /
XXavsata_u:376_8: tadāpi me bhikṣavo dharmahetor iṣṭabandhuparityāgaḥ svajīvitaparityāgaś ca kṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:376_9: prāg evedānīm* / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam:
XXavsata_u:376_10: yad dharmaṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:376_11: dharmaṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:376_13: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:379_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:379_2: sabrahmakāṇi bhikṣavas tāni kulāni yeṣu kuleṣu mātāpitarau samyaṅ mānyete,
XXavsata_u:379_3: samyak pūjyete, samyak sukhena parihriyete / tat kasya hetoḥ? brahmabhūtau hi kulaputrasya mātāpitarau sahadharmeṇa /
XXavsata_u:379_4: sācāryakāṇi tāni kulāni yeṣu kuleṣu mātāpitarau samyaṅ mānyete,
XXavsata_u:379_5: samyak pūjyete, samyak sukhena parihriyete / tat kasya hetoḥ? ācāryabhūtau hi kulaputrasya mātāpitarau sahadharmeṇa /
XXavsata_u:379_6: āhavanīyāni tāni kulāni yeṣu kuleṣu mātāpitarau samyaṅ mānyete,
XXavsata_u:379_7: samyak pūjyete, samyak sukhena parihriyete / tat kasya hetoḥ? āhavanīyau hi kulaputrasya
XXavsata_u:381_0: mātāpitarau sahadharmeṇa / sāgnikāni tāni kulāni yeṣu kuleṣu mātāpitarau samyaṅ mānyete,
XXavsata_u:381_1: samyak pūjyete, samyak sukhena parihriyete / tat kasya hetoḥ? agnibhūtau hi kulaputrasya mātāpitarau sahadharmeṇa /
XXavsata_u:381_2: sadevakāni tāni kulāni yeṣu kuleṣu mātāpitarau samyaṅ mānyete,
XXavsata_u:381_3: samyak pūjyete, samyak sukhena parihriyete / tat kasya hetoḥ? devabhūtau hi kulaputrasya mātāpitarau sahadharmeṇa /
XXavsata_u:381_4: idam avocad bhagavān* / idam uktvā sugato hy athāparam etad uvāca śāstā:
XXavsata_u:avs_36.1_1: brahmottaraṃ ca prāsādaṃ kena tvam ihāgataḥ //
XXavsata_u:avs_36.3_0: dūraṃ hi karṣate karma dūrāt karma pravartate /
XXavsata_u:avs_36.3_1: tatra prakarṣate karma yatra karma vipacyate //
XXavsata_u:382_1: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:382_3: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ tathāgato vigatarāgo vigatadveṣo vigatamohaḥ parimukto jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvākārajñaḥ sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāpto mātāpitṛguruśuśrūṣāyā varṇavādī /
XXavsata_u:382_4: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ mātuḥ svalpam apakāraṃ kṛtvā mahaduḥkham anubhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:382_5: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:382_6: bhūtapurvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ mitro nāma sārthavāho babhūva āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:382_8: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:382_9: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putrā jāyante mriyante cā /
XXavsata_u:382_10: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:382_12: na me putro na duhitā / mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājño vidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:382_13: tasya vayasyakenopadiṣṭam*: yadi te putrā jāyante, tasya dārikānāma sthāpayitavyam* /
XXavsata_u:382_15: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate /
XXavsata_u:382_16: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:382_17: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate /
XXavsata_u:382_18: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:382_19: tac ca naivam* / yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:382_20: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:382_21: katameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānām*? mātāpitarāu raktau bhavataḥ saṃnipatitau,
XXavsata_u:384_1: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:384_3: anyatamaś ca satvo 'nyatamasmāt satvanikāyāc cyutaḥ tasya prajāpatyā kukṣim avakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:384_5: katame paṃca / raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti, viraktaṃ {puruṣaṃ} jānāti / kālaṃ jānāti, ṛtuṃ jānāti / garbham avakrāntaṃ jānāti / yasya sakāśād garbho 'vakrāmati taṃ jānāti /
XXavsata_u:384_6: dārakaṃ jānāti / dārikāṃ jānāti / saced dārako bhavati dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:384_7: saced dārikā bhavati vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:384_9: diṣṭyāryaputra vardhase / āpannasatvāsmi saṃvṛttā / yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:384_10: so 'py āttamanāttamanāḥ pūrvakāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udānayati:
XXavsata_u:384_12: jāto me syān nāvajātaḥ / kṛtyāni me kurvīta / bhṛtaḥ pratibibhṛyāt / dāyād yaṃ pratipadyeta / kulavaṃśo me cirasthitikaḥ syāt* /
XXavsata_u:384_13: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyati:
XXavsata_u:384_14: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:384_16: śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair nātikaṣāyais tiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukakaṣāyavivarjitair āhārair hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharāṃ bhūmim* /
XXavsata_u:384_17: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
XXavsata_u:384_18: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:384_19: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
XXavsata_u:384_20: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:384_22: putraḥ kanyā ca / tasmād bhavatu dārakasya maitrakanyako nāmeti //
XXavsata_u:384_23: maitrakanyako dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:384_24: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:384_28: yadā maitrakanyako mahān saṃvṛtas tadā mātaram uvāca:
XXavsata_u:384_29: amba pitāsmākaṃ kiṃkarmaphalopajīvī āsīt? tataḥ paścād aham api (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:384_31: mātā kathayati: putraka pitā te okkarika āsīt* /
XXavsata_u:384_33: sā cintayati: yady aham asmai vakṣyāmi mahāsamudravaṇig āsīd iti,
XXavsata_u:384_34: eṣo 'pi kadācin mahāsamudram avatīrṇas tatraiva nidhanam upagacched iti /
XXavsata_u:384_36: tataḥ prathame divase catvāraḥ kārṣāpaṇāḥ saṃpannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:386_0: yāvad apareṇocyate: pitā te gāndhikāpaṇika āsīd iti,
XXavsata_u:386_2: aṣṭau kārṣāpaṇāḥ saṃpannāḥ / te 'pi tena mātur niryātitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:386_3: yāvad apareṇocyate: pitā te hairaṇyika āsīd iti, tena tamāpaṇaṃ tyaktvā hairaṇyikāpaṇo vyavasthāpitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:386_4: tataḥ prathame divase ṣoḍaśa kārṣāpaṇāḥ saṃpannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:386_8: yāvad dhairaṇyikair īrṣyāprakṛtaiḥ sarvān adhiṣṭhānavyavahārān viditvoktaḥ:
XXavsata_u:386_9: maitrakanyaka, kiṃ tavānayā adharmajīvikayā? pitā te mahāsamudravaṇig āsīt* /
XXavsata_u:386_12: amba evam anuśrūyate pitāsmākaṃ mahāsamudravaṇig āsīd iti /
XXavsata_u:386_13: tad anujānīhi, aham api mahāsamudram avatariṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:386_14: mātā kathayati: evam etat putraka / kiṃ tu tvaṃ bāla ekaputrakaś ca /
XXavsata_u:386_16: sa īrṣyāprakṛtibhir akalyāṇamitrair vipralabdho na nivartate /
XXavsata_u:386_17: tatas tena mātur vacanam avacanaṃ kṛtvā vārāṇasyām nagaryāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam*:
XXavsata_u:386_20: ye yuṣmākam utsahante maitrakanyakena sārthavāhena sārdham aśulkenāgulmenātarapaṇyena mahāsamudram avatartum*,
XXavsata_u:386_22: sa kṛtakutūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanaḥ pañcavaṇikśataparivāraḥ śakaṭair bhārair mūṭaiḥ piṭakaiḥ uṣṭrair gobhir gardabhaiḥ mahāsamudragamanīyaṃ paṇyaṃ samudānīya saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:386_23: mātā cāsya snehavyākulahṛdayā sāśrusurdinavadanā pādayor lagnā:
XXavsata_u:386_24: putraka mā māṃ parityajya mahāsamudram avatareti /
XXavsata_u:386_26: apy akṣarair ) ucyamānaḥ kṛtavyavasāyo mātaraṃ pādena śirasy abhihatya sārthasahāyaḥ saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:386_27: mātrā coktaḥ: mā me putraka asya karmaṇo vipākam anubhavethā iti /
XXavsata_u:386_28: yāvad asau grāmanigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīpaṭṭanāny avalokayan samudratīram anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:386_29: sa pañcabhiḥ purāṇaśatair vahanaṃ bhṛtvā paṃca pauruṣeyān gṛhītvā āhāraṃ nāvikaṃ kaivartaṃ karṇadhāraṃ ca trir api ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:386_30: yāvad vahantaṃ makareṇa matsyajātenānayād vayasanam āpāditam* /
XXavsata_u:386_31: tato maitrakanyakaḥ phalakam āsādya sthalam anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:386_32: tataḥ sthale cañcūryamāṇo nadūrān nagaraṃ ramaṇakaṃ nāmnā dṛṣṭavān* /
XXavsata_u:386_33: sa tad upajagāma / yāvat tataś catasro 'psaraso nirgatāḥ,
XXavsata_u:386_35: tāḥ kathayanti: ehi maitrakanyaka, svāgataṃ te, idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /
XXavsata_u:386_36: āgaccha raṃsyāmaha iti / sa tābhiḥ saha anekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān*,
XXavsata_u:386_41: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan paśyati sadāmattaṃ nāma nagaram* /
XXavsata_u:386_42: sa tatra dvārībhūtaḥ / yāvat tasmād apy aṣṭāv apsaraso nirgatāḥ abhirūpatarā darśanīyatarāḥ prāsādikatarāḥ /
XXavsata_u:386_43: tāḥ kathayanti: ehi maitrakanyaka, svāgataṃ te, idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /
XXavsata_u:386_44: āgaccha raṃsyāmaha iti / sa tābhiḥ sahānekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān*
XXavsata_u:388_1: tā apy asya dakṣiṇāṃ paddhatiṃ vārayanti /
XXavsata_u:388_4: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan paśyati nandanaṃ nāma nagaram* /
XXavsata_u:388_5: sa tatra dvārībhūtaḥ / yāvat tasmād api ṣoḍaśāpsaraso nirgatāḥ abhirūpatarā darśanīyatarāḥ prāsādikatarāḥ /
XXavsata_u:388_6: tāḥ kathayanti: ehi maitrakanyaka, svāgataṃ te, idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /
XXavsata_u:388_7: āgaccha raṃsyāmaha iti / sa tābhiḥ saha anekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān* yathāpi tatkṛtapuṇyaḥ satvaḥ kṛtakuśalaḥ /
XXavsata_u:388_8: tā apy asya dakṣiṇāṃ paddhatiṃ vārayanti /
XXavsata_u:388_11: yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena pathā gacchan paśyati brahmottaraṃ nāma prāsādam* /
XXavsata_u:388_12: sa tatra dvārībhūtaḥ / yāvat tasmād api dvātriṃśad apsaraso nirgatāḥ abhirūpatarā darśanīyatarāḥ prāsādikatarāḥ /
XXavsata_u:388_13: tāḥ kathayanti: ehi maitrakanyaka, svāgataṃ te, idam asmākam annagṛhaṃ pānagṛhaṃ vastragṛhaṃ śayyāgṛhaṃ maṇimuktāvaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālavividhajātarūparajatasaṃpūrṇam* /
XXavsata_u:388_14: āgaccha raṃsyāmaha iti / sa tābhiḥ saha anekāni varṣāṇi ratim anubhūtavān* yathāpi tatkṛtapuṇyaḥ satvaḥ kṛtakuśalaḥ /
XXavsata_u:388_15: tā apy asya dakṣiṇāṃ paddhatiṃ vārayanti /
XXavsata_u:388_19: tathāsyecchā vardhate / yāvat punar api dakṣiṇena yathā gacchan paśyaty ayomayaṃ nagaram* /
XXavsata_u:388_20: sa tatra praviṣṭaḥ / praviṣṭamātrasya cāsya dvāraṃ pihitam* /
XXavsata_u:388_21: tato 'bhyantaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ / tatrāsya dvāraṃ pihitam* / tato 'bhyantaraṃ praviṣṭaḥ / yāvat puruṣaṃ paśyati mahāpramāṇam* /
XXavsata_u:388_22: mūrdhni cāsya ayomayaṃ cakraṃ bhramaty ādīptaṃ pradīptaṃ saṃprajvalitam ekajvālībhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:388_24: so 'syāhāraḥ / tato maitrakanyakas taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān*:
XXavsata_u:388_25: bho puruṣa, kas tvam iti / sa kathayati: ahaṃ mātur apakārīti / udāhṛtamātre ca tena puruṣeṇa maitrakanyakasya tat karmābhimukhībhūtam*:
XXavsata_u:388_26: aham api mātur apakārīti manye tenaivāhaṃ karmaṇā ihākṛṣṭa iti /
XXavsata_u:388_27: atha tasminn antare ākāśāc chabdo nirgataḥ:
XXavsata_u:388_28: ye baddhās te muktāḥ, ye muktās te baddhāḥ / ity uktamātre tasya puruṣasya mūrdhni cakram antarhitam*,
XXavsata_u:388_30: tato duḥkhārtaṃ maitrakanyakam avekṣya sa puruṣo gāthayā pratyabhāṣata:
XXavsata_u:avs_36.5_1: pādenābhyāhatā mūrdhni tasya te karmaṇaḥ phalam* // iti
XXavsata_u:avs_36.7_1: ādīptam āyasaṃ cakraṃ tava mūrdhni bhramiṣyati // iti
XXavsata_u:394_0: maitrakanyaka āha: bhoḥ puruṣa, asti kaścid anyo 'pīhāgamiṣyatīti? puruṣaḥ prāha:
XXavsata_u:394_2: tato maitrakanyako duḥkhavedanābhibhūtaḥ satvānām antike kāruṇyaṃ janayitvā taṃ puruṣam āha:
XXavsata_u:394_3: icchāmy ahaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa sarvasatvānām arthe idaṃ cakraṃ upari śirasā dhārayitum* /
XXavsata_u:394_4: mā kaścid anyo 'py evaṃvidhakarmakārī ihāgacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:394_5: ity uktamātre maitrakanyakasya bodhisatvasya tac cakraṃ saptatālamātraṃ mūrdhni udgamyākāśe sthitam* /
XXavsata_u:394_6: sa ca kālaṃ kṛtvā tuṣite devanikāye upapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:394_7: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena maitrakanyaka āsīt,
XXavsata_u:394_8: ahaṃ sa / yan mayā saṃvyavaharatā mātā kārṣāpaṇaiḥ pratipāditā,
XXavsata_u:394_9: tasya me karmaṇo vipākena caturṣu mahānagareṣu mahatsukham anubhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:394_11: tasya me karmaṇo phalavipākenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:394_14: tad ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti ye maitrakanyakasya /
XXavsata_u:394_15: pṛthagjanasya eṣa eṣa guṇagaṇo bhaviṣyati yas tasyaiva devaputrabhūtasya /
XXavsata_u:394_17: tat kasya hetoḥ? duṣkarakārakau hi bhikṣavaḥ putrasya mātāpitarau āpyāyakau poṣakau saṃvardhakau stanyasya dātārau,
XXavsata_u:394_19: ya ekenāṃsena putro mātaraṃ dvitīyena pitaraṃ pūrṇaṃ varṣaśataṃ pariharet*,
XXavsata_u:394_20: yad vā asyāṃ mahāpṛthivyāṃ maṇayo muktā vaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālarajatajātarūpam aśmagarbho musāragalvo lohitikā dakṣiṇāvartaḥ,
XXavsata_u:394_22: na iyatā putreṇa mātāpitroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syād upakṛtaṃ vā /
XXavsata_u:394_23: yas tv asāv aśrāddhaṃ mātāpitaraṃ śraddhāsaṃpadi samādāpayati,
XXavsata_u:394_24: vinayati, niveśayati, pratiṣṭhāpayati, duḥśīlaṃ śīlasaṃpadi, matsariṇaṃ tyāgasaṃpadi, duṣprajñaṃ prajñāsaṃpadi, samādāpayati, vinayati, niveśayati, pratiṣṭhāpayati, iyatā putreṇa mātāpitroḥ kṛtaṃ vā syād upakṛtaṃ vā /
XXavsata_u:394_25: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:397_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:397_1: śrāvastyāṃ anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:397_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:397_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:397_5: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:397_6: dārako jātaḥ / sa unnīto vardhito mahān saṃvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:397_7: pitā cāsya dhanakṣayam anuprāpto bhogakṣayam anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:397_8: sa ca vistīrṇasuhṛtsaṃbandhibāndhavas taṃ putraṃ kālānukālaṃ jñātisakāśaṃ preṣayati /
XXavsata_u:397_9: sa tair jñātibhis tathā lālito yathā teṣu pravṛddhasnehaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:397_11: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:397_12: sa prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:397_14: yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāre doṣadarśī nirvāṇe guṇadarśī mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:397_15: sa evaṃ pravrajitaḥ san jñātibhiḥ saha saṃsṛṣṭo viharati /
XXavsata_u:397_16: tato bhagavāṃs taṃ gṛhisaṃsargān nivārya araṇye niyojayate /
XXavsata_u:397_17: sa tatra nābhiramate / yāvad bhagavāṃs taṃ trir api gṛhisaṃsargān nivārayati:
XXavsata_u:397_19: santi cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi iṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manāpāni kāmopasaṃhitāni rañjanīyāni /
XXavsata_u:397_20: śrotravijñeyāḥ śabdāḥ, ghrāṇavijñeyā gandhāḥ, jihvāvijñeyā rasāḥ, kāyavijñeyāni spraṣṭavyāni, manovijñeyā dharmāḥ iṣṭāḥ kāntāḥ priyā manāpāḥ kāmopasaṃhitā rañjanīyāḥ kaṇṭakabhūtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:397_22: yatra sthitasya kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vṛddhir bhavati /
XXavsata_u:397_23: yāvat tena kulaputreṇa bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya araṇyavāsena vasatā yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānenedam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣākṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:397_24: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:397_25: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:397_26: sa pūrvanivāsam anusmṛtya bhagavato 'syātiduṣkarāṇi dṛṣṭvā bhagavantam upasaṃkramya sagauravaḥ stauti mānayati ca /
XXavsata_u:399_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:399_1: paśya bhadanta, yāvad ayaṃ kulaputro bhagavatā yāvat trir api grāmāntān nivārya araṇye niyojitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:399_3: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena ayaṃ kulaputro yāvan trir api grāmāntān nivārya araṇye niyojitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:399_5: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair ayaṃ kulaputraḥ svajīvitaparityāgena grāmāntān nivārya araṇyavāse niyuktaḥ /
XXavsata_u:399_6: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:399_7: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani anyatarasmin girikandare prasravaṇapuṣpaphalakandasaṃpanno ṛṣiḥ prativasati kaṣṭatapāḥ phalamūlāmbubhakṣo 'jinavalkalavāsī agnihotrikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:399_8: tasya ca ṛṣeḥ śaśo vayasyo mānuṣapralāpī /
XXavsata_u:399_15: tataḥ sa ṛṣis tatrāśramapade upabhogaviharān nābhiramate /
XXavsata_u:399_17: atha śaśas taṃ tathā pravṛttaṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭavān*:
XXavsata_u:399_18: maharṣe kva gamiṣyasīti / ṛṣir āha: grāmāntam eva gamiṣyāmi (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:399_20: tataḥ sa ṛṣivacanam upaśrutya jātasaṃtāpo mātāpitṛviyogam iva manyamānaḥ pādayor nipatya tam ṛṣim uvāca:
XXavsata_u:399_21: mā māṃ parityaja / api ca anekadoṣasaṃkulo gṛhavāso 'nekaguṇasaṃpannaś cāraṇyavāsa iti /
XXavsata_u:399_22: sa bahv apy ucyamāno na nivartate /
XXavsata_u:399_23: tataḥ sa śaśenocyate: yady avaśyaṃ gantavyam*, kiṃ nu adyeha tāvat pratīkṣasva,
XXavsata_u:399_27: yasmād ime tiryagyonigatāḥ prāṇinaḥ saṃcayaparā iti /
XXavsata_u:399_28: atha kṛtāhnikam āhārakāle śaśa upasaṃkramya tam ṛṣiṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya kṣamayitum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:399_29: kṣamasva mama maharṣe yan mayā ūhāpohavirahitena tiryagyonāv upapannena tava kiṃcid apakṛtaṃ syāt* /
XXavsata_u:399_31: tataḥ sa ṛṣir jātasaṃvego bāṣpadurdinamukhaḥ priyaikaputram ivopaguhyovāca (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:399_32: ivopagṛhyovāca): vatsa kim idam ārabdham iti /
XXavsata_u:399_33: śaśa uvāca: maharṣe araṇyapriyatayā madīyena māṃsenāhorātraṃ yāpayiṣyasi /
XXavsata_u:avs_37.1_0: na santi mudgā na tilā na taṇḍulā vane vivṛddhasya śaśasya kecana /
XXavsata_u:avs_37.1_1: śarīram etat tv analābhisaṃskṛtaṃ mamopayojyādya tapovane vasa // iti
XXavsata_u:401_0: tataḥ sa ṛṣiḥ śaśavacanam upaśrutya jātasaṃvega uvāca:
XXavsata_u:401_1: yady evaṃ tava priyatayā kāmam ihaiva jīvitaṃ parityakṣyāmi,
XXavsata_u:401_4: ūrdhvamukhaś ca gaganatalam abhivīkṣya yācituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_37.2_0: araṇye me samāgamya viveke ramate manaḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_37.2_1: anena satyavākyena māhendraṃ deva varṣa nu //
XXavsata_u:402_2: kiṃ kṛtam api / paśyanti bodhisatvānubhāvād iti /
XXavsata_u:402_3: yāvac chakreṇa devendreṇa māhendravarṣaṃ vṛṣṭaṃ yena tadāśramapadaṃ punar api tṛṇagulmauṣadhipuṣpaphalasamṛddhaṃ saṃvṛttam* /
XXavsata_u:402_4: tatas tena ṛṣiṇā śaśaṃ kalyāṇamitram āgamya tatra vasatā pañcābhijñāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:402_5: tataḥ sa ṛiṣiḥ śaśam uvāca: bhoḥ śaśa, tena duṣkareṇa vyavasāyena kāruṇyabhāvāc ca kiṃ prārthayase iti /
XXavsata_u:402_6: tenoktam*: andhe loke anāyake apariṇāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayita,
XXavsata_u:402_7: amuktānāṃ mocayitā, anāśvastānām āśvāsayitā, aparinirvṛtānāṃ parinirvāpayiteti /
XXavsata_u:402_8: tataḥ sa ṛṣir idaṃ vacanam upaśrutya śaśam abravīt:
XXavsata_u:402_9: yadā tvaṃ buddho bhavethāḥ, asmākam api samanvāharethā iti /
XXavsata_u:402_10: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena śaśa āsīt,
XXavsata_u:402_11: ahaṃ sa / ṛṣir eṣa kulaputraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyam:
XXavsata_u:402_13: na pāpamitrā na pāpasahāyā na pāpasaṃparkā /
XXavsata_u:402_16: iha mama bhadanta ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasyaivaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi:
XXavsata_u:402_17: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:402_18: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ iti /
XXavsata_u:402_19: bhagavān āha: mā tvam ānanda evaṃ vocaḥ: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:402_20: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ iti /
XXavsata_u:402_21: sakalam idam ānanda kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:402_22: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
XXavsata_u:402_23: tat kasya hetoḥ? māṃ hy ānanda kalyāṇāmitram āgamya jātidharmāṇaḥ satvā jātidharmatayā (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:402_26: tad anenaiva te ānanda paryāyeṇa veditavyaṃ yat sakalam idaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:402_27: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
XXavsata_u:402_29: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:406_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:406_2: kalyam evotthāya bhagavato darśanāyopasaṃkramya jetavanaṃ svayaṃ saṃmārṣṭum* /
XXavsata_u:406_3: athānyatamena kālena anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ kaścid vyākṣepaḥ samutpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:406_4: tato bhagavān puṇyakāmānāṃ satvānāṃ puṇyatīrthopadarśanārthaṃ svayam eva saṃmārjanīṃ gṛhītvā jetavanaṃ saṃmārṣṭuṃ pravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:406_5: bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāśrāvakā api śāradvatīputramaudgalyāyanakāśyapanandarevataprabhṛtayaḥ saṃmārṣṭuṃ pravṛttāḥ /
XXavsata_u:406_6: tato jetavanaṃ saha śrāvakaiḥ saṃmṛjya upasthānaśālāṃ praviśya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:406_10: parasya cittaṃ prasīdati / devatānāṃ manaso bhavati prāsādikam* /
XXavsata_u:406_12: kāyasya ca bhedāt sugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyate /
XXavsata_u:406_14: tataś catasraḥ parṣado bhagavataḥ sakāśāt saṃmārjanasyeti pañcānuśaṃsān upaśrutya prasādajātāḥ prītisaumanasyaprasannacittāḥ svasvāsanād utthāya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantam etad ūcuḥ:
XXavsata_u:406_16: upasthāyakāḥ) sarvaṃ jetavanaṃ sadā saṃmārṣṭum icchāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:406_17: asmākam anugrahaṃ kuru / tato bhagavāṃs tāsāṃ tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsayati /
XXavsata_u:406_18: tatas tāś catasraḥ parṣado bhagavato 'dhivāsanāṃ viditvā saṃmārjanīgṛhītvā sarvaṃ jetavanaṃ saṃmārṣṭuṃ pravṛttāḥ /
XXavsata_u:406_19: sarvaṃ jetavanaṃ cārāmamārgaparyantaṃ saṃmārjya bhagavato dharmadeśanāṃ śrotum ekānte niṣaṇṇā ādarayuktāḥ /
XXavsata_u:406_20: anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir api taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:406_21: tena śrutaṃ yathā bhagavatā mahāśrāvakasahāyena svayam eva jetavanaṃ saṃmṛṣṭam iti /
XXavsata_u:406_22: bhagavatā deśitān saṃmārjane pañcāsnuśaṃsān upaśrutya vipratisārībhūtaḥ iti cintitavān:
XXavsata_u:406_23: kimarthaṃ mayā bhagavato vihāre tasmin puṇyakṣetre,
XXavsata_u:406_26: tathāgatasaṃmukhībhūte sarvaśrāvakasaṃvāsite 'tīva manoramabhūmau sarvadevāsuramanuṣyagandharvagaruḍakinnaramahoragāṇāṃ manoharṣāspadībhūte sarvabhūtapretapiśācayakṣarākṣasanārakadrohiṇām anavakāśe sarvamāramārakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ cānavakāśabhuvane bhagnābhibhavajāte rāgadveṣamohamātsaryerṣyāmānaduṣṭasatvānām aviditaprabhāve pāpācārāṇām alabdhāgamane pāpamitrahastagatānām amanāpajāte śraddhāvigatānāṃ tyāgadharmarahitānām adṛṣṭacintitabhāvane duḥśīlānāṃ kuvṛttinām amanogamane dayābhāvavirahitānāṃ krodhināṃ paruṣabhāṣiṇām alabdhaśaraṇe vīryahīnakusīdavṛttināṃ tyaktārambhāśamināṃ sudūrībhūte dhyānacyutamuṣitasmṛtīnāṃ kudṛṣṭicāriṇāṃ kumārgaprasthitānām andhakārībhūte duṣprajñānāṃ kubuddhilabdhajñānāntarāṇām aprāptāgamanabhāve dātṝṇām atīva manorathakṛte suśīlayuktānāṃ manoramavāse kṣamācāriṇām
XXavsata_u:408_0: ādarāgamanalabdhe vīryārabdhānāṃ nityānugamanaprāpte dhyānaratānām ālīnabhūvane prajñādhāriṇāṃ prabodhaprakāśāparityaktakṣetre etādṛśe buddhavikrīḍite vihāre saṃmārṣṭuṃ cittākṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:408_1: na punaḥ kadāpi mayā tathā kṣamaṃ kartum* /
XXavsata_u:408_3: yatra bhagavatā mahāśrāvakasahāyena svayaṃ saṃmārjanaṃ kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:408_7: tena bhikṣavaḥ pṛṣṭāḥ: ka eṣa iti / bhikṣava ūcuḥ: anāthapiṇḍado bhadanta bhagavato lajjāyamānarūpo 'patrāpyaparigatahṛdayo necchati bhagavataḥ sakāśam atropariṣṭāt pādanyāsenopasaṃkramitum*,
XXavsata_u:408_8: yatra nāma bhagavatā mahāśrāvakasahāyena svayaṃ jetavanaṃ saṃmṛṣṭam iti /
XXavsata_u:408_9: tatas taṃ bhagavān āha: gṛhapate buddhavacanaṃ ###[possibly restore:
XXavsata_u:408_13: tato 'nāthapiṇḍado gāthābhigītena gāyan yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:408_14: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastād ekānte niṣaṇṇo dharmakathāśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:408_15: tato bhagavatā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśitaḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:408_16: so 'nekaparyāyeṇa bhagavatā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśitaḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitaḥ saṃprakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:408_17: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:408_18: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavān dharme sādarajātaḥ sagauravajāto dharmasyaiva varṇaṃ bhāṣata iti /
XXavsata_u:408_19: paśya bhadanta yāvad dharmaratnasyāmī bhājanahūtaḥ satvā ādareṇa sarvaṃ jetavanaṃ saṃmārṣṭuṃ pravṛttāḥ,
XXavsata_u:408_21: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ tathāgato vigatarāgadveṣamoho 'tha parimukto jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair dharme sādarajātaḥ sagauravajāto dharmasyaiva varṇaṃ bhāṣate /
XXavsata_u:408_22: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair dharmahetoḥ svajīvitasyāpi parityāgaḥ kṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:408_23: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:408_24: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* /
XXavsata_u:408_26: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahatī tyāge vartate /
XXavsata_u:408_27: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:408_28: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa sā devī satvavatī saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:408_29: dohadaś cāsyāḥ samutpannaḥ: subhāṣitaṃ śṛṇuyām iti / tayā rājñe niveditam* / rājñā naimittikān āhūya pṛṣṭāḥ /
XXavsata_u:408_30: ta ūcuḥ: deva asya satvasyānubhāva iti /
XXavsata_u:408_31: tatas tena rājā saubhāṣaṇikasyārthe suvarṇapiṭako grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu
XXavsata_u:409_1: paryaṭitaḥ / na ca tat subhāṣitam upalabhyate /
XXavsata_u:409_2: yāvat paripūrṇair navabhir māsaiḥ sā devī prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:409_3: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṣaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
XXavsata_u:409_4: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:409_6: amātyā ūcuḥ: yasmād ayaṃ dārako 'jāta eva subhāṣitaṃ gaveṣate tasmād bhavatu dārakasya subhāṣitagaveṣī nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:409_8: subhāṣitagaveṣī dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:409_9: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:409_11: yadā krameṇa mahān saṃvṛttas tadāpi subhāṣitaṃ gaveṣate,
XXavsata_u:409_12: sa pitur atyayād rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ amātyānām ājñāpayati:
XXavsata_u:409_14: gaveṣata me subhāṣitam api / tatas tair amātyaiḥ sakale jambūdvīpe hiraṇyapiṭakāḥ subhāṣitahetoḥ saṃdarśitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:409_15: na ca subhāṣitam āsāditam* / tatas te rājñe niveditavantaḥ /
XXavsata_u:409_16: tataḥ sa rājā subhāṣitaśravaṇahetor utkaṇṭhati paritapyati /
XXavsata_u:409_19: tasyaitad abhavat*: yanv ahaṃ rājānaṃ mīmāṃseyeti /
XXavsata_u:409_20: atha śakro devānām indro guhyakarūpadhārī bhūtvā vikṛtakaracaraṇanayano rājñaḥ purastād gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:avs_38.1_0: dharmaṃ caret sucaritaṃ nainaṃ duścaritaṃ caret* /
XXavsata_u:avs_38.1_1: dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete asmiṃl loke paratra ca //
XXavsata_u:410_3: etāṃ gāthāṃ śroṣyāmīti / tato guhyako rājānam uvāca: yadi yad bravīmi tan me kariṣyasi,
XXavsata_u:410_5: tat kariṣyāmīti / rājovāca: kim ājñāpayiṣyasīti / guhyaka uvāca: saptāhorātrāṇi khadirakāṣṭhair agnikhadāṃ tāpayitvā tatra yady ātmānam utsrakṣyasi,
XXavsata_u:410_7: tacchravaṇāc ca rājā prītamanās taṃ guhyakam uvāca:
XXavsata_u:410_8: evam astv iti / tato rājñā guhyakaṃ pratijñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya sarvavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam* saptame divase rājā subhāṣitaśravaṇahetor agnikhadāyām ātmānam utsrakṣyati /
XXavsata_u:410_9: tato 'nekeṣu prāṇiśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu gaganataleṣu cānekeṣu devatāśatasahasreṣu saṃnipatiteṣu bodhisatvasyādhyāśayaśuddhitām avagamyādbhutabhāvaṃ ca draṣṭum ihāvatasthuḥ /
XXavsata_u:410_10: atha sa guhyaka ākāśam utpatya bodhisatvam uvāca:
XXavsata_u:410_12: tato rājā jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ rājye 'bhiṣicya amātyān naigamajānapadāṃś ca kṣamayitvā janakāyaṃ cāśvāsya agnikhadāsamīpam upagamya imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:avs_38.2_2: eṣā cāgnikhadā bhaviṣyati śubhā puṇyānubhāvān mama
XXavsata_u:413_0: ity uktvā bodhisatvas tasyām agnikhadāyāṃ patitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:413_2: tataḥ śakro devānām indras tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā yakṣarūpam antardhāpya svarūpeṇa sthitvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:avs_38.3_0: dharma caret sucaritaṃ nainaṃ duścaritaṃ caret* /
XXavsata_u:avs_38.3_1: dharmacārī sukhaṃ śete loke 'smiṃ ca paratra //
XXavsata_u:414_0: atha bodhisatvena tāṃ gāthām udgṛhītvā suvarṇapatreṣv abhilikhya kṛtsne jambudvīpe grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhāniṣu paryaṭitā /
XXavsata_u:414_1: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva,
XXavsata_u:414_2: ahaṃ sa / tadāpi me subhāṣitaśravaṇahetoḥ svajīvitaṃ parityaktaṃ prāg evedānīm* /
XXavsata_u:414_4: yad dharmaṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:414_5: dharmaṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:414_7: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:417_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:417_1: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastyāṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:417_4: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:417_5: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ suciraṃ nirīkṣya pṛthivyāṃ lekhāṃ niṣkṛṣya (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:417_6: nikṛṣya) bhagavantam uvāca: bho gautama, na tāvad ut te lekhā laṅghayitavyā,
XXavsata_u:419_1: tato bhagavān karmaṇām avipraṇāśasaṃdarśanārtham adattādānavairamaṇyārthaṃ ca indrakīla iva tasmin pradeśe sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:419_2: eṣa ca śabdaḥ śrāvastyāṃ samantato visṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:419_3: yathā kila bhagavān rājamārge 'nyatamena brāhmaṇena pañcānāṃ purāṇaśatānām arthaṃ vidhārita iti /
XXavsata_u:419_4: tato rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ sahaśravaṇād evāmātyagaṇaparivṛtto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:419_6: gacchatu bhagavān, ahaṃ pradāsyāmīti / na mahārāja tvayaitāni dātavyāni,
XXavsata_u:419_8: tathā viśākhā mṛgāramātā ṛṣidattapurāṇau sthapatī śakrabrahmādayo devā vaiśravaṇaprabhṛtayaś catvāro lokapālā hiraṇyasuvarṇam upādāya bhagavantam upasṛptāḥ /
XXavsata_u:419_9: tān api bhagavān uvāca: na bhavadbhir etāni dātavyānīti /
XXavsata_u:419_11: sa hiraṇyasuvarṇasya helāṃ pūrayitvā upari pañca purāṇaśatāni datvā bhagavantam upagataḥ:
XXavsata_u:419_12: bhagavan*, idaṃ pratigṛhyatām iti / bhagavān āha: gṛhapate tvayā etāni dātavyāni /
XXavsata_u:419_13: dīyatāṃ brāhmaṇāyeti / tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā sā suvarṇahelā brāhmaṇāya dattā /
XXavsata_u:419_14: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarājikā ca parṣat sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:419_15: paśya bhagavan yāvad anena brāhmaṇena bhagavān vidhārito 'nāthapiṇḍadena ca kārṣāpaṇā dattāḥ /
XXavsata_u:419_16: kutaś ca prabhṛti bhagavān asmai dhārayata iti /
XXavsata_u:419_17: bhagavān āha: icchatha yūyaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śrotum*? evaṃ bhadanta /
XXavsata_u:419_18: tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:419_19: bhāṣiṣye / tathāgatenaitāni [V: The portion from tathāgatenaitāni up to khalu dehinām is out of place here.
XXavsata_u:419_20: ] bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu avaśyaṃbhāvīni karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
XXavsata_u:419_21: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ bāhye pṛthivīdhātau nābdhātau,
XXavsata_u:419_22: na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca /
XXavsata_u:avs_39.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:420_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* /
XXavsata_u:420_3: so 'pareṇa samayena vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukaśārikākokilajīvañjīvakanirghoṣite vanaṣaṇḍe amātyaputraparivṛtaḥ krīḍati ramate /
XXavsata_u:420_6: tato 'mātyaputras tena puruṣeṇa pañca purāṇaśatāni nirjitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:420_8: ### [There seem to be a long gap.
XXavsata_u:422_1: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:422_2: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:422_7: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:425_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kuśinagaryāṃ viharati sma mallānām upavartane yamakaśālavane /
XXavsata_u:425_1: atha bhagavāṃs tad eva parinirvāṇakālasamaye āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma:
XXavsata_u:425_2: prajñāpaya ānanda tathāgatasya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcam* /
XXavsata_u:425_3: adya tathāgatasya rātryā madhyame yāme nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:425_4: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaṃ prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:425_6: ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat /
XXavsata_u:425_7: prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirā mañcaḥ /
XXavsata_u:425_9: upasaṃkramya dakṣinena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati pāde pādam ādhāya alokasaṃjño smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan nirvāṇasaṃjñām eva manasi kurvan /
XXavsata_u:425_10: tena khalu samayena kuśinagaryāṃ subhadraḥ parivrājakaḥ prativasati jīrṇavṛddho mahallakaḥ /
