XXavsata_u:425_11: sa viṃśatiśatavayaskaḥ kauśināgarāṇāṃ mallānāṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'rhan saṃmataḥ /
XXavsata_u:425_13: atra śramaṇasya gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:425_15: āśā ca me saṃtiṣṭhate, pratibalaś ca me sa bhagavān gautamaḥ tatkāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ prativinodayitum* /
XXavsata_u:425_16: śrutvā ca punaḥ kuśinagaryā niṣkramya yena yamakaśālavanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:425_17: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān ānando bahir vihārasyābhyavakāśe caṃkrame caṃkramyate /
XXavsata_u:425_19: dūrād eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar yenāyuṣmān ānandas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:425_20: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmatānandena sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisāryaikānte 'sthāt* /
XXavsata_u:425_21: ekāntasthitaḥ subhadraḥ parivrājaka āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:425_22: śrutaṃ me ānanda adya śramaṇasya gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
XXavsata_u:427_0: parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati / asti ca me dharmeṣu kāṅkṣāyitatvam*,
XXavsata_u:427_1: āśā ca me saṃtiṣṭhate, pratibalaś ca me sa bhagavān gautamas tatkāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ prativinodayitum* /
XXavsata_u:427_5: ānanda āha: alaṃ subhadra / mā bhagavantaṃ viheṭhaya / śrāntakāyo bhagavān*, klāntakāyaḥ sugataḥ / dvir api trir api subhadraḥ parivrājaka āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat* śrutaṃ bho ānanda adya śramaṇasya gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati,
XXavsata_u:427_7: āśā ca me saṃtiṣṭhate / pratibalaś ca me sa bhagavān gautamas tatkāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ prativinodayitum* /
XXavsata_u:427_8: saced bhagavata ānanda, asty aguru, praviśema, pṛcchema kaṃcid eva pradeśam*,
XXavsata_u:427_10: dvir api trir api āyuṣmān ānandaḥ subhadraṃ parivrājakam idam avocat:
XXavsata_u:427_11: alaṃ subhadra, mā tathāgataṃ viheṭhaya, śrāntakāyo bhagavān*, klāntakāyaḥ sugataḥ / punar api subhadraḥ parivrājaka āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:427_12: śrutaṃ bho ānanda purāṇānāṃ parivrājakānām antikāj jīrṇānāṃ buddhānāṃ (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:427_14: kadācit karhicit tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpadyante,
XXavsata_u:427_15: tadyathā udumbaraṃ puṣpam* / tasya cādya bhagavato gautamasya rātryā madhyame yāme anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:427_17: āśā ca me saṃtiṣṭhate / pratibalaś ca me sa bhagavān gautamas tatkāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ prativinodayitum* /
XXavsata_u:427_21: punar apy ānandaḥ subhadraṃ parivrājakam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:427_22: imāṃ ca punar āyuṣmatā ānandasya subhadreṇa parivrājakenā sārdham antarākathāṃ viprakṛtām aśrauṣīd bhagavān divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa /
XXavsata_u:427_23: śrutvā ca punar āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat:
XXavsata_u:427_24: alam ānanda / mā subhadraṃ parivrājakaṃ vāraya /
XXavsata_u:427_26: ayaṃ me paścimo bhaviṣyati anyatīrthikaparivrājakaiḥ sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāraḥ /
XXavsata_u:427_27: ayaṃ ca me caramo bhaviṣyati sākṣācchrāvakāṇām ehibhikṣukayā pravrajitānām*,
XXavsata_u:427_29: atha subhadra parivrājako bhagavatā kṛtāvakāśo hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajāto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:427_30: upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisāryaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:427_31: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ subhadraḥ parivrājako bhagavantam idam avocat:
XXavsata_u:427_33: tadyathā pūraṇaḥ kāsyapaḥ, māskarī gośālīputraḥ, sañjayī vairūṭīputraḥ, ajitaḥ keśakambalaḥ, kukudaḥ kātyāyanaḥ, nirgrantho jñātaputraḥ, pratyajñāsiṣur me svāṃ svāṃ pratijñāṃ ### /
XXavsata_u:427_34: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:avs_40.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:431_0: yasya subhadra dharmavinaye āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgo nopalabhyate,
XXavsata_u:431_2: dvitīyas tṛtīyaś caturthaḥ śramaṇas tatra nopalabhyate /
XXavsata_u:431_3: yasmiṃs tu subhadra dharmavinaye āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga upalabhyate prathamaḥ śramaṇas tatropalabhyate /
XXavsata_u:431_5: asmiṃs tu subhadra dharmavinaye āryāṣṭāṅgo mārga upalabhyate /
XXavsata_u:431_7: iha dvitīyaḥ, iha trtīyaḥ, iha caturthaḥ / na santi ito bahiḥ śramaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā /
XXavsata_u:431_8: śūnyāḥ parapravādāḥ śramaṇair vā brāhmaṇair vā /
XXavsata_u:431_10: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe subhadrasya parivrājakasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam* /
XXavsata_u:431_11: atha subhadraḥ parivrājako dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣas tīrṇavicikitso 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsanadharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān ānandas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya āyuṣmantaṃ ānandam idam avocat /
XXavsata_u:431_12: lābhā bhadanta ānandena sulabdhā yad bhagavatā ānando mahācāryeṇa mahācāryāntevāsikābhiṣekeṇābhiṣiktaḥ /
XXavsata_u:431_13: api tu asmākam api syur lābhāḥ sulabdhā yad vayaṃ labhemahi svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:431_15: ayaṃ bhadanta subhadraḥ parivrājaka ākāṅkṣate svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:431_17: ehi bhikṣo, cara brahmacaryam* / saiva tasyāyuṣmataḥ pravrajyābhūt sopasaṃpat,
XXavsata_u:431_18: evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa āyuṣmān eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā vyahārṣīt* /
XXavsata_u:431_19: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan* yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśru avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
XXavsata_u:431_20: tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya pravedayati:
XXavsata_u:431_21: kṣīṇā me jātiḥ, uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nānyam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmi /
XXavsata_u:431_23: athāyuṣmataḥ subhadrasyārhatvaprāptasya vimuktisukhaṃ pratisaṃvedayata etad abhavat*:
XXavsata_u:431_24: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ śāstāraṃ parinirvāpayantaṃ paśyeyam* /
XXavsata_u:431_27: yadā bhagavatā paścimaśayanopagatena dharmoparodhikāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ vartamānāyām*,
XXavsata_u:431_28: chidyamāneṣu dharmeṣu, mucyamāneṣu saṃdhiṣu, subhadro 'rhatve pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:431_29: bahavaś ca kauśīnāgarā mallā dharme niyuktāḥ,
XXavsata_u:431_30: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:431_31: āścaryaṃ bhadanta, yad ayaṃ subhadraḥ parivrājako bhagavatā chidyamāneṣu dharmeṣu mucyamānāsu saṃdhiṣu saṃsāravāgurāyā mocayitvā yāvad atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpita iti /
XXavsata_u:431_32: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ subhadraḥ parivrājakaḥ saṃasāravāgurāyā mocayitvā yāvad atyantaniṣṭhe
XXavsata_u:433_0: nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ / yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair ūhāpohavirahitena tiryagyonāv upapannena svajīvitaparityāgena subhadraḥ paritrātaḥ,
XXavsata_u:433_1: kauśīnāgarāś ca mallāḥ / tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:433_2: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani anyatarasyāṃ parvatadaryāṃ mṛgayūthapaḥ prativasati anekamṛgasahasraparivāraḥ paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī /
XXavsata_u:433_3: tac ca mṛgayūthaṃ lubdhakena vicārya rājñe niveditam* /
XXavsata_u:433_4: tato rājñā caturaṅgeṇa balakāyena nirgatya tan mṛgayūthaṃ sarvaṃ saṃkaṭīkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:433_6: yady aham idānīm imān na rakṣiṣyāmi,
XXavsata_u:433_9: katamena pradeśenāsya mṛgakulasya niḥsaraṇaṃ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:433_10: sa paśyati tasyāṃ parvatadaryāṃ nadīṃ vahamānām* /
XXavsata_u:433_12: te ca mṛgā durbalāḥ / tato yūthapatiḥ sahasā tāṃ nadīm avatīrya madhye sthitvā śabdam udīrayati:
XXavsata_u:433_13: āgacchantu bhavantaḥ, etasmāt kūlād utplutya mama pṛṣṭe pādān sthāpayitvā paratra kūle pratitiṣṭhata /
XXavsata_u:433_15: ato 'nyathā maraṇam iti / tatas tair mṛgais tathaiva kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:433_18: na cāsya vyavasāyo nivṛttaḥ tadgatakāruṇyo mṛgāṇām antike /
XXavsata_u:433_21: Śto) bhaviṣyatīti / sa paśyati mṛgaśāvakam ekam alaṅghitam* /
XXavsata_u:433_22: tato yūthapatiś chidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamānāsu saṃdhiṣu iṣṭajīvitam agaṇayitvā kūlam uttīrya mṛgaśāvakaṃ pṛṣṭham adhirohya nadīm uttārya kūle sthāpayitvā taṃ mṛgagaṇam uttīrṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā maraṇakāle praṇidhiṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:433_23: yathā me ime mṛgā ayaṃ ca mārgaśāvaka iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditāḥ,
XXavsata_u:433_24: vyasanāt paritrātāḥ, evam apy aham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya etān saṃsāravāgurāyā mocayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:433_25: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena mṛgapatir āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:433_26: ahaṃ sa / mṛgā ime kauśīnāgarā mallāḥ /
XXavsata_u:433_28: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:433_29: kāni bhadanta subhadreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni yena paścimaḥ sākṣācchrāvakāṇām iti /
XXavsata_u:433_30: bhagavān āha: subhadreṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
XXavsata_u:433_32: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca /
XXavsata_u:434_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:434_1: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:436_0: bhāgineyo 'śoko nāmnā / sa bhagavatsakāśe mokṣārthī pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:436_1: sa svādhīnaṃ mokṣaṃ manyamāno na vyāyacchate /
XXavsata_u:436_3: bhagavāṃś ca kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgniḥ paścimaśayanopagataḥ,
XXavsata_u:436_4: aśokaś ca bhikṣur aśokasyādhastāt pratisaṃlīno babhūva /
XXavsata_u:436_5: atha yā devatā tasminn aśokavṛkṣe vyuṣitā,
XXavsata_u:436_6: sā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvāṇaṃ śrutvā rodituṃ pravṛttā /
XXavsata_u:436_7: tasya rudantyā aśrubindavo 'śokasya kāye nipatituṃ pravṛttāḥ /
XXavsata_u:436_8: athāśoka ūrdhvamukhas tāṃ devatāṃ rudantīm āha:
XXavsata_u:436_10: devatovāca: adya rātryā madhyame yāme bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:436_11: athāśoko devatāvacanam upasṛtya marmaviddha iva pracalitavān* /
XXavsata_u:436_13: tato devatayā pṛṣṭaḥ: kimarthaṃ rodiṣīti / aśoka uvāca: guruviyogāj jñātiviyogāc ca /
XXavsata_u:436_16: dūre cāsau / ahaṃ ca pṛthagjanaḥ / apakṛṣṭatvād adhvano na śakṣyāmi viśeṣam adhigantum iti /
XXavsata_u:436_17: devatovāca: yadi punar ahaṃ bhavantaṃ bhagavatsakāśam upanayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:436_18: kiṃ śakyam iti / aśoka uvāca: tathā hi me buddhiḥ paripakvā,
XXavsata_u:436_19: yathā sahadarśanād eva bhagavataḥ śakṣyāmi viśeṣam adhigantum iti /
XXavsata_u:436_20: tato devatayā aśoko bhagavatsakāśam ṛddhyanubhāvān nītaḥ /
XXavsata_u:436_22: prasādajātasya ca bhagavatā kāśyapena tathāvidho dharmo deśitaḥ yacchravaṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:436_25: tataḥ sā devatā āyuṣmato 'śokasya parinirvāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītim utpādayāmāsa /
XXavsata_u:436_26: cintayati ca: yaḥ kaścid anenāyuṣmatā viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ,
XXavsata_u:436_27: sarvaḥ sa mām āgamya / evam apy aham anāgate 'dhvani yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:436_28: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti,
XXavsata_u:436_29: tasyāham eva paścimaśayanopagatasya caramaḥ sākṣācchravakāṇām ehibhikṣukayā pravrajitānāṃ bhaveyam*,
XXavsata_u:436_32: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau devatā,
XXavsata_u:436_33: ayaṃ sa subhadraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kalyāṇamitratā vihariṣyāmaḥ kalyāṇsahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:436_34: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
XXavsata_u:436_37: iha mama bhadanta ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi:
XXavsata_u:436_38: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:436_39: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ iti /
XXavsata_u:436_40: {bhagavān āha:} mā tvam ānanda evaṃ vocaḥ: upārdham idaṃ brahmacaryasya yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:436_41: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ iti /
XXavsata_u:437_0: kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:437_1: na pāpamitratā na pāpasahāyatā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
XXavsata_u:437_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? māṃ hy ānanda kalyāṇamitram āgamya jātidharmāṇaḥ satvā jātidharmatāyāḥ parimucyante,
XXavsata_u:437_4: tad anenaiva te ānanda paryāyeṇa veditavyaṃ yat sakalam idaṃ kevalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yaduta kalyāṇamitratā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasaṃparkaḥ,
XXavsata_u:437_5: na pāpasahāyatā na pāpamitratā na pāpasaṃparkaḥ /
XXavsata_u:437_7: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:441_0: guḍaśālā ca bhaktaṃ ca toyaṃ varcaghaṭena ca /
XXavsata_u:441_1: koliko hy uttaraś cāpi jātyandhaḥ śreṣṭhir eva ca /
XXavsata_u:441_2: putro jāmbālakaś caiva vargo bhavati samudditaḥ //
XXavsata_u:444_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:444_4: paribhokṣyāvahe), yāvan narakatiryakpretebhya ekasatvam api na mocayāva iti /
XXavsata_u:444_5: tatas tāv āyuṣmatau kālena kālaṃ kadācin narakacārikāṃ carataḥ,
XXavsata_u:444_7: tau tatra satvānāṃ vividhayātanābhyāhatānām asatpralāpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tān āgatya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām ārocayataḥ /
XXavsata_u:444_9: tatas tau tad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kurutaḥ,
XXavsata_u:444_12: yāvad apareṇa samayenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pretacārikāṃ carann adrākṣīt pretaṃ parvatakūṭaprakhyaṃ samudrasadṛśakukṣiṃ sūcīchidropamamukhaṃ svakeśasaṃchannam ādīptaṃ samyakprajvalitam ekajvālībhūtaṃ dhyāyantam ārtasvaraṃ krandantam*,
XXavsata_u:444_13: duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanām anubhavantam*,
XXavsata_u:444_14: yena yenoccāraprasrāvabhūmis tena tenānvāhiṇḍamānaṃ tad api kṛcchreṇāsādayantam* /
XXavsata_u:444_16: kiṃ te bhoḥ karma kṛtaṃ yenaivaṃvidhāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayasa iti /
XXavsata_u:444_17: preta āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* /
XXavsata_u:444_21: tena khalu samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
XXavsata_u:444_22: kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* / anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:444_23: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ priyālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ
XXavsata_u:446_0: smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca / tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:446_3: maudgalyāyana āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:446_4: tatrāhaṃ pretam adrākṣaṃ sūcīchidropamamukhaṃ parvatopamakukṣiṃ svakeśasaṃchannaṃ durgandhaṃ paramadurgandham* /
XXavsata_u:avs_41.3_2: kiṃ tena prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* // iti
XXavsata_u:447_0: bhagavān āha: pāpakārī maudgalyāyana sa pretaḥ /
XXavsata_u:447_1: icchasi tasya karmaplotiṃ śrotum*? evaṃ bhadanta /
XXavsata_u:447_2: tena hi maudgalyāyana śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
XXavsata_u:447_3: bhūtapūrvaṃ maudgalyāyana rājagṛhe nagare 'nyataraḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:447_5: yatra cekṣuḥ pīḍyate / asati ca buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
XXavsata_u:447_7: sa pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:447_11: śreṣṭhinā ca sa pratyekabuddho dṛṣṭaḥ kāyaprāsādikaś cittaprāsādikaś ca /
XXavsata_u:447_12: dṛṣṭvā śreṣṭhinā uktaḥ: kenāryasya prayojanam iti / pratyekabuddhaḥ kathayati: gṛhapate ikṣuraseneti / tatas tena gṛhapatinā bhṛtakapuruṣasyājñā dattā āryasyekṣurasaṃ prayaccheti /
XXavsata_u:447_13: sa ca gṛhapatiḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena bahir yānāya saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:447_14: atha tasya puruṣasya parakīye dravye mātsaryam utpannam*:
XXavsata_u:447_15: yady aham asya rasaṃ dāsye, punar apy eṣa āgamiṣyatīti / tena aniṣṭagatitrayaprapātanamreṇa sarvābhimatagatidvayanirākariṣṇunā atyantadūrāpagatenāryadharmebhyaḥ pāpaṃ cittam utpādya sa pratyekabuddha uktaḥ:
XXavsata_u:447_16: āhara bhikṣo pātram*, dehi, rasaṃ te dāsyāmīti / asamanvāhṛtya arhacchrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartata iti /
XXavsata_u:447_17: hīnadīnānukampitayā bhṛtyapuruṣo 'yam asyānugrahaḥ kartavya iti tat pātram upanāmitam* /
XXavsata_u:447_18: tato 'sau durācāro nirghṛṇahṛdayas tad gṛhītvā pratiguptaṃ pradeśaṃ gatvā prasrāveṇā pūrayitvā upari ikṣurasenācchādya tasmai pratyekabuddhāyānupradadau /
XXavsata_u:447_20: bahv anena tapasvinā pāpaṃ kṛtam api /
XXavsata_u:449_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyase maudgalyāyana yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena bhṛtakapuruṣa āsīt',
XXavsata_u:449_1: ayaṃ sa pretaḥ / tasya karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre 'nantaṃ duḥkham anubhūtavān* /
XXavsata_u:449_2: idānīm api pretabhūtaḥ prakṛṣṭataraṃ duḥkham anubhavati /
XXavsata_u:449_3: tasmāt tarhi te maudgalyāyana mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā evaṃvidhā doṣā na syur ye pretasya /
XXavsata_u:449_4: iti hi maudgalyāyana ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:449_5: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi te maudgalyāyana ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:449_8: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanā āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* /
XXavsata_u:452_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ {śrāvastyāṃ} viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:452_1: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ anyatarasmin vṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇo divāvihārāya /
XXavsata_u:452_2: aśrauṣīd āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pretyāḥ śabdam ārtasvaraṃ krandantyāḥ,
XXavsata_u:452_3: duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānāyā bhaktaṃ mārgantyāḥ:
XXavsata_u:452_4: bubhukṣitāsmi mārṣāḥ, pipāsitāsmi mārṣā iti / tataḥ sthaviramahāmaudgalyāyanena pretī dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭā ca:
XXavsata_u:452_5: kiṃ te pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ yenaivaṃvidhāni duḥkhāny anubhaviṣyasīti /
XXavsata_u:452_6: pretī āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* /
XXavsata_u:452_10: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
XXavsata_u:452_11: kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* / anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:452_12: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ priyālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca /
XXavsata_u:452_13: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:452_16: maudgalyāyana āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:452_17: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣiṃ svakeśasaṃchannāṃ nagnām ārtasvaraṃ krandantīṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānām* /
XXavsata_u:avs_42.3_0: bubhukṣayā pipāsayā krāntā vyasanapīḍitā / *{sonst: pipāsayā klānta vyasanapīḍitā}*
XXavsata_u:avs_42.4_0: kiṃ tayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* /
XXavsata_u:avs_42.4_1: yena evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavati bhayānakam* // iti
XXavsata_u:454_0: bhagavān āha: pāpakāriṇī maudgalyāyana sā pretī /
XXavsata_u:454_1: icchasi tasyā karmaplotiṃ śrotum*? evaṃ bhadanta /
XXavsata_u:454_2: tena hi maudgalyāyana śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
XXavsata_u:454_3: bhūtapūrvaṃ maudgalyāyana atīte 'dhvani viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:454_4: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:454_5: tasyāṃ ca vārāṇasyām anyatamā gṛhapatipatnī matsariṇī kuṭukuñcikā āgṛhītapariṣkārā kākāyāpi baliṃ na pradātuṃ vyavasyati,
XXavsata_u:454_6: prāg evānyeṣāṃ yācakānām* / sā śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakān dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ pradūṣayati /
XXavsata_u:454_7: yāvad anyataraḥ piṇḍapātikas tasyā gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:454_9: cittaṃ ca pradūṣya imāṃ cintām āpede:
XXavsata_u:454_11: punar apy eṣa āgamiṣyatīti / tatas tayā pāpakāriṇyā aniṣṭaṃ paralokabhayam avigaṇayya sa bhikṣur upanimantrya dvāraṃ baddhvā bhaktacchedaṃ kāritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:454_12: bahu ca paribhāṣyoktaḥ: iyaṃ te bhikṣo satkriyā / mā punar idaṃ gṛhaṃ pravekṣyasīti /
XXavsata_u:454_13: sā tena mātsaryeṇāsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena preteṣūpapannā /
XXavsata_u:454_16: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasa āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* /
XXavsata_u:457_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:457_1: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pretacārikāṃ caran pretīm adrākṣīd dagdhasthūṇāsadṛśīṃ svakeśasaṃchannāṃ
XXavsata_u:459_0: sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣim ādīptāṃ pradīptāṃ prajvalitām ekajvālībhūtāṃ dhmāyantīṃ tṛṣārtāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānām* /
XXavsata_u:459_2: yadā devo varṣati, tadā tasyā upari savisphuliṅgāṅgāravarṣaṃ patati /
XXavsata_u:459_4: kiṃ tvayā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavasīti /
XXavsata_u:459_5: pretī āha: pāpakāriṇy ahaṃ bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana /
XXavsata_u:459_8: yāṃ śrutvā anye 'pīha satvāḥ pāpāt karmaṇaḥ prativiraṃsyantīti /
XXavsata_u:459_10: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* /
XXavsata_u:459_11: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:459_12: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ priyālāpina ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca /
XXavsata_u:459_13: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:459_16: mahāmaudgalyāyana āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:459_17: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ dagdhasthūṇāsadṛśīṃ svakeśasaṃchannāṃ sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣim ādīptāṃ pradīptāṃ prajvalitām ekajvālībhūtāṃ dhmāyantīm ārtasvaraṃ kradantīṃ tṛṣārtāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānām* /
XXavsata_u:459_19: yadā devo varṣati tadā asyā upari savisphuliṅgam aṅgāravarṣaṃ patati /
XXavsata_u:459_20: bhagavān āha: pāpakāriṇī maudgalyāyana sā pretī /
XXavsata_u:459_21: icchasi tasyā karmaplotiṃ śrotum*? evaṃ bhadanta /
XXavsata_u:459_22: tena hi maudgalyāyana śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
XXavsata_u:459_23: bhūtapūrvaṃ maudgalyāyana atīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrakalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:459_24: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:459_28: sā bhikṣuṇoktā: tṛṣārto 'haṃ bhagini, pānīyam anuprayaccheti / tasyā mātsaryam utpannam* / sā āgṛhītapariṣkārā bhikṣum uvāca:
XXavsata_u:459_29: bhikṣo yadi mriyase, na te dadāmi pānīyam*, ghaṭo me ūno bhaviṣyatīti / tato 'sau bhikṣus tṛṣārto nirāśaḥ prakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:459_30: tato 'sau dārikā tena mātsaryeṇāsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena kālaṃ kṛtvā preteṣūpapannā /
XXavsata_u:459_31: evaṃvidhāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate /
XXavsata_u:459_32: tasmāt tarhi maudgalyāyana evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yan mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyaṃsyāmahe /
XXavsata_u:459_34: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanā āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* /
XXavsata_u:463_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:463_1: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:463_2: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisamarpya yena gṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvatas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:463_3: upasaṃkramya gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam avagāhyānyatarad vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya niṣaṇṇo divāvihārāya /
XXavsata_u:463_4: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ pretīm ādrakṣīd dagdhasthūṇāsadṛśīṃ nagnāṃ svakeśasaṃchannāṃ sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣim ādīptāṃ pradīptāṃ prajvalitām ekajvālībhūtāṃ dhmāyantīm ārtasvaraṃ kradantīṃ tṛṣārtāṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānām* /
XXavsata_u:463_5: durgandhāṃ paramadurgandhāṃ varcaḥsadṛśīṃ varcohārāṃ tad api kṛcchreṇāsādayantīm* /
XXavsata_u:463_6: dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ saṃvignaḥ /
XXavsata_u:463_7: kiṃ tvayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yasya te īdṛśaṃ phalam iti /
XXavsata_u:463_8: pretī āha: pāpakāriṇy [MS: prāgapakāriṇy] ahaṃ bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana /
XXavsata_u:463_11: Śṣyatīti) / yāṃ śrutvānye 'pi satvāḥ pāpakarmaṇaḥ prativiraṃsyantīti /
XXavsata_u:463_13: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* /
XXavsata_u:463_14: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān {madhura}madhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:463_15: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ priyālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca /
XXavsata_u:463_16: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:463_19: maudgalyāyana āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:463_20: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ dagdhasthūṇāsadṛśīṃ nagnāṃ svakeśasaṃchannāṃ sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣim ādīptāṃ pradīptāṃ prajvalitām ekajvālībhūtām ārtasvaraṃ krandantīṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānām* /
XXavsata_u:463_22: yadā devo varṣati, tadā tasyā upari savisphuliṅgam aṅgāravarṣaṃ patati,
XXavsata_u:463_23: durgandhāṃ paramadurgandhāṃ varcaḥsadṛśāṃ ca varcāhārāṃ tad api kṛcchreṇāsādayantīm* /
XXavsata_u:avs_44.1_0: ito dānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tat pretān anugacchatu /
XXavsata_u:avs_44.2_0: yena hi varcadhānāni tena dhāvati duḥkhitā /
XXavsata_u:avs_44.2_1: varcaḥ pāsyāmi bhokṣye ca tac ca duḥkhena labhyate //
XXavsata_u:avs_44.3_0: kiṃ tayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* /
XXavsata_u:465_0: bhagavān āha: pāpakāriṇī maudgalyāyana sā pretī /
XXavsata_u:465_1: icchasi tasyāḥ karmaplotiṃ śrotum*? evaṃ bhadanta /
XXavsata_u:465_2: tena hi maudgalyāyana śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
XXavsata_u:465_3: bhūtapūrvaṃ maudgalyāyana vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho hīnadīnānukampī prāntaśayanāsanasevī ca /
XXavsata_u:465_5: yāvad asya vaidyena sāṃpreyaṃ bhojanam upadiṣṭam* /
XXavsata_u:465_7: tena ca śreṣṭhinā dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaś ca:
XXavsata_u:465_13: yady aham asmai adya bhojanaṃ pradāsyāmi,
XXavsata_u:465_14: śvo bhūya āgamiṣyatīti / tayā ekāntam apasṛtya varcasaḥ pātraṃ pūrayitvā upari bhaktena pracchādya tasmai pratyekabuddhāya dattam* /
XXavsata_u:465_16: tena pratigṛhītam* / pratigṛhya saṃlakṣitaṃ yathaitad durgandham* /
XXavsata_u:465_19: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyase maudgalyāyana yāsau tena kālena tena samayena śreṣṭhivadhukā,
XXavsata_u:465_20: iyaṃ sā pretī / yad upādāyānayā tādṛkpāpaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:465_22: nityaṃ ca varcāhārā / tasmāt tarhi te maudgalyāyana mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā ete doṣā na syur ye tasyāḥ pretyā /
XXavsata_u:465_24: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanā āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* /
XXavsata_u:468_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:468_1: tena khalu punaḥ samayena antarā ca rājagṛham antarā ca veṇuvanam atrāntare pañca pretaśatāni dagdhasthūṇākṛtīni nagnāni svakeśasaṃchannāni parvatopamakukṣīṇi sūcīchidropamamukhāni ādīptāni pradīptāni saṃprajvalitāny ekajvālībhūtāny ārtasvaraṃ pralapamānāni duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām
XXavsata_u:470_2: athāyuṣmān mahamaudgalyāyanaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:470_3: tena te pretā dṛṣṭāḥ, tair api pretair āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ /
XXavsata_u:470_6: vayaṃ smo bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana rājagṛhe pañca śreṣṭhiśatāny abhūvan* /
XXavsata_u:470_8: svayaṃ tāvad asmābhir dānapradānāni na dattāni,
XXavsata_u:470_9: pareṣām api dānapradāneṣu dīyamāneṣu vighnāḥ kṛtāḥ,
XXavsata_u:470_11: pretopapannā iva yūyaṃ nityaṃ paragṛhebhyo bhaikṣyam aṭatha (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:470_12: aṭhatha) / ete vayaṃ kālaṃ kṛtvā evaṃvidheṣu preteṣūpapannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:470_13: iti bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana ye 'smākaṃ jñātayo rājagṛhe prativasanti,
XXavsata_u:470_14: teṣām asmākīnāṃ karmaplotiṃ nivedya chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kārayitvā cāsmākaṃ pretayoner mokṣaḥ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:470_16: tata āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena teṣāṃ jñātigṛhebhyaś cchandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo bhaktenopamantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:470_17: pretānāṃ ca niveditam*: śvo bhagavān sabhikṣusaṃgho bhaktenopanimantritaḥ,
XXavsata_u:470_19: jñātīnām apy ārocitam*: bhavadbhir āgantavyaṃ tatra jñātibhojane /
XXavsata_u:470_20: tān pretān drakṣyāmaḥ / athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ svayam evodyukto bhojanaṃ pratijāgaritum* /
XXavsata_u:470_21: atha prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām āhāre sajjīkṛte gaṇḍīdeśakāle saṃprāpte tān pretān na paśyati /
XXavsata_u:470_22: tata āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano divyena cakṣuṣā tān pretān samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:470_25: tatrāpi nādrākṣīt* / tato yāvad asya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate,
XXavsata_u:470_27: tatrāpi nādrākṣīt* / tata āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ saṃvigno bhagavate nivedayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:470_28: bhagavan, na me dānapatayo dṛśyanta iti /
XXavsata_u:470_29: bhagavān āha: ayaṃ maudgalyāyana mā khedam āpadyasva /
XXavsata_u:470_35: ākoṭyatāṃ gaṇḍīti / tato gaṇḍyām ākoṭitāyāṃ sarvo bhikṣusaṃghaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:470_36: pretajñātayo 'nye ca kautūhalyābhyāgatāḥ satvāḥ pretadarśanotsukāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:470_37: tato bhagavatā ṛddhyā tathā darśitaṃ yathā pretā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhuñjānaṃ paśyanti,
XXavsata_u:470_38: smṛtiṃ ca pratilabhante: jñātayo asmad arthe buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayantīti /
XXavsata_u:470_39: tato bhagavān pañcāṅgopetena svareṇa dakṣiṇām ādiśati:
XXavsata_u:472_0: yāvad bhagavatā tad adhiṣṭhānā tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:472_1: yāṃ śrutvā anekair prāṇiśatasahasrair mātsaryamalaṃ prahāya satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:472_2: te ca pretā bhagavati cittam abhiprasādya kālagatāḥ,
XXavsata_u:472_4: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyakāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:472_6: paśyanti pretebhyaś cyutāḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ,
XXavsata_u:472_9: nāsmākaṃ pratirūpaṃ syāt, yad vayaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmema /
XXavsata_u:472_10: yan nu vayam aparyuṣitaparivāsā eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmemeti /
XXavsata_u:472_11: atha pretapūrviṇo devaputrāś calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrā maṇiratnavicitramaulayaḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrās tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmapuṇḍarīkamandāravādīnāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā samantato venuvaṃ kalandakanivāpam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair ākīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:472_12: atha bhagavān pretapūrviṇāṃ devaputrāṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:472_13: yāṃ śrutvā pretapūrvikair devaputrair mahān viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ /
XXavsata_u:472_14: te labdhalābhā iva vaṇijo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tatraivāntarhitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:472_20: teṣāṃ mayā dharmo deśitaḥ / te labdhodayā labdhalābhāḥ prakrāntā iti /
XXavsata_u:472_21: tata āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena teṣāṃ jñātīnām ārocitam* /
XXavsata_u:472_22: te śrutvā paraṃ vismayam upagatā bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādayāmāsur bhūyaś ca satkāraṃ pracakrur iti /
XXavsata_u:472_23: tasmāt tarhi te maudgalyāyana mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyam* /
XXavsata_u:472_24: ete doṣā na bhavanti ye teṣāṃ pretānām iti /
XXavsata_u:472_25: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanā āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* /
XXavsata_u:475_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:475_1: rājagṛhe 'nyataraḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:477_0: ramate paricārayati / tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:477_1: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:477_2: dārako jātaḥ / tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:477_4: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād uttare nakṣatre jātas tasmād bhavatūttara iti nāma /
XXavsata_u:477_5: uttaro dārako unnīto vardhito mahān saṃvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:477_6: pitā cāsya kālagataḥ / uttaraś ca gṛhe svāmī saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:477_7: tenāpaṇaḥ sthāpitaḥ / krīṇāti vikrīṇīte krayavikrayeṇa jīvikāṃ kalpayati /
XXavsata_u:477_9: tasya bhagavatsaṃdarśanāt saddharmaśravaṇāc ca bhagavacchāsane prasādo jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:477_11: sa mātaraṃ vijñāpayāmāsa: amba anujānīhi māṃ bhagavacchāsaneṣu pravrajiṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:477_12: tato mātā kathayati: putra tvam ekaputrakaḥ / yāvad ahaṃ jīvāmi, tāvan na pravrajitavyam* / mṛtāyāṃ mayi yathākaraṇīyaṃ kariṣyasīti /
XXavsata_u:477_13: sa cottaro yat kiṃcid upārjayati tat sarvaṃ mātre 'nuprayacchati:
XXavsata_u:477_15: sā cāsya mātā lubdhā kuṭukuñcikā matsariṇī āgṛhītapariṣkārā tān kārṣāpaṇān gopayitvā ye śramaṇabrāhmaṇāḥ piṇḍārthinas tad gṛhaṃ praviśanti,
XXavsata_u:477_16: tān paribhāṣate: pretopapannā iva yūyaṃ nityaṃ paragṛhebhyo bhaikṣam aṭatheti /
XXavsata_u:477_17: sā ca putraṃ visaṃvādayati: aham adya iyatāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ bhojanaṃ prayacchāmīti /
XXavsata_u:477_19: uttaraś ca mātṛviyogād dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:477_20: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣākṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:477_21: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:477_22: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:477_24: sā cāsya mātā pretalokopapannā nagnā dagdhasthūṇāsadṛśī svakeśaromasaṃchannā sūcīchidropamamukhī parvatopamakukṣir ādīptā saṃprajvalitā ekajvālībhūtā ārtasvaraṃ kradantī āyuṣmantam uttaram upasaṃkrāntā /
XXavsata_u:477_25: yāvad āyuṣmatā uttareṇa sā pretī dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭā ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_46.1_0: ahaṃ te jananī snigdhā yayā jāto 'si putraka /
XXavsata_u:avs_46.2_0: pañcaviṃśati varṣāṇi yataḥ kālagatā hy aham* /
XXavsata_u:avs_46.3_0: saphalān vṛkṣān gacchāmi niṣphalā me bhavanti te /
XXavsata_u:avs_46.3_1: pūrṇāni sarāṃsi gacchāmi tāni śuṣkāṇi santi me //
XXavsata_u:avs_46.4_0: sukhaṃ bhadantasya hi vṛkṣamūlaṃ udakaṃ bhajate śītala bhājanesmim* /
XXavsata_u:avs_46.4_1: kṛpā janayitvā {janetvā} kṛpaṇāyai mahyaṃ dadasva toyaṃ tṛṣārtitāyai //
XXavsata_u:479_0: tata uttaro mātaram uvāca: amba nanu purā tvaṃ mayā manuṣyabhūtā dānāni dāpitā,
XXavsata_u:479_1: puṇyāni kāriteti / pretī āha: na mayā putraka mātsaryābhibhūtayā dānāni dattāni,
XXavsata_u:479_2: puṇyāni vā kṛtāni / sarvaṃ tadarthajātaṃ pāpacittayā agnikhadāyāṃ nikhātam* /
XXavsata_u:479_3: tad idānīṃ putraka jñātigṛhaṃ gatvā chandanabhikṣaṃ kṛtvā mama nāmnā buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojaya,
XXavsata_u:479_4: dakṣiṇām ādeśaya, deśanāṃ ca kāraya / evaṃ pretayoner mama mokṣaḥ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:479_5: uttara āha: evam astu amba / kiṃ tu tvayā buddhānte sthātavyam iti /
XXavsata_u:479_6: pretī āha: putrakā, apatrape nagnā hriyānviteti /
XXavsata_u:479_7: uttara āha: amba yadā pāpaṃ karoṣi, tadā nāpatrapitā / idānīṃ kimarthaṃ phalakāle vyapatrapasa iti /
XXavsata_u:479_8: tata uttareṇa jñātigṛhebhyaś chandanabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:479_12: te tāṃ pretīṃ vikṛtāśrayāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ saṃvegam upagatāḥ bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādayāmāsuḥ /
XXavsata_u:479_13: tataḥ āyuṣmān uttaro buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya pretyā nāmnā dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kārayāmāsa /
XXavsata_u:479_14: bhagavāṃś ca pañcāṅgopetena svareṇa svayam eva dakṣiṇādeśanām ādiśati:
XXavsata_u:avs_46.5_0: ito dānād dhi yat punyaṃ tat pretīm anugacchatu /
XXavsata_u:480_0: yāvad bhagavatā tad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tasyāḥ pretyā mahataś ca janakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:480_4: tata āyuṣmatā uttareṇoktam*: amba asti te śaktiḥ / kriyatāṃ dānotsarga iti / pretamaharddhikovāca: putra na śakyāmi / nāsti me dāne 'bhilāṣa iti / tata āyuṣmān uttaraḥ pretamaharddhikām uvāca:
XXavsata_u:avs_46.6_0: adyāpi te tiṣṭhati tac charīraṃ vivṛddhanirmāṃsatvagasthicarmam* /
XXavsata_u:481_0: yāvad āyuṣmatā uttareṇa subahu paribhāṣya ekā yamalī labdhā /
XXavsata_u:481_1: tataḥ sā saṃghāya dattā / yena ca bhikṣuṇā saṃghamadhyāt sā yamalī krītā,
XXavsata_u:481_2: tena mānavake sthāpitā / tatas tayā pretyā rātrāv upāgatyāpahṛtā /
XXavsata_u:481_3: tatas tena bhikṣuṇā āyuṣmata uttarāya niveditam* /
XXavsata_u:481_4: uttareṇa gatvā pretīṃ paribhāṣya punar apy ānīya dattā /
XXavsata_u:481_5: evaṃ yāvat trir api tasya bhikṣoḥ sakāśād apahṛtā,
XXavsata_u:481_7: bhikṣuṇā ca sā pāṭayitvā cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya vilepanikāyāṃ
XXavsata_u:483_0: sīvitā / tatas tayā na punar apahṛtā /
XXavsata_u:483_1: ata eva mātsaryaṃ satvānāṃ viḍambanakaraṃ dṛṣṭvā mātsaryaprahāṇāya dhyāyitavyam* /
XXavsata_u:483_2: tathā evaṃvidhā doṣā na syur yathā tasyāḥ pretyā iti /
XXavsata_u:483_3: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* /
XXavsata_u:486_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:486_1: athāyuṣmān nandakaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisamarpya pretacārikāṃ carati sma /
XXavsata_u:486_2: adrākṣīd āyuṣmān nandakaḥ pretīṃ dagdhasthūṇāsadṛśīṃ jātyandhāṃ svakeśaromasaṃchannāṃ sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣiṃ durgandhāṃ śmaśānasadṛśīṃ kākair gṛdhraiḥ śvabhiḥ śṛgālaiś cābhidrutām* /
XXavsata_u:486_4: sā marmavedanābhyāhatā ārtasvaraṃ krandati duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti /
XXavsata_u:486_6: kiṃ tvayā bhagini prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavasīti /
XXavsata_u:486_7: pretī āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* /
XXavsata_u:486_10: yāṃ śrutvā anye 'pīha satvāḥ pāpāt prativiraṃsyantīti /
XXavsata_u:486_12: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* /
XXavsata_u:486_13: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ śṛṇoty anijyamānair indriyaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:486_14: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca /
XXavsata_u:486_15: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ nandakam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:486_16: ehi nanadaka, svāgataṃ te, kutas tvaṃ nandaka etarhy āgacchasīti /
XXavsata_u:486_17: nandaka āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:486_18: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ dagdhasthūṇāsadṛśīṃ svakeśaromasaṃchannāṃ sūcīchidropamamukhīṃ parvatopamakukṣiṃ durgandhāṃ śmaśānasadṛśīṃ kākair gṛdhraiḥ śvabhiḥ śṛgālaiś cābhidrutām*,
XXavsata_u:486_20: sā marmavedanābhyāhatā ārtasvaraṃ krandati duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām amanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānām* /
XXavsata_u:avs_47.4_0: kiṃ tayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* /
XXavsata_u:488_0: bhagavān āha: pāpakāriṇī nandaka sā pretī /
XXavsata_u:488_1: icchasi tasyā karmaplotiṃ śrotum*? evaṃ bhadanta /
XXavsata_u:488_2: tena hi nandaka śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
XXavsata_u:488_3: bhūtapūrvaṃ nandaka asminn eva bhadrakalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:488_4: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:488_6: sā dharmābhilāṣiṇī / yāvad asau dharmaṃ śrutvā saṃsāradoṣadarśinī nirvāṇe guṇadarśinī saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:488_9: sā tatra śaikṣāśaikṣībhir bhikṣuṇībhiḥ sārdhaṃ prativasati /
XXavsata_u:488_12: tatas tayā dānapatir gṛhebhyaḥ pravṛttakāni chandakāni # # # [The gap may be filled ou by ācchinnāni;
XXavsata_u:488_13: Speyer: kurkuraiḥ śṛgālaiś ca.] śaikṣāśaikṣīṇāṃ ca avarṇo bhāṣitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:488_14: bhikṣavaś ca ye śīlavantaḥ, tān dṛṣṭvā nayane nimīlitavatī /
XXavsata_u:488_15: kiṃ manyase nandaka yā sā śreṣṭhiduhitā,
XXavsata_u:488_16: iyaṃ sā pretī / yat tayā varṣake mātsaryaṃ kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:488_17: tena preteṣūpapannā / yat tayā naityakasamucchedaḥ kṛtas tena kākair gṛdhraiḥ kurkuraiś cābhidrutā /
XXavsata_u:488_18: yat tayā śaikṣāśaikṣīṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām avarno bhāṣitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:488_20: yat tayā śīlavato bhikṣūn dṛṣṭvā nayane nimīlite,
XXavsata_u:488_21: tena jātyandhā saṃvṛttā / iti hi nandaka ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:488_22: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi te nandaka ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:488_25: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe daśabhiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:488_27: ime cānye ca ādīnavā mātsarye vāgduścarite ceti jñātvā mātsaryasya vāgduścaritasya ca prahāṇāya vyāyantavyam* /
XXavsata_u:488_29: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* /
XXavsata_u:492_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:492_1: śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:492_3: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:492_4: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:492_5: tasmai bhagavatā saṃsāravairāgyikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāradoṣadarśī nirvāṇe guṇadarśī bhūtvā bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:492_6: pravrajitaś ca jñāto mahāpuṇyaḥ saṃvṛtto lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇām* /
XXavsata_u:492_7: sa gṛhītapariṣkāro labdhaṃ labdhaṃ saṃcayaṃ karoti,
XXavsata_u:492_8: na tu sabrahmacāribhiḥ saha saṃvibhāgaṃ karoti /
XXavsata_u:492_9: sa tena mātsaryeṇa sevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena pariṣkārādhyavasitaḥ kālagataḥ svake layane preteṣūpapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:492_10: tato 'sya sabrahmacāribhir muṇḍikāṃ gaṇḍīṃ parāhatya śarīrābhinirhāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:492_11: tato 'sya śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā vihāram āgatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:492_12: tato layanadvāraṃ vimucya pātracīvaraṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhāḥ /
XXavsata_u:492_13: yāvat paśyanti taṃ pretaṃ vikṛtakaracaraṇanayanaṃ paramabībhatsāśrayaṃ pātracīvaram avaṣṭabhyāvasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:492_14: tathāvikṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhikṣavaḥ saṃvignā bhagavate niveditavantaḥ /
XXavsata_u:492_15: tato bhagavāṃs tasya kulaputrasyānugrahārthaṃ śiṣyagaṇasyodvejanārthaṃ mātsaryasya cāniṣṭavipākasaṃdarśanārthaṃ bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:492_16: tato 'sau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:492_18: sa vyapatrapitavān* / tato bhagavān sajalajaladagambhīradundubhisvaraḥ pretaṃ paribhāṣitavān:
XXavsata_u:492_22: mā haiva itaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā narakeṣūpapatsyasa iti /
XXavsata_u:492_23: tataḥ pretaḥ saṃghe pātracīvaraṃ niryātya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya atyayaṃ deśitavān* /
XXavsata_u:492_24: tato bhagavatā pretasya nāmnā dakṣiṇā ādiṣṭā:
XXavsata_u:avs_48.1_0: ito dānād dhi yat puṇyaṃ tat pretam anugacchatu /
XXavsata_u:493_0: tataḥ sa preto bhagavati cittaṃ prasādya kālagataḥ pretamarddhikeṣūpapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:493_1: tataḥ pretamaharddhikaś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitramauliḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras
XXavsata_u:495_0: tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:495_6: kiṃ bhagavan asyām rātrau brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān āha:
XXavsata_u:495_7: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:495_8: api sa pretaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā pretamaharddhikeṣūpapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:495_10: tasya mayā dharmo deśitaḥ / sa prasādajātaḥ prakrāntaḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyam* /
XXavsata_u:495_11: ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti, ye tasya śreṣṭhinaḥ pretabhūtasya /
XXavsata_u:495_13: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* /
XXavsata_u:498_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:498_1: athāyuṣmān nāladaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:498_2: rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyaḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratisamarpya pretacārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:498_3: sa gṛdhrakūṭaparvatasāmantake pretīṃ dadarśa yamarākṣasasadṛśīṃ rudhirabinducitām asthiśakalāparivṛtāṃ śmaśānamadhya ivāvasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:498_4: rātriṃdivena pañca putrān prasūya tādṛśaṃ duḥkham anubhūya putrasnehe saty api kṣutkṣāmatayā putrāṃs tān bhakṣayantīm* /
XXavsata_u:498_6: kiṃ tvayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ yenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavasīti /
XXavsata_u:498_7: pretī āha: āditye hi samudgate na dīpena prayojanam* /
XXavsata_u:498_10: yāṃ śrutvā anye 'pīha satvāḥ pāpāt karmaṇaḥ prativiraṃsyantīti /
XXavsata_u:498_12: tena khalu samayena bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* /
XXavsata_u:498_13: anekaśatā ca parṣad bhagavataḥ sakāśān madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ
XXavsata_u:500_1: tato buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūrvālāpinaḥ ehīti svāgatavādinaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamāś ca /
XXavsata_u:500_2: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ nāladam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:500_3: ehi nālada, svāgataṃ te, kutas tvaṃ nālada etarhy āgacchasīti /
XXavsata_u:500_4: nālada āha: āgacchāmy ahaṃ bhadanta pretacārikāyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:500_5: tatrāhaṃ pretīm adrākṣaṃ yamarākṣasasadṛśīṃ rudhirabinducitām asthiśakalāparivṛtāṃ śmaśānamadhya ivāvasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:avs_49.1_0: pañca putrān ahaṃ rātrau divā pañca tathāparān* /
XXavsata_u:avs_49.1_1: bhakṣayāmi janitvā tān nāsti tṛptas tathāpi me // iti
XXavsata_u:avs_49.2_0: kiṃ tayā prakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ martyaloke sudāruṇam* /
XXavsata_u:avs_49.2_1: yena evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavati bhayānakam* // iti
XXavsata_u:500a_0: bhagavān āha: pāpakārī nālada sā pretī / icchasi tasyāḥ karmaplotiṃ śrotum*? evaṃ bhadanta /
XXavsata_u:500a_1: tena hi nālada śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
XXavsata_u:500a_2: bhūtapūrvaṃ nālada atīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām 'nyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:500a_4: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:500a_5: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato naiva putro na duhitā /
XXavsata_u:500a_6: sa kare kapolaṃ kṛtvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:500a_8: na me putro na duhitā / mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:500a_9: so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:500a_10: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:500a_11: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:500a_12: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:500a_13: tac ca naivam* / yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:500a_14: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:500a_15: katameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānām*? mātāpitarāu raktau bhavataḥ saṃnipatitau,
XXavsata_u:500a_16: mātā kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī, gandharvaś ca pratyupasthito bhavati /
XXavsata_u:500a_17: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:500a_18: tasya devatārādhane 'pi sati na putro na duhitā /
XXavsata_u:500a_19: tasyaivaṃ buddhir utpannā: dvitīyāṃ bhāryām anayāmi / kadācit sā satvavatī syād iti /
XXavsata_u:500a_20: tena sadṛśāt kulād dvitīyā bhāryā ānītā /
XXavsata_u:500a_21: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:500a_22: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa sā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:500a_24: diṣṭyā āryputra vardhase / āpannasatvāsmi saṃvṛttā / yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
XXavsata_u:500a_26: so 'py āttamanāttamanāḥ pūrvakāyam abhyunnamayya dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udanayati:
XXavsata_u:502_0: putramukhaṃ paśyeyam* / jāto me syān nāvajātaḥ / kṛtyāni me kurvīta / bhṛtaḥ pratibibhṛyāt* / dāyād yaṃ pratipadyeta / kulavaṃśo me cirasthitikaḥ syāt* /
XXavsata_u:502_1: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyate:
XXavsata_u:502_2: idaṃ tayor yatrayatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:502_3: āpannasatvāṃ caināṃ viditvopariprāsādatalagatām ayantritāṃ dhārayati śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair nātikaṣāyais tiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukakaṣāyavivarjitair āhāraiḥ /
XXavsata_u:502_4: hārārdhahāravirājitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharimāṃ bhūmim* /
XXavsata_u:502_5: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
XXavsata_u:502_6: tatas tasyāḥ pūrvikāyāḥ prajāpatyāḥ prathamapatnyās tāṃ bahumānāl lālitāṃ (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:502_8: cintayanti: yady eṣā putraṃ janayiṣyati, niyataṃ māṃ bādhayiṣyati / sarvathopāyasaṃvidhānaṃ kartavyam iti /
XXavsata_u:502_10: pratisevamānasya) nāsti kiṃcit pāpaṃ karmācaraṇīyam iti /
XXavsata_u:502_11: tayā aniṣṭagatiprapātanamugdhayā visrambham utpādya tathāvidhaṃ garbhaśātanaṃ dravyaṃ dattaṃ yena pītamātreṇaiva tasyās tapasvinyāḥ srasto garbhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:502_12: tatas tayā dvitīyapatnyā sarvajñātīn saṃnipātya sā prathamā patnī samanuyujyate:
XXavsata_u:502_13: tvayā me visrambham utpādya śātanaṃ dravyaṃ dattam*,
XXavsata_u:502_14: yena me srasto garbha iti / tato 'sau prathamapatnī jñātimadhye śapathaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttā:
XXavsata_u:502_15: yadi mayā garbhaśātanaṃ dravyam anupradattaṃ syāt*,
XXavsata_u:502_16: ahaṃ pretī bhūtvā jātāñ jātān putrān bhakṣayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:502_18: iyaṃ sā pretī / yat tayā īrṣyāprakṛtayā garbhaśātanaṃ dattaṃ tena preteṣūpapannā /
XXavsata_u:502_20: tasya karmaṇo vipākena rātriṃdivena pañca putrān prasūya tān eva bhakṣayati /
XXavsata_u:502_21: tasmāt tarhi te nālada vāgduścaritaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā evaṃvidhā doṣā na syur ye tasyāḥ pretyāḥ /
XXavsata_u:502_23: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanā āyuṣmān nālado 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* /
XXavsata_u:505_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho vaiśālīm upaniśritya viharati markaṭahradatīre kūṭāgāraśālāyām* /
XXavsata_u:505_1: tena khalu samayena vaiśālyām anyatarasyāṃ nagaraparikhāyāṃ pañca pretaśatāni prativasanti vāntāśāny ujjhitāśāni kheṭamūtropajīvīni pūyaśoṇitaviṣṭhāhārāṇi ghorāṇi prakṛtiduḥkhitāni ca /
XXavsata_u:507_2: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:507_3: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:507_5: tatas tena brāhmaṇena naimittikā āhūya pṛṣṭāḥ /
XXavsata_u:507_6: te kathayanti: yo 'yam udarastho dārakas tasyāyaṃ prabhāva iti /
XXavsata_u:507_7: yāvad asau navānāṃ māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:507_8: dārako jāto durvarṇo durdarśano avakoṭimako 'medhyamrakṣitagātro durgandhaś ca /
XXavsata_u:507_9: tathāpy asau snehapāśānubaddhābhyāṃ paramabībhatso 'pi mātṛpitṛbhyāṃ saṃvardhitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:507_11: keśāṃl luñcati, amedhyaṃ mukhe prakṣipati / tasya bālo jāmbāla iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:507_12: yāvad asāv itaś cāmutaś ca paribhraman pūraṇena kāśyapena dṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:507_13: tasyaitad abhavat: yādṛśeṣu sthāneṣv ayam abhiramate,
XXavsata_u:507_14: nūnam ayaṃ siddhapuruṣaḥ / yanv aham enaṃ pravrājayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:507_15: sa tena pravrājito nagnaḥ paryaṭati satkriyāsu ca vartate /
XXavsata_u:507_16: tatas tena paryaṭatā vaiśālīparikhāyāṃ pañca pretaśatāni dṛṣṭāni /
XXavsata_u:507_17: sa pūrvakarmavipākasaṃbandhāt tāṃ nagaraparikhām avatīrya taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgamya samāgamya saṃmodate,
XXavsata_u:507_18: sakhitvaṃ cābhyupagataḥ / yāvad apareṇa samayena jāmbālo dārakaḥ kvacit prayojanena vyākṣipto vaiśālīṃ praviṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:507_20: dadṛśus te pretā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:507_22: bhagavatā uktāḥ: kiṃ bhavatāṃ bādhata iti / te ūcuḥ: pipāsitāḥ smo bhagavann iti /
XXavsata_u:507_23: tato bhagavatā pañcabhyo 'ṅgulibhyo 'ṣṭāṅgopetasya pānīyasya pañca dhārā utsṛṣṭāḥ,
XXavsata_u:507_25: tatas te bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādya kālagatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:507_27: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyakāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:507_33: nāsmākaṃ pratirūpaṃ syāt, yad vayaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmema /
XXavsata_u:507_34: yan nu vayam aparyuṣitaparivāsā eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmemeti /
XXavsata_u:507_35: atha pretapūrviṇo devaputrāś calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrā maṇiratnavicitramaulayaḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrās tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvāṃ kūṭāgāraśālāṃ udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:509_0: dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:509_1: yāṃ śrutvā pañcabhir devaputraśatair viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam anuprāptam* /
XXavsata_u:509_3: saṃpannasasyā iva karṣakāḥ, śūrā iva vijitasaṃgrāmāḥ, sarvarogaparimuktā ivāturā yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatās tayaiva vibhūtyā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:509_4: atha jāmbālo nagaraparikhām āgatas tān pretān nādrākṣīt* /
XXavsata_u:509_6: sa ca tān parimārgamāṇaḥ khedam āpanno na ca tān āsādayati /
XXavsata_u:509_7: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:509_8: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttakānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya [ca] buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:509_9: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ /
XXavsata_u:509_10: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:avs_50.2_1: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet //
XXavsata_u:510_0: tato bhagavāñ jāmbālasya kulaputrasyānugrahārthaṃ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vaiśālīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:510_1: yāvad anupūrveṇa piṇḍapātam aṭan vīthīm avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:510_2: jāmbālaś ca itas tato 'nvāhiṇḍamāno bhagavato 'grataḥ sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:510_3: atha dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:510_5: sa prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭa uvāca:
XXavsata_u:510_6: yadi bhagavan mādṛśānāṃ satvānām asmin dharmavinaye pravrajyāsti;
XXavsata_u:510_8: tato bhagavān mahākaruṇāparigatahṛdayaḥ satvānām āśayānuśayajñas taṃ bhavyarūpaṃ viditvā rajabhujasadṛśaṃ suvarṇavarṇabāhum abhiprasāryedam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:510_10: ity uktamātre bhagavatā saptāhāvaropitair iva keśair dvādaśavarṣopasaṃpannasyeva bhikṣor īryāpathena pātrakarakavyagrahasto 'vasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_50.3_0: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaś ca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_50.3_1: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthāv evaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena //
XXavsata_u:512_1: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣākṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:512_2: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:512_3: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:512_6: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ lūhādhimuktānām*,
XXavsata_u:512_7: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:512_8: kiṃ bhadanta jāmbālena sthavireṇa karma kṛtaṃ yenaivaṃvidhaṃ duḥkham anubhavatīti /
XXavsata_u:512_9: bhagavān āha: jāmbalenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:512_11: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:512_12: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_50.4_0: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /
XXavsata_u:avs_50.4_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:513_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:513_2: tasyāṃ ca rājadhānyām anyatamena gṛhapatinā vihāraḥ kārito yatra nānādigdeśavāsino bhikṣava āgantavyaṃ gantavyaṃ vastavyaṃ ca manyante /
XXavsata_u:513_3: tasmiṃś ca vihāre pṛthagjano bhikṣur naivāsikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:513_5: cātīvāvāsamatsarī) / āgantukān bhikṣūn dṛṣṭvā 'bhiṣajyate kupyati vyāpadyate madguḥ pratitiṣṭhati kopaṃ saṃjanayati /
XXavsata_u:513_6: ye tu tasmād vihārād bhikṣavaḥ prakrāmanti,
XXavsata_u:513_8: yāvad apareṇa samayena janapadād arhadbhikṣur āgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:513_9: sa ca vihārasvāmy anāgāmī / tenāsāv īryāpathena saṃlakṣito 'rhann iti /
XXavsata_u:513_10: tataḥ prasādajātena śvo bhaktena jentākasnātreṇa copanimantritaḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena /
XXavsata_u:513_12: yāvad dvitīye divase jentākasnātre pratipādite bhakte sajjīkṛte āvāsiko bhikṣur āgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:513_14: paśyati vihārasvāminam ekaśāṭakanivasitam āgantukasya bhikṣoḥ parikarma kurvāṇam* /
XXavsata_u:515_0: vākkarma niścāritam*: varaṃ khalu te bhikṣo amedhyena śarīram upaliptam*,
XXavsata_u:515_1: na tu evaṃvidhasya dānapateḥ sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkṛtam iti /
XXavsata_u:515_3: mā haivāyaṃ tapasvī gāḍhatarasya karmaṇo bhāgī bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:515_4: yāvat sāmagrīdeśakāle saṃprāpte naivāsikena bhikṣuṇā śrutam*:
XXavsata_u:515_8: kṣamasva ārya yan mayā tvayi paruṣā vāg niścāriteti /
XXavsata_u:515_9: tato 'rhaṃs tasya prasādābhivṛddhyarthaṃ gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:515_11: tena tasya purastāt tat karma atyayenādeśitaṃ prakāśitam uttānīkṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:515_12: ca na cānena śakitaṃ naiṣṭhikaṃ jñānam utpādayitum* /
XXavsata_u:515_17: yat tu mayā paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ dānapradānāni dattāni saṃghasya copasthānām kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:515_18: tasya karmaṇo vipākena anāgatān samyaksaṃbuddhān ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:515_19: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayenāvāsiko bhikṣuḥ,
XXavsata_u:515_20: ayam evāsau jāmbālaḥ / yad anenārhato 'ntike kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam*,
XXavsata_u:515_21: asya karmaṇo vipākenānantaṃ saṃsāre duḥkham anubhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:515_22: tenaiva ca karmāvaśeṣeṇa etarhi paścime bhave evaṃ durgandhaḥ paramadurgandho 'medhyāvaskarasthānanivāsābhiprāyaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:515_23: yat punar anena tatra paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalam āyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:515_24: tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:515_25: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yan mātsaryaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyam * /
XXavsata_u:515_26: tat kasya hetoḥ? ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti,
XXavsata_u:515_28: eṣa eva guṇagaṇo bhaviṣyati, yo 'sau tasyaivārhatvaprāptasya /
XXavsata_u:515_30: idam avocad bhagavān / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* /
XXavsata_u:518_0: kṛṣṇasarpaś ca candraś ca sālaḥ śrīmatir eva ca /
XXavsata_u:518_1: vastraṃ śukaś ca dūtaś ca mahiṣaḥ poṣadhaś ca vai /
XXavsata_u:518_2: x x x x x haṃso bhavati paścimaḥ //
XXavsata_u:521_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:521_1: rājagṛhe nagaradvāre 'nyataro gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:521_2: sa ca matsarī kuṭukuñcaka āgṛhītapariṣkāraḥ kākāyāpi baliṃ na pradātuṃ vyavasyati /
XXavsata_u:521_4: svake codyāne mahān hiraṇyasuvarṇasya rāśiḥ sthāpitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:521_6: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā tasyaivopari āśīviṣa utapanno mahān kṛṣṇasarpo dṛṣṭiviṣaḥ /
XXavsata_u:521_7: atha ye tad udyānaṃ janakāyāḥ praviśanti,
XXavsata_u:521_9: eṣa ca śabdo rājagṛhe nagare samantato visṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:521_14: kas taṃ śakyati vinetum anyatra buddhād bhagavata iti /
XXavsata_u:521_15: atha rājā bimbisāro mahājanakāyaparivṛto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:521_16: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:521_17: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ rājānaṃ bimbisāraṃ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
XXavsata_u:521_18: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
XXavsata_u:521_19: atha rājā bimbisāra utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:521_20: iha bhagavan rājagṛhe nagare 'muṣminn udyāne mahānāśīviṣaḥ kṛṣṇasarpo dṛṣṭiviṣaḥ prativasati,
XXavsata_u:521_21: mahājanavipraghātaṃ karoti / sādhu bhagavāṃs tam vinayed anukampām upādāyeti /
XXavsata_u:521_23: atha rājā bimbisāro bhagavatas tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:521_24: atha bhagavāṃs tasyā eva rātrer atyayāt pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya yena tad udyānaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:521_25: upasaṃkramya bhagavatā sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāḥ kanakavarṇā marīcaya utsṛṣṭāḥ,
XXavsata_u:523_3: atha sa āśīviṣa itaś cāmutaś ca prekṣitum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:523_4: kasya prabhāvān mama śarīraṃ prahlāditam iti /
XXavsata_u:523_5: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:523_7: prassannacittasya ca bhagavatā tan mayyā gatyās tan mayyā yonyā dharmo deśitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:523_12: mā haiva itaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā narakeṣūpapatsyasa iti /
XXavsata_u:523_14: tadā rodituṃ pravṛttaḥ / atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:524_0: yāvad bhagavatā pātre prakṣipya veṇuvanaṃ nītaḥ /
XXavsata_u:524_1: atrāntare rājñā māgadhena janakāyena ca śrutaṃ yathāsāv āśīviṣo bhagavatā vinīta iti /
XXavsata_u:524_5: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:524_7: paśyati: āśīviṣebhyaś cyutaḥ, praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ,
XXavsata_u:524_10: na mama pratirūpaṃ syāt*, yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam* /
XXavsata_u:524_11: yan nu aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:524_12: athāśīviṣapūrvako devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitracūḍaḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāsam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsayan bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:524_13: atha bhagavān āśīviṣapūrvikasya devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:524_14: yāṃ śrutvā āśīviṣapūrvakeṇa devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:524_16: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:524_18: laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, pihitāny apāyadvārāṇi, vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ smo devamanuṣyeṣu /
XXavsata_u:avs_51.5_3: saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* // iti
XXavsata_u:528_1: saṃpannasasya iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ,
XXavsata_u:528_2: sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam upagatas tayaiva vibhūtyā tasyām eva rātrau rājño bimbisārasya sakāśam upasaṃkramya sarvaṃ rājakulam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya rājānaṃ prabodhya etad uvāca:
XXavsata_u:528_3: mahārāja uttiṣṭha uttiṣṭha, kiṃ svapiṣīti / atha rājā prabuddhaḥ paśyati tam udāram avabhāsaṃ taṃ ca devaputram* /
XXavsata_u:528_4: dṛṣṭvā prītamanās taṃ papraccha kas tvam iti /
XXavsata_u:528_5: sa kathayati: ahaṃ sa dṛṣṭyāśīviṣo bhagavatā tatrodyāne vinītaḥ,
XXavsata_u:528_7: bhagavantaṃ ca me paryupāsya satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:528_8: sa idānīṃ prabodhayāmi / gatvā tad udyānam amukasmāt pradeśān mahānidhānam utpāṭya mama nāmnā bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojaya,
XXavsata_u:528_9: dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ ca kārayeti / adhivāsayati rājā bimbisāro devaputrasya tūṣṇībhāvena /
XXavsata_u:528_10: athāśīviṣapūrvako devaputro rājñas tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:528_11: atha sa rājā bimbisāras tasyām eva rātrau māgadhānāṃ paurajānapadānāṃ nivedya tad udyānaṃ gatvā nidhānam utpāṭya bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ traimāsyaṃ bhojayitvā bhagavantaṃ papraccha:
XXavsata_u:528_12: kāni bhagavann aśīviṣapūrvakeṇa devaputreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni,
XXavsata_u:528_13: yenāśīviṣeṣūpapannaḥ: kāni karmāṇi kṛtāni yena deveṣūpapannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:528_14: satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti? bhagavān āha:
XXavsata_u:528_18: tena deveṣūpapannaḥ / kāśyape ca samykasaṃbuddhe upāsakabhūtena śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:528_21: ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti ye āśīviṣasya /
XXavsata_u:528_22: eṣa eva guṇagaṇo bhaviṣyati, yas tasyaiva devaputrasyety evaṃ te mahārāja śikṣitavyam* /
XXavsata_u:528_23: atha rājā bimbisāro bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:528_24: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* /
XXavsata_u:532_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:532_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:532_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:532_5: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:532_7: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:532_9: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya jātau sarvalokānāṃ nayanaprahlādanam*,
XXavsata_u:532_10: tasmād bhavatu asya dārakasya candra iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:532_11: sa ca tena brāhmaṇena kṛcchreṇa labdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:532_14: sa sarvalokaprahlādanakaratvād brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhiḥ kṛtsnaṃ nagaram anvāhiṇḍyata iti /
XXavsata_u:532_15: sa brāhmaṇas tasmin bhūyasyā mātrayādhyavasito nityam eva kramasthānaśayyāsu saṃrakṣaṇaparo 'vatiṣṭhite /
XXavsata_u:532_17: atha sa brāhmaṇadārako 'nāthapiṇḍadasaṃsargāj jetavanaṃ gatvā buddhavacanaṃ śṛṇoti /
XXavsata_u:532_19: sa cālpāyuṣkaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:532_20: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:532_21: kutaś cyutaḥ, kutropapannaś ca kena karmaṇeti /
XXavsata_u:532_22: paśyati manuṣyebhyaś cyutaḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ,
XXavsata_u:532_25: na mama pratirūpaṃ syāt*, yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam* /
XXavsata_u:532_26: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:532_27: atha brāhmaṇapūrvako devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitracūḍaḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:532_28: atha bhagavān brāhmaṇapūrvakasya devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:532_29: yāṃ śrutvā brāhmaṇapūrvakeṇa devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:532_31: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:532_33: laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, pihitāny apāyadvārāṇi, vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ smo devamanuṣyeṣu /
XXavsata_u:avs_52.3_3: saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* // iti
XXavsata_u:536_0: atha brāhmaṇapūrvako devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ,
XXavsata_u:536_2: sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā hi vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatas tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:536_6: kiṃ bhagavann asyāṃ rātryāṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān āha:
XXavsata_u:536_7: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
XXavsata_u:536_8: api yo 'sāv ekaputro 'sya brāhmaṇasya putro 'lpāyuṣkaḥ kālagataḥ,
XXavsata_u:536_9: sa mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:536_11: tasya mayā dharmo deśitaḥ, dṛṣṭasatyaś ca svabhavanaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:536_12: atra cāntare sa brāhmaṇas tam ekaputrakam iṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ manāpaṃ kṣāntam apratikūlaṃ śmaśāne nirhṛtyotsaṅge kṛtvā karuṇakaruṇaṃ vilapan* kathayati:
XXavsata_u:536_13: hā putraka hā ekaputraketi / jñātayaḥ subahv api śokavinodanaṃ kurvaṇā na śaknuvanty utthāpayitum* /
XXavsata_u:536_14: sa kākakuraraśvaśṛgālagṛdhraparivṛtaḥ prakīrṇakeśībhiḥ strībhir anugato mahājanakāyena codvīkṣyamāṇas tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:536_15: tato 'sya putro devabhūtaḥ pitaraṃ paridevamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ pituḥ śokavinodanārtham ṛṣiveṣadhāriṇam ātmānam abhinirmāya śmaśānasamīpe pañcatapāvasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:536_16: atha sa brāhmaṇas tam ṛṣiṃ papraccha:
XXavsata_u:536_17: bho maharṣe anena tapasā kiṃ prārthayasa iti /
XXavsata_u:536_18: ṛṣir āha: rājyaṃ prārthaye, sauvarṇaś ca me rathaḥ syān nānāratnavicitraḥ,
XXavsata_u:536_21: so 'haṃ taṃ ratham abhiruhyemāṃ mahāpṛthivīm anvāhiṇḍeyeti /
XXavsata_u:avs_52.5_1: na lapsyase 'pi tat sthānaṃ paramatapasāpi hi //
XXavsata_u:537_0: ṛṣiḥ kathayati: tvaṃ ca punar anena mṛtakuṇapenāśucinā paramadurgandhena śavena kāṣṭhabhūtena kiṃ prārthayasa iti /
XXavsata_u:537_1: brāhmaṇaḥ prāha: priyo me ekaputrakaḥ kālagataḥ,
XXavsata_u:avs_52.6_1: na lapsyase 'pi taṃ putraṃ ruditena hi kiṃ tava //
XXavsata_u:539_0: tatas tasya brāhmaṇasya bhūtam ṛṣivacanam avagatya prasādo jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:539_1: prasādajātaś cāha: kas tvam iti / tata ṛṣis taṃ veṣam antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa sthitvā pitaram āha:
XXavsata_u:539_2: ahaṃ te sa ekaputrako bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasādya kālagataḥ /
XXavsata_u:539_5: ehi tvaṃ tāta buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccha,
XXavsata_u:539_6: apy eva tvam api saṃsārasamatikrāmaṃ kuryā iti /
XXavsata_u:539_7: atha sa brāhmaṇo mṛtaśarīram apahāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:539_8: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:539_10: yāṃ śrutvā tena brāhmaṇeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalam prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:539_11: sa labdhodayo labdhalābho bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:539_12: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:539_13: paśya bhagavan, yāvad anena devaputreṇāyaṃ pitā śokaṃ vinodya satyadarśane pratiṣṭhāpita iti /
XXavsata_u:539_14: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad anenaitarhi dṛṣṭasatyena pitā paritrātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:539_15: yat tv anena atīte 'dhvani pṛthagjanena satā yāvat trir api pitā jīvitād vyavaropyamāṇaḥ paritrātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:539_16: tac chruṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:539_17: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ pāradārikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:539_21: tataḥ putreṇa yāvat trir api rājānaṃ vijñāpya iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:539_22: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena pāradārika āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:539_23: ayaṃ sa brāhmaṇaḥ / pāradārikaputro 'yam eva brāhmaṇadārakaḥ /
XXavsata_u:539_24: bhikṣava ūcuḥ: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena pitāputrābhyāṃ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam iti /
XXavsata_u:539_25: bhagavān āha: kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe upāsakabhūtābhyāṃ śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:539_28: sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ, śāntaṃ nirvāṇam iti nirvāṇe yatnaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
XXavsata_u:539_30: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo 'nye ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragādayo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* /
XXavsata_u:543_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:543_1: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śrāvastyāṃ sālabhañjikā nāma parva pratyupasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:543_2: tatrānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatya sālapuṣpāṇy ādāya krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
XXavsata_u:543_3: yāvad anyatarā śreṣṭhidārikā sālapuṣpāṇy ādāya śrāvastīṃ praviśati /
XXavsata_u:543_4: bhagavāṃś ca bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtaḥ śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya caritvā nirgacchati /
XXavsata_u:543_5: dadarśa sā dārikā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:543_6: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ prasādajātayā bhagavān sālapuṣpair avakīrṇaḥ /
