XXavsata_u:543_10: bhagavataḥ kṛtopasthānā kālagatā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā yāvat sālapuṣpavimānālaṃkṛtā devasamitim upasaṃkrāntā /
XXavsata_u:543_11: tasmiṃś ca kāle śakro devendraḥ sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāṃ devagaṇasya madhye buddhasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
XXavsata_u:543_13: dadarśa śakro devendras tāṃ devakanyāṃ sālapuṣpavimānālaṃkṛtām uttaptakuśalamūlām* /
XXavsata_u:avs_53.1_1: gātraśrīr atulā kṛteyam iha te dehāt prabhā niḥsṛtā /
XXavsata_u:avs_53.1_3: brūhi tvaṃ mama devate phalam idaṃ yat karmajaṃ bhujyate //
XXavsata_u:avs_53.2_1: tat karma kuśalaṃ kṛtvā rājate 'bhyadhikaṃ mama /
XXavsata_u:avs_53.3_1: yatra nyastaṃ tvayā bījam iṣṭaṃ svargopapattaye //
XXavsata_u:549_0: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:549_2: sā paśyati: manuṣyebhyaś cyutā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā,
XXavsata_u:549_5: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam* /
XXavsata_u:549_6: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsā eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:549_7: atha sā devakanyā calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrī maṇiratnavicitracūḍā kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrī anekadevatāśatasahasraparivṛtā tenaiva sālapuṣpavimānena saha bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntā /
XXavsata_u:549_8: bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:549_9: atha bhagavāṃs tasyā devatāyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:549_10: yāṃ śrutvā tayā devakanyayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:549_12: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na devatābhir na rājñā neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:549_14: laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, pihitāny apāyadvārāṇi, vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ smo devamanuṣyeṣu /
XXavsata_u:avs_53.7_3: saphalam adya mune tava darśanam* // iti
XXavsata_u:552_1: sasyasaṃpanna iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ,
XXavsata_u:552_2: sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatā tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gatā /
XXavsata_u:554_3: kiṃ bhadanta imāṃ rātriṃ brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān āha:
XXavsata_u:554_4: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:554_5: api tu dṛṣṭā yuṣmābhiḥ sā dārikā,
XXavsata_u:554_6: yayā aham antarmārgo sālapuṣpair avakīrṇaḥ? evaṃ bhadanta /
XXavsata_u:554_7: saiṣā mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagatā praṇīteṣū deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā /
XXavsata_u:554_9: tasyā mayā dharmo deśitaḥ, dṛṣṭasatyā ca svabhavanaṃ gatā /
XXavsata_u:554_11: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:554_12: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:554_14: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:557_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:557_1: rājagṛhe nagare rājā bimbisāro rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam ekaputram iva rājyaṃ pālayati /
XXavsata_u:557_2: yadā rājñā bimbisāreṇa bhagavataḥ sakāśāt satyāni dṛṣṭāni,
XXavsata_u:557_3: tadā rātriṃ bhagavantam upasaṃkrāmati sārdham antaḥpureṇa /
XXavsata_u:557_4: atha rājā bimbisāro 'pareṇa samayena saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukaśārikākokilajīvañjīvakanirghoṣite vanaṣaṇḍe devyā sahāntaḥpuraparivṛta udyānabhūmiṃ nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:557_6: deva vayaṃ na śaknumo 'hanyahani bhagavantam upasaṃkramitum* /
XXavsata_u:557_7: tat sādhu devo 'sminn antaḥpure tathāgatasya keśanakhastūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayed* yatra vayam asakṛtpuṣpair gandhair mālyair vilepanaiś chatrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ pūjāṃ kuryāmeti /
XXavsata_u:557_9: dīyatām asmabhyaṃ keśanakhaṃ yena vayaṃ tathāgatastūpam antaḥpuramadhye pratiṣṭhāpayāma iti /
XXavsata_u:557_11: rājñā bimbisāreṇa mahatā satkāreṇāntaḥpurasahāyena tathāgatasya keśanakhastūpo 'ntaḥpuramadhye pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:557_13: yadā punā rājñā ajātaśatruṇā devadattavigrāhitena pitā dhārmiko dharmarājo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:559_0: kriyākāraś ca kārito na kenacit tathāgatastūpe kārāḥ kartavyā iti /
XXavsata_u:559_2: tadā tatra keśanakhastūpe na kaścit saṃmārjanaṃ dīpadhūpapuṣpadānaṃ vā kurute /
XXavsata_u:559_3: tato 'ntaḥpurikā keśanakhastūpaṃ tathāvidhaṃ rājānaṃ ca bimbisāram anusmṛtya karuṇakaruṇaṃ roditum ārabdhāḥ:
XXavsata_u:559_4: hā kaṣṭaṃ dharmarājaviyogād vayaṃ puṇyāt prahīṇā iti /
XXavsata_u:559_6: sā svakaṃ jīvitam agaṇayitvā buddhaguṇāṃś cānusmṛtya keśanakhastūpaṃ saṃmṛjya dīpamālām akārṣīt* /
XXavsata_u:559_7: yāvad ajātaśatrur upariprasādatalagataḥ tam udāram avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā papraccha kim idam iti /
XXavsata_u:559_8: yāvad anyayā kathitam*: śrīmatyā keśanakhastūpe dīpamālā kṛteti /
XXavsata_u:559_11: sā kathayati: yady api mayā tava śāsanam atikrāntam*,
XXavsata_u:559_12: kiṃ tu dharmarājasya mayā bimbisārasya śāsanaṃ nātikrāntam iti /
XXavsata_u:559_13: tatas tena kupitena cakraṃ kṣiptvā jīvitād vyavaropitā /
XXavsata_u:559_14: sā bhagavati prasannacittā kālagatā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā /
XXavsata_u:559_16: atha śrīmatī devakanyā samantayojanaṃ divyaprabhāmaṇḍalāvabhāsitā devasamitim upasaṃkrāntā /
XXavsata_u:559_17: tataḥ śakro devendras tam udāram avabhāsaṃ divyāṃ ca prabhāṃ samantayojanaṃ dṛṣṭvā papraccha:
XXavsata_u:avs_54.1_1: gātraśrīr atulā kṛteyam iha te dehāt prabhā niḥsṛtā /
XXavsata_u:avs_54.1_3: brūhi tvaṃ mama devate phalam idaṃ yat karmajaṃ bhujyate //
XXavsata_u:avs_54.2_0: trailokyanāthaṃ jagataḥ pradīpaṃ nirīkṣya buddhaṃ varalakṣaṇāḍhyam* /
XXavsata_u:avs_54.2_1: cakāra dīpaṃ vadatāṃ varasya tamonudaṃ kleśatamonudasya //
XXavsata_u:avs_54.3_0: dṛṣṭvā prabhāṃ candramarīcivarṇāṃ cakāra bhāvena munau prasādam* /
XXavsata_u:avs_54.3_1: prabhāṃ ca harṣāt samudīkṣya śāstuś cakre praṇāmaṃ vadatāṃ varasya //
XXavsata_u:avs_54.5_1: yatra nyastaṃ tvayā bījam iṣṭaṃ svargopapattaye //
XXavsata_u:565_0: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:565_2: sā paśyati: manuṣyebhyaś cyutā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā,
XXavsata_u:565_5: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam* /
XXavsata_u:565_6: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsā eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:565_7: atha śrīmatī devakanyā divyaprabhāvabhāsapariveṣṭitā divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:565_8: atha bhagavāñ chrīmatyā devakanyāyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:565_9: yāṃ śrutvā srīmatyā devakanyāyā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:565_11: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:565_13: laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, pihitāny apāyadvārāṇi, vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ smo devamanuṣyeṣu /
XXavsata_u:568_0: atha śrīmatī devakanyā vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ,
XXavsata_u:568_2: sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatā tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gatā /
XXavsata_u:570_3: kiṃ bhagavann imāṃ rātriṃ brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān āha:
XXavsata_u:570_4: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:570_5: api tu rājño bimbisārasya śrīmatī nāmāntaḥpurikā svajīvitam agaṇayitvā buddhaguṇāṃś cānusmṛtya tathāgatasya keśanakhastūpe dīpamālāṃ kṛtavatī /
XXavsata_u:570_6: tato rājñā ajātaśatruṇā kupitena jīvitād vyavaropitā /
XXavsata_u:570_7: sā mamāntike cittaṃ prasādya kālagatā praṇīteṣū deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā /
XXavsata_u:570_9: tasyā mayā dharmo deśitaḥ, dṛṣṭasatyā ca svabhavanaṃ gatā /
XXavsata_u:570_11: yac chāstāraṃ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:570_12: śāstāraṃ satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya vihariṣyāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:570_14: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:573_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:573_1: yadā anāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā buddhapramukhāya bhikṣusaṃghāya jetavanaṃ niryātitam*,
XXavsata_u:573_3: tadā tasya buddhir abhavat*: kim atrāścaryaṃ yad ahaṃ dānāni dadāmi,
XXavsata_u:573_4: puṇyāni vā karomi, yanv ahaṃ daridrajanānugrahārthṃ śrāvastīnivāsino janakāyāc chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃgham upatiṣṭheyam* /
XXavsata_u:573_7: tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā eṣa vṛttānto rājñe niveditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:573_10: adya saptame divase anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir hastiskandhābhirūḍhas tathāgatasya saśrāvakasaṃghasyārthāya cchandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kartukāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:573_11: yasya vo yan mātraṃ parityaktaṃ tad anupradātavyam iti /
XXavsata_u:573_12: yāvat saptame divase anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir hastiskandhādhirūḍhas tathāgatasya saśrāvakasaṃghasyārthāya chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kartuṃ pravṛttam* /
XXavsata_u:573_13: tatra yeṣāṃ yan mātro vibhavas te tan mātraṃ dātuṃ pravṛttāḥ /
XXavsata_u:574_1: kecid aṅgulimudrām*, kecin muktāhāram*, kecid dhiraṇyam*, kecit suvarṇam*, kecid antaśaḥ kārṣāpaṇam* / gṛhapatir api parānugrahārthaṃ pratigṛhṇāti /
XXavsata_u:574_3: tayā tribhir māsaiḥ kṛcchreṇa paṭaka upārjitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:574_4: sā taṃ paṭakaṃ prāvṛtya vīthīm avatīrṇā /
XXavsata_u:574_7: tayānyatama upāsakaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ: yadi tāvad ayaṃ gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhoho 'ntarbhūmau nigūḍhāny api nidhānāni paśyati,
XXavsata_u:574_9: sā upāsakenoktā: parānugrahārtham* / ye 'samamarthā bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojayitum*,
XXavsata_u:574_11: kathaṃ bahavaḥ sametā bhagavantaṃ pratipādayeyur iti /
XXavsata_u:574_13: ahaṃ tāvad akṛtapuṇyā, na me śaktir asti, yad aham ekākinī bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhojanena pratipādayeyam* /
XXavsata_u:574_14: yanv aham atra kiṃcid anupradadyām iti /
XXavsata_u:574_15: sā svakaṃ vibhavam avalokayantī na kiṃcit paśyati ṛte paṭakāt* /
XXavsata_u:574_16: sā cintayituṃ pravṛttā: yady aham ihasthaiva paṭakaṃ pradāsyāmi,
XXavsata_u:574_17: nagnā bhaviṣyāmi / yanv ahaṃ śaraṇapṛṣṭham abhiruhya paṭakaṃ kṣipeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:574_18: tataḥ sā śaraṇapṛṣṭham abhiruhya svaśarīrāt paṭakam avanīya anāthapiṇḍadasyopari kṣiptavatī /
XXavsata_u:574_19: sā gṛhapatinā saṃlakṣitā: nūnam asyā eṣa eva vibhavo yad anayā śaraṇasaṃsthayā kṣiptam iti /
XXavsata_u:574_21: gacchantu bhavantaḥ, avalokayantu kenāyaṃ paṭakaḥ kṣipta iti /
XXavsata_u:574_23: tatas taiḥ pṛṣṭā / tayā coktam*: yo me vibhava āsīt sa me bhagavadguṇānukīrtanaṃ pratiśrutya dāridryabhayabhītayā (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:574_26: tato 'nāthapiṇḍadena gṛhapatinā paramavismayajātenā sā dārikā vicitrair vastrair ābharaṇaiś cācchāditā /
XXavsata_u:574_27: sā cālpāyuṣkā kālagatā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā /
XXavsata_u:574_29: na kasyacid anyasya devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā /
XXavsata_u:574_30: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:574_32: sā paśyati: manuṣyebhyaś cyutā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannā,
XXavsata_u:574_34: tato vastradāyikā devakanyā calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrī maṇiratnavicitracūḍā kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrī tām eva rātriṃ divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇām puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:574_35: atha bhagavān paṭakapradāyikāyā devakanyāyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:574_36: yāṃ śrutvā paṭakapradāyikāyā devakanyāyā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:574_38: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ
XXavsata_u:576_1: laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, pihitāny apāyadvārāṇi, vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ smo devamanuṣyeṣu /
XXavsata_u:579_0: atha paṭapradāyikā devakanyā vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ,
XXavsata_u:579_1: sasyasaṃpanna iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ,
XXavsata_u:579_2: sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatā tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gatā /
XXavsata_u:579_6: kiṃ bhagavann asyāṃ rātrau bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān āha:
XXavsata_u:579_7: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:579_8: yā daridradārikā anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateś chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kurvāṇasya paṭaṃ datvā kālagatā,
XXavsata_u:579_11: tasyā mayā dharmo deśitaḥ / sā prasādajātā prakrāntā, dṛṣṭasatyā ca svabhavanaṃ gatā /
XXavsata_u:579_15: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:582_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:582_1: rājagṛhe nagare rājā bimbisāro rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* /
XXavsata_u:582_3: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya
XXavsata_u:584_1: yāvad asau bhagavaddarśanotkaṇṭhitaḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:584_2: tato 'mātyar uktaḥ: kimarthaṃ deva śokaḥ kriyata iti /
XXavsata_u:584_3: rājovāca: ciradṛṣṭo me sugataḥ / so 'ham ākāṅkṣāmi bhagavato darśanam iti /
XXavsata_u:584_4: aśrauṣīd bhagavān divāvihāropagato divyena śrotreṇa viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣeṇa rājā bimbisāra utkaṇṭhita iti /
XXavsata_u:584_5: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:584_6: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛtt{ak}ānām ekārakṣāṇāṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ caturṣu saṃgrahavastuṣu dīrgharātrakṛtaparicayānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:584_7: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyanimnaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ,
XXavsata_u:584_8: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:avs_56.1_1: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet //
XXavsata_u:585_0: tato bhagavān rājño bimbisārasyānugrahārthaṃ trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvaro niṣṭḥitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaram janapadacārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:585_1: anupūrveṇa cārikāṃ carann anyatamaṃ vanaṣaṇḍam anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:585_2: tatra ca vanaṣaṇḍe manuṣyapralāpī śukaḥ prativasati /
XXavsata_u:585_5: etu bhagavān, svāgataṃ bhagavate, kriyatām asmākam anugrahaḥ, ihaiva vanaṣaṇḍe ekāṃ rātriṃ prativaseti /
XXavsata_u:585_6: tato bhagavāñ chukasyānugrahārthaṃ yatra vkṣe śukasyālayas tatra tṛṇasaṃstaraṃ saṃstīrya paryaṅkeṇa niṣaṇṇaḥ,
XXavsata_u:585_7: anyavṛkṣeṣu mahāśrāvakāḥ, tataḥ śukaḥ kṛtsnāṃ rātrim itas tatas taṃ vanaṣaṇḍaṃ paryaṭati,
XXavsata_u:585_8: mā haiva kaścid bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ viheṭhayiṣyatīti manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā yakṣo vā rākṣaso vā śvāpadaś caṇḍaśṛṅgo veti /
XXavsata_u:585_9: tataḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ bhagavantaṃ triḥpradakṣīṇīkṛtya kṣamayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:585_11: nāsti me vibhavo yena bhagavantam abhyarcayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:585_14: evam astv iti / yāvad asau rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:585_16: tasmiṃś ca samaye rājā upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:587_0: tava vijitam anuprāptaḥ / tad arhati devo bhaktaṃ sajjīkartum iti /
XXavsata_u:587_1: tato rājā tvaritatvaritaṃ prāsādād avatīryāmātyagaṇaparivṛto bhagavato 'rthena āsanakāni prajñapya chatradhvajapatākābhir vicitraiś ca gandhapuṣpadhūpair bhagavantaṃ pratyudgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:587_2: tato rājñā bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho mahatā satkāreṇa praveśitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:587_4: atha śukasyaitad abhavat*: yad bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgha evaṃvibhūtis tat sarvaṃ māmāgamya /
XXavsata_u:587_5: iti viditvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudita udagraprītisaumanasyajāto rājñaḥ purastād itaś cāmutaś ca paryaṭan* śyenakenāpahṛtya pañcatvam āpāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:587_8: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:587_10: sa paśyati: tiryagbhyaś cyutaḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:587_13: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam* /
XXavsata_u:587_14: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:587_15: atha śukapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitracūḍaḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇām puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:587_16: atha bhagavāṃś chukapūrviṇo devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:587_17: yāṃ śrutvā śukapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:587_19: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:587_21: laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, pihitāny apāyadvārāṇi, vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ smo devamanuṣyeṣu /
XXavsata_u:591_0: atha śukapūrvī devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ,
XXavsata_u:591_1: sasyasaṃpanna iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ,
XXavsata_u:591_2: sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatas tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:591_6: kiṃ bhagavann asyāṃ rātrau bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān āha:
XXavsata_u:591_7: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:591_8: api tu dṛṣṭaḥ sa yuṣmābhiḥ śuko yena vayaṃ tasmin vanaṣaṇḍe rātriṃ vastum upanimintritā iti? bhikṣava ūcuḥ:
XXavsata_u:591_9: evaṃ bhadanteti / bhagavān āha: sa eṣa bhikṣavaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā,
XXavsata_u:591_11: bhikṣava ūcuḥ: kāni bhadanta śukapūrvakeṇa devaputreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni yena śukeṣūpapannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:591_13: satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti / bhagavān āha: śukapūrvakeṇaiva bhikṣavo devaputreṇa pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:591_15: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:591_16: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_56.6_0: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /
XXavsata_u:avs_56.6_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:592_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:592_1: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati sma /
XXavsata_u:592_5: tena deveṣūpapannaḥ / yat tena pariṣiṣṭāni śikṣāpadāni rakṣitāni,
XXavsata_u:592_6: tena satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* / iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:592_7: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:592_10: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:596_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛhe varṣā upagato veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:596_1: atha anāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatir yena rājā prasenajit kauśalas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:596_2: upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ prasenajitaṃ jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvā vijñāpayati:
XXavsata_u:596_3: yat khalu deva jānīyāś ciradṛṣṭo 'smābhir bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:596_7: kaccit te gṛhapate śrutaṃ kutra bhagavān etarhi varṣā upagata iti? anāthapiṇḍada uvāca:
XXavsata_u:596_8: śrutaṃ me deva bhagavān rājagṛhe varṣā upagata iti /
XXavsata_u:596_9: tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena anāthapiṇḍadādyaiś ca paurajānapadāmātyair anyatamaḥ puruṣo dūtyenāhūyoktaḥ:
XXavsata_u:596_10: ehi tvaṃ bho puruṣa, yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāma /
XXavsata_u:596_11: upasaṃkramyāsmākaṃ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasva,
XXavsata_u:596_12: alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛccha alpātaṅkaṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:596_13: evaṃ ca vada: rājā bhadanta kauśalaḥ śrāvastīnivāsinaś ca paurā ākāṅkṣanti bhagavato darśanam* /
XXavsata_u:596_17: sādhu bhagavāñ chrāvastīm āgacched anukampām upādāyeti /
XXavsata_u:596_18: evaṃ deveti sa puruṣo rājñaḥ prasenajitaḥ kauśalasya sāmātyapaurajānapadasya pratiśrutya śrāvastīto 'nupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇo rājagṛhaṃ nagaram anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:596_19: tataḥ pūrvaṃ rājagṛhaṃ nagaram avalokya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:596_20: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:596_21: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ sa puruṣo bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:596_22: rājā bhadanta prasenajit kauśalaḥ śrāvastīnivāsinaś ca paurā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā alpābādhatāṃ pṛcchanti,
XXavsata_u:596_23: alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:596_27: sādhu bhagavāñ chrāvastīm āgacched anukampām upādāyeti /
XXavsata_u:596_28: bhagavān āha: sacen me bhoḥ puruṣa rājā bimbisāro 'nujñāsyati;
XXavsata_u:596_29: gamiṣyāmīti / tataḥ sa dūto rājānaṃ bimbisāram anujñāpya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:596_33: atha bhagavāṃs trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvaro niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ mahatā parivāreṇa śrāvastyabhimukho 'bhijagāma /
XXavsata_u:596_35: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ padbhyāṃ saṃprasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:596_36: tato rathād avatīrya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:599_0: dūtaḥ prāha: yady api bhagavān ṛddhipādayānayāyī;
XXavsata_u:599_2: atha bhagavān dūtasyānugrahārtham ṛddhyā rathasyopari sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:599_4: dūtena ca rājñe niveditam* / atha rājā sāmātyaḥ sapaurajānapado bhagavantaṃ pratyudgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:599_5: tatraiva ca jetavane rātriṃvāsam upagato dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:599_6: sa ca dūto 'lpāyuṣko dharmaṃ śrutvā tasyām eva rātrau kālagataḥ /
XXavsata_u:599_7: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:599_8: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:599_10: sa paśyati: manuṣyebhyaś cyutaḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:599_13: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam* /
XXavsata_u:599_14: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:599_15: atha dūtapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitracūḍaḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇām puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:599_16: atha bhagavān dūtapūrviṇo devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:599_17: yāṃ śrutvā dūtapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:599_19: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:599_21: laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, pihitāny apāyadvārāṇi, vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ smo devamanuṣyeṣu /
XXavsata_u:603_0: atha dūtapūrvī devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ,
XXavsata_u:603_1: sasyasaṃpanna iva karṣakaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ,
XXavsata_u:603_2: sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā hi vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatas tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:603_3: tato rājā prasenajid upariprāsādatalagatas tam udāram avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ bhagavantaṃ papracha:
XXavsata_u:603_4: kiṃ bhagavann imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān āha:
XXavsata_u:603_5: na mahārāja brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
XXavsata_u:603_6: api tu tāvako dūtaḥ sa mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ praṇīteṣū deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:603_8: tasya mayā dharmo deśitaḥ / sa dṛṣṭasatyaḥ svabhavanaṃ gata iti /
XXavsata_u:603_10: aho buddho aho dharmaḥ aho saṃgho yatra nāma parīttaṃ karma kṛtvā mahān vipāka iti /
XXavsata_u:603_11: atha rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:603_14: katamās tisraḥ? buddhe agraprajñaptir dharme saṃghe 'graprajñaptiḥ /
XXavsata_u:603_15: buddhe 'graprajñaptiḥ katamā? ye kecid satvā apadā vā dvipadā vā bahupadā vā rūpiṇo vā arūpiṇo va saṃjñino vā asaṃjñino vā naivasaṃjñino nāsaṃjñinaḥ,
XXavsata_u:603_18: agre te 'bhiprasannāḥ / teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyo deveṣu vā devabhūtānāṃ manuṣyeṣu vā manuṣyabhūtānām* /
XXavsata_u:603_20: dharme 'graprajñaptiḥ katamā? ye kecid dharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vā asaṃskṛtā vā,
XXavsata_u:603_23: agre te 'bhiprasannāḥ / teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyo deveṣu vā devabhūtānāṃ manuṣyeṣu vā manuṣyabhūtānām* /
XXavsata_u:603_25: saṃghe 'graprajñaptiḥ katamā? ye kecit saṃghā vā gaṇā vā pūgā vā pariṣado vā,
XXavsata_u:603_28: agre te 'bhiprasannāḥ / teṣām agre 'bhiprasannānām agra eva vipākaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyo deveṣu vā devabhūtānāṃ manuṣyeṣu vā manuṣyabhūtānām* /
XXavsata_u:603_30: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:606_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:608_0: saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kośaleṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ carann anyatamavanaṣaṇḍam anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:608_1: tatra ca vanaṣaṇḍe mahān mahiṣīyūthaḥ prativasati,
XXavsata_u:608_3: yāvat tatrānyatamo mahiṣo balavān parameṇa balena samanvāgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:608_6: tato mahiṣīpālair bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho dūrata eva dṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:608_8: bhagavan, imaṃ mārgaṃ varjaya, duṣṭamahiṣo 'tra prativasatīti /
XXavsata_u:608_11: athāsau duṣṭamahiṣo bhagavantaṃ dūrata eva dṛṣṭvā lāṅgūlam unnāmya yena bhagavāṃs tena pradhāvitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:608_12: tato bhagavatā purastāt pañca kesariṇaḥ saṭādhāriṇaḥ (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:608_14: vāme dakṣiṇe ca pārśve dvāv agniskandhau,
XXavsata_u:608_16: tataḥ sa mahiṣaḥ samantato mahābhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavataḥ pādau niśritya dīnavadanaś ca bhagavantaṃ prekṣyate (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:608_17: prekṣate) / tato 'sya bhagavatā tanmayyā gatyās tanmayyā yonyās tribhiḥ pādair dharmo deśitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:608_19: sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ, śāntaṃ nirvāṇam iti / jātiś ca smāritā / sa śrutvā rodituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:608_20: atha bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthe bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:avs_58.2_0: sādhu prasādyatāṃ cittaṃ mayi kāruṇike jine /
XXavsata_u:609_2: sa āśu kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:609_3: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:609_5: sa paśyati: tiryagbhyaś cyutaḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:609_8: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam* /
XXavsata_u:609_9: yanv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:609_10: atha mahiṣapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravirājitagātro maṇiratnavicitracūḍaḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātras tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ taṃ vanaṣaṇḍam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:609_11: atha bhagavān mahiṣapūrviṇo devaputrasyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:609_12: yāṃ śrutvā mahiṣapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:609_14: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na
XXavsata_u:611_0: devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:611_2: laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, pihitāny apāyadvārāṇi, vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ smo devamanuṣyeṣu /
XXavsata_u:614_0: atha tair mahiṣīpālaiḥ sa udāro 'vabhāso dṛṣṭaḥ,
XXavsata_u:614_2: ka eṣa bhagavan*, rātrau divyam avabhāsaṃ kṛtvā bhagavatsakāśam anuprāpta iti /
XXavsata_u:614_3: bhagavān āha: sa eṣa bhavanto mahiṣo mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:614_5: tasya mayā dharmo deśitaḥ / sa dṛṣṭasatyaḥ svabhavanaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:614_6: tatas te mahiṣīpālāḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ:
XXavsata_u:614_7: āścaryaṃ yan nāma ayaṃ tiryagyonigato bhūtvā bhagavantaṃ kalyāṇamitram āsādya deveṣūpapannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:614_8: satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam* / kathaṃ nāma vayaṃ manuṣyabhūtā viśeṣaṃ nādhigacchemeti? tatas te buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaṃ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpya bhagavato 'ntike pravrajitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:614_9: tair yujyamānair ghaṭamānair vyāyacchamānaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:614_10: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:614_11: kāni bhadanta mahiṣapūrvikeṇa devaputreṇa karmāṇi kṛtāni yena mahiṣeṣūpapannaḥ? ebhiś ca mahiṣīpālaiḥ kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yenāhartvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*? bhagavān āha:
XXavsata_u:614_12: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:614_14: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:614_15: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_58.7_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:615_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:616_1: ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve / tatra ca kāle bhikṣūṇāṃ viniścaye vartamāne tripiṭo bhikṣuḥ pañcaśataparivāro viniścaye 'avasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:616_4: sa na śaknoti vyākartum* / tena kupitena kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam*:
XXavsata_u:616_6: śiṣyair apy asyoktam: ime mahiṣīpālāḥ kiṃ prajānantīti /
XXavsata_u:616_7: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau mahiṣaḥ,
XXavsata_u:616_8: ayam asau tripiṭaḥ / ye te śiṣyāḥ, ime te mahiṣīpālāḥ / tena karmaṇā pañca janmaśatāni mahiṣeṣūpapannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:616_10: yan mamāntike cittaṃ prasāditaṃ tena deveṣūpapannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:616_11: satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam* / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava vāgduścaritaprahāṇāya vyāyantavyaṃ yathā ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti ye mahiṣasya mahiṣīpālāṇāṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:616_12: eṣa eva guṇagaṇo bhaviṣyati yas tasyaiva devaputrabhūtasya /
XXavsata_u:616_14: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:619_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:619_1: tena khalu punaḥ samayena devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānām upoṣadho nāma devaputro 'sakṛdasakṛd bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāmati dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:619_2: yāvad apareṇa samayena upoṣadho nāma devaputraḥ pañcaśataparivāro yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:619_3: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:619_4: atha bhagavān upoṣadhasya devaputrasya āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:619_5: yāṃ śrutvā upoṣadhena devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:619_7: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā na rājñā na devatābhir neṣṭena svajanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇair yad bhagavatāsmākaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:619_9: laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, pihitāny apāyadvārāṇi, vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ smo devamanuṣyeṣu /
XXavsata_u:623_0: tato bhikṣavaḥ pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktā viharanti /
XXavsata_u:623_3: kiṃ bhagavann imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān āha:
XXavsata_u:623_4: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:623_5: api tu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu upoṣadho nāma devaputraḥ pañcaśataparivāro māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:623_6: tasya mayā dharmo deśitaḥ / dṛṣṭasatyaś ca svabhavanaṃ gata iti /
XXavsata_u:623_7: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:623_8: kuto bhadanta upoṣadhasya devaputrasyotpattir nāmābhinirvṛttiś ceti /
XXavsata_u:623_9: bhagavān āha: icchatha yūyaṃ hikṣavaḥ śrotum? evaṃ bhadanta /
XXavsata_u:623_10: tena hi bhikṣavaḥ śṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:623_11: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrakalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:623_12: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:623_13: yāvad apareṇa samayena kṛkī rājā bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmati paryupāsanāya /
XXavsata_u:623_14: yāvad dvau brāhmaṇāu ṛṣipatanaṃ gatau kenacit karaṇīyena /
XXavsata_u:623_15: tābhyāṃ rājā drṣṭo mahatyā rājaṛddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena /
XXavsata_u:623_16: tayo rājyābhilāṣo jātaḥ / tābhyām anyatama upāsakaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ:
XXavsata_u:623_17: bho buddhopāsaka, kiṃ karma kṛtvā yac cintayati yat prārthayate tad asya sarvaṃ samṛdhyatīti /
XXavsata_u:623_18: upāsakenoktam*: ya pariśuddham aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upavasati,
XXavsata_u:623_19: yac cintayati yat prārthayate tad asya sarvaṃ samṛdhyatīti /
XXavsata_u:623_20: tatas tau brāhmaṇau āṣāḍhasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśād aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upalabhyopoṣitau /
XXavsata_u:623_22: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā rājñaḥ kṛkeḥ putratvam abhyupagataḥ /
XXavsata_u:623_25: dvitīyenopavāsaḥ khaṇḍitaḥ / sa kālaṃ kṛtvā nāgeṣūpapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:623_26: tasyopari divase divase saptakṛtvaḥ taptavālukā nipatati yayā so 'sthiśeṣaḥ kriyate /
XXavsata_u:623_27: tasyaitad abhavat*: kasyedaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ kasyāyaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalavipāko yenāham īdṛśaṃ duḥkham anubhavāmīti /
XXavsata_u:623_28: sa paśyati: aṣṭāṅgasamanvāgataṃ me upavāsaṃ samādāya śikṣāśaithilyaṃ kṛtaṃ yenāham īdṛśaṃ mahadduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhavāmi /
XXavsata_u:623_29: yena punaḥ samādāya rakṣitaṃ tena rājyaṃ pratilabdham iti /
XXavsata_u:625_1: apy eva nāma nāgayoner mokṣaḥ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:625_2: tato nāgavarṇam antardhāpya brāhmaṇavarṇam ātmānam abhinirmāya rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:625_6: atha na paryeṣase, niyataṃ devasya saptadhā mūrdhānaṃ sphālayāmi /
XXavsata_u:625_8: tato rājā bhītas trastaḥ saṃvigna āhṛṣṭaromakūpo hiraṇyapiṭakaṃ dhvajāgre baddhvā sarvavijite ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:625_14: atra me stambhe pitā asakṛdgandhadhūpapuṣpārcanaṃ kṛtavān* /
XXavsata_u:625_20: saha pañca copāsakaśikṣāpadāni saptatriṃśac ca bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ /
XXavsata_u:625_21: tato rājñā tasya nāgasyāṣṭāṅgasamanvāgata upavāso likhitvā dattaḥ /
XXavsata_u:625_22: ṛṣipatananivāsibhiś ca dvādaśabhir ṛṣisahasraiḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ pratyakṣīkṛtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:625_23: sa ca nāgo 'ṣṭāṅgasamanvāgatam upavāsam upoṣya sthalam udgamyotsṛṣṭakāyo 'vasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:625_24: so 'nāhāratāṃ pratipaṇṇaḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā pañcaśataparivāraḥ praṇīteṣū deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:625_26: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:628_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:628_1: śrāvastyāṃ rājā prasenajit kauśalo rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* /
XXavsata_u:628_3: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā prasenajit kauśalo jetavanaṃ nirgato bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya /
XXavsata_u:628_4: rājñā ca pañcālena rājñaḥ prasenajit kauśalasya prābhṛtaṃ pañca haṃsaśatāni preṣitāni /
XXavsata_u:628_5: yadā rājā jetavanaṃ nirgatas tadā tāni pañca haṃsaśatāny upanāmitāni /
XXavsata_u:628_6: tato rājñā prasenajitā teṣām abhayapradānaṃ datvā tatraiva jetavanae samutsṛṣṭāṇi /
XXavsata_u:628_8: 'śana) upaniṣīdati, tadā te haṃsā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāmanti /
XXavsata_u:628_9: bhagavān api tebhya ālopam anuprayacchanti mahāśrāvakāś ca /
XXavsata_u:630_1: yadā bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
XXavsata_u:630_2: tadā te haṃsā bhagavatsakāśaṃ gatvā dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti /
XXavsata_u:630_3: te cālpāyuṣkāḥ kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:630_4: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
XXavsata_u:630_6: paśyanti haṃsebhyaś cyutāḥ praṇīteṣu deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣūpapannāḥ,
XXavsata_u:630_8: atha haṃsapūrviṇo devaputrāś calavimalakuṇḍaladharā hārārdhahāravirājitagātrā maṇiratnavicitracūḍāḥ kuṅkumatamālapatraspṛkkādisaṃsṛṣṭagātrās tasyām eva rātrau divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamandāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṅgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ jetavanam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavantaṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:630_9: atha bhagavān haṃsapūrviṇāṃ devaputrāṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśīṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān,
XXavsata_u:630_10: yāṃ śrutvā haṃsapūrvibhir devaputrair viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:630_12: sasyasaṃpannā iva karṣakāḥ śūrā iva vijitasaṃgrāmāḥ,
XXavsata_u:630_13: sarvarogaparimuktā ivāturāḥ yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam āgatās tayaiva vibhūtyā svabhavanaṃ gatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:630_17: kiṃ bhagavann imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraś catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ? bhagavān āha:
XXavsata_u:630_18: na bhikṣavo brahmā sahāṃpatir na śakro devendro nāpi catvāro lokapālā māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:630_19: api tu dṛṣṭās te yuṣmābhir bhikṣavas tāni pañca haṃsaśatāni rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena ihotsṛṣṭāni? evaṃ bhadanta /
XXavsata_u:630_21: praṇīteṣu deveṣūpapannāni / tāny asyāṃ rātrau matsakāśam upasaṃkrāntāni /
XXavsata_u:630_22: teṣāṃ mayā dharmo deśitaḥ / dṛṣṭasatyāni ca svabhavanaṃ gatāni /
XXavsata_u:630_23: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:630_24: kāni bhadanta haṃsapūrvakair devaputraiḥ karmāṇi kṛtāni yena haṃseṣūpapannāḥ,
XXavsata_u:630_25: kāni karmāṇi kṛtāni yena deveṣūpapannāḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti? bhagavān āha:
XXavsata_u:630_26: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:630_28: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:630_29: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_60.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:632_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:632_1: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:632_3: tena haṃseṣūpapannāḥ / yan mamāntike cittaṃ prasāditaṃ tena deveṣūpapannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:632_4: yat pariśiṣṭāni śikṣāpadāni tena satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam iti /
XXavsata_u:632_5: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:632_6: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:632_9: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:636_0: suvarṇābhaḥ sugandhiś ca vapuṣmān balavān priyaḥ /
XXavsata_u:639_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme /
XXavsata_u:639_1: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:639_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:639_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:639_5: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:639_6: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇaṃ jāmbūnadaniṣkasadṛśaḥ /
XXavsata_u:639_7: suvarṇavarṇayā cānena prabhayā sarvaṃ kapilavastu nagaram avabhāsitam* /
XXavsata_u:639_8: taddarśanān mātāpitarāv anye ca kutūhalābhyāgatāḥ satvāḥ paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:639_9: cintayanti ca: kuto 'yam īdṛśaḥ satvaviśeṣa iti /
XXavsata_u:639_10: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:639_12: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād anena jātena suvarṇavarṇayā prabhayā sarvaṃ kapilavastu nagaram avabhāsitam*,
XXavsata_u:639_13: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya suvarṇābha iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:639_14: suvarṇābho dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradatto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:639_15: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:639_17: sa ca paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:639_18: yāvad apareṇa samayena rūpamadamatto bahir adhiṣṭhānasya krīḍati /
XXavsata_u:639_20: tatas tena suvarṇābhena dṛṣṭāḥ pṛṣṭāś ca:
XXavsata_u:639_21: kva bhavanto gacchantīti / tair uktam*: nyagrodhārāmaṃ gacchāmo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ draṣṭum iti /
XXavsata_u:639_22: suvarṇābhasya buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ nāma śrutvā sarvaromakūpāṇy āhṛṣṭani,
XXavsata_u:639_24: tasyaitad abhavat*: yanv aham api buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:639_26: tatas tatra dadarśa suvarṇābhakumāro buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:640_2: sa bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:640_4: sa taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajyābhilāṣī saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:640_6: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:640_7: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:640_9: tato bhagavān gajabhujasadṛśaṃ suvarṇavarṇabāhum abhiprasārya suvarṇābhadārakam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:avs_61.1_0: ehīti coktaḥ sa tathāgatena muṇḍaś ca saṃghāṭiparītadehaḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_61.1_1: sadyaḥ praśāntendriya eva tasthāv evaṃ sthito buddhamanorathena //
XXavsata_u:641_0: yāvat saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmaśrur dvādaśavarṣopasaṃpanneryāpathaḥ pātrakaravyagrahasto bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:641_2: tena yujyamānena vyāyacchamānena ghaṭamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikaraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:641_3: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:641_4: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:641_5: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:641_6: kāni bhadanta suvarṇābhena karmāṇi kṛtāni yenaivaṃrūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ pravrajya ca acirād (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:641_8: bhagavān āha: suvarṇābhenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:641_10: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:641_11: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_61.2_0: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /
XXavsata_u:avs_61.2_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:642_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:642_2: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddho buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:642_3: tato rājñā bandhumatā bhagavataḥ śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaḥ stūpaś catūratnamayaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena
XXavsata_u:644_0: / stūpamahaś ca prajñaptaḥ / yāvad anyatamo gṛhapatis tasmin stūpamahe vartamāne nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:644_1: tena tasmāt stūpāt sauvarṇavarṇa ādarśaḥ patito dṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:644_2: sa tenāvataṃsakaṃ kārayitvā tatra stūpe āropitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:644_3: gandhadhūpapuṣpārcanaṃ kṛtvā pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:644_4: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyāmi,
XXavsata_u:644_6: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena gṛhapatir āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:644_7: ayaṃ sa suvarṇābhaḥ / yat tena vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya stūpe kārāḥ kṛtāḥ,
XXavsata_u:644_9: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tad ihaiva janmany arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:644_10: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:644_11: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:644_14: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:647_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme /
XXavsata_u:647_1: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ kulaputraḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:647_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:647_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko atikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
XXavsata_u:647_5: tasya mukhān nīlotpalagandho vāti sarvaśarīrāc candanagandhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:647_6: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:647_8: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya mukān nīlotpalagandho vāti,
XXavsata_u:647_9: śarīrāc candanagandhaḥ, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya sugandhir iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:647_10: sugandhir dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:647_11: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:647_13: sa pūrvahetubalādhānāc chrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:647_14: yadā sugandhir dārakaḥ keyūrahārakaṭakālaṃkṛto vīthīm avatarati,
XXavsata_u:647_16: janakāyaś ca divyaṃ gandham āghrāya paraṃ vismayam āpadyte /
XXavsata_u:647_17: evaṃ cāha: aho puṇyānāṃ sāmarthyam iti /
XXavsata_u:649_0: yāvad apareṇa samayena sugandhir dārako nyagrodhārāmaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:649_1: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:649_3: prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:649_4: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:649_5: yāṃ śrutvā sugandhidārakeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:649_6: sa dṛṣṭasatyo mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:649_7: tena yujyamānena vyāyacchamānena ghaṭamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikaraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:649_8: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:649_9: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:649_10: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:649_11: kāni bhadanta sugandhinā karmāṇi kṛtāni yenāsya mukhān nīlotpalagandho vāti,
XXavsata_u:649_13: bhagavān āha: sugandhinaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:649_15: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:649_16: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_62.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:650_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:650_2: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:650_3: tato rājñā bandhumatā bhagavataḥ śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaḥ stūpaś catūratnamayaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena /
XXavsata_u:650_4: stūpamahaś ca prajñaptaḥ / tatrānyatamena gṛhapatinā prasādajātena vicitrair gandhaiḥ pralepaṃ datvā dhūpapuṣpārcanaṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:650_5: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyāmi /
XXavsata_u:650_7: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena gṛhapatir āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:650_8: ayaṃ sa sugandhiḥ / yad anena vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya stūpe kārāḥ kṛtās tena tena sugandhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:652_0: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ teneha janmany arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:652_1: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,

XXavsata_u:665_1: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /

XXavsata_u:665_3: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:665_4: kāni bhadanta balavatā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni yenāsyāśrayo balavān*,
XXavsata_u:665_5: arhatvaṃ ca prāptam iti / bhagavān āha: balavataiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:665_7: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:665_8: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_64.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:666_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:666_2: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:666_3: tasya rājñā bandhumatā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaḥ stūpaś catūratnamayaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena /
XXavsata_u:666_4: tatra stūpamahe vartamāne mahājanakāyena nṛtyatā gāyatā ca stūpaṃ pāṃsunā malinīkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:666_7: tatas tena gṛhapatinā buddhaguṇān anusmṛtya prasādajātena tailavyāmiśro gandhakāyo dattaḥ,
XXavsata_u:666_8: praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtam*: apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām* /
XXavsata_u:666_9: evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:666_10: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena gṛhapatiḥ,
XXavsata_u:666_11: ayaṃ sa balavān* / yad anena vipaśyinaḥ stūpe kārāḥ kṛtās tena balavān saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:666_12: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:666_13: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:666_14: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:666_17: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:670_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme /
XXavsata_u:670_1: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:670_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:670_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko maheśākhyo priyadarśanaś ca /
XXavsata_u:670_5: tasya janmani sarvaṃ kapilavastu nagaraṃ yaśasā āpūritam* /
XXavsata_u:670_6: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:670_8: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād ayaṃ jātamātra eva sarvajanapriyaḥ,
XXavsata_u:670_9: tasmād asya priya iti nāma bhavatu /
XXavsata_u:670_10: priyo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:670_11: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:670_13: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalas tyāgaruciḥ pradānaruciḥ pradāne 'bhirato mahati tyāge vartate /
XXavsata_u:670_14: sa śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakānāṃ vividhair dānavisargaiḥ saṃgrahaṃ karoti /
XXavsata_u:670_15: yāvat priyo dārako 'pareṇa samayena nyagrodhārāmaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:670_16: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:670_18: sa prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:670_19: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:670_20: yāṃ śrutvā priyeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:670_21: sa dṛṣṭasatyo mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:670_22: tena yujyamānena vyāyacchamānena ghaṭamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:670_23: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:670_24: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:670_25: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:670_26: kāni bhadanta priyeṇa karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni yena mahāyaśasāṃ priyo manāpaś ca /
XXavsata_u:670_28: bhagavān āha: priyeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni
XXavsata_u:672_2: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:672_3: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_65.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:673_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:673_2: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:673_3: tasya rājñā bandhumatā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena /
XXavsata_u:673_4: yāvad apareṇa samyena vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādeṣu nānāvicitriteṣu puṣpeṣu prādurbhūteṣv anyatamo gṛhapatī rājānaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:673_5: icchāmy ahaṃ devasahāyo vipaśyinaḥ stūpe puṣpāropaṇaṃ kartum iti /
XXavsata_u:673_6: rājā kathayati: evam astv iti / yāvat tena gṛhapatinā rājāmātyapauruṣaiḥ sahāyena ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇena vicitrapuṣpasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā vipaśyinaḥ stūpe puṣpārohaṇaṃ kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:673_7: yatrānekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiś cittāni prasādya kuśalamūlāni samāropitāni /
XXavsata_u:673_8: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena gṛhapatir āsīt* ayaṃ sa priyaḥ /
XXavsata_u:673_10: tena mahājanasya priyo manāpaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ,
XXavsata_u:673_12: arhatvaṃ ca prāptam* / iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:673_13: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:673_16: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:676_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme /
XXavsata_u:676_1: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
XXavsata_u:678_0: vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī / tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānītam* /
XXavsata_u:678_1: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:678_2: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'bhinīlapadmanetraḥ divyenendranīlamaṇiratnena śirasy ābaddhena,
XXavsata_u:678_4: tasya jatau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:678_6: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya padmasadṛśe akṣiṇī,
XXavsata_u:678_7: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya padmākṣa iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:678_8: padmākṣo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:678_9: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:678_11: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmas tyāgaruciḥ pradānābhirato mahati tyāge vartate /
XXavsata_u:678_12: sa yena yena gacchati, tena devamanuṣyaiḥ pūjyate 'bhyarcyate ca /
XXavsata_u:678_13: yatha padmākṣo dārako 'pareṇa samayena nyagrodhārāmaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:678_14: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:678_16: prasādajātaś ca bhagavatpādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:678_17: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:678_18: yāṃ śrutvā padmākṣeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:678_19: sa dṛṣṭasatyo dānapradānāni datvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakaduḥkhitān saṃtarpayitvā mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:678_20: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:678_21: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:678_22: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:678_24: atha sa padmākṣo bhagavataḥ sakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavantaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:678_25: sādhu me bhagavāṃs tathā karotu yathā maṇiratnam antardhīyeta /
XXavsata_u:678_26: bhagavān āha: karmajaṃ hy etat*, na śakyam antardhāpayitum* / api tu tathā kariṣyāmi yac chrāddhā drakṣyanti nāśrāddhā iti /
XXavsata_u:678_28: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:678_29: kāni bhadanta padmākṣeṇa karmāṇi kṛtāny {upacitāni} yenaivaṃ mahāśakhyo 'rhatvaṃ ca prāptam iti /
XXavsata_u:678_30: bhagavān āha: padmākṣeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:680_0: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:680_1: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_66.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:681_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:681_2: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvendhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:681_3: tasya rājñā bandhumatā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:681_4: tatra anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kārān kṛtvā svargamokṣaparāyaṇāni bhavanti /
XXavsata_u:681_7: tena vipaśyinaḥ stūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāgataguṇān anusmṛtya tan maṇiratnaṃ vipaśyinaḥ stūpavarṣasthālyām upari nibaddham* /
XXavsata_u:681_9: padmaiś ca pūjāṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:681_10: aham apy evaṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:681_11: evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:681_12: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena sārthavāha āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:681_13: ayaṃ sa padmākṣaḥ / yat tena vipaśyinaḥ stūpe maṇiratnam āropitaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākenāsya maṇiratnaṃ śirasi prādurbhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:681_14: yan nīlapadmaiḥ pūjā kṛtā tenābhinīlapadmanetraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:681_15: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā teneha janmany arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:681_16: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:681_17: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:681_20: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:684_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme /
XXavsata_u:684_1: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:686_0: paricārayati / tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko maheśākhyaḥ kalaviṅkamanojñabhāṇī (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:686_2: tasya jatau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:686_4: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād ayaṃ dārako dundubhisvaraḥ,
XXavsata_u:686_5: tasmād asya bhavatu dundubhisvara iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:686_6: dundubhisvaro dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:686_7: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:686_9: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalas tyāgaruciḥ pradānarucir mahati tyāge vartate /
XXavsata_u:686_10: yāvad apareṇa samayena dundubhisvaro dārako nyagrodhārāmaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:686_11: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:686_13: prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:686_14: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:686_15: yāṃ śrutvā dundubhisvareṇa dārakeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:686_16: sa dṛṣṭasatyo dānapradānāni datvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇavanīpakān duḥkhitān saṃtarpayitvā mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:686_17: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:686_18: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:686_19: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:686_20: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:686_21: kāni bhadanta dundubhisvareṇa karmāṇi kṛtāny yenābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādiko 'rhatvaṃ ca prāptam iti /
XXavsata_u:686_22: bhagavān āha: dundubhisvareṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:686_24: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:686_25: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_67.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:688_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:688_2: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvendhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:688_3: tasya rājñā bandhumatā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena /
XXavsata_u:688_4: tatrānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kārān kṛtvā svargamokṣaparāyaṇāni bhavanti /
XXavsata_u:688_5: yāvad anyatareṇa gṛhapatinā vicitrāṇi vādyabhāṇḍāni puruṣāś ca śikṣayitvā tatra stūpe niryātitāḥ,
XXavsata_u:688_6: ye tatra stūpe ahanyahani vādyaviśeṣaiḥ satkāraṃ kurvanti /
XXavsata_u:688_7: {bhagavān āha:} kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena gṛhapatir āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:688_8: ayaṃ sa dundubhisvaraḥ / yat tena vipaśyinaḥ stūpe vādyabhāṇḍāni niryātitāni,
XXavsata_u:688_11: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:688_13: vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:688_16: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:691_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme /
XXavsata_u:691_1: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:691_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:691_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:691_5: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:691_8: anye ca gṛhavāsinaḥ paricārakā jñātayaś ca:
XXavsata_u:691_10: yāvad asau gṛhapatiḥ śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:691_11: kasya nivedayeyam*, ko jñāsyati kim etad iti / tasya buddhir utpannā: ayaṃ buddho bhagavān sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī /
XXavsata_u:691_13: sa jñāsyatīti / sa yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:692_1: māṃsapeśīṃ sthāpayitvā trir divasasya pāṇināpamṛjya kṣīreṇa punaḥ pariprokṣasva yāvat saptāham* /
XXavsata_u:692_2: tataḥ sphuṭiṣyati, kumāraśatam utpatsyate / te ca sarve mahānagnabalino bhaviṣyanti /
XXavsata_u:692_3: iti śrutvā gṛhapatiḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:692_4: cintayati ca: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me īdṛśāḥ putrā utpatsyantīti /
XXavsata_u:692_5: tena tathaiva kṛtam* / yāvat saptame divase sā māṃsapeśī sphuṭitā /
XXavsata_u:692_6: kumāraśatam utpannam* / sarve abhirūpā darśanīyāḥ prāsādikāḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā mahānagnabalinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:692_7: yāvat krameṇa unnītā vardhitā mahāntaḥ saṃvṛttāś ca /
XXavsata_u:692_8: sarve yauvanamadamattā itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramanto nyagrodhārāmaṃ gatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:692_9: atha te dadṛśur buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:692_10: sahadarśanāc bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:692_11: teṣāṃ bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:692_12: yāṃ śrutvā sarvair evaṃ viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:692_13: te dṛṣṭasatyā mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:692_14: taiḥ sarvair yujyamānair ghaṭamānair vyāyacchamānaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:692_15: arhanto babhūvas traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhāḥ /
XXavsata_u:692_16: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyāś ca saṃvṛttāḥ /
XXavsata_u:692_17: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:692_18: kāni bhadanta kumāraśatena karmāṇi kṛtāny yena mahānagnabalinaḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
XXavsata_u:692_19: sahitāś ca bhrātara iti / bhagavān āha: ebhir eva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:692_21: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:692_22: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:

XXavsata_u:695_0: śataṃ nirgatam* / taṃb stūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāgataguṇān anusmṛtya tais tatra stūpe ekapuruṣeṇa vā ekadehinā vā ekātmanā vā ekacitteneva ekātmabhāveneva (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:695_1: ekapuruṣeṇevaikadehinevaikātmanevaikacittenevaikātmabhāveneva) sarvair ekasamūhībhūtaiḥ prasannacittakaiḥ prītijātair ekātmanībhūtais tatra stūpe puṇyadhūpagandhamālyavilepanāni naivedyarasarasāgrabhojyāni sarvopahārāṇi copaḍhaukitāni /
XXavsata_u:695_3: āropya ekasamūhībhūtvā ekasvareṇa stūtiṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇaśatasahasraṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:695_4: tatas taiḥ sarvair ekātmabhāvenaikacittakena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā:
XXavsata_u:695_5: anena kuśalamūlenāsmākaṃ tathaivaikātmajātā ekacittakāḥ samānadehāḥ samānācārāḥ samānadharmāḥ samānapuṇyāḥ samanirvāṇā bhavantu iti /

XXavsata_u:700_8: tato bhagavatā sūryasyānukampām upādāya tan maṇiratnam upagṛhyāśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:700_9: yāṃ śrutvā tena sūryeṇa dārakeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:700_10: sa dṛṣṭasatyo dānapradānāni datvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇavanīpakān duḥkhitān satvān saṃtarpayitvā mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:700_11: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:700_12: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:700_13: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:700_14: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:700_15: kāni bhadanta sūryeṇa dārakeṇa karmāṇi kṛtāny yena śirasi maṇiratnaṃ jātam*,
XXavsata_u:700_16: yena ca maheśākhyo 'rhatvaṃ ca prāptam iti /
XXavsata_u:700_17: bhagavān āha: sūryeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:700_19: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:700_20: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_69.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:700a_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:702_0: sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
