XXavsata_u:702_1: tasya rājñā bandhumatā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena /
XXavsata_u:702_2: yatrānekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kārān kṛtvā svargamokṣaparāyaṇāni bhavanti /
XXavsata_u:702_3: tatra stūpamaho vartate / śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo vicitrair gandhamālyavilepanaiś chatrair dhvajaiḥ patākābhiḥ pūjāṃ kurvanti /
XXavsata_u:702_4: yāvad apareṇa puruṣeṇa rājñāḥ sakāśād dyūtaṃ krīḍataḥ sūryābhāsaṃ (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:702_6: tatas tena prasādajātena vipaśyinaś caitye varṣāsthālyāṃ samāropitam* /
XXavsata_u:702_8: anenāhaṃ kuśalena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:702_10: evaṃvidhena cūḍāyāṃ baddhena mātuḥ kukṣer nirgaccheyam iti /
XXavsata_u:702_11: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena akṣadhūrta āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:702_12: ayaṃ sa sūryaḥ / yat tena vipaśyinaḥ stūpe ratnaṃ samāropitaṃ tenāsya śirasi maṇiratnaṃ prādurbhūtam* /
XXavsata_u:702_14: arhatvaṃ ca sākṣātkṛtam* / iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:702_15: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:702_18: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:705_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme /
XXavsata_u:705_1: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:705_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:705_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣaṃ varṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
XXavsata_u:705_5: yadāsau kumāro jātas tadā devatābhir divyāḥ patākāḥ samantata ucchrāpitāḥ,
XXavsata_u:705_8: sarvaṃ ca kapilavastu nagaraṃ yaśasā āpūritam*,
XXavsata_u:705_10: tasya jatau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:705_12: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya jātasya yaśasā sarvaloka
XXavsata_u:707_0: āpūritaḥ, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya viditayaśā iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:707_1: viditayaśā dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:707_2: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:707_4: sa ca śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ /
XXavsata_u:707_6: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:707_8: prasādajātaś ca bhagavatpādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:707_9: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:707_10: yāṃ śrutvā tena viditayaśasā dārakeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:707_11: sa dṛṣṭasatyaḥ śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānapradānāni datvā mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:707_12: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:707_13: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:707_14: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:707_17: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:707_18: kāni bhadanta viditayaśasā karmāṇi kṛtāny yena jātamātrasya devatābhiḥ patākā ucchrāpitāḥ,
XXavsata_u:707_19: yaśasā ca sarvaloka āpūrṇaḥ, pravrajya cārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti /
XXavsata_u:707_20: bhagavān āha: viditayaśasaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:707_22: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:707_23: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_70.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:708_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho
XXavsata_u:710_0: bhagavān* / sa bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīm upaniśritya viharati /
XXavsata_u:710_1: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:710_2: tasya rājñā bandhumatā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena /
XXavsata_u:710_3: yatra anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kārān kṛtvā svargamokṣaparāyaṇāni bhavanti /
XXavsata_u:710_5: tatra ca stūpamahe vartamāne mallānāṃ madhye patākā ucchrāpitā /
XXavsata_u:710_8: sa tām ādāya anekaprāṇiśatasahasraparivṛto nānāvicitrair vādyair vādyamānair yena vipaśyinaḥ stūpas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:710_9: upasaṃkramya tathāgataguṇānām anusmaraṇaṃ kṛtvā tāṃ patākāṃ stūpayaṣṭyāṃ baddhvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtavān*:
XXavsata_u:710_10: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:710_11: evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:710_12: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena malla āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:710_13: ayaṃ sa viditayaśāḥ / yad anena vipaśyinaḥ stūpe kārāḥ kṛtās tena saṃsāre 'nantaṃ sukham anubhūtavān* /
XXavsata_u:710_15: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:710_16: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:710_19: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:714_0: suprabhā supriyā caiva śuklā somā tathāparā /
XXavsata_u:714_1: kuvalayā sundarī yaiva muktā caiva kacaṅgalā /
XXavsata_u:717_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:717_1: śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:717_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:717_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:717_5: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:717_6: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā divyālaṃkārabhūṣitā maṇiratnena kaṇṭhe ābaddhena /
XXavsata_u:717_9: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:717_11: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād anayā jātamātrayā maṇiratnāvabhāsena sarvā śrāvastī avabhāsitā,
XXavsata_u:717_13: sā suprabhā dārikā aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattā dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:717_14: sā aṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:717_16: sā dārikā śrāddhā bhadrā kalyāṇāśayā ātmahitaparahitapratipannā /
XXavsata_u:717_18: tebhyas tebhyaḥ kaṇṭhād alaṃkāram avamucya prayacchati /
XXavsata_u:717_20: yāvad asau dārikā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā,
XXavsata_u:717_23: tair upadrūyamāṇaḥ pitā cāsyāḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:717_24: yady ekasmai dāsyāmi, anye me amitrā bhaviṣyantīti /
XXavsata_u:717_25: yāvad asau dārikā pitaraṃ cintāparam avekṣyovāca:
XXavsata_u:717_26: tāta kim asi cintāpara iti / tena so 'rtho vistareṇa samākhyātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:717_27: dārikā kathayati: tāta na te śokaḥ kartavyaḥ / svayam evāhaṃ saptame divase svayaṃvaram avatariṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:717_28: tataḥ śreṣṭhī rājñaḥ prasenajito nivedya śrāvastyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:717_29: saptame divase suprabhā dārikā svayaṃvaram avatariṣyati,
XXavsata_u:717_30: yena vo yat karaṇīyaṃ sa tat karotv iti /
XXavsata_u:719_0: tataḥ saptame divase suprabhā dārikā rathābhirūḍhā kāṣāyaṃ dhvajam ucchrāpya buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ citrapaṭe lekhayitvā abhiṣṭuvatī vīthīm avatīrṇā /
XXavsata_u:719_1: sā tatra rājaputrair amātyaputraiḥ śreṣṭhiputraiś ca sotkaṇṭhK‍h̲dvīkṣyamāṇā vicitrābhiḥ kathābhiḥ saṃjñapyovāca:
XXavsata_u:719_2: sarvathāhaṃ na kenacid aṃśena bhavatāṃ paribhavaṃ karomi /
XXavsata_u:719_4: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāsmi / tasya sakāśe pravrajiṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:719_6: suprabhāpi dārikā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:719_7: tasyā bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:719_8: yāṃ śrutvā suprabhayā dārikayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:719_9: abhinirhāraś ca kṛtaḥ / atha suprabhā dārikā utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:719_10: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣuṇībhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:719_12: tato bhagavān saṃlakṣayati: anayā asmāc chāsane (Speyer: asmacchāsane) mahadvineyākarṣaṇaṃ kartavyam iti /
XXavsata_u:719_13: tato bhagavatoktā: gaccha dārike parṣadam avalokayeti /
XXavsata_u:719_14: tataḥ suprabhā dārikā jetavanān nirgatya tatrāgatā /
XXavsata_u:719_15: tatraikaikasyaivaṃ bhavati: balenaināṃ harāma iti / te tām ākramitum ārabdhāḥ / tataḥ suprabhā dārikā tair upakramyamāṇā vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi darśayitum ārabdhā /
XXavsata_u:719_17: tatas te tad atyadbhūtaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā uddaṇḍaromāṇo mūlanikṛtta iva drumāḥ pādayor nipatya vijñāpayitum ārabdhāḥ:
XXavsata_u:719_18: avatara avatara bhagini, yayaite tvayā dharmāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:719_19: asthānam etad yat tvaṃ kāmān paribhuñjīthā iti /
XXavsata_u:719_21: gagaṇatalād) avatīrya janakāyasya purastāt sthitvā tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavatī,
XXavsata_u:719_22: yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam*
XXavsata_u:719_25: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:719_26: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā /
XXavsata_u:719_27: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyābhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:719_28: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:719_29: kāni bhadanta suprabhayā dārikayā karmāṇi kṛtāny,
XXavsata_u:719_33: bhagavān āha: suprabhayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni {labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:721_1: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_71.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:722_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:722_2: yāvad vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvendhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:722_3: tasya rājñā bandhumatā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena /
XXavsata_u:722_5: tayā vicitrāṇy ābharaṇāni śarīrād avamucya tatra stūpe dattāni /
XXavsata_u:722_7: anena kuśalamūlema cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena cārhatvaṃ prāpnuyām iti /
XXavsata_u:722_8: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yā sā tena kālena tena samayena rājño bandhumato agramahiṣī āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:722_9: iyaṃ sā suprabhā / yad anayā vipaśyinaḥ stūpe vicitrāṇy ābharaṇāni samāropitāni,
XXavsata_u:722_11: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*, tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:722_12: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:722_13: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:722_16: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:725_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:725_1: tena khalu samayena anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapateḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:725_2: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:725_3: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā śrāvastyadhivāsino janakāyasyātīva priyā /
XXavsata_u:725_4: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:725_6: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād iyaṃ priyā sarvajanasya,
XXavsata_u:avs_72.1_0: dattaṃ hi dānaṃ bahu vālpakaṃ vā
XXavsata_u:728_0: āthāsyā mātāpitarāv anye ca gṛhavāsinas taṃ vākyavyāhāraṃ śrutvā bhītās trastāḥ saṃvignā ākṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:728_1: āhṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ) kathayanti: piśācīva seyaṃ dāriketi / sā kathayati: amba nāhaṃ piśācī nāpi rākṣasī,
XXavsata_u:728_2: kiṃ tarhi dārikā / icchāmi dānāni dātum iti / tato 'syā mātrā anāthapiṇḍadasya gṛhapater niveditam*:
XXavsata_u:728_3: evam eṣā dārikā brūta iti / tatas tena gṛhapatinā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditena bhagavān antargṛhe sabhikṣusaṃgho bhojitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:728_5: yāvad asau dārikā krameṇa saptavarṣā saṃvṛttā,
XXavsata_u:728_7: sā sarvāsāṃ bhikṣuṇīnām iṣṭā kāntā priyā manāpā /
XXavsata_u:728_8: yāvat tatra kālena mahādurbhikṣaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ durbhikṣāntarakalpasadṛśam*,
XXavsata_u:728_10: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma:
XXavsata_u:728_11: gaccha ānanda, madvacanāt supriyāṃ vada: catasras te parṣadas traimāsyaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ pratipādayitavyā iti /
XXavsata_u:728_13: bhagavān āha: catasras te pariṣadas traimāsyaṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ pratipādayitavyā iti /
XXavsata_u:728_14: tataḥ supriyā kṛtakarapuṭā bhagavata ājñāṃ śirasi kṛtvā kathayati:
XXavsata_u:728_17: sa tvaritaṃ supriyāyā agrato bhūtaḥ kathayati:
XXavsata_u:728_18: supriye kva gacchasīti / sā kathayati: bhagavān āha traimāsyaṃ vaiyāvṛtyakarmaṇi niyukteti /
XXavsata_u:728_19: anāthapiṇḍada uvāca: alpotsukā bhava, ahaṃ tvāṃ sarveṇa pravārayāmīti /
XXavsata_u:728_20: supriyā kathayati: kim atrāścaryaṃ yadi tāto dṛṣṭasatyaḥ pravārayati samantato 'ntarhitāni nidhānāny abhisamīkṣya /
XXavsata_u:728_23: mālikayā devyā, varṣākārayā kṣatriyayā, ṛṣidattapurāṇābhyāṃ sthapatibhyāṃ,
XXavsata_u:728_24: viśākhayā mṛgāramātrā, rājñā prasenajitā / aṭavīgatā tatrāpy amanuṣyair manuṣyaveṣadhāribhiḥ pravāryate /
XXavsata_u:728_25: tayā evaṃ pravāryamāṇayā bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghas traimāsyam upasthitaś cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ /
XXavsata_u:728_26: tatraiva ca traimāsye yujyamānaghaṭamānavyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:728_27: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā /
XXavsata_u:728_28: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyābhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:730_0: atha bhagavāṃs traimāsyātyayāt kṛtacīvaro niṣṭhitacīvaraḥ samādāya pātracīvaraṃ śrāvastyā rājagṛhaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ sārdhaṃ śrāvakasaṃghena /
XXavsata_u:730_1: tataḥ supriyayā bhagavān antarmārge alpotsukaḥ kṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:730_3: gaṇḍīdeśakālo jātaḥ, pathyadanaṃ ca nāsti / tayā bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgha upaniveśitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:730_5: pravyāhṛtavatī: yadi puṇyānām asti vipākaḥ, pātram evaṃvidhabhakṣyabhojyādinā paripūryeteti /
XXavsata_u:730_7: tataḥ supriyayā anuparipāṭikayā sarvasya bhikṣusaṃghasya pātrāṇi pūritāni /
XXavsata_u:730_9: eṣā agrā me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ kṛtapuṇyānāṃ yaduta supriyā bhikṣuṇī /
XXavsata_u:730_10: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:730_11: kāni bhadanta supriyayā dārikayā karmāṇi kṛtāny,
XXavsata_u:730_12: yenāḍhye kule jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā abhimatā sarvajanasya,
XXavsata_u:730_14: bhagavān āha: supriyayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:730_16: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:730_17: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_72.2_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:731_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:731_1: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:731_2: atha kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ purvāhṇe nivāsya pātracivaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vārāṇasīṃ nagarīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:731_3: yāvad anyataraḥ śreṣṭhī saparijana udyānaṃ gataḥ,
XXavsata_u:731_5: yāvat tasya preṣyadārikayā ### [Acording to Kalpadrumāvadāna it is:
XXavsata_u:731_6: peśām ādāya paiṣṭikīm.] / {tayā} bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho 'ntarmārge dṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:731_8: kiṃ māṃ svāmī dvir api dāsīkariṣyati,
XXavsata_u:731_10: tatas tayā bandhanatāḍanam agaṇayitvā bhaktapeḍām uddhāṭya bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho vicitreṇāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:731_12: yāvac chreṣṭhinā uktā: dārike kva sā bhaktapeḍeti / sā kathayati: bhagavān me kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:733_2: gaccha dārike, adyāgreṇa tvam adāsī bhava, yā tvaṃ mama suptasya jāgarṣīti /
XXavsata_u:733_7: bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya pravacane daśavarṣasahasrāṇi vaiyāvṛtyaṃ kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:733_9: nimittikair) dīpamālābhiḥ kaṭhinacīvarair dānapradānāni datvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:733_10: yan mayā bhagavate kāśyapāya kṛcchreṇa samudānīya dānapradānāni dattāni,
XXavsata_u:733_11: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ pravrajyāhartvaṃ prāpnuyām iti /
XXavsata_u:733_12: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau preṣyadārikā,
XXavsata_u:733_13: iyam asau supriyā / yad anayā bhagavān kāsyapaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ,
XXavsata_u:733_14: tena āḍhye kule jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā abhimatā sarvajanasya /
XXavsata_u:733_15: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:733_16: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:733_17: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:733_20: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:736_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme /
XXavsata_u:736_1: śākyeṣu rohiṇo nāma śākyaḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:736_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:736_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ na putro na duhitā /
XXavsata_u:736_5: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:736_7: na me putro na duhitā / mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:736_9: devatārādhanaṃ kuruṣveti / so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberavāsavādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate /
XXavsata_u:736_10: tadyathā ārāmadevatā vanadevatāś catvaradevatāḥ śṛṅgāṭakadevatā balipratigrāhikā devatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:736_11: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:736_12: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:736_13: tac ca naivam* / yady evam abhaviṣyat*, ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:736_14: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:738_0: raktau bhavataḥ saṃnipatitau, mātā ca kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī,
XXavsata_u:738_2: eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:738_4: anyatamā ca dārikā anyatamasmāt devanikāyāc cyutvā tasya prajāpatyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntā /
XXavsata_u:738_5: tayā svāmine niveditam* / tataḥ svāminocyate: bhadre yadi putraṃ janiṣyasīty evaṃ kuśalam*,
XXavsata_u:738_6: atha duhitaram*, tayaiva saha tvāṃ niṣkāsayāmīti /
XXavsata_u:738_7: yāvad asāv aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:738_8: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā atikrāntā mānuṣyāṃ varṇam asaṃprāptā ca divyaṃ varṇam*,
XXavsata_u:738_10: yāvad rohiṇena śrutaṃ prajāptī te prasūtā dārikā jāteti,
XXavsata_u:738_11: sa kupitaḥ praviṣṭaḥ / tato 'sya prajāptyā divyavastrapravṛtā dārikopanītā /
XXavsata_u:738_12: tato rohiṇaḥ śākyo dārikāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:738_13: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:738_15: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād iyaṃ śuklavastraparivṛtā jātā,
XXavsata_u:738_17: śuklā dārikā aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattā dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:738_18: sā aṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:738_20: yathā yathā ca śuklā dārikā vardhate,
XXavsata_u:738_21: tathā tathā tāny api vastrāṇi vardhante na ca malinībhavanti,
XXavsata_u:738_23: yadā śuklā dārikā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā,
XXavsata_u:738_25: rājaputrā amātyaputrāś ca / tatas tair upadrūyamāṇaḥ pitā cāsyāḥ kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:738_26: yady ekasmai dāsyāmi, anye me amitrā bhaviṣyantīti /
XXavsata_u:738_27: yāvad asau dārikā pitaraṃ cintāparam avekṣyovāca:
XXavsata_u:738_28: tāta kim asi cintāpara iti / tena so 'rtho vistareṇa samākhyātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:738_29: dārikā kathayati: tāta na te śokaḥ kartavyaḥ, nāhaṃ kāmenārthinī, bhagavacchāsane pravrajiṣyāmi,
XXavsata_u:738_30: anujānīhi māṃ tāteti / yāvad asau mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitā /
XXavsata_u:738_33: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:738_34: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā /
XXavsata_u:738_35: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyābhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:738_36: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:738_37: kāni bhadanta śuklayā dārikayā karmāṇi kṛtāny,
XXavsata_u:738_38: yenāḍhye kule jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā,
XXavsata_u:738_40: bhagavān āha: śuklayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:740_0: karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni / ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:740_1: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_73.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:741_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:741_1: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:741_2: yāvad anyatarā śreṣṭhibhāryā śrāddhā bhadrā kalyāṇāśayā kenacid eva karaṇīyena ṛṣipatanaṃ gatā /
XXavsata_u:741_3: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:741_4: sahadarśanāc ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:741_6: tayā labdhaprasādayā bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃgham antargṛhe bhojayitvā bhikṣusaṃghāya kaṭhinacīvaram anupradattam*,
XXavsata_u:741_7: krameṇa ca mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitā /
XXavsata_u:741_9: eṣaivāsau śuklā bhikṣuṇī / yad anayā bhikṣusaṃghāya kaṭhinacīvaram anupradattaṃ tena śuklavastraprāvṛttā jātā /
XXavsata_u:741_10: yad brahmacaryavāsaḥ paripālitas teneha janmany arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:741_11: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:741_12: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:741_15: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:744_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:744_1: śrāvastyām anyatamo brāhmaṇa āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī trayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ pāragataḥ sanighaṇṭakaiṭabhānāṃ sākṣaraprabhedānām itihāsapañcamānāṃ padaśo vyākaraṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:744_2: sa pañca māṇavakaśatāni brāhmaṇakān mantrān pāṭhayati /
XXavsata_u:746_1: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:746_2: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:746_3: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:746_4: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā /
XXavsata_u:746_5: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:746_7: jñātaya ūcuḥ: prāyaśo 'smākaṃ putrapautrikayā somanāmāni kriyante /
XXavsata_u:746_9: somā dārikā unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:746_11: yadā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā, sā paṇḍitā vyaktā medhāvinī paṭupracārā smṛtimatī śrutidharā ca /
XXavsata_u:746_12: yāvad asyāḥ pitā māṇavakān mantrān pāṭhayati,
XXavsata_u:746_13: sā śrutamātreṇodgṛhṇāti / śrutvā ca teṣāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ pūrvāpareṇa vyākhyānaṃ karoti /
XXavsata_u:746_14: tato 'syā yaśasā sarvā śrāvastī sphuṭā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:746_17: yadā bhagavān anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ tadā śrāvastīm āgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:746_20: tataḥ sā tān na paśyantī antarjanam āmantrayate:
XXavsata_u:746_21: ko 'tra bhavanto hetur yenaitarhi śāstravido nopasaṃkrāmantīti /
XXavsata_u:746_22: te kathayanti: bhagavān sarvajñaḥ śākyamunir nāmeha saṃprāptaḥ,
XXavsata_u:746_24: tato buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvāsyāḥ sarvaromakūpā hṛṣṭāḥ (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:746_25: sarvaromakūpāhṛṣṭāḥ ) / tatra somā dārikā buddhaśabdaśravaṇād bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntā /
XXavsata_u:746_26: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:746_27: sahadarśanāc ca bhagavatpādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:746_28: atha bhagavān somāyā dārikāyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikīṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān*,
XXavsata_u:746_29: yāṃ śrutvā somayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:746_31: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:746_32: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā /
XXavsata_u:746_38: bhagavān āha: na hi bhikṣuṇyas tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ padaśo dharmam uddiśanti /
XXavsata_u:746_41: evam aham uddiśeyam iti / tena khalu samayena sā bhikṣuṇī tasyām eva parṣadi saṃniṣaṇṇā saṃnipatitā /
XXavsata_u:746_42: atha sā bhikṣuṇī utthāyāsanād yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam etad avocat*:
XXavsata_u:748_1: ahaṃ sakṛduktaṃ dhārayiṣye / tato bhagavatā vistareṇoddiṣṭaḥ,
XXavsata_u:748_2: somayā sakṛdukto dhāritaḥ / tatra bhagavān bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
XXavsata_u:748_3: eṣā agrā me bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ bahuśrutānāṃ śrutadharīṇāṃ yaduta somā bhikṣuṇī /
XXavsata_u:748_4: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:748_5: kāni bhadanta somayā bikṣuṇyā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni,
XXavsata_u:748_6: yenāḍhye kule jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā śrutidharā ca saṃvṛtteti /
XXavsata_u:748_7: bhagavān āha: somayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:748_9: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:748_10: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_74.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:749_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:749_1: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:749_2: yāvad anyatarā brāhmaṇadārikā bhagavataḥ kāsyapasya śāsane pravrajitā /
XXavsata_u:749_3: tayā tatroddiṣṭaṃ paṭhitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:749_4: na tu śaktitaṃ naiṣṭhikaṃ jñānam utpādayitum* /
XXavsata_u:749_6: sā bhagavatā kāśyapena śrutadharīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā /
XXavsata_u:749_7: tataḥ somayā bhikṣuṇyā maraṇakāle praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:749_8: yathā me upādhyāyikā śrutadharīṇām agrā nirdiṣṭā,
XXavsata_u:749_9: evam aham apy anāgate 'dhvani yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapenottaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:749_10: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti,
XXavsata_u:749_11: tasya śāsane pravrajitā bhagavatā śākyamuninā śrutidharīṇām agrā nirdiśyeya /
XXavsata_u:749_12: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau brāhmaṇadārikā āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:749_13: iyaṃ sā somā bhikṣuṇī / yad anayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:749_17: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:749_18: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:749_21: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:753_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:753_1: tena khalu samayena rājagṛhe nagare girivalgusamāgamo nāma parva pratyupasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:753_2: tatra sarvebhyaḥ ṣaḍbhyo mahānagarebhyo janakāyaḥ saṃnipatati /
XXavsata_u:753_4: tasya duhitā kuvalayā nāma abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā /
XXavsata_u:753_6: yadā raṅgamadhyam avatarati, tadā sarvaprekṣakaiḥ sotkaṇṭhair udvīkṣyate /
XXavsata_u:753_11: asti bhavanto rājagṛhe nagare kaścin manuṣyabhūto yo me rūpeṇa samo viśiṣṭataro veti /
XXavsata_u:753_12: janakāyenoktā: asti śramaṇo gautamaḥ saparivāra iti /
XXavsata_u:753_13: kuvalayovāca: kim asau manuṣyabhūto 'tha deva iti /
XXavsata_u:753_15: tatas tadvacanam upaśrutya kuvalayā sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntā /
XXavsata_u:753_16: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitvā nṛtyati gāyati vādayate strīliṅgāni strīcihnāni strīnimittāni copadarśayati /
XXavsata_u:753_17: ye sarāgā bhikṣavas te tayā saṃbhrāmitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:753_18: tato bhagavān rāgabahulānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ vinayanārthaṃ kuvalayāyāś ca rūpayauvanamadāpanayanārthaṃ tadrūpān ṛddhyabhisaṃkārān abhisaṃkṛtavān*,
XXavsata_u:753_19: yena kuvalayā jīrṇā vṛddhā palitaśiraskā khaṇḍadantā kubjagopānasīvaktrā nirmitā /
XXavsata_u:753_20: tatkālasamanantaram eva kuvalāyā ātmānaṃ bībhatsam abhivīkṣya yo 'sau rūpayauvanamadaḥ sa prativigataḥ /
XXavsata_u:753_22: tataḥ kuvalayā apagatamadā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ vijñāpitavatī:
XXavsata_u:753_23: sādhu me bhagavāṃs tathā dharmaṃ deśayatu,
XXavsata_u:753_26: atha bhagavān kuvalāyās teṣāṃ cāvītarāgāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tāthavidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavān*,
XXavsata_u:753_27: yāṃ śrutvā kaiścid viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:753_28: kaiścit sakṛdāgāmiphalam*, kaiścid anāgāmiphalm*, kaiścit pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:753_30: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:753_31: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā
XXavsata_u:755_1: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:755_2: tair api naṭais tena saṃvegena sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:755_3: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:755_4: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavatā kuvalayā naṭadārikā rūpayauvanamadamattā jarayā saṃvejya yāvad atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā iti /
XXavsata_u:755_5: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena kuvalayā dārikā rūpayauvanamadamattā jarayā saṃvejya yāvad atyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā /
XXavsata_u:755_6: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ kuvalayā dārikā saṃvejya pañcasu vratapradeśeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitā /
XXavsata_u:755_7: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:755_8: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* /
XXavsata_u:755_10: yāvad asau rājā devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:755_11: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:755_12: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:755_13: dāriko jāto abhirūpo darśanīyo prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭa uccaghoṣaṇaḥ saṃgatabrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
XXavsata_u:755_14: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:755_16: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya pitā kāśirājaḥ, ayaṃ cābhirūpo darśaniyaḥ prāsādikaḥ,
XXavsata_u:755_17: tasmād bhavatu dārikasya kāśisundara iti nāma /
XXavsata_u:755_18: kāśisundaro dārakaḥ aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:755_19: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:755_22: so 'nekadoṣaduṣṭam anarthamūlaṃ rājatvaṃ viditvā ṛiṣiṣu pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:755_23: sa ca himavatkandare prativasati phalamūlāṃbubhakto 'jinavalkaladhārī agnihotrikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:755_24: yāvad apareṇa samayena phalānām artham anyataraṃ parvatakandaram anupravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:755_25: yāvat tatra kinnaradārikā / ṛiṣikumāraṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃraktā nṛtyati gāyati vādayati strīcihnāni strīnimittāni strīvikrīḍitāny upadarśayati /
XXavsata_u:755_26: yāvat kāśisundareṇa ṛṣiṇā tasyā dārikāyā dharmadeśanā dattā /
XXavsata_u:755_27: jīrṇāsi bhagini, prathamas te svaro madhuraḥ snigdhaś ca,
XXavsata_u:757_0: sa prativigataḥ / tayā prasādajātayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:757_3: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena ṛṣikumāro babhūva,
XXavsata_u:757_4: ahaṃ saḥ / kinnarakanyā imam eva kuvalayā /
XXavsata_u:757_6: kāni bhadanta kuvalayayā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni,
XXavsata_u:757_8: kāni karmaṇi kṛtāni yenārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam api /
XXavsata_u:757_9: bhagavān āha: kuvalayayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:757_11: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:757_12: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_75.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:758_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:758_3: tatra śobhanena (Speyer: śobhena) rājñā bhagavataḥ sakāśāt satyadarśanaṃ kṛtvā naṭācāryāṇām ājñā dattā:
XXavsata_u:758_4: bauddhaṃ nāṭakaṃ mama purastān nāṭayitavyam iti /
XXavsata_u:758_6: evaṃ bhadanteti / tataḥ sarvanaṭair bauddhaṃ nāṭakaṃ vicārya muninirjitaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:758_7: yāvad rājño 'mātyagaṇaparivṛtasya purato naṭā nāṭayitum ārabdhāḥ /
XXavsata_u:758_10: tato rājñā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditena naṭācāryapramukho naṭagaṇo mahatā dhanaskandhenācchāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:758_11: tatas te bhagavacchāsane labdhaprasādā dānapradānāni datvā samyakpraṇidhānaṃ cakruḥ:
XXavsata_u:758_12: anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca anāgatān buddhān ārāgayema,
XXavsata_u:758_13: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo ye te naṭāḥ,
XXavsata_u:758_14: ime te kuvalayāpramukhāḥ / yad ebhis tatra praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:758_15: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:758_16: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:758_19: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:762_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho vārāṇasyāṃ viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:762_1: vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ rājā brahmadatto rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* /
XXavsata_u:762_3: yāvad asau rājā devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:762_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:762_5: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:762_6: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetā /
XXavsata_u:762_7: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:762_9: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād iyaṃ kāśirājasya duhitā surūpā ca,
XXavsata_u:762_11: kāśisundarī dārikā aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattā dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:762_12: sā 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:762_14: yadā kāśisundarī dārikā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā,
XXavsata_u:762_15: tadā prātisīmaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ rājabhī rājñe brahmadattasya dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:762_16: śrutam asmābhir yathā tava duhitā jāteti /
XXavsata_u:762_17: tad arhasy asmākaṃ putrāṇām anyatarasmai anupradātum iti /
XXavsata_u:762_18: tato rājā śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaś cintayati:
XXavsata_u:762_19: yady ekasmai dāsyāmi, apareṇa saha me (Speyer: me saha) virodho bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:762_20: kāśisundarī dārikā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā pituḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā /
XXavsata_u:762_21: tayā pitā śokārto dṛṣṭaḥ pṛṣṭaś ca:
XXavsata_u:762_26: saptame divase kāśisundarī dārikā svayaṃvaram avatariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:762_27: yena vo yat karaṇīyaṃ sa tat karotv iti /
XXavsata_u:762_28: yāvat saptame divase ṣaṭ prātisīmā rājānaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:762_29: kāśisundary api ratham abhiruhya kāṣāyaṃ dhvajam ucchrāpya buddhapaṭaṃ hastena gṛhītvā rājasabhāṃ gatvovāca:
XXavsata_u:762_33: ya eṣa eva me bhagavān buddhaḥ paṭe likhitas tasyāhaṃ śrāvikā /
XXavsata_u:762_35: yāvad ṛṣipatanaṃ gatvā bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:762_36: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣu{ṇī}bhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:762_40: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ
XXavsata_u:763_0: viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:763_1: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā /
XXavsata_u:763_2: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:763_3: tatas te rājaputrās tasyā rūpayauvanaśobhāṃ samanusmṛtya rāgamadamattāḥ pravrajitām api prārthayituṃ pravṛttāḥ /
XXavsata_u:763_4: sā taiḥ prārthyamānā vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:763_5: gagaṇatalam) abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhā /
XXavsata_u:763_7: tatas te rāputrā atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā āhṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayitum ārabdhāḥ:
XXavsata_u:763_8: marṣaya bhagini / yathaite tvayā dharmāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ,
XXavsata_u:763_9: asthānam etad yat tvaṃ kāmān parimuñjīthā iti /
XXavsata_u:763_10: tataḥ kāśisundarī dārikā gaganatalād avatīrya janakāyasya purastāt sthitvā tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavatī,
XXavsata_u:763_11: yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrair mahān viśeṣo 'dhigataḥ /
XXavsata_u:763_12: tato bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:763_16: bhagavān āha: kāśisundaryaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:763_18: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:763_19: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_76.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:764_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe triṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kanakamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:764_1: ### [The name of the place is missing.
XXavsata_u:764_2: ] / yāvat tatrānyatarā rājaduhitā śrāddhā bhadrā kalyāṇāśayā ātmahitaparahitapratipannā /
XXavsata_u:764_3: tayā vihāraṃ kārayitvā sarvopakaraṇaiḥ paripūrya bhagavate saśrāvakasaṃghāya pratipāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:764_4: kanakamunau ca samyaksaṃbuddhe pravrajya daśavarṣasahasrāṇi maitrī bhavitā /
XXavsata_u:764_5: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yā sā rājaduhitā,
XXavsata_u:764_6: iyaṃ sā kāśisundarī dārikā / yad anayā vihāraḥ pratipāditas tenābhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:764_7: yat kanakamunau bhagavati pravrajya daśavarṣasahasrāṇi maitrī bhāvitā tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:764_8: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:764_9: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:764_12: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:768_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:768_1: śrāvastyāṃ puṣyo nāma śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:768_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:768_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:768_5: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:768_6: dārikā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā muktāmālayā śirasi baddhayā /
XXavsata_u:768_7: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:768_9: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asyā jātamātrāyā muktamālā śirasi prādurbhūtaṃ,
XXavsata_u:768_11: muktā dārikā aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo dattā dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:768_12: sā 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:768_14: yāvan muktā dārikā krameṇa mahatī saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:768_15: tasyāḥ sā muktāmālā avatāritā punaḥ prādurbhavati /
XXavsata_u:768_16: tataḥ sā dārikā kṛpaṇavanīpakān dṛṣṭvā bhāgasaṃvibhāgaṃ karoti /
XXavsata_u:768_17: yadā ca pradeyā saṃvṛttā, tadā tasyā bahavo yācanakā āgacchanti rājaputrā amātyaputrāḥ śreṣṭhiputrāś ca /
XXavsata_u:768_18: tato 'syāḥ pitā śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaś cintayati:
XXavsata_u:768_19: yady ekasmai dāsyāmi, anye me 'mitrā bhaviṣyantīti /
XXavsata_u:768_23: tato dārikā kathayati: tāta nāhaṃ kāmair arthinī / bhagavacchāsane pravrajiṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:768_24: yāvad anāthapiṇḍadasya supriyo nāma kanīyaḥ putras tena pitā vijñaptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:768_28: evaṃ kṛtaṃ sāṃbandhikaṃ yāvajjīvasukhyaṃ kṛtaṃ ca bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:768_29: tataḥ puṣyeṇa gṛhapatinā svasyāṃ duhitari so 'rtho niveditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:768_30: sā kathayati: samayato yadīndriyāṇāṃ paripākān mayā saha bhagavacchāsane pravrajati,
XXavsata_u:768_32: tena tathaiva kṛtam* / yāvad ubhāv eva gṛhān niṣkramya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitau /
XXavsata_u:768_33: tābhyāṃ yujyamānābhyāṃ ghaṭamānābhyāṃ vyāyacchamānābhyām idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:768_34: arhantau saṃvṛttau traidhātukavītarāgau samaloṣṭakāñcanāv ākāśapāṇitalasamacittau vāsīcandanakalpau vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośau vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptau bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhau /
XXavsata_u:768_35: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyau mānyāv abhivādyau ca saṃvṛttau /
XXavsata_u:770_0: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:770_1: kāni bhadanta muktayā karmāṇi kṛtāni yena muktāmālayā śirasy ābaddhayā,
XXavsata_u:770_3: bhagavān āha: muktayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:770_5: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:770_6: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_77.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:771_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:771_1: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:771_2: yāvad anyatamaḥ sārthavāhaḥ sa mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:771_5: tasya ca bhāryā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā /
XXavsata_u:771_6: vārāṇasyām anyatamo gṛhaptiḥ śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:771_7: tasya buddhir utpannā: yanv ahaṃ chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya śāsane pañcavārṣikaṃ kuryām iti /
XXavsata_u:771_9: icchāmy ahaṃ chandakabhikṣaṇaṃ samādāpya bhagavataḥ pañcavārṣikaṃ kartum iti /
XXavsata_u:771_11: athāsau gṛhapatir hastiskandhārūḍho vārāṇāsyāṃ nagaryāṃ rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cchandakabhikṣaṇaṃ yācituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:771_12: yāvat sārthavāhabhāryā muktāhāraṃ śiraso 'vamucya tasmiṃś chandakabhikṣaṇe dattavatī /
XXavsata_u:771_13: yāvat sārthavāha āgatas taṃ muktāhāraṃ śiraso 'panītaṃ dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭavān*:
XXavsata_u:771_15: tatas tayoktam*: āryaputra prītiṃ janaya, prasādam utpādaya, bhagavacchāsane chandakabhikṣaṇe datta it /
XXavsata_u:771_16: yāvat sārthavāhena puṣkalena mūlyena niṣkrīya tasyai patnyai dattaḥ /
XXavsata_u:771_18: parityakto (Speyer: parityaktā) me iti / svāminocyate: bhadre mayā prabhūtena hiraṇyasuvarṇenāyaṃ krītaḥ /
XXavsata_u:771_19: kasmān necchasīti / tato 'sau dārikā taṃ gṛhītvā prabhūtaṃ puṣpasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā gandhamālyāni ca gṛhītvā ṛṣipatanaṃ gatā /
XXavsata_u:771_20: tato gandhakuṭyāṃ gandhapralepaṃ kṛtvā puṣpair ākīrya muktāhāraṃ bhagavato mūrdhni kṣiptavatī /
XXavsata_u:771_21: sa sahasā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya mūrdhani sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:771_23: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ labhinī syām*,
XXavsata_u:771_24: evaṃvidham eva śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:771_25: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau tena kālena tena samayena sārthavāhabhāryā,
XXavsata_u:771_26: iyaṃ sā muktā / yad anayā bhagavati kāśyape kārāḥ kṛtās tenābhirūpā darśaniyā prāsādikā /
XXavsata_u:773_0: śirasi prādurbhūtaḥ / tenaiva hetunedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:773_1: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:773_2: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:773_5: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:776_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kacaṅgalāyāṃ viharati kācaṅgalīye vanaṣaṇḍe /
XXavsata_u:776_2: sā ghaṭam ādāya udakārthinī kūpam upasṛptā /
XXavsata_u:776_4: gaccha ānanda, etasyāṃ vṛddhāyāṃ kathaya: bhagavāṃs trṣitaḥ, pānīyam anuprayacchasveti / sā ānandenoktā: ahaṃ svayam evāneṣyāmīti / yāvat kacaṅgalā pānīyaghaṭaṃ pūrayitvā bhagavataḥ sakāśaṃ gatā /
XXavsata_u:776_5: dadarśa kacaṅgalā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:776_8: sā ūrdhvabāhuḥ putra putreti bhagavantaṃ pariṣvaktum ārabdhā /
XXavsata_u:776_9: bhikṣavas tāṃ vārayanti / bhagavān āha: mā yūyaṃ bhikṣava imāṃ vṛddhāṃ vārayata /
XXavsata_u:avs_78.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:avs_78.2_0: saced eṣā nivāryeta mama gātreṣu śleṣaṇāt* /
XXavsata_u:avs_78.2_1: idānīṃ rudhiraṃ hy uṣṇaṃ kaṇṭhād asyāḥ sravet kṣaṇāt* //
XXavsata_u:777_0: yāvad asau putrasnehaṃ vinodya bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:777_1: bhagavān cāsyā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:777_2: yāṃ śrutvā kacaṅgalayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:avs_78.4_0: yat kartavyaṃ hi putreṇa mātur duṣkarakariṇā /
XXavsata_u:avs_78.4_1: tat kṛtaṃ bhavatā mahyaṃ cittaṃ mokṣaparāyaṇam* //
XXavsata_u:avs_78.5_0: durgatibhyaḥ samuddhṛtya svarge mikṣe ca te aham* /
XXavsata_u:779_0: yāvad asau svāminam anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitā /
XXavsata_u:779_1: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:779_2: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā /
XXavsata_u:779_3: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:779_4: yadā bhagavān bhikṣuṇīnāṃ saṃkṣepeṇoddiśya pratisaṃlayanāya praviśati,
XXavsata_u:779_7: eṣāgra me bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ sūtrāntavibhāgakartrīṇāṃ yaduta kacaṅgalā bhikṣuṇīti /
XXavsata_u:779_8: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:779_9: kāni bhadanta kacaṅgalayā karma kṛtaṃ yena vṛddhā pravrajitā,
XXavsata_u:779_10: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena bhagavān paścimagarbhavāsena *{S:
XXavsata_u:779_14: bhagavān āha: kacaṅgalayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:779_16: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:779_17: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:780_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani bodhisatvacaryāyāṃ vartamānasyaiṣā me pañca janmaśatāni mātā āsīt* /
XXavsata_u:780_2: tadā mām eṣā vārayati / tasya karmaṇo vipākena vṛddhā pravrajitā /
XXavsata_u:780_4: tena daridrā saṃvṛttā / kiṃ tv anayā naivaṃvidhāni maheśākhyasaṃvartanīyāni karmāṇi kṛtāni,
XXavsata_u:780_5: yathā mahāmāyā kṛtavatī / tenāham anayā paścime na dhāritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:780_8: tena dāsī saṃvṛttā / yat tatrānayā paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthanakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:780_11: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:780_12: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:780_15: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:784_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:784_1: tena khalu samayena rājā prasenajit kauśalo rājā ca brāhmadatta ubhāv apy etau parasparaviruddhau /
XXavsata_u:784_2: yāvad rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ svaviṣayaparyantaṃ gatvā kāṣṭhavāṭaṃ baddhvāvasthitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:784_3: rājā brahmadattaś ca caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ saṃnāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ nadyāḥ kūle kāṣṭhavāṭaṃ baddhvāvasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:784_5: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:784_6: brahmadatto 'pi devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:784_7: yenaikadivasa eva rājñaḥ prasenajitkauśalasya duhitā jātā,
XXavsata_u:784_8: brahmadattasya putraḥ // yāvad ubhayor api skandhāvāre ### brahmadattasya skandhāvāre pravartate yenāyam evaṃvidha utsava iti /
XXavsata_u:784_9: tair ākhyātam*: rājño brahmadattasya putro jāta iti /
XXavsata_u:784_12: tato rājñā brahmadattena rājñaḥ prasenajito dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:784_13: śrutaṃ mayā yathā tava duhitā jāteti /
XXavsata_u:784_14: diṣṭyā vardhase / asmākam api putro jātaḥ / kiṃ tu dīyatām eṣā dārikā mama putrāya /
XXavsata_u:784_15: evaṃ kṛte sāṃbandhike yāvajjīvaṃ vairotsargaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:784_17: evam bhavatv iti / tatas tābhyāṃ parasparaṃ prītau kṛtāyāṃ kṣeme jāte rājñā brahmadattena dārakasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ kṣemaṃkara iti /
XXavsata_u:784_18: rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena dārikāyā jātāyā jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kṣemeti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:784_21: atha sa dārako dārikāyā hārārdhahāramālāṃ badhnan kaṇṭhemaṇīn preṣayati /
XXavsata_u:784_23: tayā te pṛṣṭāḥ: kuta etāni prābhṛtāny āgacchanti? preṣyair vistareṇa sa vṛtānta (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:784_24: vṛttānta) āveditaḥ / śrutvā ca pitaraṃ vijñāpayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:784_25: tāta nāhaṃ kāmair arthinī, bhagavacchāsane pravrajiṣyāmi,
XXavsata_u:784_26: anujānīhi māṃ tāteti / rājā kathayati: naitad dārike śakyaṃ mayā kartum*,
XXavsata_u:784_27: yasmāt tava janmani mama kṣemaṃ jātam iti /
XXavsata_u:784_28: tato rājñā prasenajitā kauśalena rājño brahmadattasya dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:784_30: āgatyaināṃ gṛhāṇeti / yāvad rājñā brahmadattena divasaḥ pratigṛhītaḥ:
XXavsata_u:784_31: saptame 'hani āgacchāmīti / yat te kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat kuruṣveti /
XXavsata_u:784_34: tataḥ kṣemā bhītā trastā saṃvignā āhṛṣṭaromakūpā śaraṇapṛṣṭham abhiruhya jetavanābhimukhī buddhaṃ bhagavantam āyācituṃ pravṛttā /
XXavsata_u:avs_79.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:avs_79.1_2: mama vidhivadapāyān mocaya tvaṃ hi nāthaḥ
XXavsata_u:787_0: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:787_1: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛtt{ak}ānām ekārakṣāṇām ekavīrāṇām advitīyānām advayavādināṃ śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:787_2: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ ko 'pāyapravaṇaḥ ko 'pāyaprāgbhāraḥ /
XXavsata_u:787_3: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:788_0: atha bhagavān kṣemāyā vinayakālam avekṣya ṛddhyā upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:788_2: yāṃ śrutvā kṣemayā anāgāmiphalaṃ prāptam abhijñānirhāraś ca /
XXavsata_u:788_4: yāvat saptame divase vivāhakāle saṃprāpte pratyupasthite rājakumāre anekajanaśatasahāye vedīmadhyagatāyāṃ brāhmaṇena purohitena lājā ghṛtasarpiṣānupradattā /
XXavsata_u:788_5: tato dārakadārikāhastasaṃśleṣaṇe kriyamāṇe kṣemā paśyatām anekeṣāṃ prāṇiśatasahasrāṇāṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam abhiruhya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhā /
XXavsata_u:788_6: tato rājā prasenajit kauśalo rājā ca brahmadattaḥ kṣemaṃkaraś ca rājakumāro 'nye ca kutūhalābhyāgatāḥ satvā vismayam upagatāḥ pādayor nipatya vijñāpayitum ārabdhāḥ:
XXavsata_u:788_7: marṣaya bhagini ya ete tvayā dharmāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ,
XXavsata_u:788_8: asthānam etad yat tvaṃ kāmān parimuñjīthā iti /
XXavsata_u:788_9: atha kṣemā gaganatalād avatīrya janakāyasya puraḥ sthitvā tathāvidhāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kṛtavatī,
XXavsata_u:788_10: yāṃ śrutvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:788_11: tataḥ kṣemā dārikā pitaram anujñāpya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntā /
XXavsata_u:788_14: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:790_0: saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā /
XXavsata_u:790_1: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:790_3: eṣā agrā me bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikāṇāṃ mahāprājñānāṃ mahāpratibhānāṃ yaduta kṣemā bhikṣuṇīti /
XXavsata_u:790_4: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:790_5: kāni bhadanta kṣemayā karmāṇi kṛtāni yena mahāprājñānāṃ mahāpratibhānām agrā nirdiṣṭā /
XXavsata_u:790_6: bhagavān āha: kṣemayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:790_8: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:790_9: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:791_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:791_1: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:791_2: yāvat tatrānyatarā śreṣṭhiduhitā bhagavataḥ kāsyapasya śāsane pravrajitā /
XXavsata_u:791_3: tayā bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya śāsane dānapradānāni dattāni,
XXavsata_u:791_7: sā bhagavatā kāśyapena prajñāvatīnām agrā nirdiṣṭā /
XXavsata_u:791_10: evam aham apy anāgate 'dhvani yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:791_11: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti,
XXavsata_u:791_12: tasyāhaṃ śāsane pravrajitvā prajñāvatīnām agrā bhaveyam iti /
XXavsata_u:791_13: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāsau tena kālena tena samayena śreṣṭhiduhitā,
XXavsata_u:791_14: iyaṃ sā kṣemā bhikṣuṇī / yat tayā dānāni pradattāni, tenāḍhye kule pratyājātā / yat tayā dvādaśa varṣasahasrāṇi brahmacaryavāsaḥ paripālitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:791_16: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:791_17: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:791_20: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:794_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:794_1: tena khalu samayena prasenajit kauśalo rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* /
XXavsata_u:794_3: yāvat sa rājā anyatamayā devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:794_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:794_5: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:794_6: dārikā jātā aṣṭādaśabhir daurvarṇikair aṅgaiḥ samanvāgatā /
XXavsata_u:794_7: tasyā jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā virūpeti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
XXavsata_u:794_9: tadā yasmai pradīyate, sa tāṃ virūpeti kṛtvā na pratigṛhṇāti /
XXavsata_u:794_10: yāvad dakṣiṇāpathād gaṅgo nāma sārthavāho 'bhyāgato vistīrṇavibhavaḥ /
XXavsata_u:794_13: yanv aham asmai dāsyāmīti / tato rājñā rātrau saṃprāptāyāṃ bhagnacakṣuṣpathe (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:794_14: bhagne cakṣuṣpathe) gaṅgaṃ dūtenāhvāpya sā dārikā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā bhāryārthe dattā gaṅgāya /
XXavsata_u:794_16: yāvad gaṅgena sārthavāhena dvitīye divase prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ sā dārikā dṛṣṭā paramabībhatsā /
XXavsata_u:794_17: yāṃ dṛṣṭvā rājāpekṣayā na śaknoty avamoktum* /
XXavsata_u:794_18: yāvad gaṅgaḥ sārthavāhaḥ kasmiṃścit parvaṇy upasthite goṣṭhikānāṃ madhyaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:794_20: saha bhāryayā amukam udyānaṃ yo no yāsyati,
XXavsata_u:794_21: sa goṣṭhikānāṃ pañca purāṇaśatāni daṇḍam anupradāsyatīti /
XXavsata_u:794_22: tato gaṅgaḥ svagṛham āgatya śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ kṛtvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:794_23: tasya buddhir utpannā: varam ahaṃ daṇḍaṃ dadyām*, na cāham etām eteṣāṃ darśayeyam* /
XXavsata_u:794_25: atha gaṅgo dvāraṃ baddhvā pañca purāṇaśatāni
XXavsata_u:796_3: yatra me na ca svāmicittaṃ sukhitam*,
XXavsata_u:796_4: na cāham* / kim atra prāptakālam* / ātmānaṃ ghātayiṣyāmīti / tato rajjuṃ gṛhītvā avarakaṃ praviṣṭā udbandhanahetoḥ /
XXavsata_u:796_5: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:796_6: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛtt{ak}ānām ekārakṣāṇām śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:796_7: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ,
XXavsata_u:796_9: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:avs_80.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:797_0: tato bhagavatā jetavanāvasthitena kanakavarṇā prabhā utsṛṣṭā,
XXavsata_u:797_2: ṛddhyā copasaṃkramya tadgalād udbandhanam avamucya dārikāṃ samāśvāsitavān* /
XXavsata_u:797_4: tathāgatasya tathāgatapraveditasya dharmavinayasya manuṣyatvasya āryāyatane pratyājātatvasya indriyair avikalatvasya kuśaladharmacchandakasya āścaryādbhuto loke prādurbhāvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:797_5: tato bhagavatā tasyā dārikāyās tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:797_6: yāṃ śrutvā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:797_7: tato labdhaprasādayā bhagavān bhaktena pratipāditaḥ paṭena cācchāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:797_9: lakṣmīḥ prādurbhūtā / devakanyeva cāvarakam avabhāsamānā sthitā /
XXavsata_u:797_12: sa eṣa īrṣyāprakṛtir daṇḍam utsahate dātum*,
XXavsata_u:797_14: yan nu vayam enaṃ viruddhair madyaiḥ pāyayitvā tāḍam ādāya gṛham asya gatvā bhāryāṃ paśyemeti /
XXavsata_u:797_15: tatas tais taṃ ghanaghanena viruddhamadyena pānena kṣībaṃ (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:797_16: kṣīvaṃ) kṛtvā tāḍam apahṛtya gṛhaṃ gatvā dvāram avamucya dārikā dṛṣṭā /
XXavsata_u:797_17: tato dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam upagatāś cintayanti:
XXavsata_u:797_19: tatas te punar āgatya madyavaśāt suptam utthāpya
XXavsata_u:799_0: ūcuḥ: lābhās te gaṅga sulabdhāḥ, yasya te evaṃvidhā darśanīyā dāriketi /
XXavsata_u:799_1: tato gaṅgo bhūyasyā mātrayā duḥkhī durmanā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:799_2: daṇḍaḥ svayaṃ mayā dattaḥ, ahaṃ cāvagīto jāta iti / tato durmanāḥ svagṛham āgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:799_3: dvāram avamucya tāṃ bhāryāṃ dṛṣṭavān vanadevatām iva kusumitamadhye 'tīva vibhrājamānām* /
XXavsata_u:799_4: tataḥ pṛcchati: bhadre kim etat*? kiṃ kṛto rūpaviśeṣa iti /
XXavsata_u:799_7: yāvad asau dārikā krameṇa bhartāram anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitā /
XXavsata_u:799_8: tayā yujyamānayā ghaṭamānayā vyāyacchamānayā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:799_9: arhantī saṃvṛttā traidhātukavītarāgā samaloṣṭakāñcanā ākāśapāṇitalasamacittā vāsīcandanakalpā vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośā vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāptā bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhā /
XXavsata_u:799_10: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyā mānyā abhivādyā ca saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:799_11: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:799_13: yenāḍhye jātā / kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena virūpā saṃvṛttā,
XXavsata_u:799_15: bhagavān āha: gaṅgarasthayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:799_17: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:799_18: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:800_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamā śreṣṭhibhāryā caṇḍā rabhasā karkaśā /
XXavsata_u:800_1: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
XXavsata_u:800_2: yāvad anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhas tad gṛhaṃ praviṣṭo virūpaḥ /
XXavsata_u:800_3: sa tayā bahu paribhāṣya gṛhān niṣkāsitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:800_4: kenāyaṃ virūpo mama gṛhe praveśita iti /
XXavsata_u:800_5: tataḥ pratyekabuddhas tasyā anugrahārthaṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:800_7: yāvad asau kṣamitaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaś ca /
XXavsata_u:800_8: praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtam*: yan mayā pratyekabuddhaḥ paribhāṣitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:802_1: iyam asau gaṅgarasthā / yad anayā pratyekabuddhaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ,
XXavsata_u:802_4: tena virūpā saṃvṛttā / bhūyaḥ kāśyape bhagavati pravrajitā āsīt* /
XXavsata_u:802_5: tatrānayā paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalam āyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:802_8: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:802_9: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:802_12: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:806_0: samudraḥ sumanāś caiva hiraṇyapāṇis tripiṭena ca /
XXavsata_u:806_2: bhadriko rāṣṭrapālaś ca vargo bhavati samudditaḥ //
XXavsata_u:809_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:809_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:809_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato buddhir utpannā:
XXavsata_u:809_5: yāvad ahaṃ yuvā, tāvad dhanasaṃcayaṃ karomi / paścād vṛddhāvasthāyāṃ sukhaṃ parimokṣye iti /
XXavsata_u:809_7: ŚvaṇikśataŚ}* yānapātram ādāya bhāryāsahāyo mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:809_11: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam*:
XXavsata_u:809_12: yasmāt samudramadhye jātas tasmāt samudra iti nām /
XXavsata_u:809_13: yāvad asau sārthavāhaḥ svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsidhhayānapātro mahāsamudrāt pratyāgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:809_14: yadā samudro darako mahān saṃvṛttas tadā pitrā sārthavāhatve pratiṣṭhāpya pañcavaṇikchataparivāro *{Vaidya:
XXavsata_u:809_16: so 'nupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇo grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīpaṭṭanāny avalokayan samudratīram anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:809_17: sa pñcabhiḥ purāṇaśatair vahanaṃ bhṛtvā pañca pauruṣeyān* gṛhītvā āhāraṃ nāvikaṃ kaivartaṃ karṇadhāraṃ ca trir api ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:809_18: tatas teṣāṃ samudramadhyagatānāṃ kālikāvātena tad vahanam itaś cāmutaś ca paribhrāmyate /
XXavsata_u:809_21: tathāpi tad vahanaṃ vāyunā bhrāmyata eva /
XXavsata_u:809_22: yāvad anye vaṇijo devatāsahasrāṇy āyācituṃ pravṛttāḥ /
XXavsata_u:810_1: bhuvi ca tuvimagho yo viśvadevo maharṣiḥ /
XXavsata_u:810_2: vayam iha maraṇārtā vaḥ prapannāḥ sma śīghraṃ
XXavsata_u:810_3: vyasanam idam upetaṃ trātum icchantu sārtham* //
XXavsata_u:812_0: tatas teṣām evam api paridevamānānāṃ nāsti kaścit trātā /
XXavsata_u:812_2: sa uvāca: kiṃ vo bhavantaḥ ṣaṭ śāstāra anye ca devatāḥ kariṣyanti? buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pratyakṣadevataṃ bhāvena śaraṇaṃ prapadyadhvam* /
XXavsata_u:812_3: sa vas trātā bhaviṣyatīti / tataḥ samudrapramukhāni pañca vaṇikchatāni ekasvareṇa bhagavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapannāni /
XXavsata_u:812_4: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātam* /
XXavsata_u:812_5: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttānām ekārakṣāṇām śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:
XXavsata_u:812_6: ko hīyate ko vardhate kaḥ kṛcchraprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃkaṭaprāptaḥ kaḥ saṃbādhaprāptaḥ kaḥ kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptaḥ,
XXavsata_u:812_8: kam aham apāyād uddhṛtya svarge mokṣe ca pratiṣṭhāpayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:avs_81.1_1: na tu vaineyavatsānāṃ buddho velām atikramet //
XXavsata_u:813_0: yāvad bhagavatā jetavanāvasthitena sūryasahasrātirekaprabhāḥ kanakavarṇā marīcaya utsṛṣṭāḥ,
XXavsata_u:813_3: yāvat samudraḥ svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsiddhayānapātraḥ pratyāgatas tenaiva maraṇasaṃvegena dānapradānāni datvā bandhujanaṃ samāśvāsya śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakān saṃtarpya pañcavaṇikchataparivāro bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:813_4: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:813_5: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:813_6: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:813_7: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:813_8: āścaryaṃ bhadanta yad bhagavatā imāni samudrapramukhāni pañca vaṇikchatāni iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditāni,
XXavsata_u:813_9: vyasanāt paritrātāni, atyantaniṣṭe ca nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitānīti /
XXavsata_u:813_10: bhagavān āha: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ imāni samudrapramukhāni pañca vaṇikchatāni iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditāni,
XXavsata_u:815_0: vyasanāt paritrātāni, atyantaniṣṭe ca nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitānīti /
XXavsata_u:815_1: yat tu mayā atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ ime vaṇijaḥ paritrātāḥ /
XXavsata_u:815_2: tac chṛṇuta, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuruta,
XXavsata_u:815_3: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany anyatarasmin samudratīre pañcābhijñaḥ ṛṣiḥ prativasati,
XXavsata_u:815_5: agnihotrakaḥ) / sa ca kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalo vyasanagatānāṃ paritrātā /
XXavsata_u:815_8: tam ṛṣiṃ dṛṣṭvā prasādajātāni pādayor nipatya vijñāpayitum ārabdhāni:
XXavsata_u:815_9: yady asmākaṃ bhagavan samudramadhyagatānāṃ kiṃcid vyasanam utpadyate,
XXavsata_u:815_11: tenādhivāsitam*: evaṃ bhavatv iti / tatas te vaṇijo ratnāny ādāya jambudvīpābhimukhāḥ saṃprasthitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:815_15: bho maharṣe anena duṣkareṇa vyavasāyena kāruṇyabhāvāc ca kiṃ prārthayasa iti /
XXavsata_u:815_16: tenoktam*: andhe loke 'nāyake buddho bhūyāsam atīrṇānāṃ satvānāṃ tārayitā,
XXavsata_u:815_17: amuktānāṃ mocayitā, anāśvastānām āśvāsayitā, aparinirvṛtānāṃ parinirvāpayiteti /
XXavsata_u:815_18: tair uktam*: yadā tvaṃ buddho bhaves tadā asmān api samanvāharethā iti /
XXavsata_u:815_19: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena ṛṣir āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:815_20: ahaṃ saḥ / ye te vaṇijaḥ, ime te samudrapramukhās tadāpy ete mayā paritrātāḥ /
XXavsata_u:815_24: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:815_25: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:815_28: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:818_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
