XXavsata_u:818_1: śrāvastyām anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:820_0: ramate paricārayati / tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putrāḥ prajāyante ca mriyante ca /
XXavsata_u:820_4: etaṃ tāvad āyāciṣye: yadi me putro jāyate, asya paścācchramaṇaṃ dasyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:820_7: yadi me putro jāto jīvati, sthavirasya paścācchramaṇaṃ dasyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:820_8: sthavirāniruddhenoktam*: evam astu, kiṃ tu smartavyā te pratijñeti /
XXavsata_u:820_9: yāvad apareṇa samayena patnyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:820_10: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:820_13: dārako jātaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko divyasumanaḥkañcikayā prāvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:820_14: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā sumanā iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam* /
XXavsata_u:820_15: tataḥ sthavirāniruddham antargṛhe bhaktenopanimantrya sa dārako niryātitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:820_17: yadā saptavarṣo jātas tadā mātāpitṛbhyāṃ sthavirāya dattaḥ /
XXavsata_u:820_19: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:820_20: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:820_21: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:820_22: sa ca tīkṣṇendriyaḥ / yadā pāṃsukūlaṃ pratisaṃskaroti,
XXavsata_u:820_23: tadā ekaikasmin* sūcīpradeśe aṣṭau vimokṣān samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca /
XXavsata_u:820_25: gaccha putraka, nadyā ajiravatyā udakam ānayeti /
XXavsata_u:820_26: tataḥ sumanāḥ śramaṇoddeśo ghaṭam ādāyājiravatīm avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:820_27: tatra snātvā udakasya ghaṭaṃ pūrayitvā vihāyasaṃ prasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:820_28: agrato ghaṭo gacchati, tataḥ sumanāḥ śramaṇoddeśaḥ /
XXavsata_u:820_29: tasmiṃś ca samaye bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
XXavsata_u:820_31: imaṃ paśya śāriputra śramaṇoddeśam āgacchantam udakasya ghaṭaṃ pūrayitvā smṛtimantaṃ susamāhitendriyam* /
XXavsata_u:821_0: hitvā rāgaṃ ca dveṣaṃ ca abhidhyāṃ ca virāgayan* /
XXavsata_u:822_0: yadā bhagavatā sumanāḥ śramaṇoddeśo bhikṣusaṃghasya purastāt stutaḥ praśastaś ca,
XXavsata_u:822_2: kāni bhadanta sumanasā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni,
XXavsata_u:822_3: yenābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko divyayā ca sumanasāṃ kañcukayā prāvṛtto jātaḥ,
XXavsata_u:822_4: tīkṣnendriyaḥ, arhatvaṃ ca prāptam iti / sumanasaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:822_6: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:822_7: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_81.2_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:823_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:823_2: yāvad anyatamaḥ sārtavāhaḥ / tasya taruṇāvasthāyāṃ pravrajyācittam utpannam* /
XXavsata_u:823_4: yadā vṛddho bhūtas tadā tasya vipratisāro jātaḥ:
XXavsata_u:823_5: na me śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yad ahaṃ bhagavacchāsane na pravrajita iti /
XXavsata_u:823_7: vipaśyī ca samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:823_8: tataḥ tena pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:823_9: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlema cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca anāgatān samyaksaṃbuddhānām ārāgayeyam* /
XXavsata_u:823_15: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:823_16: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:823_19: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:826_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:826_1: śrāvastyām anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
XXavsata_u:828_0: vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī / na cāsya putro na duhitā / sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:828_2: na me putro na duhitā / mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:828_4: devatārādhanaṃ kuruṣveti / asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:828_5: tac ca naivam* / yady evam abhaviṣyat*, ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:828_6: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:828_7: katameṣāṃ trayāṇām* / mātāpitarāu raktau bhavataḥ saṃnipatitau,
XXavsata_u:828_8: mātā kalyā bhavati ṛtumatī, gandharvaś ca pratyupasthito bhavati /
XXavsata_u:828_9: eteṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:828_11: anyatamaś ca satvo 'nyatamasmād devanikāyāc cyutvā tasya prajāpatyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:828_13: katame pañca / raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti, viraktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti / kālaṃ jānāti ṛtuṃ jānāti / garbham avakrāntaṃ jānāti / yasya sakāśād garbho 'vakrāmati taṃ jānāti /
XXavsata_u:828_14: dārakaṃ jānāti / dārikāṃ jānāti / saced dārako bhavati dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:828_15: {saced dārikā bhavati vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:828_17: diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhase / āpannasatvāsmi saṃvṛttā / yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati niyataṃ dārako bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:828_19: atyunnamayya) dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya udānam udānayati:
XXavsata_u:828_21: jāto me syān nāvajātaḥ / kṛtyāni me kurvīta / bhṛtaḥ pratibibhṛyāt / dāyād yaṃ pratipadyeta / kulavaṃśo me cirasthitikaḥ syāt* /
XXavsata_u:828_22: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā asmākaṃ nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyati:
XXavsata_u:828_23: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:828_25: śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair nātikaṣāyais tiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukakaṣāyavivarjitair āhāraiḥ /
XXavsata_u:828_26: hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharāṃ bhūmim* /
XXavsata_u:828_27: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
XXavsata_u:828_28: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:828_31: yadā tad apanītaṃ bhavati tadā anyat prādurbhavati /
XXavsata_u:828_32: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:828_34: jñātayaḥ ūcuḥ: yasmād asya jātamātrasya pāṇidvaye lakṣaṇāhataṃ karmavipākajaṃ dīnāradvayaṃ prādurbhūtam*,
XXavsata_u:828_35: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya hiraṇyapāṇir iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:828_36: hiraṇyapāṇir dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:828_37: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:828_39: sa śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśaya ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko
XXavsata_u:830_4: yena tān saṃtarpayati / tasya yaśasā sarvā śrāvastī āpūrṇā /
XXavsata_u:830_5: yāvad hiraṇyapāṇir dārako 'pareṇa samayena jetavanaṃ nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:830_6: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:830_8: prasādajātaś ca bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:830_11: icchāmy aham ācārya bhagavataḥ saśrāvakasaṃghasya bhaktaṃ kartum iti /
XXavsata_u:830_13: tato hiraṇyapāṇinā buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṃghasya purastāt sthitvā pāṇidvayaṃ prasārya hiraṇyasuvarṇasya mahān rāśiḥ sthāpitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:830_14: yaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃghasthaviro 'nye ca bhikṣavaḥ sthavirānandaś ca paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:830_15: tato hiraṇyapāṇir dārako buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhojayitvā bhagavataḥ purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:830_16: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:830_17: yāṃ śrutvā hiraṇyapāṇidārikeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:830_18: dṛṣṭasatyo jñātīnāṃ bhāgasaṃvibhāgaṃ kṛtvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇkṛpaṇanīpakān saṃtarpya mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:830_19: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:830_20: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:830_21: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:830_22: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:830_26: bhagavān āha: hiraṇyapāṇinaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:830_28: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:830_29: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_83.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:831_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ
XXavsata_u:833_1: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:833_2: atha kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgnir nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:833_3: tasya rājñā kṛkiṇā śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā samantayojanaś catūratnamayaḥ stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ krośam uccatvena /
XXavsata_u:833_4: tatra ca stūpamahe vartamāne dyūtakareṇa dīnāradvayaṃ tasmin stūpe yaṣṭyāṃ samāropitam* /
XXavsata_u:833_6: yatra yatra jāyeya, tatra tatra hastagatenaiva suvarṇeneti /
XXavsata_u:833_7: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena dyūtakara āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:833_8: ayaṃ sa hiraṇyapāṇiḥ / yad anena stūpe dīnāradvayaṃ samāropitam*,
XXavsata_u:833_10: yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tenedānīm arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:833_11: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:833_12: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:833_15: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:836_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:836_1: tena khalu samayena śrāvastyāṃ rājā prasenajit kauśalo rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca {subhikṣaṃ ca} ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* /
XXavsata_u:836_3: yāvad asau devyā saha krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:836_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:836_5: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:836_6: dārako jātaḥ kāṣāyavastraṃ prāvṛtya śramaṇaveṣadhārī jātismaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:836_7: sa jātamātraḥ pṛcchati: kiṃ bhagavān ihaiva śrāvastyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanakāśyapānandaprabhṛtayo vā mahāśrāvakā iti /
XXavsata_u:836_9: putraka bhagavān ihaiva śrāvastyāṃ mahāśrāvakāś ceti /
XXavsata_u:836_11: putras te jātaḥ / kāṣāyavastraṃ prāvṛtya śramaṇaveṣadhārī jātismaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:836_12: sa bhagavato mahāśrāvakāṇāṃ ca pravṛttim anveṣata iti /
XXavsata_u:836_13: tato rājñā prasenajitā tasyānugrahāryaṃ bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃgho bhaktenopanimantritaḥ /
XXavsata_u:836_14: atha bhagavān bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena rājñaḥ prasenajito bhaktābhisāras tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:836_15: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:836_16: tato rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ putram utsaṅge kṛtvā bhagavato darśayati:
XXavsata_u:836_17: ayaṃ me bhagavan putro jātamātra eṣa
XXavsata_u:838_0: bhagavantaṃ smarati, mahāśrāvakāṃś ceti / tato bhagavāṃs taṃ kumāram āmantrayate:
XXavsata_u:838_1: ārogyaṃ te tripiṭeti / sa kathayati: vande tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham iti /
XXavsata_u:838_2: tato rājā prasenajit param vismayam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:838_3: yadā saptavarṣo jātas tadā bhagavacchāsane pravrajitas tair eva kāṣāyaiḥ prāvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:838_4: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:838_5: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:838_6: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:838_7: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:838_11: bhagavān āha: tripiṭenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:838_13: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:838_14: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_84.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:839_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:839_1: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:839_2: yāvad rājñaḥ kṛkiṇaḥ putra ṛṣipatanaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:839_3: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:839_5: sa prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:839_6: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī saṃsāravairāgyikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:839_7: yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāre doṣadarśī nirvāṇe guṇadarśī bhūtvā rājānaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa:
XXavsata_u:839_9: rājovāca: na śakyam etan mayā kartum* /
XXavsata_u:839_11: kumāraḥ kathayati: alaṃ me rājyena bahudoṣaduṣṭadharmasaṃpannena /
XXavsata_u:839_13: sa pitrā nānujñātaḥ / tenaiko bhaktacchedaḥ kṛtaḥ, dvau trayo vā yāvat ṣaḍ bhaktacchedāḥ kṛtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:839_16: mā haiva kālaṃ kariṣyatīti / tato rājñā putraḥ pratijñāṃ
XXavsata_u:840_0: karitaḥ: tāvat te 'smākaṃ darśanaṃ na deyam*,
XXavsata_u:840_2: yāvad asau pitaram anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:840_3: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena nacireṇa trayaḥ piṭakā adhītāḥ /
XXavsata_u:840_5: tasyaitad abhavat*: yanv ahaṃ pūrvikāṃ pratijñāṃ niryātayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:840_6: sa pituḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ / sa pṛṣṭaś ca: kiṃ putra asti kiṃcid adhītam iti? tenoktam*:
XXavsata_u:840_7: trayaḥ piṭakā iti / tatas tena pitus tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:840_11: tenoktam*: icchāmy ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ saśrāvakasaṃgham upanimantrya ṣaḍbhiḥ pariṣkārair ācchādayitum iti /
XXavsata_u:840_12: rājā kathayati: yatheṣṭaṃ kuruṣva, vistīrṇaṃ rājakulam iti / tatas tripiṭena bhagavān viṃśatisahasraparivāraḥ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:840_13: ekaikaś ca bhikṣuḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pariṣkārair ācchāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:840_15: yan mayā idānīṃ kṛcchreṇa pravrajyā pratilabdhā,
XXavsata_u:840_17: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatra yatra jāyeya tatra tatra kāṣāyavastraprāvṛta eva śramaṇaveṣadhārī jātismaraś ca syām iti /
XXavsata_u:840_18: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena kṛkiṇaḥ putraḥ,
XXavsata_u:840_19: ayaṃ tripiṭaḥ / tenaiva hetunā āḍhye rājakule putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko jātismaraś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:840_20: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:840_21: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:840_24: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:843_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:843_1: śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ sārthavāha āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:843_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:843_4: tena khalu samayena durbhikṣam abhūt kṛcchram* /
XXavsata_u:845_0: naimittikaiś ca nirdiṣṭo devo na varṣiṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:845_2: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:845_4: yatra ca divase dārako jātas tatraiva divase 'nāvṛṣṭir bhagnā /
XXavsata_u:845_6: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:845_8: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya samantād yaśo visṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:845_9: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya yaśomitra iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:845_10: yaśomitro dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:845_11: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:845_13: yadā yaśomitro mahān saṃvṛttas tadā jetavanaṃ nirgataḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena /
XXavsata_u:845_14: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:845_16: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:845_17: tasya bhagavatā tādṛśī saṃsāravairāgyikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:845_18: yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāradoṣadarśī nirvāṇaguṇadarśī bhūtvā mātapitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:845_19: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:845_20: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:845_21: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:845_23: yenāsya tṛṣā na bādhate / yadā nidāghakāle bhikṣavas tṛṣārtāḥ pānakasyārthe saṃgham avataranti,
XXavsata_u:845_24: tadāpy asau nāvatarati / tato 'sya supremakā bhikṣavaḥ pṛcchanti:
XXavsata_u:845_25: kena hetunā bhavatas tṛṣā na bādhata iti /
XXavsata_u:845_26: sa kathayati: mamaitābhyāṃ daṃṣṭrābhyām aṣṭāṅgopetaṃ pānīyaṃ prasravati,
XXavsata_u:845_27: yena na me tṛṣā bādhatā iti /
XXavsata_u:845_28: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:845_33: bhagavān āha: yaśomitreṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:845_35: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:845_36: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_85.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:847_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:847_1: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:847_2: yāvad anyataraḥ śreṣṭhiputro 'nyatarasya vṛddhabhikṣoḥ sakāśe pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:847_5: sa upasthāyakam ātmānaṃ matvā vṛddhatarāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ sakāśād upasthānaṃ svīkaroti /
XXavsata_u:847_10: tṛṣā trāsitaḥ) svakaṃ kamaṇḍalukam upagṛhya pānīyaṃ pāsyāmīti paśyati nirudakam* /
XXavsata_u:847_11: evam ācāryopādhyāyānām* / yāvat sāṃghikaṃ pānīyamaṇḍapam avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:847_12: tad api nirudakaṃ paśyati / yāvan nadīcārikām avatīrṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:847_13: sāpi nirudakā saṃvṛttā / sa udvignaḥ svakānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇām udvejanārthaṃ śraddhādeyasya ca gurutvasaṃdarśanārtham*,
XXavsata_u:847_15: pare vṛkṣaḥ), tatra śāṭakaṃ baddhvā samabhirūḍhaḥ,
XXavsata_u:847_17: karmapratisaraṇāvasthitaḥ) / yāvad dvitīye divase prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām etad vṛttāntaṃ sabrahmacāriṇām ārocayati /
XXavsata_u:847_21: tad api na paśyati / tenāpi saṃvignena bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya niveditam* /
XXavsata_u:847_22: bhagavatā kāśyapenoktaḥ: gaṇḍīr ākoṭyatām iti / tata upadhivārikeṇa gaṇḍīr ākoṭitā /
XXavsata_u:847_24: eṣa vṛttānto vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ samantato visṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:847_26: yāvad upādhyāyena vṛddhānte niṣādayitvā udakapurṇā kuṇḍikā dattā /
XXavsata_u:847_28: sa pratyakṣaphaladarśī tenaiva saṃvegena buddhe bhagavti śrāvakeṣu ca prasādam utpādya tīvreṇāśayena tad udakaṃ saṃghe cāritavān* /
XXavsata_u:847_29: tato bhagavatā tasyānugrahārthaṃ gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya bhītānām āśvāsanakareṇa tad udakaṃ gṛhītaṃ mahāśrāvakaiś ca /
XXavsata_u:847_30: na ca kṣīyate / yāvat sarvasaṃghe cāritam*, tadāpi na kṣīyate / tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:847_33: tadā tena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ pānīyenālpotsukaḥ kṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:847_34: dvādaśa varṣasahasrāṇi tena saṃghe pānīyaṃ cāritam* /
XXavsata_u:847_36: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ:
XXavsata_u:847_37: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
XXavsata_u:847_39: daṃṣṭrāntarāc ca me 'ṣṭāṅgopetaṃ pānīyaṃ nirgacched iti /
XXavsata_u:849_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena bhikṣur āsīt,
XXavsata_u:849_1: ayaṃ saḥ / yat tena dvādaśa varṣasahasrāṇi saṃghe pānīyaṃ cāritam*,
XXavsata_u:849_2: praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtam*, teneha janmani daṃṣṭrāntarād aṣṭāṅgopetam pānīyaṃ nirgacchati /
XXavsata_u:849_4: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:849_5: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:849_8: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:852_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu varṣā upagataḥ pāṇḍukambalaśilāyāṃ pārijātasya kovidārasya nātidūre /
XXavsata_u:852_2: anyeṣāṃ ca devānām* / tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ śrāvastyāṃ varṣā upagato jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:852_3: atha catasraḥ parṣado yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ,
XXavsata_u:852_5: catasraḥ parṣada āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano dharmakathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
XXavsata_u:852_6: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
XXavsata_u:852_7: atha catasraḥ parṣada utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:852_8: kaccit te bhadanta mahāmaudgalyāyana śrutaṃ kutra bhagavān etarhi varṣā upagata iti /
XXavsata_u:852_9: mahāmaudgalyāyana āha: śrutaṃ me bhavanto bhagavān deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu varṣā upagataḥ,
XXavsata_u:852_13: atha catasraḥ parṣadaḥ āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:852_14: atha catasraḥ parṣadas trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇām atyayād yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:852_15: upasaṃkramyāyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ /
XXavsata_u:852_16: catasraḥ parṣada āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:853_0: saṃpraharṣayati / anekaparyāyeṇa dhamyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm* /
XXavsata_u:853_1: atha catasraḥ parṣada utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:853_9: upasaṃkramyāsmākaṃ vacanena bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandasva,
XXavsata_u:853_10: alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛccha, alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:853_11: evaṃ ca vada: jambūdvīpe bhadanta catasraḥ parṣada ākāṅkṣanti bhagavato darśanam* /
XXavsata_u:853_12: evaṃ cāhuḥ: nāsti khalu bhadanta jambūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tadrūpā ṛddhir vā anubhāvo vā yena jambūdvīpakā manuṣyā devāṃs trāyastriṃśān (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:853_14: asti khalu devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ tadrūpā ṛddhiś cānubhāvaś ca,
XXavsata_u:853_15: yena devās trāyastriṃśā jambūdvīpam avatareyur bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramaṇāya paryupāsanāya /
XXavsata_u:853_16: sādhu bhagavān devebhyas trāyastriṃśebhyo jambūdvīpam avatared anukampām upādāyeti /
XXavsata_u:853_17: adhivāsayaty āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaś catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ tūṣṇībhāvena /
XXavsata_u:853_18: atha catasraḥ parṣada āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya tūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanebhyaḥ prakrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:853_19: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano 'ciraprakrāntāś catasraḥ parṣado viditvā tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃkuñcitaṃ vā bāhuṃ prasārayet*,
XXavsata_u:853_20: prasāritaṃ vā saṃkuñcayet*, evam evāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ śrāvastyām antarhito deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣu pratyaṣṭhāt pāṇdukambalaśilāyāṃ pārijātasya kovidārasya nātidūre /
XXavsata_u:853_21: tena khalu samayena bhagavān anekaśatāyā devaparṣado dharmaṃ deśayati /
XXavsata_u:853_22: adrākṣīc ca mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavantam anekaśatāyā devaparṣadaḥ purastān niṣaṇṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantam* /
XXavsata_u:853_24: ihāpi bhagavān ākīrṇo viharati tadyathā jambūdvīpe catasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhir iti /
XXavsata_u:853_25: atha bhagavān āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya cetasā cittam ājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:853_27: api tu yadā me evaṃ bhavati: āgacchantv iti, tadā āgacchanti / yadā me evaṃ bhavati: gacchantv iti, tadā gacchanti / iti me cetasā cittam ājñāya āgacchanti ca gacchanti /
XXavsata_u:853_29: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:853_30: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān maudgalyāyanaḥ sarvāṃ devaparṣadam avalokya bhagavantam idam avocat:
XXavsata_u:853_32: santy asyāṃ devaparṣadi devatā yā buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ kāyasya bhedād ihopapannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:853_33: santi dharme, santi saṃghe, santi āryakāntaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ,
XXavsata_u:855_0: atha bhagavān āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya bhāṣitam anuvarṇayann āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:855_1: evam etan maudgalyāyana, evam evam etat* / vicitrā bateyaṃ devaparṣat saṃniṣaṇṇā saṃnipatitā /
XXavsata_u:855_2: santy asyāṃ devatā yā buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ,
XXavsata_u:855_3: kāyasya bhedād ihopapannāḥ / santi dharme, santi saṃghe, santi āryakāntaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ,
XXavsata_u:855_4: atha śakro śakro devānām indro bhagavata āyuṣmataś ca mahāmaudgalyāyanasya bhāṣitam anuvarṇayann āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:855_6: evam etat* / vicitrā bateyaṃ devaparṣat saṃniṣaṇṇā saṃnipatitā /
XXavsata_u:855_9: kāyasya bhedād ihopapannāḥ / santi dharme, santi saṃghe, santy āryakāntaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ,
XXavsata_u:855_10: athānyatamo devaputro bhagavata āyuṣmataś ca mahāmaudgalyāyanasya śakrasya ca devānām indrasya bhāṣitam anuvarṇayann āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:855_12: evam etat* / vicitrā bateyaṃ devaparṣat saṃniṣaṇṇā saṃnipatitā /
XXavsata_u:855_14: yā buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ kāyasya bhedād ihopapannāḥ /
XXavsata_u:855_15: santi dharme, santi saṃghe / santi āryakāntaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ kāyasya bhedād ihopapannā iti /
XXavsata_u:855_16: tatrānekāni devatāśatāni anekāni devatāsahasrāṇy anekāni devatāśatasahasrāṇi bhagavataḥ purastāt pratyekaṃ pratyekaṃ srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtya tatraivāntarhitāni /
XXavsata_u:855_17: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ praviviktāṃ devaparṣadaṃ viditvā ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:855_18: jambūdvīpe bhadanta catasraḥ parṣado bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vandante alpābādhatāṃ ca pṛcchanti,
XXavsata_u:855_19: alpātaṅkatāṃ ca laghūtthānatāṃ ca yātrāṃ ca balaṃ ca sukhaṃ cānavadyatāṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:855_20: bhagavān āh: sukhino maudgalyāyana bhavantu jambūdvīpe catasraḥ parṣadas tvaṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:855_21: mahāmaudgalyāyana āha: jambūdvīpe bhadanta catasraḥ parṣada ākāṅkṣanti bhagavato darśanam* /
XXavsata_u:855_22: evaṃ cāhuḥ: nāsti bhadanta jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tadrūpā ṛddhir vā anubhāvo vā yena jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā devāṃs trāyastriṃśān abhiroheyur bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya /
XXavsata_u:855_23: asti tu bhadanta devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ tadrūpā ṛddhiś cānubhāvaś ca,
XXavsata_u:855_24: yena devās trāyastriṃśā jambūdvīpam avatareyur bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya /
XXavsata_u:855_25: sādhu bhagavān devebhyaś trāyastriṃśebhyo 'vatared anukampām upādāya /
XXavsata_u:855_26: bhagavān āha: tena hi tvaṃ gaccha maudgalyāyana jambūdvīpam* /
XXavsata_u:855_28: avatariṣyati bhavanto bhagavān itaḥ saptame divase devebhyas trāyastriṃśebhyo jambūdvīpaṃ sāṃkāśye nagare āpajjure dāve udumbaramūle iti /
XXavsata_u:855_29: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya pādau śirasā vanditvā tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ saṃpanno yathā samāhite citte tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃkuñcitaṃ bāhuṃ prasārayet*,
XXavsata_u:857_0: prasāritaṃ vā saṃkuñcayet*, evam evāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano deveṣu trāyastriṃśeṣv antarhitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:857_1: jambūdvīpe pratyaṣṭhāt* / athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano jambūdvīpam āgatya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadām ārocayati:
XXavsata_u:857_2: avatariṣyati bhavanto bhagavān itaḥ saptame divase devebhyas trāyastriṃśebhyo jambūdvīpaṃ sāṃkāśye nagare āpajjure dāve udumbaramūle iti /
XXavsata_u:857_3: avatīrṇo bhagavāṃs tataḥ saptame divase devebhyas trāyastriṃśebhyaḥ sāṃkāśye nagare āpajjure dāve udumbaramūle /
XXavsata_u:857_5: tadā anekāni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bhagavato darśanāya saṃnipatitāni /
XXavsata_u:857_7: tena bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghas te ca devāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā bhaktenopanimantritāḥ /
XXavsata_u:857_8: yāvad gaṇḍīdeśanākāle sahacittotpādād divyāny āsanāny udārapaṭācchāditāni prādurbhūtāni,
XXavsata_u:857_9: divyāni ca bhakṣyabhojyāni / tata upapādukena bhagavān divyenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:857_11: tato 'sya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:857_12: yāṃ śrutvopapādukena bhikṣuṇā idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:857_13: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:857_14: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:857_15: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:857_17: yenopapādukaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ? sahacittotpādāc cāsya yac cintayati,
XXavsata_u:857_18: tat prārthayate, tat sarvaṃ saṃṛdhyatīti / bhagavān āha: upapādukenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:857_20: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:857_21: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_86.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:858_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:858_2: yāvad anyatarasmin grāmake 'raṇyāyatane pañca bhikṣavo varṣā upagatāḥ tatraikena bhikṣuṇā caturṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:860_1: tair yujyamānair ghaṭamānair vyāyacchamānaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:860_4: anena me kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca pravrajitasya upakaraṇaviśeṣair avaikalyaṃ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:860_5: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena vaiyāvṛtyaṃ kṛtavān*,
XXavsata_u:860_6: ayaṃ sa upapāduka iti / bhikṣava ūcuḥ: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yenopapādukaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ? bhagavān āha:
XXavsata_u:860_7: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:860_8: viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi) prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:860_9: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:860_10: tatrānyataraḥ śreṣṭhī / tasya bhāryā prasavakāle duḥkhavedanābhibhūtā ārtasvarā kradanti /
XXavsata_u:860_11: sa taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā paraṃ saṃvegam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:860_12: sa śokāgāraṃ praviśya kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:860_13: tasya buddhir utpannā: yanv ahaṃ bhagavacchāsane pravrajya praṇidhānaṃ kuryām*,
XXavsata_u:860_15: sa tenaiva saṃvegena bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya pravacane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:860_16: tena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatra yatra jāyeya,
XXavsata_u:860_19: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena sārthavāha āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:860_20: ayaṃ sa upapādukaḥ / yat praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*, tenopapādukaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ / yat tatrānenendriyāṇi paripācitāni,
XXavsata_u:860_22: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:860_23: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:860_26: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:863_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kapilavastuni viharati nyagrodhārāme /
XXavsata_u:863_1: kapilavastuni anyatamaḥ śākya āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:863_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:863_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:865_0: aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:865_1: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
XXavsata_u:865_4: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:865_6: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya janmani kapilavastu nagaraṃ samantataḥ śobhitam*,
XXavsata_u:865_7: tasmād asya bhavatu śobhita iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:865_8: śobhito dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:865_9: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:865_11: sa yadā mahān samvṛttas tadā nyagrodhārāmaṃ gato bhagavato darśanāya /
XXavsata_u:865_12: dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:865_14: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:865_15: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:865_16: yāṃ śrutvā śobhitena dārakeṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:865_17: sa dṛṣṭasatyo mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:865_18: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:865_19: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:865_20: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:865_21: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:865_23: yenābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko 'tikrānto mānuṣavarṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam*,
XXavsata_u:865_25: yaiḥ kapilavastu nagaraṃ samantataḥ śobhitam*? bhagavān āha:
XXavsata_u:865_26: śobhitenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:865_28: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:865_29: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_87.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:867_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe catvāriṃśadvarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ krakucchando nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:867_3: yāvat kasmiṃścit parvaṇi pratyupasthite goṣṭhikāḥ stūpasamīpaṃ gatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:867_4: tais taṃ stūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā pasādajātaiḥ puṣpāropaṇaṃ kartum ārabdham* /
XXavsata_u:867_6: ahaṃ na karomi, mama vibhavo nāstīti / sa taiś ca goṣṭhikamadhyān niṣkāsitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:867_7: tasya vipratisāro jātaḥ / tena vicitrapuṣpasaṃgrahaṃ kṛtvā tasminn eva stūpe puṣpāropaṇaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:867_8: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena goṣṭhika āsīt,
XXavsata_u:867_9: yena vipratisārajātena krakucchandasya keśanakhastūpe puṣpāripaṇaṃ kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:867_10: ayam asau śobhitaḥ / anyāny api hi bhikṣavaḥ śobhitena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
XXavsata_u:867_11: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī /
XXavsata_u:867_13: tataḥ prasādajātena pādayor nipatya piṇḍakena pratipāditaḥ paṭena cācchāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:867_14: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena śreṣṭhī,
XXavsata_u:867_15: ayaṃ śobhitaḥ / bhūyaḥ kāśyape bhagavati daridro 'bhūt kāṣṭhahārakaḥ /
XXavsata_u:867_17: tena stūpo dṛṣṭaḥ / tatra ca stūpāṅgaṇe tṛṇāni jātāni /
XXavsata_u:867_18: tatas tena prasādajātena tṛṇāny utpāṭya saṃmārjanīṃ gṛhītvā stūpāṅgaṇaṃ ca saṃmṛṣṭam* /
XXavsata_u:867_19: tataḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:867_20: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deydharmaparityāgena ca abhirūpaḥ syāṃ darśanīyaḥ prasādikaḥ,
XXavsata_u:867_21: anāgatāṃś ca buddhān ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:867_22: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena kāṣṭhahāraka āsīt,
XXavsata_u:867_23: ayam evāsau śobhitaḥ / yad anena stūpāṅgaṇaṃ saṃmṛṣṭam*,
XXavsata_u:867_24: tena yatra yatra jātas tatra tatrābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prasādikaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:867_26: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:867_27: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:867_30: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:870_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:872_1: tena khalu samayena dakṣiṇāpathe kalpo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* /
XXavsata_u:872_3: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:872_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
XXavsata_u:872_5: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā kapphiṇa iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam* /
XXavsata_u:872_6: kapphiṇo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:872_7: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:872_9: yasminn eva divase kapphiṇaḥ kumāro jātaḥ,
XXavsata_u:872_10: tasminn eva divase aṣṭādaśānām amātyasahasrāṇāṃ putrā jātāḥ,
XXavsata_u:872_11: sarve mahānagnāḥ / teṣāṃ pratirūpāṇi nāmāni vyavasthāpitāni /
XXavsata_u:872_15: athāpareṇa samayena rājā mahākapphiṇo 'ṣṭādaśāmātyasahasraparivṛto mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:872_16: purastāt pṛṣṭhataś ca sarvabalaugham avalokyāmātyān āmantrayate:
XXavsata_u:872_17: asti bhavantaḥ kasyacid evaṃrūpo balaughaḥ tadyathā mamaivaitarhīti? tataḥ priyavādibhir amātyair abhihitam*:
XXavsata_u:872_18: deva nānyasya kasyacid iti / atha madhyadeśād vaṇijo dakṣiṇāpathaṃ gatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:872_20: rājñā uktāḥ: bho vaṇijaḥ, kas tatra rājeti / vaṇijaḥ kathayanti: deva kecid deśā gaṇādhīnāḥ kecid rājādhīnā iti /
XXavsata_u:872_21: yāvad rājñā mahākapphiṇena śrāvastyādiṣu ṣaṭsu mahānagareṣu dūtasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:872_23: śīghram āgantavyam*, anyathā va uttamena daṇḍena samanuśāsiṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:872_24: etad vacanam upaśrutya ṣaṇmahānagaravāsino rājāno bhītās trastāḥ saṃvignā āhṛṣṭaromakūpāḥ saṃgamya samāgamya ekasamūhena śrāvastīm anuprāptāḥ /
XXavsata_u:872_25: tato bhagavatsakāśaṃ gatāḥ / taiḥ sa vṛttānto bhagavato vistareṇa niveditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:872_26: bhagavatā te samāśvāsitāḥ, uktāś ca: sa dūto matsakāśam ānetavya iti /
XXavsata_u:872_28: tato bhagavatā dūtāgamanam avetya jetavanaṃ catūratnamayam nirmitaṃ devānām iva sudarśanaṃ nagaram* /
XXavsata_u:872_30: airāvatasadṛśā hastinaḥ, bālāhakasadṛśā aśvāḥ, nandīghoṣasadṛśā rathāḥ, vyāḍayakṣsadṛśā manuṣyāḥ / svayaṃ ca bhagavatā cakravartiveṣo nirmitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:872_31: saptatālodgataṃ ca simḥāsanaṃ yatra bhagavān niṣaṇṇāḥ /
XXavsata_u:872_32: tato dūtas tathāvidhāṃ śobhāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:872_33: tato bhagavatā lekhaṃ lekhayitvā sa dūto 'bhihitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:874_0: athavā nāgacchasi, aham eva mahatā balaughena sārdham āgamiṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:874_1: tato dūtena gatvā rājño mahākapphiṇasya lekhaṃ vācikaṃ ca yat saṃdiṣṭaṃ tat sarvaṃ niveditam* /
XXavsata_u:874_2: tataḥ kapphiṇo rājā aṣṭādaśāmātyagaṇasahasraparivṛto 'nupūrveṇa cañcūryamāṇaḥ śrāvastīm anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:874_3: prātisīmāś ca rājāno rājānaṃ mahākapphiṇaṃ pratyudgatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:874_6: tato bhagavatā tasyāgamanam avetya jetavanaṃ catūratnamayaṃ nirmitaṃ devānām iva sudarśanaṃ nagaram* /
XXavsata_u:874_8: airāvatasadṛśā hastinaḥ, bālāhakasadṛśā aśvāḥ, nandīghoṣasadṛśā rathāḥ, vyāḍayakṣasadṛśā manuṣyāḥ / svayaṃ ca bhagavatā cakravartiveṣo nirmitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:874_9: saptatālodgataṃ ca siṃhāsanaṃ sarvaṃ tathaiva nirmitam* /
XXavsata_u:874_12: aiśvarye aiśvaryamadaḥ, sa prativigataḥ / baladarpo 'dyāpi pratibādhata eva /
XXavsata_u:874_14: aho bata śakro devendra aindraṃ dhanur ādāya āgacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:874_15: sahacittotpādād bhagavataḥ śakro devendraḥ sārathiveṣeṇa aindraṃ dhanur upanāmayati /
XXavsata_u:874_17: tac ca rājā mahākapphiṇa utkraṣṭum api na śaknoti,
XXavsata_u:874_18: kutaḥ punar āropayiṣyati / tato bhagavatā saptāyobheryo nirmittāḥ /
XXavsata_u:874_19: svayaṃ ca tad dhanur ardhacandrākāreṇāropya śaraḥ kṣiptaḥ,
XXavsata_u:avs_88.1_1: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
XXavsata_u:avs_88.2_0: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
XXavsata_u:875_0: sa ca śabdo yāvad akaniṣṭhān devān gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:875_2: sa prativigataḥ / tasya buddhir utpannā: kim idam iti / tato bhagavān rājño mahākapphiṇasya cittaprakāram upalakṣya rājaveṣam antardhāpya idaṃ sūtram āradbhavān*:
XXavsata_u:875_3: daśabalasamanvāgato bhikṣavas tathāgato 'han samyaksaṃbuddhaś catur vaiśāradyaviśārada udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānīte,
XXavsata_u:875_5: yadutāsmin satīdaṃ bhavati, asyotpādād idam utpadyate / yaduta avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ /
XXavsata_u:875_10: sparśapratyayā vedanā / vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā / tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam* / upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ / bhavapratyayā jātiḥ / jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṃbhavanti /
XXavsata_u:875_11: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
XXavsata_u:877_9: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati /
XXavsata_u:877_11: uttāno vivṛtaś chinnaplotiko yāvad devamanuṣyebhyaḥ samyaksuprakāśitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:877_12: evaṃ svākhyāte me dharme uttāne vivṛte chinnaplotike yāvad devamanuṣyebhyaḥ samyaksuprakāśite yāvad alam eva bhikṣavaḥ śraddhāpravrajitena kulaputreṇa alaṃ yogāya alam apramādāya,
XXavsata_u:877_16: atha ca punar yat tadārabdhavīryeṇa prāptavyaṃ sthāmavatā vīryavatā utsāhinā dṛḍhaparākrameṇānikṣiptadhureṇa kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu,
XXavsata_u:877_18: tat kasya hetoḥ? duḥkhaṃ hi kusīdo viharati vyavakīrṇa,
XXavsata_u:877_19: pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ sāṃkleśikaiḥ paunarbhavikaiḥ sajvarair duḥkhavipākaiḥ āyatyāṃ jātijarāmaraṇīyaiḥ mahataś cārthasya parihāṇir bhavati /
XXavsata_u:877_20: ārabdhavīryas tu sukhaṃ viharaty avakīrṇaḥ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ sāṃkleśikaiḥ paunarbhavikaiḥ sajvarair duḥkhavipākaiḥ āyatyāṃ jātijarāmaraṇīyaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:877_22: maṇḍayeyam idaṃ pravacanaṃ yaduta śāstā ca saṃmukhībhūtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:877_23: dharmaś ca deśyata aupaśamikaḥ pārinirvāṇikaḥ saṃbodhigāmī sugatapraveditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:877_24: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ātmārthaṃ ca samanupaśyadbhiḥ parārthaṃ cobhayārthaṃ ca,
XXavsata_u:877_25: idaṃ pratisaṃśikṣitavyam: kaccin naḥ pravrajyā amoghā bhaviṣyati,
XXavsata_u:877_28: teṣāṃ ca te kārāḥ kṛtāḥ kaccid atyarthamahāphalā bhaviṣyanti,
XXavsata_u:877_31: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe rājñā mahākapphiṇena aṣṭādaśāmātyagaṇasahasraparivāreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:877_33: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:877_34: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:877_35: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:877_36: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:877_40: bhagavān āha: kapphiṇenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:879_1: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:879_2: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_88.3_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:880_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:880_1: sa bandhumatīṃ rājadhānīm upaniśritya viharati bandhumatīyake dāve /
XXavsata_u:880_2: yāvad anyatamena sārthavāhena mahāsamudrāt prabhūtāni ratnāny ānītāni /
XXavsata_u:880_4: vihāraṃ ca kārayitvā cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya bhikṣusaṃghāya niryātitavān* /
XXavsata_u:880_6: eṣa evāsau kapphiṇo rājā tena kālena tena samayena /
XXavsata_u:880_7: yad anena vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ saśrāvakasaṃghas traimāsyaṃ svāntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ,
XXavsata_u:880_8: vihāraṃ ca kārayitvā cāturdiśāya bhikṣusaṃghāya niryātitaḥ ### {tenedānīm abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ} ### aparāṇy api bhikṣavaḥ kapphiṇena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
XXavsata_u:880_9: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* /
XXavsata_u:880_12: saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu, haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukaśārikākokilajīvañjīvakanirghoṣite vanaṣaṇḍe aṣṭādaśāmātyagaṇasahasraparivṛta udyānaṃ nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:880_15: parinirvṛtasya ca śarīrastūpaṃ kārayitvā amātyagaṇasahāyena tailābhiṣeko dattaḥ /
XXavsata_u:880_20: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:880_21: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:880_24: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:883_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:883_1: yadā bhagavān ṣaḍvarṣābhisaṃbuddho dvādaśavarṣanirgataḥ kapilavastu anuprāptaḥ,
XXavsata_u:883_2: tadā droṇodanāmṛtodanapramukhair anekaiḥ śākyasahasraiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtaṃ sthāpayitvā rājānaṃ śuddhodanam* /
XXavsata_u:883_3: tato rājā śuddhodanas tāṃ putraśobhāṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:883_4: tasya buddhir utpannā: yadi me putro na pravrajito 'bhaviṣyat*,
XXavsata_u:883_5: so 'yam abhaviṣyad rājā cakravartī caturantavijetā dhārmiko dharmarājaḥ /
XXavsata_u:883_7: yanv ahaṃ śākyakulebhya ekaikaṃ pravrājayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:883_8: tato rājñā śuddhodanena nagare ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam*:
XXavsata_u:883_10: tataḥ sarvaśākyeṣu saṃnipatiteṣu rājā śuddhodanaḥ kathayati:
XXavsata_u:883_11: śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ śākyāḥ / yadi sarvārthasiddhaḥ kumāro na pravrajito 'bhaviṣyat*,
XXavsata_u:883_13: tad idānīm asya pravrajitasya ekaikena kulapuruṣeṇa śākyenopasthāyakena pravrajitavyam iti /
XXavsata_u:883_15: teṣām upālir nāma kalpaka upasthāyakaḥ tān pravrajitān dṛṣṭvā roditum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:883_16: tataḥ śākyaiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ: kimartham upāle rudyata iti /
XXavsata_u:883_18: yūyaṃ pravrajitāḥ / ko mamedānīṃ bhahtācchādanena paripālanaṃ kariṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:883_19: tataḥ śākyā ūcuḥ: tena hi upāle, paṭakaṃ prasārayeti / tena paṭakaḥ prasāritaḥ / tataḥ śākyaiḥ śarīrāvalagnānāṃ hārārdhahāramaṇimukhtāvaiḍūryakeyūrāṅgulīyakānāṃ mahān rāśiḥ kṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:883_20: tata upāleḥ kalpakasya tān dṛṣṭvā vicitraṃ cālaṃkāram abhivīkṣya yoniśo manasikāra utpannaḥ:
XXavsata_u:883_21: ime tāvac chākyāḥ kularūpayuvanavanto 'ntaḥpurāṇi imaṃ cālaṃkāraṃ kheṭavad utsṛjya pravrajitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:883_22: kim utāham alpavibhavaḥ imam alaṃkāraṃ gṛhaṃ neṣyāmi? alam anena /
XXavsata_u:883_25: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:883_27: labheyāhaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam*,
XXavsata_u:883_31: bhikṣuveṣadhārīṇi) buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṃghasya praṇāmaṃ kartúṃ pravṛttāni /
XXavsata_u:883_32: te upāliṃ jñātvā kularūpavibhavānvitatvān necchanty upāleḥ
XXavsata_u:885_0: praṇāmaṃ kartum* / tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ bhadrikam āmantrayate:
XXavsata_u:885_2: yasmād idaṃ māmakaṃ śāsanaṃ na kularūpayauvanaiśvaryacāturvarṇyaviśuddhim apekṣata iti /
XXavsata_u:885_3: tato mūlanikṛttā iva drumā bhadrikapramukhāni pañca śākyaśatāni dharmatām avalambya pādayor nipatitāni /
XXavsata_u:885_4: teṣām pādavandanasamakālam eveyaṃ mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitā /
XXavsata_u:885_5: tatrāyuṣmatā bhadrikeṇa yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:885_6: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:885_7: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:885_9: so 'pareṇa samayena pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ gocarāya prasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:885_11: tena khalu samayena rājā prasenajit kauśala ekapuṇḍarīkaṃ hastināgam abhiruhya dīrgheṇa cārāyaṇena sārathinā bhagavato darśanāya saṃprasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:885_12: dadarśa rājā prasenajit kauśalo bhadrikaṃ śāntendriyaṃ śāntamānasam*,
XXavsata_u:885_13: parameṇa ca cittadamavyupaśamanasamanvāgataṃ pāṃsukūlaprāvṛtaṃ lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā tasmāc caṇḍālakaṭhinān nirgacchantam* /
XXavsata_u:885_14: dṛṣṭvā ca punar dīrghaṃ cārāyaṇaṃ sārathim āmantrayate:
XXavsata_u:885_15: syād ayaṃ cārāyaṇa bhadriko bhikṣuḥ? evaṃ yathā vadasi /
XXavsata_u:885_16: iti śrutvā rājā prasenajit kauśalaḥ saṃmoham āpannaḥ,
XXavsata_u:885_19: tato rājā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam uvāca:
XXavsata_u:885_20: bhagavan, adbhutaṃ me dṛṣṭam* / asau bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ pāṃsukūlaprāvṛto lūhaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā devamanuṣyāvarjanakareṇātipraśānteneryāpathena piṇḍapātam ādāya caṇḍālakaṭhinān nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:885_21: tasya mamaitad abhavat*: āścarya yāvat suvinītaṃ bhagavacchāsanam*,
XXavsata_u:885_22: yatra nāma evaṃvidhāḥ kumārāḥ sukhaidhitā evaṃvinītapracārāḥ saṃvṛttā iti /
XXavsata_u:885_23: bhagavān āha: aparam api mahārāja bhadrikasyāścaryaṃ śṛṇu /
XXavsata_u:885_24: ayaṃ mahārāja bhadriko 'raṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā śūnyāgāragato vā trir udānayati:
XXavsata_u:885_25: aho bata saukhyam* / yad aham apravrajitaḥ san rājakulamadhyagato 'mātyanaigamajānapadasusaṃrakṣitaḥ prākāraparikhādvārastūpābhinigūḍhaḥ pariśaṅkitahṛdayaḥ saṃvignaḥ samantataḥśaṅkī nidrāṃ nāsādayāmi /
XXavsata_u:885_26: so 'ham etarhi nirapekṣaḥ kāye jīvite ca sukhaṃ yatratatrastho viharāmīti /
XXavsata_u:885_27: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:885_28: kāni bhadanta bhadrikeṇa pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni,
XXavsata_u:885_29: yenābhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādika āḍhye rājakule pratyājātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:885_31: bhagavān āha: bhadrikeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:887_0: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:887_1: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_89.1_0: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇi api kalpaśatair api /
XXavsata_u:avs_89.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:888_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ koṭṭamallakaḥ kṣutkṣāmaparigataśarīraḥ itaś cāmutaś cānvāhiṇḍate /
XXavsata_u:888_1: yāvad anyatarā dārikā pūpalikā ādāya gacchati /
XXavsata_u:888_2: tatas tena koṭṭamallakena sā dārikā pūpalikānām arthe abhibhūtā /
XXavsata_u:888_3: tato balād ekām pūpalikām ādāya itas tataḥ (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:888_7: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
XXavsata_u:888_8: tadā anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhas tasya koṭṭamallakasyāgrataḥ sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:888_9: tataḥ koṭṭamallasya taṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ śānteryāpathaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahān prasādo jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:888_10: tena svaṃ vyasanam agaṇayya pratyekabuddhāya pūpalikā pratipāditā /
XXavsata_u:888_11: tasya vipraharṣasaṃjananārthaṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājo gaganatalam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:888_12: tataḥ koṭṭamallakas tad atyadbhutaṃ devamanuṣyāvarjanakaraṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā mūlanikṛttā iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
XXavsata_u:888_13: yan me siddhavrato dakṣiṇīyaḥ pūpalikayā pratipāditaḥ,
XXavsata_u:888_14: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca yatra yatra jāyeya,
XXavsata_u:888_15: tatra tatroccakulīnaḥ syām*, evaṃvidhānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ lābhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:888_16: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:888_17: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena koṭṭamallakaḥ,
XXavsata_u:888_18: ayam asau bhadrikaḥ / yat tena pratyekabuddhaḥ pūlikayā pratipāditaḥ,
XXavsata_u:888_23: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:888_24: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:888_27: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:892_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ sthūlakoṣṭham upaniśritya viharati sthūlakoṣṭhakīye vanaṣaṇḍe /
XXavsata_u:892_1: tena khalu samayena sthūlakoṣṭhake kauravyo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam akhilam akaṇṭakam* /
XXavsata_u:892_3: tasya bhrātṛputro rāṣṭrapālo nāmnā abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ /
XXavsata_u:892_4: tasya vinayakālam avekṣya bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ sthūlakoṣṭhakaṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:892_5: dadarśa rāṣṭrapālo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:892_7: sa prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya pravrajyāṃ yācate /
XXavsata_u:892_8: tatas taṃ bhagavān āha: vatsa anujñāto 'si mātāpitṛbhyām iti? rāṣṭrapālaḥ kathayati:
XXavsata_u:892_9: no bhadanteti / bhagavān āha: na hi vatsa tathāgatā vā tathāgataśrāvakā vā anujñātaṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ pravrājayanti,
XXavsata_u:892_13: sphītaṃ cakravartirājyam apahāya pravrajitaḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ cāntaḥpurasahasrāṇi /
XXavsata_u:892_14: muṇḍaḥ saṃghāṭipravṛtto 'sminn eva sthūlakoṣṭhake piṇḍapātam aṭati /
XXavsata_u:892_16: yad ahaṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ pravrajitam anupravrajeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:892_19: dvau trayo vā yāvac chaḍ bhaktacchedāḥ kṛtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:892_20: atha rāṣṭrapālasya mātāpitarau yena rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputras tenopasaṃkrāntau /
XXavsata_u:892_23: tvaṃ hi sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī / na tvaṃ jānako duḥkhasya / duṣkaraṃ brahmacaryam*, duṣkaraṃ prāvivekyam*, durabhiramam ekatvam*, durabhisaṃbodhāny araṇyavanaprasthāni,
XXavsata_u:892_25: ihaiva tvaṃ tāta rāṣṭrapāla niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅkṣva,
XXavsata_u:892_26: dānāni ca dehi, puṇyāni ca kuru / evam ukte rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputras tūṣṇīm* /
XXavsata_u:894_0: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarau jñātīn udyojayataḥ:
XXavsata_u:894_1: aṅga tāvaj jñātayaḥ tātaṃ rāṣṭrapālam utthāpayata /
XXavsata_u:894_2: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya jñātayo yena rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:894_5: tvaṃ hi sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī / na tvaṃ jānako duḥkhasya / duṣkaraṃ brahmacaryam, duṣkaraṃ prāvivekyaṃ, durabhiramam ekatvam, durabhisaṃbodhāny araṇyavanaprasthāni,
XXavsata_u:894_7: ihaiva tvaṃ tāta rāṣṭrapāla niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅkṣva,
XXavsata_u:894_8: dānāni ca dehi, puṇyāni ca kuru / evam ukte rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputras tūṣṇīm* /
XXavsata_u:894_9: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarau rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya vayasyakān udyojayataḥ:
XXavsata_u:894_10: aṅga tāvat kumārāḥ, tātaṃ rāṣṭrapālam utthāpayata /
XXavsata_u:894_11: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya vayasyakā yena rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:894_14: tvaṃ hi sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī / na tvaṃ jānako duḥkhasya / duṣkaraṃ brahmacaryam, duṣkaraṃ prāvivekyaṃ, durabhiramam ekatvam, durabhisaṃbodhāny araṇyavanaprasthāni,
XXavsata_u:894_16: ihaiva tvaṃ saumya rāṣṭrapāla niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅkṣva,
XXavsata_u:894_17: dānāni ca dehi, puṇyāni ca kuru / evam ukte rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputras tūṣṇīm* /
XXavsata_u:894_18: atha rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya vayasyakā yena rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarau tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:894_19: upasaṃkramya rāṣṭrapālasya gṛhapatiputrasya mātāpitarāv idam avocan*:
XXavsata_u:894_20: amba tāta, anujānītaṃ saumya rāṣṭrapālaṃ pravrajituṃ samyag eva śraddhayā agarād anagārikām*,
XXavsata_u:894_21: kiṃ mṛtena kariṣyatha? sacet tātaḥ pravrajyāyām abhiraṃsyate,
XXavsata_u:894_22: jīvantam enaṃ drakṣyadhve / sacen nābhiramate, kā anyā putrasya gatir anyatra mātāpitarāv eva /
XXavsata_u:894_23: evam āvāṃ kumārakāḥ tātaṃ rāṣṭrapālam anujānīyāvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:894_25: atha rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputro 'nupūrveṇa kāyasya sthāmaṃ ca balaṃ ca saṃjanayya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:894_27: ekānte sthito rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputro bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:894_29: labheyāhaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:894_31: labdhavān rāṣṭrapālo gṛhapatiputraḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:894_32: sa evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sann idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:894_33: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo
XXavsata_u:avs_90.1_1: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_90.1_3: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ {āraṇyakānāṃ }yaduta rāṣṭrapālo bhiksur iti /
XXavsata_u:avs_90.1_4: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:avs_90.1_9: bhagavān āha: rāṣṭrapālenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:avs_90.1_11: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:avs_90.1_12: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_90.1_14: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:897_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani videharājaḥ saparivāraḥ paracakravitrāsito 'ṭavīm anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:897_1: sa madhyāhne tīkṣṇasūryaraśmiparitāpitaḥ sabalaugha itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramati,
XXavsata_u:897_2: mārgaṃ ca nāsādayati / asati ca buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
XXavsata_u:897_3: yāvad anyataraḥ pratyekabuddhas tasmin kāntāramārge prativasati /
XXavsata_u:897_4: tena kāruṇyam utpādya tasya videharājasya mārgo vyapadiṣṭaḥ,
XXavsata_u:897_5: pānīyahradaś ca darśitaḥ, yena sa rājā iṣṭena jīvitenācchāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:897_6: tato rājñā prasādajātena svanagaram ānīya traimāsyaṃ sarvopakaraṇair upasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:897_8: praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtavān: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ labhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:897_9: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ ca śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:897_10: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena rājā babhūva,
XXavsata_u:897_11: ayaṃ sa rāṣṭrapālaḥ / aparāṇy api rāṣṭrapālena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
XXavsata_u:897_12: asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:897_13: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:897_14: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ kṛkī rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* /
XXavsata_u:897_17: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:899_1: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:899_3: tena prasādajātena bhagavān kāśyapaḥ saparivāra upasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:899_5: parinirvṛtasya ca stūpe kanīyāñ chatram āropitavān* /
XXavsata_u:899_7: ayam evāsau rāṣṭrapālas tena kālena tena samayena /
XXavsata_u:899_8: aparāṇy api rāṣṭrapālena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
XXavsata_u:899_9: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ mahānagaryām anyatamo mūliko brāhmaṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:899_11: tena tatra paryaṭatā vanānte glānaḥ pratyekabuddho dṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:899_13: yadā glānyād vyutthitaḥ, tadā piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:899_15: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:899_16: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena mūliko brāhmaṇaḥ,
XXavsata_u:899_17: ayam evāsau rāṣṭrapālaḥ / tasya karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre na kadācid duḥkham anubhūtavān* /
XXavsata_u:899_18: idānīm apy āḍhye rājakule pratyājāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:899_20: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:899_21: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:899_24: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:903_0: subhūtiḥ sthaviraś cāpi hasta lekuñcikas tathā /
XXavsata_u:903_1: saṃsāro guptikaś cāpi virūpo gaṅgikena ca /
XXavsata_u:903_2: dīrghanakhaḥ saṃgītiś ca vargo bhavati samudditaḥ //
XXavsata_u:906_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:906_1: yadā bhagavatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya śrāvakā niyuktās teṣu janapadeṣu vineyajanānugrahārtham*,
XXavsata_u:906_2: tadā ye 'dhyāyinas te sumerupariṣaṇḍāyāṃ dhyānaparā sthitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:906_4: sa taṃ sumerupariṣaṇḍāyām āropya bhakṣayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:906_5: tato nāgapotalako jīvitād vyaparopyamāṇo mahāśrāvakāṇām antike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ /
XXavsata_u:906_6: sa kālaṃ kṛtvā śrāvastyāṃ bhūtir nāma brāhmaṇaḥ,
XXavsata_u:906_8: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:906_10: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:906_12: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya pitā bhūtiḥ, tasmād bhavatu dārakasya subhūtir iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:906_13: subhūtir dāraka unnīto vardhito mahān samvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:906_14: sa pūrveṇa hetubalādhānena atīva roṣaṇaḥ krodhaparyavasthānabahulo mātāpitṛbhyām ātharvaṇād vinivartya ṛṣiṣu pravrājitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:906_15: sa ca tatra dhyānaparaḥ saṃyato 'nyatarad vanaṣaṇḍam upaniśritya viharati /
XXavsata_u:906_16: tatra ca vanaṣaṇḍe devatā prativasati dṛṣṭasatyā /
XXavsata_u:906_17: tasyāḥ kāruṇyam utpannam*: ayaṃ kulaputraḥ krodhaparyavasthānabahalo viśeṣaṃ nādhigacchati /
XXavsata_u:906_18: yanv aham enaṃ bhagavaddarśane niyojayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:906_19: tatas tayā devatayā subhūteḥ purastād buddhasya varṇo bhāṣito dharmasya ca saṃghasya ca /
XXavsata_u:906_23: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:908_0: āghātaḥ, sa prativigataḥ / tataḥ prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:908_1: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:908_2: yāṃ śrutvā subhūtinā kulaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:908_4: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena maitrībhāvanayā cittaṃ damayitvā sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:908_5: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:908_6: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:908_9: paśyati: pañca jātiśatāni nāgebhyaś cyuto nāgeṣv evopapannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:908_10: tasya buddhir utpannā: mayā atīva evaṃvidho dveṣapratyayopasaṃbhāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:908_13: idānīṃ punas tathā kariṣyāmi yat pareṣām antike dveṣopasaṃbhāro notpatsyate /
XXavsata_u:908_14: yena samanvāgataḥ kāyasya bhedād apāyaṃ durgatiṃ vinipātaṃ narakeṣūpapadyate /
XXavsata_u:908_16: yadā saṃghe vā grāme vā deśe vā janapade vā bhikṣāhetor vihartukāmo bhavati,
XXavsata_u:908_18: mā māṃ kaścit kāraṇena dṛṣṭvā cittaṃ pradūṣayiṣyati,
XXavsata_u:908_24: yanv aham idānīṃ mahājanānugrahārthaṃ kuryām iti /
XXavsata_u:908_25: tatas tena ṛddhyā pañca suparṇiśatāni nirmitāni,
XXavsata_u:908_26: yāni dṛṣṭvā nāgā bhītās trastā saṃvignā itaś cāmutaś ca saṃbhrāntāḥ /
XXavsata_u:908_29: punar api mahāntaṃ nāgarūpam abhinirmāya pañca garuḍaśatāny abhidrutāni /

XXavsata_u:918_1: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ mahākāruṇikānāṃ lokānugrahapravṛttānām ekārakṣāṇām śamathavipaśyanāvihāriṇāṃ tridamathavastukuśalānāṃ caturoghottīrṇānāṃ caturṛddhipādacaraṇatalasupratiṣṭhitānāṃ pañcāṅgaviprahīṇānāṃ pañcagatisamatikrāntānāṃ ṣaḍaṅgasamanvāgatānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇānāṃ saptabodhyaṅgakusumāḍhyānām aṣṭāṅgamārgadeśikānāṃ navānupūrvavihārasamāpattikuśalānāṃ daśabalabalināṃ daśadiksamāpūrṇayaśasāṃ daśaśatavaśavartiprativiśiṣṭānāṃ trī rātres trir divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokya jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate:

XXavsata_u:919_1: yāṃ śrutvā sthavirakeṇa idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:919_2: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /

XXavsata_u:921_4: tataḥ sthavireṇa ṛddhyā gatvā tasmād bhayāt paritrātāḥ /
XXavsata_u:921_6: manasikāraś caiṣa dattaḥ / taiḥ sarvair eva yujyamānair ghaṭamānair vyāyacchamānaiḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:921_7: teṣāṃ ca guṇeṣu na kaścit pratyakṣaḥ /
XXavsata_u:921_12: tata āyuṣmān ānandaḥ sabrahmacārivatsalaḥ parānugrahapravṛtta āyuṣmantaṃ sthavirakanāmān udbhāvayitukāmo yenāyuṣmān sthaviranāmā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:921_13: upasaṃkramya āyuṣmatā sthavireṇa sthaviranāmnā bhikṣuṇā sārdhaṃ saṃmukhaṃ saṃmodanīṃ saṃrañjanīṃ vividhāṃ kathāṃ vyatisārya ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:921_14: ekānte niṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān ānandaḥ sthaviraṃ sthavirakanāman idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:921_15: pṛcchema vayam āyuṣmantaṃ sthaviraṃ sthavirakanāmānaṃ kaṃcid eva pradeśam*,
XXavsata_u:921_17: āyuṣmann ānanda, śrutvā te vedayiṣye / araṇyagatenāyuṣman sthavira bhikṣuṇā vṛkṣamūlagatena śūnyāgāragatena katame dharmā abhīkṣṇaṃ manasikartavyāḥ? āha:
XXavsata_u:921_18: araṇyagatena āyuṣmann ānanda bhikṣuṇā vṛkṣamūlagatena śūnyāgāragatena dvau dharmāv abhīkṣṇaṃ manasikartavyau:
XXavsata_u:921_19: śamathaś ca vipaśyanā ca / śamathaḥ (Speyer: śamatha) sthavira āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ kam arthaṃ pratyanubhavati? vipaśyanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kam arthaṃ pratyanubhavati? śamatha āyuṣmann ānanda āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛto vipaśyanām āgamya vimucyate /
XXavsata_u:921_20: vipaśyanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā śamatham āgamya vimucyate /
XXavsata_u:921_21: śamathavipaśyanāparibhāvitam āyuṣmann ānanda śrutavataḥ āryaśrāvakasya cittaṃ dhātuśo vimucyate /
XXavsata_u:921_22: tatra sthavira katame dhātavaḥ? yaś cāyuṣmann ānanda prahāṇadhātuḥ,
XXavsata_u:921_23: yaś ca virāgadhātuḥ, yaś ca nirodhadhātuḥ / kasya nu sthavira prahāṇāt prahāṇadhātur ity ucyate? kasya virāgād virāgadhātur ity ucyate? kasya nirodhān nirodhadhātur ity ucyate? sarvasaṃskārāṇām āyuṣmann ānanda prahāṇāt prahāṇadhātur ity ucyate /
XXavsata_u:921_26: athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ sthavirasya sthavirakanāmno bhikṣor bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya yena pañca bhikṣuśatāni tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:921_28: araṇyagatenāyuṣmanto bhikṣuṇā vṛkṣamūlagatena śūnyāgāragatena katame dharmā abhīkṣṇaṃ manasikartavyāḥ? araṇyagatena āyuṣmann ānanda bhikṣuṇā vṛkṣamūlagatena śūnyāgāragatena dvau dharmāv abhīkṣṇaṃ manasikartavyau:
XXavsata_u:921_29: śamathaś ca vipaśyanā ca / śamatha āyuṣmanta āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ kam arthaṃ pratyanubhavati? vipaśyanā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā kam arthaṃ pratyanubhavati? śamatha āyuṣmann ānanda āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛto vipaśyanām āgamya vimucyate /
