XXavsata_u:923_25: bhadanta āścaryaṃ yāvac chāstuḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ ca arthenārthaḥ,
XXavsata_u:923_26: padena padam*, vyañjanena vyañjanaṃ saṃsyandate sameti yadutāgrapadaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:923_27: kaṃ punas tvam ānanda sthavirakaṃ bhikṣuṃ saṃjānīyāḥ? sthavirako bhadanta bhikṣur arhan kṣīṇāśravaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyo 'pahṛtabhāro 'nuprāptasvakārthaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaḥ /
XXavsata_u:923_28: tāny api bhikṣuśatāni sarvāṇy arhanti kṣīṇāsravāṇi kṛtakṛtyāni kṛtakaraṇīyāny apahṛtabhārāṇy anuprāptasvakārthaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittāni /
XXavsata_u:925_0: yadā bhagavatā āyuṣmatānandena sthavirakas te ca bhikṣava udbhāvitāḥ prakāśitāś ca,
XXavsata_u:925_1: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:925_2: kāni bhadanta sthavirakeṇa karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni,
XXavsata_u:925_3: yena ṣaṣṭi varṣāṇi mātuḥ kukṣāv uṣitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:925_4: kāni karmāṇi kṛtāni yena dhandhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ paramadhandhaḥ,
XXavsata_u:925_6: sthavirakeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:925_8: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:925_9: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_92.8_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:926_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:926_1: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:926_3: sa ca sthaviro 'rhan, sa rāgaviprahīṇaḥ / yāvat tatra deśe parva pratyupasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:926_6: sthavira āha: vatsa adyāpi prag eva, gaccha tāvat kuśalapakṣaṃ pratijāgṛhīti /
XXavsata_u:926_7: dvir api trir api taruṇabhikṣuṇā sthavira utthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:926_9: dvir api trir api sthavira āha:
XXavsata_u:926_10: vatsa, adyāpi prag eva, gaccha tāvat kuśalapakṣaṃ pratijāgṛhīti /
XXavsata_u:926_14: tasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaṣṭi varṣasahasrāṇi mātuḥ kukṣāv uṣitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:926_17: yad anena tatra paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:926_18: tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:926_20: ete doṣā na bhaviṣyanti, ye sthavirakasya pṛthagjanabhūtasya /
XXavsata_u:926_21: eṣa eva guṇagaṇo bhaviṣyati yas tasyaivārhatvaṃ prāptasya /
XXavsata_u:926_23: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:930_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:930_1: śrāvastyām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:930_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:930_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:930_5: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:930_6: dārako jāto 'bhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ prakṛtijātismaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:930_7: sa svakaṃ hastaṃ gṛhītvā āliṅgate cumbati pariṣvajati,
XXavsata_u:930_8: vācaṃ bhāṣate: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhau,
XXavsata_u:930_9: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakāv iti /
XXavsata_u:930_10: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:930_12: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād ayaṃ jātamātra eva hastāv āliṅgate cumbati,
XXavsata_u:930_13: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya hastaka iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:930_14: hastako dāraka aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:930_15: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:930_17: yadā tatra deśe kiṃcid bhavati bhayam*,
XXavsata_u:930_18: tadā sa janakāyo bhīta itaś cāmutaś codbhrānto bhāṇḍaṃ gopāyati /
XXavsata_u:930_19: sa tu hastau gopāyati, janakāyasya caivaṃ kathayati:
XXavsata_u:930_22: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakau,
XXavsata_u:930_23: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakāv iti /
XXavsata_u:930_24: yāvad apareṇa samayena hastako jetavanaṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:930_25: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:930_27: sa prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:930_28: tato 'sya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
XXavsata_u:930_29: yāṃ śrutvā hastakena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:930_30: sa dṛṣṭasatyo mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:930_31: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:930_32: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto
XXavsata_u:932_1: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:932_2: so 'rhatvaprāpto 'py evam eva bhikṣūṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati:
XXavsata_u:932_5: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakau,
XXavsata_u:932_6: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakāv iti /
XXavsata_u:932_7: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:932_8: kāni bhadanta hastakena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni yenārhatvaprāpto 'py evam eva kathayati:
XXavsata_u:932_9: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakau,
XXavsata_u:932_10: aho bata me hastakau sucireṇa labdhakāv iti /
XXavsata_u:932_13: hastakenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:932_15: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:932_16: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_93.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:933_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśatisahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:933_1: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:933_5: sa jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ bahūni ca nimantraṇakāni pratilabhate /
XXavsata_u:933_6: sa taṃ saṃśīlikabhikṣuṃ yatra nimantrito bhavati,
XXavsata_u:933_10: na ca pratilabhate / tatas tena tasyādarśanād anyo bhikṣur nītaḥ /
XXavsata_u:933_11: yāvat tatra taruṇabhikṣubhir auddhatyābhiprāyair evam uktam*:
XXavsata_u:933_12: paśyata bhadantā yāvat tenāyaṃ paścācchramaṇo 'dya na nīto 'nyo nīta iti /
XXavsata_u:933_13: tatas tena krodhābhibhūtenārhato 'ntike cittaṃ pradūṣya kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam* /
XXavsata_u:933_15: yadā āśayato vipratisārajātena atyayam atyayato deśitaṃ vivṛtam uttānīkṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:933_16: tena hastau pratilabdhau / yat punas tena paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalam
XXavsata_u:935_1: tena mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:935_2: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:935_3: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:935_6: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:938_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:938_1: śrāvastyām anyatamo brahmaṇa āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:938_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:938_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:938_5: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:938_7: jātamātrasya cāsya mātuḥ stanābhyāṃ kṣīram antarhitam* /
XXavsata_u:938_8: yāvat tena brāhmaṇena tasyānyā dhātrī ānītā /
XXavsata_u:938_11: yadāsya kṣīrasaṃbhavaḥ sarvair apy upāyair na saṃbhavati,
XXavsata_u:938_13: lehenoddhṛtaḥ) / tasya lekuñcika iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:938_15: yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā udarapūraṇam api nāsādayati /
XXavsata_u:938_16: paśyati ca bhikṣūn sunivasitān suprāvṛtān bhramarasadṛśāni pātrāṇi gṛhītvā śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya praviśataḥ /
XXavsata_u:938_19: sa mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajito 'py udarapūraṇaṃ nāsādayati /
XXavsata_u:938_20: tena tenaiva saṃvegena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:938_21: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:938_22: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:940_0: yāvad asāv apareṇa samayena bhagavato gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmārjituṃ pravṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:940_1: sa tāṃ saṃmṛjya pātracīvaram ādāya śrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat* /
XXavsata_u:940_2: tatas tena prabhūtaḥ praṇītaś ca piṇḍapāta āsāditaḥ,
XXavsata_u:940_4: tatas tena saṃtarpitendriyeṇa kṛtsnā rātrir dhyānavimokṣasamāpattibhir atināmitā /
XXavsata_u:940_5: tato 'sya buddhir utpannā: śobhano 'yam upāyo yanv ahaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ vijñāpayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:940_7: ahaṃ bhadanta alpapuṇyo yadā gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmṛjya piṇḍapātaṃ praviśāmi,
XXavsata_u:940_8: tadā tṛptiṃ labhe / tan me saṃghaḥ kāruṇyaṃ karotu,
XXavsata_u:940_12: sa visrabdho gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmṛjya paścāc chrāvastīṃ piṇḍāya praviśati /
XXavsata_u:940_13: tasmiṃś ca samaye āyuṣmāñ chāradvatīputraḥ pañcaśataparivāro janapade varṣoṣitaḥ śrāvastyām abhyāgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:940_14: tataḥ śāstur gauravajāto gandhakuṭīṃ saṃmārṣṭum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:940_16: tenocyate: sthavira udare mama prahāro dattaḥ,
XXavsata_u:940_18: sthaviraḥ prāha: katham iti? lekuñcikaḥ kathayati:
XXavsata_u:940_19: sthavira, yadāhaṃ gandhakuṭīṃ na saṃmārjitavāṃs tadā piṇḍapātaṃ nāsādayāmīti /
XXavsata_u:940_22: alpotsukas tvaṃ bhava / ahaṃ tatra tubhyaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dāsyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:940_25: yadā gṛhapater gṛhasamīpaṃ gatas tadā lekuñcikasya karmavipākena tasmin gṛhe mahān kalahaḥ samutpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:940_28: tataḥ pratinivṛtya vihāraṃ gatvā bhaktacchedam akarot* /
XXavsata_u:940_30: kimarthaṃ tvaṃ na gata iti / tenoktam*: sthavireṇa nāvagatam*: mamālpapuṇyatayā yādṛśas tatra kalaho jāta iti /
XXavsata_u:940_31: tataḥ sthaviraśāriputreṇānyatra divase taṃ puraskṛtya tad gṛhaṃ praveśitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:940_32: saṃghamadhye copaviṣṭasya sataḥ pradakṣiṇaś cāhāro dīyate /
XXavsata_u:940_36: śrutvā ca lekuñcikam uvāca: tena hi tvam ihaiva jetavane tiṣṭha,
XXavsata_u:940_42: caturthe divase sthavirānandenāsthāṃ kṛtvā piṇḍapāto dattaḥ /
XXavsata_u:942_0: pañcame divase sthaviramaudgalyāyanena śrutvā lekuñcikasyāthāya piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhītvā ṛddhyā saṃprasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:942_1: lekuñcikasya karmavipākena suparṇinā pakṣirājena pakṣaiḥ parāhatya mahāsamudre pātitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:942_4: tasyaitad abhavat*: yanv ahaṃ lekuñcikasya piṇḍapātaṃ ###################### lekuñcikasya kuṭikādvāre 'vasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:942_5: tato lekuñcikasya karmavipākena tad api dvāraṃ śilābhir āvṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:942_6: tataḥ śāriputreṇa ṛddhyā mokṣyāmīti tat pātraṃ pṛthivyāṃ sthāpitam* /
XXavsata_u:942_9: tato 'pi sthaviraśāriputreṇa ṛddhyā samuddhṛtya tat piṇḍakaṃ mukhadvāraśleṣite piṇḍapāte tasya karmāvaraṇena tan mukham ekadhanaṃ saṃvṛttam* /
XXavsata_u:942_10: tata āyuṣmāñ chāriputro lekuñcikasyābhavyatāṃ jñātvā saṃvignaḥ /
XXavsata_u:942_11: tena ca bhadantena ṣaḍ bhaktacchedāḥ kṛtāḥ /
XXavsata_u:942_12: tataḥ saptame divase āyuṣmāl lekuñcikaḥ satvānām udvejanārthaṃ karmaṇāṃ cāvipraṇaśasaṃdarśanārthaṃ karmabalodbhāvanārthaṃ ca bhasmanā pātraṃ pūrayitvā buddhapramukhasya bhikṣusaṃghasya purastān niṣadya udakenāloḍya pītvā nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:942_13: tam abhivīkṣya bhikṣavaḥ saṃvignāḥ tasya śarīre śarīrapūjāṃ kṛtvā saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:942_15: yenārhatvaprāpto 'pi ṣaḍ bhaktacchedān kṛtvā saptame divase nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛta iti /
XXavsata_u:942_16: bhagavān āha: lekuñcikenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:942_18: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:942_19: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_94.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:943_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamā gṛhapatipatnī śrāddhā bhadrā kalyāṇāśayā /
XXavsata_u:943_3: yāvad asyāḥ putraḥ svagṛhe svāmī saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:943_4: sa ca matsarī kuṭukuñcakaḥ āgṛhītapariṣkāraḥ kākāya baliṃ na pradātuṃ vyavasyati /
XXavsata_u:943_6: tasya mātā tenaiva pūrvakrameṇa śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānapradānāny anuprayacchati /
XXavsata_u:943_8: amba na me rocate (Speyer: rocyate) / mā dānam anuprayaccheti / sā kathayati: putraka iha kule eṣa kuladharma iti /
XXavsata_u:945_3: tatas tena mātsaryābhibhūtena krodhenāvṛtabuddhinā bhūyo nivāryata eva /
XXavsata_u:945_5: tadā mātaram uvāca: amba kiṃcit karaṇīyam asti, avavarakaṃ praviśeti / sā ṛjusvabhāvatayā avavarakaṃ praviṣṭā /
XXavsata_u:945_6: tatas tena dvāraṃ baddhvā ekaṃ bhaktacchedaṃ kāritā /
XXavsata_u:945_7: sā kathayati: putra bubhukṣitāsmīti / tatas tena kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam*:
XXavsata_u:945_8: bhasma khādeti / yāvat tenāsau kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptā sakaruṇakaruṇaṃ vikrośamānā ṣaḍ bhaktacchedān kāritā,
XXavsata_u:945_9: tathāpi na pratimuktā / kālagatā / tadāsya mātsaryeṇāvṛtasya mātṛviyogād vipratisāro jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:945_10: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena gṛhapatiputraḥ,
XXavsata_u:945_11: ayaṃ sa lekuñcikaḥ / yad anena mātur apakāraḥ kṛtas tasya karmaṇo vipākena kalpam avīcau mahānaraka utpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:945_12: tenaiva hetunā idānīm apy arhatvaprāptaḥ ṣaḍ bhaktacchedān kṛtvā bhasmād anāhāra eva parinirvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:945_13: anyāny api bhikṣavo lekuñcikena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni /
XXavsata_u:945_14: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamo brāhmaṇo devatārcikaḥ sarveṣāṃ vārāṇaseyānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṃ satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito 'bhimataś ca sarvajanasya /
XXavsata_u:945_15: dharmatā caiṣā yad asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya /
XXavsata_u:945_16: yāvad anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho vārāṇasīṃ piṇḍāya praviṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:945_17: sa ca tatra pūrṇahastaḥ pūrṇapātro nirgacchati /
XXavsata_u:945_18: tena brāhmanena dṛṣṭaḥ / tasya mātsaryam utpannam* / kathayati: ānaya yāvat pātraṃ paśyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:945_19: asamanvāhṛtya ca śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartata iti /
XXavsata_u:945_20: tena bhadantenopanāmitam* / tatas tena pṛthivyām utsṛjya pādenābhimṛditam* /
XXavsata_u:945_22: na ca tasya brāhmaṇasya vipratisāro jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:945_24: ayam evāsau lekuñcikaḥ / bhūyaḥ kāśyape bhagavati pravrajito babhūva /
XXavsata_u:945_27: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:945_29: vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:945_32: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:948_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ
XXavsata_u:950_1: śrāvastyām anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:950_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:950_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:950_5: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:950_7: sa jātamātra eva gṛham avalokya vācaṃ niścārayati sma:
XXavsata_u:950_8: duḥkho bhavantaḥ saṃsāraḥ, paramaduḥkhaḥ saṃsāraḥ / ity uktvā tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:950_9: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:950_11: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād ayaṃ jātamātra eva saṃsāra iti ghoṣayati,
XXavsata_u:950_12: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya saṃsāra iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:950_13: saṃsāro dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:950_14: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:950_16: yadā saṃsāro dārakaḥ krameṇa mahān saṃvṛttaḥ,
XXavsata_u:950_17: sa prakṛtijātismaratvāc ca janakāyasya dharmaṃ deśayati:
XXavsata_u:950_18: mā bhavanto guruṣu gurusthānīyeṣu mātāpitṛṣv ācāryopādhyāyeṣu vā kharavācaṃ niścārayata /
XXavsata_u:950_19: duḥkhaṃ saṃsāra iti / yāvad apareṇa samayena itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramañ jetavanaṃ nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:950_20: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:950_22: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:950_24: yāṃ śrutvā saṃsāro dārakaḥ saṃsāre doṣadarśī bhūtvā mātāpitarāv anujñāpya bhagavacchāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:950_25: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:950_26: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:950_27: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:950_29: mā āyuṣmanto guruṣu gurusthānīyeṣu mātāpitṛṣv ācāryopādhyāyeṣu {vā} kharavācaṃ niścārayata /
XXavsata_u:950_30: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:950_32: yena pañca janmaśatāni mṛtakuṇapa eva mātuḥ kukṣer nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:952_0: cārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti / bhagavān āha: saṃsāreṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:952_2: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:952_3: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_95.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:953_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvany asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:953_1: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:953_2: vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhīputraḥ sthavirasakāśe pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:953_3: sa ca sthaviro 'rhan, sa rāgaviprahīṇaḥ / yāvat tatra deśe parva samupasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:953_6: sthavira āha: vatsa adyāpi prātar eva, gaccha tāvat kuśalapakṣaṃ pratijāgṛhīti /
XXavsata_u:953_7: dvir api trir api taruṇabhikṣuṇā sthavira utthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:953_9: dvir api trir api sthavira āha:
XXavsata_u:953_10: vatsa adyāpi prātar eva, gaccha tāvat kuśalapakṣaṃ pratijāgṛhīti /
XXavsata_u:953_11: tatas tena taruṇabhikṣuṇā rasagṛdhreṇa kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam:
XXavsata_u:953_12: mā tvaṃ pañcabhir api janmaśatair jīvaḥ kośān nirgaccha,
XXavsata_u:953_13: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena taruṇabhikṣuḥ,
XXavsata_u:953_14: ayam saṃsāraḥ / yad anenārhato 'ntike cittaṃ pradūṣya kharaṃ vākkarma niścāritam*,
XXavsata_u:953_15: tasya karmaṇo vipākena pañca janmaśatāni mṛtakuṇapa eva mātuḥ kukṣer nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:953_16: nirgateṣu pañcasu janmaśateṣu idānīm anena manuṣyatvam āsāditam* /
XXavsata_u:953_17: tatas tat smṛtvā kathayati: duḥkhaṃ saṃsāraḥ, paramaduḥkhaṃ saṃsāra iti / yad anena vipratisārajātena sthavirasyātyayo deśitaḥ,
XXavsata_u:953_20: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:953_21: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:953_24: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:957_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:957_1: yadā bhagavatā stavakarṇikanimantritena saupārake nagare mahājanavineyākarṣaṇaṃ kṛtam*,
XXavsata_u:957_2: tadā sarvaḥ saupārakanivāsī janakāyo buddhanimno dharmapravaṇaḥ saṃghaprāgbhāro vyavasthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:957_3: saupārake nagare 'nyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:957_5: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:957_6: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:957_7: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:957_8: dārako jātaḥ jātamātrasya sarvaśarīraṃ piṭakaiḥ sphuṭaṃ saṃvṛttam* /
XXavsata_u:957_9: yadā te piṭakāḥ sphuṭitāḥ, tadā ekadhano māṃsapiṇḍaḥ saṃsthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:957_10: pūyaśoṇitaṃ cāsya śarīrāt pragharan mahaddaurgandhaṃ janayati /
XXavsata_u:957_11: tato 'sya pitā aiśvaryabalādhānena dravyamantrauṣadhiparicārakasametaḥ svayam evārabdhaś cikitsāṃ kartum*,
XXavsata_u:957_12: na cāsau vyādhir upaśamaṃ gacchati karmabalādhānaprāptatvāt* /
XXavsata_u:957_13: sa svaśarīraṃ tathā vikṣatam apatrāpya parigṛhītaṃ vastrair gopāyati /
XXavsata_u:957_15: yāvad guptiko dārako mahān saṃvṛttas tasya vayasyakāḥ sahajātakāḥ śrāvastyāḥ saupārakanagaram anuprāptāḥ /
XXavsata_u:957_19: yasmāt tatra santi vaidyabhaiṣajādayaḥ sulabhā iti /
XXavsata_u:957_20: tataḥ pitrā tad vacanam upaśrutya prabhūtāni ratnāni paricārakāṃś ca datvā śrāvastīm anupreṣitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:957_22: tatrāpy asya karmajo vyādhiḥ saty api vaidyadravyauṣadhiparicārakabāhulye na śakyate cikitsitum* /
XXavsata_u:957_23: yāvad asāv apareṇa samayena jetavanaṃ nirgataḥ /
XXavsata_u:957_24: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:957_26: prasādajāto bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:957_27: tasmai bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā pañcopādānaskandhā rogato gaṇḍataḥ śalyato 'ghato 'nityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataś ca deśitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:957_29: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā
XXavsata_u:959_0: sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:959_1: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:959_2: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:959_3: te 'py asya sahajātakās tenaiva saṃvegena pravrajitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:959_7: kiṃ vā atra loke 'pralopadharma? rūpam āyuṣmantaḥ pralopadharma /
XXavsata_u:959_9: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam āyuṣmantaḥ pralopadharma /
XXavsata_u:959_11: kiṃ manyadhve āyuṣmantaḥ: rūpaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā? anityam idam āyuṣman guptika /
XXavsata_u:959_12: yat punar anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā tan na vā,
XXavsata_u:959_15: satyam api tac chrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacched etan mama,
XXavsata_u:959_16: eṣo 'ham asmi, eṣa me ātmety evam etat? no āyuṣman guptika /
XXavsata_u:959_17: kiṃ manyadhve āyuṣmantaḥ: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā? anityam idam āyuṣman guptika /
XXavsata_u:959_18: yat punar anityaṃ duḥkham*? duḥkham idam āyuṣman guptika /
XXavsata_u:959_20: api tac chrutavān āryaśrāvaka ātmata upagacchet*:
XXavsata_u:959_21: etan mama, eṣo 'ham asmi, eṣa me ātmeti? no āyuṣman guptika /
XXavsata_u:959_22: tasmāt tarhi āyuṣmanto yat kiṃcid rūpam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā,
XXavsata_u:959_23: yad vā dūre, yad vāntike, tat sarvaṃ naitan mama, naiṣo 'ham asmi, naiṣa me ātmety evam etad yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyam* /
XXavsata_u:959_24: yā kācid vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā yat kiṃcid vijñānam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vā audārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā,
XXavsata_u:959_25: yad vā dūre, yad vāntike, tat sarvaṃ naitan mama, naiṣo 'ham asmi, naiṣa me ātmety evam etad yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā draṣṭavyam* /
XXavsata_u:959_26: evaṃdarśī āyuṣmantaḥ śrutavān āryaśrāvako rūpād api nirvidyate,
XXavsata_u:959_28: nirviṇṇo virujyate, virako vimucyate / vimuktam evaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ bhavati:
XXavsata_u:959_29: kṣīṇā me jātiḥ, uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyam* /
XXavsata_u:959_31: asmin khalu dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe teṣāṃ sahajātakānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam* /
XXavsata_u:959_32: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:959_34: yenāsya śārīram evaṃ bībhatsavyādhibahulaṃ durgandhaṃ saṃvṛttam* /
XXavsata_u:959_35: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena tīkṣṇaniśitabuddhiḥ saṃvṛttaḥ,
XXavsata_u:959_37: bhagavān āha: guptikenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:961_0: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:961_1: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_96.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:962_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ anyatamaḥ śreṣṭhī /
XXavsata_u:962_2: tatas tena rājā prabhūtaṃ dhanaṃ datvā vijñāpitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:962_7: tato rudhirāvasiktaśarīrasya prabhūtaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca viṣacūrṇaṃ datvoptam*,
XXavsata_u:962_8: yenāsya tac charīram ekadhanaṃ māṃsapiṇḍavad avasthitam* /
XXavsata_u:962_11: tatas taiḥ sametair bhūtvā # # {upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ} yair upakaraṇaviśeṣais tasmād vyādheḥ parimocitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:962_12: tato 'sau tenaiva ca saṃvegena gṛhān niṣkramya pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:962_13: tena anācāryakeṇa saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān bhāvayitvā pratyekā bodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā /
XXavsata_u:962_14: tato 'sya cittam utpannam*: bahv anena śreṣṭhinā matsaṃtāpād apuṇyaṃ prasūtam* /
XXavsata_u:962_15: yanv aham enaṃ gatvā saṃvejayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:962_16: tatas tasyāgrato gatvā upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:962_18: sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭo bhagavantaṃ vijñāpayati:
XXavsata_u:962_19: avatara, avatara mahādakṣiṇīya, kṛtāparādho 'haṃ tavāntike, tvām eva niśritya punaḥ, pratyupasthāsyāmīti / tenāsau pratyekabuddhaḥ kṣamāpayitvā piṇḍakena pratipādya paṭenācchāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:962_20: praṇidhānaṃ ca kṛtam*: yan mayā krodhābhibhūtena tavāparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ,
XXavsata_u:962_22: yan mayā satkāraḥ kṛtaḥ, anenaivaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:962_24: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena śreṣṭhī āsīt*,
XXavsata_u:962_25: ayam sa guptikaḥ / tasya karmaṇaḥ prabhāvāt pañca janmaśatāni kaśābhis tāḍyamānaḥ kālaṃ kṛtavān* /
XXavsata_u:962_26: tenaiva hetunā ayam evaṃvidhaṃ āśraya āsāditaḥ /
XXavsata_u:962_27: bhūyaḥ kāśyape bhagavati sahajātakair vayasyakaiḥ sārdhaṃ pravrajita āsīt*/
XXavsata_u:962_30: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:962_31: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:962_34: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:966_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śrāvastyāṃ viharati jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme /
XXavsata_u:966_1: # # # anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:966_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:966_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:966_5: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:966_6: dārako jātaḥ / jātamātrasya sarvaśarīraṃ vikṛtisphuṭaṃ pravṛttam* /
XXavsata_u:966_7: durvarṇo durdarśano 'ṣṭādaśabhir doṣavarṇakaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sa dārako bhūtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:966_8: tasya mātāpitarau sarvāṅgaṃ durvarṇaṃ durdarśanaṃ vikṛtarūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā cintāparau vyvasthitau /
XXavsata_u:966_9: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyvasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:966_10: kiṃ nāma bhavatu dārakasya? jñātaya ūcuḥ:
XXavsata_u:966_12: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya virūpa iti nāma /
XXavsata_u:966_13: ydā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā tasya lajjayā mahān saṃkoco jātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:966_14: kutrānyatra gamiṣyāmi, kva tiṣṭhāmi, iti vicārya sujīrṇodyānaṃ jagāma /
XXavsata_u:966_16: sa bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā jehrīyamāṇa itaś cāmutaś ca palāyitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:966_17: tato bhagavatā ṛddhyā tathādhiṣṭhito yan na śaknoti palāyitum* /
XXavsata_u:966_18: tato bhagavān saha śrāvakair nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:966_19: tato nirodhād vyutthāya virūpam ātmānaṃ nirmitavān* /
XXavsata_u:966_20: nirmāya śarāvaṃ bhojanapūrṇam ādāya virūpam āgataṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣajāta āmantritavān*:
XXavsata_u:966_21: ehi sahāyaka, kuta āgamiṣyate, tiṣṭha, ubhāv api sahitau vatsyāva iti /
XXavsata_u:966_25: tato virūpo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati:
XXavsata_u:966_28: bhagavān āha: vidyā me asti cittaprasādajananī nāmnā,
XXavsata_u:966_29: tasyā eṣa prabhāva iti / tatas tena bhagavato 'ntike cittaṃ prasāditam*,
XXavsata_u:966_33: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:966_37: bhagavān āha: virūpeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:968_1: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:968_2: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_97.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:969_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani puṣyo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān* /
XXavsata_u:969_3: paśyati tasmin kāle dvau bodhisatvau saṃnikṛṣṭau:
XXavsata_u:969_6: śāstur vaineyā aparipakvāḥ / śākyamunes tu svasaṃtatir aparipakvā,
XXavsata_u:969_7: vaineyāḥ paripakvāḥ / atha puṣyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śākyamuner bodhisatvasya saṃtatiparipācanārthaṃ himavantaṃ parvatam abhiruhya ratnaguhāṃ praviśa paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā tejodhātuṃ samāpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:969_8: tasmiṃś ca kāle śākyamunir bodhisatvaḥ phalamūlānām arthe himavantaṃ parvatam abhirūḍhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:969_9: sa itas tataś cañcūryamāṇo dadarśa puṣyaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dvātriṃṣatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam aśītyā cānuvyañjanair virājitagātraṃ vyāmaprabhālaṃkṛtaṃ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṃ jaṅgamam iva ratnaparvataṃ samantato bhadrakam* /
XXavsata_u:969_11: yad ekapādena sapta rātriṃdivāni ekayā gāthayā stutavān*:
XXavsata_u:avs_97.2_0: na divi bhuvi vā nāsmiṃl loke na vaiśravaṇālaye
XXavsata_u:avs_97.2_1: na marubhavane divye sthāne na dikṣu vidikṣu vā /
XXavsata_u:971_0: atha puṣyaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ paripakvasaṃtatiṃ śākyamuniṃ bodhisatvaṃ dṛṣṭvā sādhukāram adāt*:
XXavsata_u:972_0: tato bhagavān maheśākhyābhir devatābhiḥ parivṛtaḥ tasyāṃ guhāyāṃ sthitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:972_1: tatra guhānivāsinī devatā alpeśākhyatvān na śaknoti tāṃ guhāṃ samabhiroḍhum* /
XXavsata_u:972_3: yadā suciram api bhīṣayamāṇā na śaknoti bhagavato 'pakāraṃ kartum*,
XXavsata_u:972_4: tadā tayā prasādo labdhaḥ: śobhano 'yam ṛṣiḥ siddhavrataś ceti /
XXavsata_u:972_5: tataḥ sā udāraṃ rūpam abhinirmāya bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya kṣamāpayitvā piṇḍakena pratipāditavatī /
XXavsata_u:973_0: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena guhānivāsinī devatā babhūva,
XXavsata_u:973_1: ayam virūpaḥ saḥ / tasya karmaṇo vipākena saṃsāre 'nantaṃ duḥkham anubhūtavān* /
XXavsata_u:973_2: idānīm api tenaiva hetunā virūpaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:973_6: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:973_7: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:973_10: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:976_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣipatane mṛgadāve /
XXavsata_u:976_1: vārāṇasyām anyatamo gṛhapatir āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī /
XXavsata_u:976_3: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:976_4: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayato na putro na duhitā /
XXavsata_u:976_5: sa kare kapolaṃ datvā cintāparo vyavasthitaḥ:
XXavsata_u:976_7: na me putro na duhitā / mamātyayāt sarvasvāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:976_9: devatārādhanaṃ kuruṣveti / so 'putraḥ putrābhinandī śivavaruṇakuberaśakrabrahmādīn anyāṃś ca devatāviśeṣān āyācate /
XXavsata_u:976_11: sahajāḥ sahadhārmikā nityānubaddhā api devatā āyācate sma /
XXavsata_u:976_12: asti caiṣa loke pravādo yadāyācanahetoḥ putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:976_13: tac ca naivam* / yady evam abhaviṣyad ekaikasya putrasahasram abhaviṣyat tadyathā rājñaś cakravartinaḥ /
XXavsata_u:976_14: api tu trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ca /
XXavsata_u:976_15: katameṣāṃ trayāṇām* / mātāpitarāu raktau bhavataḥ saṃnipatitau,
XXavsata_u:976_18: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ sthānānāṃ saṃmukhībhāvāt putrā jāyante duhitaraś ceti /
XXavsata_u:976_20: anyatamaś ca satvo 'nyatamasmāt satvanikāyāc cyutvā tasya prajāpatyāḥ kukṣim avakrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:978_0: pañca? raktaṃ puruṣaṃ jānāti viraktaṃ {puruṣaṃ} jānāti /
XXavsata_u:978_1: kālaṃ jānāti ṛtuṃ jānāti / garbham avakrāntaṃ jānāti / yasya sakāśād garbho 'vakrāmati taṃ jānāti /
XXavsata_u:978_3: saced dārako bhavati, dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:978_4: saced dārikā bhavati, vāmaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:978_6: diṣṭyā āryaputra vardhase / āpannasatvāsmi saṃvṛttā / yathā ca me dakṣiṇaṃ kukṣiṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
XXavsata_u:978_11: jāto me syān nāvajātaḥ / kṛtyāni me kurvīta / bhṛtaḥ pratibibhṛyāt* / dāyād yaṃ pratipadyeta / kulavaṃśo me cirasthitikaḥ syāt* /
XXavsata_u:978_12: asmākaṃ cāpy atītakālagatānām alpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā mama nāmnā dakṣiṇām ādekṣyate:
XXavsata_u:978_13: idaṃ tayor yatratatropapannayor gacchator anugacchatv iti /
XXavsata_u:978_14: āpannasatvāṃ caināṃ viditvā upariprāsādatalagatām ayantritāṃ dhārayati,
XXavsata_u:978_15: śīte śītopakaraṇair uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇair vaidyaprajñaptair āhārair nātitiktair nātyamlair nātilavaṇair nātimadhurair nātikaṭukair nātikaṣāyais tiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukakaṣāyavivarjitair āhāraiḥ /
XXavsata_u:978_16: hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrīm apsarasam iva nandanavanavicāriṇīṃ mañcān mañcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantīm adharāṃ bhūmim* /
XXavsata_u:978_17: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñaśabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad eva garbhasya paripākāya /
XXavsata_u:978_18: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:978_20: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā gaṅgika iti nāma kṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:978_21: gaṅgiko dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:978_22: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:978_24: sa ca nirbhedabhāgīyaiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgato gṛhāvāse nābhiramate /
XXavsata_u:978_26: amba tāta anujānītaṃ mām*, bhagavacchāsane pravrajiṣyāmīti /
XXavsata_u:978_27: tato 'sya mātāpitarāv ekaputraka iti kṛtvā nānujānītaḥ /
XXavsata_u:978_31: ko me upāyo bhaved yad ahaṃ bhagavacchāsane pravrajeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:978_32: tasyaitad abhavat*: yanv ahaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā ātmānamātmanā jīvitād vyaparopayeyam*,
XXavsata_u:978_33: yathā manuṣyātvam āsādya laghu laghv eva pravrajeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:978_35: na ca kālaṃ karoti / agnau patitaḥ, parvatād ātmānam utsṛṣṭavān*,
XXavsata_u:978_36: nadyāṃ cārakāyāṃ patitaḥ, tatrāpi kālaṃ na karoti / tasya buddhir utpannā: kaḥ upāyaḥ syād yena kālaṃ kuryām iti /
XXavsata_u:978_37: tasyaitad abhavat*: sarvathāyaṃ rājā ajātaśatruś caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ sāhasikaś ca /
XXavsata_u:978_38: yanv aham asya gṛhe rātrau saṃdhiṃ chindyām iti /
XXavsata_u:978_39: sa rājagṛhaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā rātrau saṃprāptāyāṃ bhagne cakṣuṣpathe saṃdhim ārabdhaś chettum* /
XXavsata_u:978_40: tato rakṣibhir jīvagrāhaṃ gṛhītvā rājño 'jātaśatror upanītaḥ:
XXavsata_u:980_0: tato rājñā aparādhika iti kṛtvā vadhya utsṛṣṭaḥ /
XXavsata_u:980_1: tato vyadhyaghātair nīlāmbaravasanaiḥ karavīramālāsaktakaṇṭheguṇa udyataśastrapāṇibhī rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu śrāvaṇāmukheṣv anuśrāvya dakṣiṇena nagaradvāreṇa niṣkāsya śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ nīyate /
XXavsata_u:980_4: mā kadācid rājñaś cittasyānyathātvaṃ syād iti /
XXavsata_u:980_5: tato vyadhyaghātair eṣā pravṛttī rājño niveditā /
XXavsata_u:980_7: ko hetur yat tvam iṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ parityaktum icchasīti /
XXavsata_u:980_8: tena sa vṛttānto vistareṇa rājñe samākhyātaḥ /
XXavsata_u:980_9: tato rājā ajātaśatruḥ kadambapuṣpavad āhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ sāśrukaṇṭho rudan mukha udānam udānayati:
XXavsata_u:980_12: yatra nāmāyaṃ pravrajyāhetor idam iṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ parityaktuṃ vyavasitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:980_13: tato rājñā samāśvāsyoktaḥ: putraka ahaṃ prabhus te jīvitasya /
XXavsata_u:980_16: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:980_17: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:980_18: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:980_20: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ śraddhāpravrajitānāṃ yaduta gaṅgiko vārāṇaseyaḥ śreṣṭhiputra iti /
XXavsata_u:980_21: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:980_24: na viṣam*, na ca śastram*, nodakena kālaṃ karoti, arhatvaṃ cānena prāptam iti /
XXavsata_u:980_25: bhagavān āha: gaṅgikenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:980_27: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:980_28: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_98.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:981_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām anyatamaḥ śmaśānamoṣako mātaṅgaḥ /
XXavsata_u:981_1: yāvat tena pāthān hatvā bhāṇḍam āsāditam* /
XXavsata_u:981_3: yāvad anyatamasmin śmaśāne pratyekabudho nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:983_0: mātaṅgas tasya purastād bhāṇḍam apasṛjya tatraiva nilīnaḥ /
XXavsata_u:983_1: tats te taskarāḥ pratyekabuddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā asyārabdhāḥ kṣeptuṃ śastram agniṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:983_2: na cāsya cīvarakarṇakam api śaknuvanti cālayitum*,
XXavsata_u:983_6: tatas tena śmaśānamoṣakeṇa mātaṅgena taṃ pratyekabuddhaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:983_7: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:983_8: yathā cāyam aparopakramaḥ / evam aham api yatra yatra jāyeya,
XXavsata_u:983_10: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:983_11: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena śmaśānamoṣako mātaṅgaḥ,
XXavsata_u:983_12: ayam sa gaṅgikaḥ / bhūyaḥ kāśyape bhagavati pravrajito babhūva /
XXavsata_u:983_15: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:983_17: vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:983_20: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:986_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃgho rājagṛham upaniśritya viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe /
XXavsata_u:986_1: tena khalu samayena nāladagrāmake tiṣyo nāma brāhmaṇaḥ /
XXavsata_u:986_2: tena śārī nāma dārikā māṭharasakāśāl labdhā /
XXavsata_u:986_4: tadā bhrātrā saha dīrghanakhena vivādaṃ kurvantī nigrahasthānaṃ prāpayati /
XXavsata_u:986_5: # # # # # # # / tato dīrghanakhena dakṣiṇāpathaṃ gatvā bahūni śāstrāṇy adhītāni /
XXavsata_u:986_8: sarvavādinaś ca nigṛhītāḥ / so 'nupūrveṇa bhagavataḥ śāsane pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:987_3: tasmiṃś ca samaye bhagavān pratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ madhuramadhuraṃ dharmaṃ deśayati kṣaudraṃ madhv ivāneḍakam* /
XXavsata_u:987_4: śāriputro 'pi bhagavataḥ purastāt sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavanataṃ vījayan* /
XXavsata_u:987_5: atha dadarśa dīrghanakhaparivrājako bhagavantam ardhacandrākāreṇopaviṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantam*,
XXavsata_u:987_7: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:987_8: sarvaṃ me bho gautama na kṣamata iti /
XXavsata_u:987_9: bhagavān āha: eṣāpi te agnivaiśyāyana dṛṣṭir na kṣamate,
XXavsata_u:987_10: yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ: sarvaṃ me na kṣamata iti / eṣāpi me bho gautama dṛṣṭir na kṣamate,
XXavsata_u:987_11: yeyaṃ me dṛṣṭiḥ: sarvaṃ me na kṣamata iti / api tu te agnivaiśyāyana evaṃ jānato 'yāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ;
XXavsata_u:987_12: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ? api me bho gautama evaṃ jānata evaṃ paśyato 'syāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:987_16: katame trayaḥ? ihāgnivaiśyāyana eka evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati evaṃvādī:
XXavsata_u:987_17: sarvaṃ me kṣamata iti / punar aparam ihaika evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati evaṃvādī:
XXavsata_u:987_18: sarvaṃ me na kṣamata iti / punar aparam eka evaṃdṛṣṭir bhavati evaṃvādī:
XXavsata_u:987_19: evaṃ me kṣamate, ekaṃ na me kṣamata iti / tatrāgnivaiśyāyana yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ sarvaṃ me kṣamata iti,
XXavsata_u:987_21: saṃdveṣāya nāsaṃdveṣāya, saṃmohāya nāsaṃmohāya, saṃyogāya nāsaṃyogāya, saṃkleśāya na vyavadānāya, saṃcayāya nāpacayāya, abhinandanāyopādānāya adhyavasānāya saṃvartate /
XXavsata_u:987_23: sarvaṃ me na kṣamata iti, iyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ asaṃrāgāya saṃvartate na saṃrāgāya,
XXavsata_u:987_24: asaṃdveṣāya na saṃdveṣāya, asaṃmohāya na saṃmohāya, visaṃyogāya na saṃyogāya, vyavadānāya na saṃkleśāya, asaṃcayāya na saṃcayāya / anabhinandanāyānupādānāya anadhyavasānāya
XXavsata_u:987_25: saṃvartate / tatra yeyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ: ekaṃ me kṣamate, ekaṃ me na kṣamata iti, yat tāvad asya kṣamate, tat saṃrāgāya saṃdveṣāya saṃmohāya saṃyogāya saṃkleśāya,
XXavsata_u:987_26: na vyavadānāya nāpacayāya / abhinandanāyopādānāya adhyavasānāya saṃvartate /
XXavsata_u:987_27: yad asya na kṣamate, tad asaṃrāgāya saṃvartate na saṃrāgāya,
XXavsata_u:987_28: asaṃdveṣāya na saṃdveṣāya, asaṃmohāya na saṃmohāya, asaṃyogāya na saṃyogāya, vyavadānāya na saṃkleśāya, apacayāya na saṃcayāya / anabhinandanāyānupādānāya anadhyavasānāya saṃvartate /
XXavsata_u:987_30: ahaṃ caivaṃdṛṣṭiḥ syām*, evaṃvādī: sarvaṃ me kṣamate / dvābhyāṃ me sārdhaṃ syād vigrahaḥ syād vivādaḥ /
XXavsata_u:987_31: yaś ca evaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī: sarvaṃ me na kṣamata iti, yaś ca evaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādi: ekaṃ me kṣamate ekaṃ me na kṣamata iti /
XXavsata_u:987_32: vigrahe sati vivādaḥ, vivāde sati vihiṃsā / iti sa tāṃ savigrahāṃ savivādāṃ savihiṃsāṃ ca samanupaśyann
XXavsata_u:989_0: imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratinisṛjati, anyāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ nopādatte / evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ,
XXavsata_u:989_1: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:989_4: sarvaṃ me na kṣamata iti, dvābhyāṃ me sārdhaṃ syād vigrahaḥ,
XXavsata_u:989_5: syād vivādaḥ / yaś ca evaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī: sarvaṃ me kṣamata iti, yaś ca evaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādi: ekaṃ me kṣamate ekaṃ me na kṣamata iti /
XXavsata_u:989_6: vigrahe sati vivādaḥ, vivāde sati vihiṃsā, iti sa tāṃ savigrahāṃ savivādāṃ savihiṃsāṃ ca samanupaśyann imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratinisṛjati,
XXavsata_u:989_7: anyāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ nopādatte / evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:989_8: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:989_11: sarvaṃ me na kṣamata iti, dvābhyāṃ me sārdhaṃ syād vigrahaḥ,
XXavsata_u:989_12: syād vivādaḥ / yaś caivaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī: sarvaṃ me kṣamata iti, yaś ca evaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādi: ekaṃ me kṣamate ekaṃ me na kṣamate iti /
XXavsata_u:989_13: vigrahe sati vivādaḥ, vivāde sati vihiṃsā, iti sa tāṃ savigrahāṃ savivādāṃ savihiṃsāṃ ca samanupaśyann imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratinisṛjati,
XXavsata_u:989_14: anyāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ nopādatte / evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:989_15: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:989_18: ekaṃ me kṣamate, ekaṃ me na kṣamata iti, dvābhyāṃ me sārdhaṃ syād vigrahaḥ,
XXavsata_u:989_19: syād vivādaḥ / yaś caivaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādī: sarvaṃ me kṣamata iti, yaś ca evaṃdṛṣṭir evaṃvādi: sarvaṃ me na kṣamate iti / vigrahe sati vivādaḥ, vivāde sati vihiṃsā, iti sa tāṃ savigrahāṃ savivādāṃ savihiṃsāṃ ca samanupaśyann imāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ pratinisṛjati,
XXavsata_u:989_20: anyāṃ ca dṛṣṭiṃ nopādatte / evam asyāś ca dṛṣṭeḥ prahāṇaṃ bhavati pratinisargo vāntībhāvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:989_21: anyasyāś ca dṛṣṭer apratisaṃdhir anupādānam aprādurbhāvaḥ /
XXavsata_u:989_22: ayaṃ khalv agnivaiśyāyana kāyo rūpī audārikaś cāturmahābhūtika iti āryaśrāvakeṇa abhīkṣṇam udayavyayānudarśinā vihartavyam*,
XXavsata_u:989_25: yo 'sya bhavati kāye kāyacchandaḥ kāyasnehaḥ kāyapremā kāyālayaḥ kāyaviṣaktiḥ kāyādhyavasānam*,
XXavsata_u:989_26: tac cāsya cittaṃ na paryādāya tiṣṭhati /
XXavsata_u:989_28: katamās tisraḥ? sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /
XXavsata_u:989_29: yasmin samaye śrutavān āryaśrāvakaḥ sukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:989_30: dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ:
XXavsata_u:989_31: duḥkhā ca aduḥkhāsukhā ca / sukhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate /
XXavsata_u:989_33: yasmin samaye āryaśrāvako duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:989_34: dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ,
XXavsata_u:989_35: sukhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca / duḥkhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate /
XXavsata_u:989_37: yasmin samaye āryaśrāvako aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:989_38: dve asya vedane tasmin samaye niruddhe bhavataḥ,
XXavsata_u:989_39: sukhā duḥkhā ca / aduḥkhāsukhām eva ca tasmin samaye āryaśrāvako vedanāṃ vedayate /
XXavsata_u:989_41: tasyaivaṃ bhavati: imā vedanāḥ kiṃnidānāḥ kiṃsamudayāḥ kiṃjātīyāḥ kiṃprabhāvā iti? imā vedanā sparśanidānāḥ sparśasamudayāḥ sparśajātīyāḥ sparśaprabhāvāḥ /
XXavsata_u:989_42: tasya sparśasya samudayāt tās tā vedanāḥ samudayante
XXavsata_u:991_0: tasya sparśasya nirodhāt tās tā vedanā nirudhyante,
XXavsata_u:991_2: sa yāṃ kāṃcid vedanāṃ vedayate sukhāṃ vā duḥkhāṃ vā aduḥkhāsukhā vā,
XXavsata_u:991_3: tāsāṃ vedanānāṃ samudayaṃ cāstaṃgamaṃ cāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāmīti,
XXavsata_u:991_4: tasya vedanānāṃ samudayaṃ cāstaṃgamaṃ cāsvādaṃ cādīnavaṃ ca niḥsaraṇaṃ ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānata utpannāsu vedanāsv anityatānudarśī viharati,
XXavsata_u:991_6: sa kāyaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamānaḥ kāyaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedaya iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
XXavsata_u:991_7: jīvitaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedayamāno jīvitaparyantikāṃ vedanāṃ vedaya iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
XXavsata_u:991_8: bhedāc ca kāyasyorddhvaṃ jīvitaparyādānād ihaivāsya sarvāṇi vedanāni apariśeṣaṃ nirudhyante apariśeṣam astaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchanti /
XXavsata_u:991_9: tasyaivaṃ bhavati: sukhām api vedanāṃ vedayato bhedaḥ kāyasya bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:991_10: eṣa evānto duḥkhasya / duḥkhām api, aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayato bhedaḥ kāyasya bhaviṣyati /
XXavsata_u:991_11: eṣa evānto duḥkhasya / sa sukhām api vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:991_12: visaṃyukto vedayate, na saṃyuktaḥ / duḥkhām api aduḥkhāsukhām api vedanāṃ vedayate,
XXavsata_u:991_13: visaṃyukto vedayate, na saṃyuktaḥ / kena visaṃyuktaḥ? visaṃyukto rāgeṇa dveṣeṇa mohena,
XXavsata_u:991_16: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmāñ śāriputro 'rdhamāsopasaṃpanno bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā bhagavantaṃ vījayan* /
XXavsata_u:991_18: bhagavāṃs teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇam eva varṇayati,
XXavsata_u:991_19: virāgam eva nirodham eva pratiniḥsargam eva varṇayati /
XXavsata_u:991_20: yanv ahaṃ teṣāṃ teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇānudarśī vihareyam*,
XXavsata_u:991_23: āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaiṣāṃ dharmāṇām anityatānudarśino viharato vyayānudarśino virāgānudarśino nirodhānudarśinaḥ pratiniḥsargānudarśino viharataḥ anupādāya āsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktam* /
XXavsata_u:991_24: dīrghanakhasya ca parivrājakasya virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣur utpannam* /
XXavsata_u:991_25: atha dīrghanakhaḥ parivrājako dṛṣṭadharmā prāptadharmā paryavagāḍhadharmā tīrṇakāṅkṣas tīrṇavicikitso 'parapratyayo 'nanyaneyaḥ śāstuḥ śāsane (Speyer:
XXavsata_u:991_26: śāstraśasane) dharmeṣu vaiśāradyaprāpta utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat /
XXavsata_u:991_27: lābheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:991_29: labdhavān dīrghanakhaparivrājakaḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam* /
XXavsata_u:991_30: evaṃ pravrajitaḥ sa āyuṣmān eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā vyahārṣīt* /
XXavsata_u:991_31: eko vyapakṛṣṭo 'pramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan* yad arthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśru avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
XXavsata_u:993_0: dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā pratipadya pravedayate:
XXavsata_u:993_1: kṣīṇā me jātiḥ, uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ, kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti /
XXavsata_u:993_2: ājñātavān sa āyuṣmān arhan babhūva suvimuktacittaḥ /
XXavsata_u:993_4: eṣo 'gro me bhikṣavo bhikṣūṇāṃ mama śrāvakāṇāṃ pratisaṃvitprāptānāṃ yaduta koṣṭhilo bhikṣur iti /
XXavsata_u:993_5: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
XXavsata_u:993_6: kāni bhadanta mahākoṣṭhilena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni,
XXavsata_u:993_7: yena mahāvādī saṃvṛttaḥ / pravrajya cārhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti /
XXavsata_u:993_8: bhagavān āha: koṣṭhilenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:993_10: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:993_11: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:avs_99.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:994_0: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'tīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ pañcamātrāṇi taskaraśatāni senāpatipramukhāṇi cauryeṇa saṃprasthitāni /
XXavsata_u:994_1: yāvat te cañcūryamāṇā anyatamaṃ khadiravaṇam anuprāptāḥ /
XXavsata_u:994_2: yāvat senāpatinābhihitāḥ: paśyata yūyaṃ kamalāyatākṣaḥ kaścid aparakīyo manuṣyaḥ saṃvidyate,
XXavsata_u:994_5: tatas tais taskaraiḥ paryaṭadbhir dṛṣṭvā senāpatisakāśaṃ nītaḥ /
XXavsata_u:994_6: tataś caurasenāpatinā vadhyatām ayam ity ājñā dattā /
XXavsata_u:994_7: tato 'sau pratyekabuddhas teṣām anugrahārthaṃ vitatapakṣa iva haṃsarājaḥ khagapatham abhyudgamya vicitrāṇi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayitum ārabdhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:994_8: tataḥ senāpatir mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya atyayaṃ deśitavān* /
XXavsata_u:994_10: aham apy evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syām*,
XXavsata_u:994_11: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyaṃ mā virāgayeyam iti /
XXavsata_u:994_12: bhagavān āha: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena caurasenāpatiḥ,
XXavsata_u:994_13: ayam evāsau koṣṭhilaḥ / bhūyaḥ kāśyape bhagavati pravrajito babhūva /
XXavsata_u:994_16: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:994_17: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:994_20: idam avocad bhagavān* / āttamanasas te bhikṣavo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan* //
XXavsata_u:998_0: buddho bhagavān satkṛto gurukṛto mānitaḥ pūjito rājabhī rājamātrair dhanibhiḥ pauraiḥ śreṣṭhibhiḥ sārthavāhair devair nāgair yakṣair asurair garuḍaiḥ kinnarair mahoragair iti devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragābhyarcito buddho bhagavān jñāto mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāṃ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ kuśinagaryāṃ viharati mallānām upavartane yamakaśālavane /
XXavsata_u:998_1: atha bhagavāṃs tad eva parinirvāṇakālasamaye āyuṣmantam ānandam āmantrayate sma:
XXavsata_u:998_2: prajñāpaya ānanda tathāgatasya āntareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcam* /
XXavsata_u:998_3: adya tathāgatasya rātryā madhyame yāme nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
XXavsata_u:998_4: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaṃ prajñāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXavsata_u:998_5: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte 'sthāt* /
XXavsata_u:998_6: ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat*:
XXavsata_u:998_7: prajñapto bhadanta tathāgatasya antareṇa yamakaśālayor uttarāśirasaṃ mañcaḥ /
XXavsata_u:998_9: upasaṃkramya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati pādaṃ pādenopadhāya ālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan nirvāṇasaṃjñām eva manasi kurvann iti /
XXavsata_u:998_10: tatra bhagavān rātryā madhyame yāme 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /
XXavsata_u:998_11: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati atyarthaṃ tasmin samaye mahāpṛthivīcālo 'bhūt* ulkāpātā diśodāhāḥ /
XXavsata_u:998_13: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati ubhau yamakaśālavanasya drumottamau tathāgatasya siṃhaśayyāṃ śālapuṣpair avākiratām* /
XXavsata_u:998_14: samanantaraparinirvṛte bhagavati anyataro bhikṣus tasyāṃ velāyāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:avs_100.1_1: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām* //
XXavsata_u:999_0: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati śakro devendro gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:avs_100.2_1: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣāṃ vyupaśamaḥ sukham* // iti
XXavsata_u:1000_0: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati brahmā sahāṃpatir gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:1002_0: samanantaraparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati āyuṣmān āniruddho gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:avs_100.6_1: pradyotasy eva nirvāṇaṃ vimokṣas tasya cetasaḥ //
XXavsata_u:1004_0: saptāhaparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataś citāṃ pradakṣiṇīkurvan* gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
XXavsata_u:avs_100.7_0: yena kāyaratanena nāyako brahmalokam agaman maharddhikaḥ /
XXavsata_u:avs_100.7_1: dahyate sma tanujena tejasā pañcabhir yugaśataiḥ sa veṣṭitaḥ (Speyer: veṣṭhitaḥ) //
XXavsata_u:avs_100.8_0: sahasramātreṇa hi cīvarāṇāṃ buddhasya kāyaḥ pariveṣṭito 'bhūt* / (Speyer: pariveṣṭhito)
XXavsata_u:avs_100.8_1: dve cīvare tatra tu naiva dagdhe abhyantaraṃ bāhyam atha dvitīyam* //
XXavsata_u:1005_0: varṣaśataparinirvṛte buddhe bhagavati pāṭaliputre nagare rājā aśoko rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamaraṃ taskararogāpagataṃ śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannam* /
XXavsata_u:1005_2: yāvad apareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
XXavsata_u:1005_3: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā /
XXavsata_u:1005_4: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā /
XXavsata_u:1005_5: dārako jāto abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ kuṇālasadṛśābhyāṃ netrābhyām* /
XXavsata_u:1005_6: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate:
XXavsata_u:1005_8: jñātaya ūcuḥ: yasmād asya jātamātrasya kuṇālasadṛśe netre,
XXavsata_u:1005_9: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya kuṇāla iti nāmeti /
XXavsata_u:1005_10: kuṇālo dārako 'ṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo datto dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyām* /
XXavsata_u:1005_11: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpimaṇḍenānyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣaiḥ /
XXavsata_u:1005_13: tatas taṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ rājā utsaṅgena kṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ prekṣya rūpasaṃpadā praharṣita uvāca:
XXavsata_u:1005_15: tatra ca samaye gāndhāre puṣpabherotso nāma grāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:1005_16: tatrānyatamasya gṛhapateḥ putro jāto 'tikrānto mānuṣaṃ varṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
XXavsata_u:1007_1: puṣpasaṃpannaṃ ca mahad udyānaṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca /
XXavsata_u:1007_2: yatra yatra kumāro gacchati tatra tatra ca puṣkariṇī udyānaṃ ca prādurbhavati /
XXavsata_u:1007_5: tato 'pareṇa samayena puṣpabherotsād vaṇijaḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena pāṭaliputraṃ gatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:1007_6: te prābhṛtam ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśam upagatāḥ /
XXavsata_u:1007_7: tataḥ pādayor nipatya prābhṛtaṃ rājñe upanamayya purastād vyavasthitāḥ /
XXavsata_u:1007_8: tato rājā aśokas teṣāṃ kuṇālaṃ darśayati:
XXavsata_u:1007_9: haṃ bho vaṇijaḥ, kadācit kutracid bhavadbhiḥ paryaṭadbhir evaṃvidhaṃ rūpaviśeṣayuktaṃ dṛṣṭapūrvam iti ? tatas te vaṇijaḥ kṛtakarapuṭāḥ pādayor nipatya abhayaṃ mārgayitvā rājānam ūcuḥ:
XXavsata_u:1007_10: asti deva asmadīye viṣaye sundaro nāma kumāro 'tikrānto mānuṣaṃ varṇam asaṃprāptaś ca divyaṃ varṇam* /
XXavsata_u:1007_11: janmani cāsya divyagandhodakaparipūrṇā ratnamayī puṣkariṇī prādurbhūtā,
XXavsata_u:1007_13: yatra yatra ca kumāro gacchati tatra tatra puṣkariṇī udyānaṃ ca prādurbhavati /
XXavsata_u:1007_14: śrutvā rājā aśokaḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ /
XXavsata_u:1007_16: eṣa rājā aśoka āgantum icchati sundarasya kumārasya darśanahetoḥ /
XXavsata_u:1007_17: yad vaḥ kṛtyaṃ vā karaṇīyaṃ vā tat kurudhvam iti /
XXavsata_u:1007_18: tato mahājanakāyo bhītāḥ: yadi rājā mahāsādhanena ihāgamiṣyati,
XXavsata_u:1007_20: tataḥ sa kumāro bhadrayānaṃ yojayitvā śatasahasraṃ ca muktāhāraṃ prābhṛtasyārthe datvā aśokasya sakāśaṃ preṣitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:1007_22: śatasahasraṃ ca muktāhāraṃ gṛhītvā rājño 'śokasya sakāśam anuprāptaḥ /
XXavsata_u:1007_23: rājā aśokaś ca sahadarśanāt sundarasya kumārasya rūpaṃ śobhāṃ varṇapuṣkalatāṃ ca divyāṃ puṣkariṇīm udyānaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam upagataḥ /
XXavsata_u:1007_24: tato rājā aśokaḥ sthaviropaguptasya vismayajananārthaṃ sundaraṃ ca kumāram ādāya kukkuṭāgāraṃ gataḥ /
XXavsata_u:1007_27: tataḥ sa sthavirasya pādābhivandanaṃ kṛtvā purastān niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya /
XXavsata_u:1007_29: tataḥ kumāraḥ paripakvasaṃtatir dharmaṃ śrutvā pravrajyābhilāṣī saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:1007_30: sa rājānam aśokam anujñāpya sthaviropaguptasya sakāśe pravrajitaḥ /
XXavsata_u:1007_31: tena yujyamānena ghaṭamānena vyāyacchamānena idam eva pañcagaṇḍakaṃ saṃsāracakraṃ calācalaṃ viditvā sarvasaṃskāragatīḥ śatanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṃsanadharmatayā parāhatya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam* /
XXavsata_u:1007_32: arhan saṃvṛttaḥ traidhātukavītarāgaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcana ākāśapāṇitalasamacitto vāsīcandanakalpo vidyāvidāritāṇḍakośo vidyābhijñāpratisaṃvitprāpto bhavalābhalobhasatkāraparāṅmukhaḥ /
XXavsata_u:1007_33: sendropendrāṇāṃ devānāṃ pūjyo mānyo 'bhivādyaś ca saṃvṛttaḥ /
XXavsata_u:1007_34: tato rājā aśokaḥ saṃdigdhaḥ sthaviraṃ pṛcchati:
XXavsata_u:1007_36: yenāsyaivaṃvidhaṃ rūpam*, kāni punaḥ karmāṇi yena divyagandhodakaparipūrṇā ratnamayī puṣkariṇī prādurbhūtā,
XXavsata_u:1007_37: puṣpaphalasamṛddhaṃ ca mahad udyānaṃ jaṅgamam*? sthaviropagupta āha:
XXavsata_u:1009_0: mahārāja pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyaṃbhāvīni /
XXavsata_u:1009_2: ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
XXavsata_u:1009_3: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca:
XXavsata_u:1010_1: tadā āyuṣmān mahākāśyapaḥ pañcaśataparivāro magadheṣu janapadacārikāṃ caran dharmasaṃgītiṃ kartukāmaḥ /
XXavsata_u:1010_2: yāvad anyatamena daridrakarṣakeṇa mahān bhikṣusaṃgho dṛṣṭaḥ,
XXavsata_u:1010_5: tatas tena kāśyapapramukhāṇi pañca bhikṣuśatāni jentākasnātreṇopanimantritāni /
XXavsata_u:1010_6: tatas tena nānāgandhaparibhāvitam uṣṇodakaṃ kṛtvā te bhikṣavaḥ snāpitāḥ,
XXavsata_u:1010_7: cīvarakāṇi śobhitāni / praṇītena cāhāreṇa saṃtarpya śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadāni datvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam*:
XXavsata_u:1010_8: asminn eva śākyamuneḥ pravacane pravrajya cārhatvaṃ prāpnuyām iti /
XXavsata_u:1010_9: kiṃ manyase mahārāja yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena daridrakarṣakaḥ,
XXavsata_u:1010_10: ayaṃ sa sundaro bhikṣuḥ / yat tena bhikṣavo jentākasnātreṇa snāpitāḥ,
XXavsata_u:1010_12: divyacandanodakaparipūrṇā ramaṇīyā puṣkariṇī puṣpaphalasamṛddhaṃ ca mahad udyānaṃ jaṅgamaṃ prāptam* /
XXavsata_u:1010_15: iti hi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
XXavsata_u:1010_16: ekāntaśuklānām ekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ / tasmāt tarhi mahārāja ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
XXavsata_u:1010_19: atha rāhā aśoka āyuṣmataḥ sthaviropaguptasya bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ //
